name: Hostal Mar y Huerta
address: Avenida Es Canar, 118, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Enjoy an authentic Balearic break with a stay at this welcoming, small hotel, set just off the clean, golden sands of Es Canar’s beach on Ibiza’s east coast. Relax at the family-friendly Mar y Huerta with an afternoon spent around the outdoor swimming pool. Here you will find free sun loungers, allowing you to soak up the Mediterranean sunshine in comfort. As you unwind, children can enjoy themselves in the playground or on the pool table. There is also a snack bar, offers refreshing drinks and light snacks for the terrace, as well as a buffet restaurant open for breakfast and dinner.

name: Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle & Spa
address: Salvador Camacho, 14, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: The new Aguas de Ibiza Lifestyle and Spa Hotel is the new concept of 5* luxury hotels with 112 rooms designed and managed by the Torres family as an expression of their worship of Ibiza. It is located in Santa Eulalia del R?o a few distance of Ibiza, beside the new congress palace. The hotel has modern facilities for any event, a restaurant with traditional cuisine, a chill out area, Air Ibiza and a bar.priceline.com

name: Catalonia Ses Estaques - Adults Only
address: Cala Ses Estaques, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Catalonia Ses Estaques is located on the Ibizan coast, just outside Santa Eulalia del Rio. This elegant, adults-only hotel offers an outdoor pool and 2 hot tubs. Rooms at Ses Estaques are air-conditioned and spacious. They all have satellite TV, a minibar and a safe. Rooms also have a private bathroom. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Hotel Ses Estaques has attractive gardens and sun terraces. It offers views of Santa Eulalia town centre and the marina. The Ses Estaques has an à la carte restaurant next to the sea, serving classic Ibizan and Mediterranean dishes. The hotel has a poolside snack bar. Live music and animation in English are available on the terrace. The hotel has a 24-hour reception, with currency exchange and car rental services. There is free public parking on site.

name: Hotel Boutique & Spa Las Mimosas Ibiza
address: Carrer de Burgos 29, Es Serral, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set in a residential area, this sophisticated boutique hotel with views of the Balearic Sea is a 9-minute walk from Pouet Beach and 18 km from Ibiza Airport. Featuring stylish modern furnishings, the airy suites have private balconies or terraces, pull-out sofas and free Wi-Fi, as well as flat-screen TVs and minifridges. Some come with sea views. Upgraded suites add separate living areas. Breakfast and parking are complimentary. Amenities include a bar/restaurant, a spa area and an outdoor pool.WebBeds

name: azuLine Hotel Bergantin
address: C/Albacete 5-7, 07839 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This establishment is located in Bahía de San Antonio de Ibiza, one of the most important tourist areas of the island, This informal hotel is a 2 minute-walk from the closest beach along the Mediterranean Sea and 5 km from the Aquarium Cap Blanc. It's 19 km from the Ibiza Airport. All air-conditioned rooms at azuLine Hotel Bergantin have a furnished balcony, some with sea views. Each room includes satellite TV, a safe, telephone and a private bathroom including toiletries.The hotel has a 24-hour reception desk and offers a car rental and ticket service. Sant Antoni de Portmany Ferry Terminal with crossings to Denia is just 1.6 mi away and Breakfast is included. All meals are served buffet-style with live cooking stations in the main restaurant, Playa Sa Flama. There is also an on-site pub and a snack bar. The hotel offers a family/activity swimming pool and an Adults Only pool. There is also a kids' pool with a pirate ship, as well as a mini club (ages 4-12) and a playground to keep the little ones happy. Other facilities include tennis, mini golf, volleyball, games room, gym, sauna, hot tub and a daily entertainment programme of activities and professional shows. The beach is just a short walk from the hotel, and there is a bus stop close by that allows you to explore the rest of the island as much as you like.FarePortal

name: Iberostar Santa Eulalia - Adults Only
address: Calle Mestral, 42, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Santa Eulália del Río, Iberostar Selection Santa Eulalia Ibiza is just 20 metres from S’Argamassa Beach. This hotel is for adults only and offers an outdoor pool and a terrace with sun loungers. The rooms feature air conditioning, satellite TV and a private bathroom. All rooms have a private balcony or terrace and most have views of the sea, outdoor pool or gardens. Es Vedra terrace bar offers daily shows, music and entertainment in the evening. The centre of Santa Eulália del Río is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the hotel. Es Canar is 1 km away and Ibiza Old Town is 15 km away.

name: Aparthotel Duquesa Playa
address: Calle San Lorenzo, 16-18, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated 300 metres from Ibiza’s Santa Eulalia Beach, Duquesa Playa has a roof terrace with swimming pool, snack bar and panoramic views. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each functional Duquesa Playa apartment features a balcony. Apartments include air conditioning, heating, and a bright living-dining area with a flat-screen TV and a sofa. The kitchen includes a microwave, fridge and a toaster. You can choose from Spanish and international dishes in the Duquesa Playa’s café-restaurant. There are also plenty of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the apartments. Santa Eulalia Marina is only 150 metres from the apartments. The popular Hippy Market in Es Canar is less than 5 km away, while Ibiza Town is within 14 km.

name: Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel - Adults Only
address: Ctra. Playa den Bossa 10, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Set on Playa d’en Bossa Beach, the adults-only Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel features a spa and 3 outdoor pools with large sun beds. Guests enjoy free entrance to live DJ performances hosted by the hotel. The minimalist rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a 42-inch plasma TV and iPod docking station. They also feature a furnished terrace. The Ushuaia Ibiza Beach Hotel is made up of 2 separate buildings. The Ushuaia Club houses the bedrooms and hosts the hotel's famous parties. The exclusive Ushuaia Tower offers 24-hour room service, an outdoor pool, Balinese beds and a poolside cocktail bar. The hotel offers the Minami Japanese fusion restaurant with a Zen garden, as well as a Beach Club restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine. The property's Montauk Steak House restaurant specialises in steaks and other grilled meats. The hotel is 2 km from Ibiza Airport and 3 km from Ibiza Old Town. It is located directly opposite Hi Ibiza. Check the hotel's app for available services.

name: azuLine Hotel Pacific
address: C/ Londres 2, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Enjoy the vibrant atmosphere and warm sunshine of Ibiza with a stay at this sunny holiday hotel, set just off a beautiful beach and with its own unique outdoor pool. Spend your day on the magnificent beaches of San Antonio Bay, just 200 metres from the Pacific. The outdoor pool features loungers and a poolside bar. An amusement arcade, table tennis and pool table are also available to entertain the younger guests. Head to the nearby jetty to take a boat trip around the local coastline. Then, in the evenings, take the 200-metre journey into San Antonio town centre to enjoy its world-famous nightlife, shops and restaurants.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Ibiza Santa Eulalia
address: Calle Pou Roig, nº 1, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located on Es Caná beachfront, Leonardo Royal Hotel Ibiza Santa Eulalia features a shared terrace, swimming pools, a solarium and rooms with balconies. The air-conditioned rooms come with a wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Daytime and evening entertainment for both adults and children are offered on site. Surrounded by pine groves and the sea, the area is popular for water sports. Ibiza Town is 21 km away and a 30-minute drive will take you to Ibiza Airport.

name: Casa Maca Hotel
address: Can Palau De Dalt, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 10 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring private spa tubs and LED televisions. Your bed comes with down comforters and premium bedding. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Satellite programming and MP3 docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature jetted bathtubs and rainfall showerheads. Amenities Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Ibiza Town, Casa Maca Hotel is in the mountains, within a 10-minute drive of Marina Botafoch and Dalt Vila. This family-friendly hotel is 2.5 mi (4 km) from Port of Ibiza and 3 mi (4.8 km) from Bossa Beach. Dining Enjoy Mediterranean cuisine at Casa Maca, a restaurant which features a bar/lounge and an ocean view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wrap up your day with a drink at the poolside bar. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to noon for a fee. name: Bless Hotel Ibiza, a member of The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Cala Nova - Es Canar, 07849 Es Canar, Ibiza Island
description: Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea and the island of Tagomago, Bless Hotel Ibiza is located in a quiet part of eastern Ibiza. It features an outdoor infinity pool and direct beach access. All air-conditioned rooms come with a private furnished terrace or balcony, satellite TV and an iPod docking station. There is also a fan, safe and desk. The private bathroom has a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has a bar and restaurant and 24-hour reception. The Micheline star restaurant Etxeko at the accommodation is run by the 12 Michelin-starred chef Martin Berasategui, and serve special menu. Other facilities available at the property are a gym, spa and meeting rooms. In the nearby resort of Es Canar is one of the island’s most famous hippy markets. The town of Santa Eulalia is only 5 km away.

name: Hotel Portmany
address: Paseo de Las Fuentes, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Portmany has air-conditioned guest accommodation in San Antonio, 400 metres from San Antonio Beach, 1.1 km from Calo des Moro Beach and 1.6 km from Es Pouet Beach. Complimentary WiFi is featuredthroughout the property. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave and a toaster, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware are also offered, as well as a coffee machine. A Full English/Irish, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At Hotel Portmany you will find a restaurant serving Indian, Italian and Japanese cuisine. The accommodation provides a housekeeping service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Both a bicycle rental service and a car rental service are available at Hotel Portmany, while cycling and hiking can be enjoyed nearby. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include San Antonio Port, San Antonio Bus Station and Cap Blanc Aquarium. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 17 km from Hotel Portmany.

name: Hotel Vibra San Remo
address: C/ Cala de Bou, 32, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Hotel San Remo is next to S'Éstanyol Beach. All the modern rooms feature air conditioning, free WiFi and a private terrace overlooking the sea or island. Hotel San Remo offers an entertainment programme, with organised daily performances twice a week. Children can also have fun in their own pool and play area. The hotel has a buffet restaurant, as well as a pool-side bar. There is a 24-hour reception and wired internet is available in public areas, for an extra cost. Near the San Remo you will find plenty of opportunities to practise water sports as well as a variety of bars and restaurant.

name: Tropicana Ibiza Suites - Adults Only
address: Deessa Tanit, nº 10-12, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Featuring an outdoor pool and sun terrace, Tropicana Ibiza Suites - Adults Only is located in Playa d’en Bossa, 100 metres from the nearest beach. Playa d'en Bossa Town Centre is 300 metres away. All suites are air-conditioned and have a full kitchenette with a Smeg minibar. They also feature a 32-inch flat-screen TV with satellite channels and USB connection. Each suite provides Bluetooth speakers. The private bathroom includes a shower and hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout. Guests have access to free luggage storage and a sun terrace, complete with beds and free pool towels. Guests at Tropicana also have free access to the beachfront swimming pool at the Hotel Dorado Ibiza, located 100 metres away. Other facilities at the property include a 24-hour lobby bar and terrace, and 24-hour front desk. You can find several restaurants and bars in the surrounding area, including the famous Hi and Ushuaia nightclubs. The beach is only 100 metres from the property.

name: Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas
address: Carretera Sa Canal de Ses Salines, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas features a garden, a shared lounge and a sun terrace with swimming pool and continental breakfast in Ibiza Town. Among the various facilities are a bar, water sports facilities, as well as a tennis court. The accommodation provides evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Spanish and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas offers a children's playground. Activities such as hiking, windsurfing, diving can be enjoyed in the surroundings, and guests can relax along the beachfront. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Las Salinas Beach is 400 metres from the accommodation, while Es Cavallet Beach is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 5 km from Boutique Hostal La Curandera de Salinas.

name: Invisa Hotel Club Cala Verde
address: Playa Des Figueral, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: This new holiday resort complex is set just off Es Figueral beach, boasting fantastic views of the bay. It lies 25 km from Ibiza City. Take in the magnificent sea views from the hotel’s sun terrace, which surrounds the 2 outdoor swimming pools. Enjoy an active session playing tennis, 5-a-side football or volleyball before relaxing in front of the live entertainment with a meal from the hotel’s Mediterranean buffet restaurant.

name: Suite Hotel S'Argamassa Palace
address: Avinguda De S'Argamassa, 82, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Built around an inviting outdoor swimming pool, this suite hotel offers spectacular views over the beach and the Mediterranean Sea beyond – great for a peaceful break on picturesque Ibiza. It offers free Wi-Fi. The S’Argamassa Palace is surrounded by tranquil pine forests on the island’s east coast. It looks out over the golden sands of Cala Pada beach. Take a swim in the beach's clear waters or in the property’s central swimming pool, designed for both adults and children. The hotel features a gym and a hot tub. Beauty treatments are available. Finish off the day by choosing from the varied cuisine served at the hotel restaurant. This charming venue serves dishes ranging from innovative creations to traditional Spanish dishes, all out on the comfortable terrace. The S’Argamassa Palace is just 3 minutes from the Palacio de Congresos de Santa Eulalia.

name: Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay
address: Cami Ses Feixes 52, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Seafront on Ibiza’s Talamanca Beach, Nobu Hotel Ibiza Bay offers spa access, two pools, a kid’s club and rooftop terrace suites. Ibiza Town is 3 km away. Each room is decorated with luxurious details and equipped with free WiFi. All offer marble bathrooms with rainfall showers, floor to ceiling windows and open terraces with sea or garden views. The suites are spacious and come with a plush lounge area and separate dressing room. Some include a kitchenette and private plunge pool. The resort has four restaurants and bars, offering a variety of options for all tastes. Bay Café serves gluten-free dishes and the Nobu restaurant serves Japanese-Nikkei fusion cuisine. There is also a beachfront chiringuito-style restaurant, which serves fresh sea food. Ibiza Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Puchet
address: Avenue Doctor Fleming, 51, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Puchet is in a quiet area of Sant Antoni de Portmany, 600 metres from Es Pouet Beach. It offers free WiFi and a large outdoor swimming pool open from May to October. All rooms at the Hotel Puchet have a private balcony and satellite TV. The Puchet's air-conditioned café-restaurant serves international food. Buffet meal is available. Other facilities at Hotel Puchet include a poolside terrace. There is also an onsite supermarket and TV room.

name: Hotel Rural Ca's Pla
address: Venda Del Rubio, 59, 07819 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Ibiza Island
description: Offering luxurious rooms and a seasonal outdoor pool, Hotel Rural Cas Pla is surrounded by forest, 5 minutes’ drive from the beaches at Port de Sant Miquel. It offers sea views from its attractive gardens. Each air-conditioned room at the Cas Pla has beautiful décor with tiled floors and wooden furnishings. All rooms have ceiling fans, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The Hotel Rural has a charming terrace with sofas overlooking the gardens. There is also a bar and a relaxing lounge area. Free Wi-Fi is available here. Set in the village of San Miquel de Balansat, the Cas Pla is a 30-minute drive from Ibiza Town and the island’s airport. Santa Eulària des Riu is 17 km away.

name: Agroturismo Can Marquet
address: Carretera de San Lorenzo, km. 1 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, 07814 Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Ibiza Rocks Hotel - Adults Only
address: Carrer Cervantes, 27, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Located in San Antonio centre, Ibiza Rocks Hotel - Adults Only is set 10 minutes' walk from Sant Antoni Beach, and 5 minutes from the Sunset Strip and the West End. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. It offers rooms with a balcony, flat-screen TV, and in-room fridge. The bathroom comes with free toiletries and a shower. The hotel has 2 pools and an Ibiza Rocks merchandise shop. Hosting Pool Parties every day, general admission tickets to all the events happening during your stay are included in the price of your room. The hotel also offers multiple bars and restaurants, as well as a supermarket. There are several taxi and bus stops nearby that can take you to the main points of the city. Staff at the Host Team can provide information about what to see and do in Ibiza. Important Note: The Ibiza Rocks Venue will not be open every day between 30th March & 25th April 2023 (and our Poolside Sessions events will be advertised on our website to detail the days the venue will be open) and the Ibiza Rocks Venue is closed to hotel guests for a private event on Friday 5th May 2023.

name: Om Hotels
address: Disseminat sa Caleta, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Sant Francesc de s'Estany, 70 metres from Es Codolar Beach, OM Hotels offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. The property is situated 1.2 km from Sa Caleta Beach, 1.5 km from Es Bol Nou Beach and 11 km from Ibiza Port. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a concierge service and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, the rooms have a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, all guest rooms at OM Hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and certain rooms also offer a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms include bed linen and towels. An Italian breakfast is available every morning at OM Hotels. Marina Botafoch is 12 km from the hotel, while Aguamar Water Park is 6.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 2 km from OM Hotels.

name: Insotel Club Tarida Playa
address: C/ San Ferrán, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Cas Gasi
address: Camino Viejo De Sant Mateu, Santa Gertrudis de Fruitera, Ibiza Island
description: Cas Gasi is a luxury hotel located in the countryside, just 15 minutes from the main beaches and attractions of Ibiza. It features two outdoor swimming pools, the bigger quiet one for adults, the other one for children, and beautiful gardens. The rural house reflects traditional Ibizan architecture with its large porches and terraces. The interior décor features antiques, elegant furniture and rustic details. All rooms at Hotel Cas Gasi have a view and are equipped with a private bathroom as well as free Wi-Fi. Cas Gasi's restaurant features fresh, seasonal Mediterranean cuisine made with vegetables from its organic garden, local meat and seafood, and an international wine list. Room Service is offered until 23:00 Guests are welcome to enjoy massages and beauty treatments at the spa as well as personal training and yoga. Bikes, electric bikes and an electric car are available for hire. The property's concierge service can book restaurants and clubs, excursions, private yoga and Pilates classes, boat hire, childcare and more.

name: Marina Palace by Intercorp Hotel Group
address: Caló 104, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Located on the seafront of San Antonio Bay, Can Salia offers a range of facilities and apartments, some of them with beautiful sea views. This hotel features accommodation with balconies. Each apartment at Can Salia has a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, cooker and fridge. A cleaning service is also provided everyday. The Can Salia complex features two outdoor swimming pools and Gym. Fishing and scuba diving are also available on site. The Roof Top Swimming Pool is Only Adults (People under 16 years old are not permitted in this area. Within 500 metres of Can Salia guests can find many restaurants, bars and shops. The complex also has its own restaurant called Taste of Salia. The restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner and offers views of the Mediterranean Sea. Buffet breakfast is served in Taste of Salia restaurant by the sea. The apartments are 900 metres from Port des Torrent and Des Pinet Beaches and a 20 minute drive from San José Airport. Ibiza Town is less than 20 km from Can Salia.

name: Can Jaume by Ocean Drive
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 12 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Can Jaume by Ocean Drive in Santa Eulalia del Rio, you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Port of Ibiza and Bossa Beach. This 4-star hotel is 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Dalt Vila and 2.9 mi (4.7 km) from Talamanca Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's coffee shop/cafe, or stay in and take advantage of the room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 30 April, EUR 0.83 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 0.41 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. name: Agroturismo Sa Vinya d'en Palerm
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 5 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have jetted bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. Additional features at this farm stay include complimentary wireless Internet access, a communal living room, and tour/ticket assistance. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location Located in Sant Joan de Labritja, Agroturismo Sa Vinya d'en Palerm is within a 15-minute drive of Benirras Beach and Cala Xarraca Beach. This farm stay is 9.2 mi (14.8 km) from Marina Botafoch and 9.6 mi (15.5 km) from Talamanca Beach. Dining Wrap up your day with a drink at the poolside bar. Renovations The property is closed during January, February, March, November, and December. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 30 April, EUR 0.55 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 0.28 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 May - 31 October, EUR 2.20 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 1.10 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. name: El Somni Ibiza Dream Hotel by Grupotel
address: Cala San Vicente, 7811, Cala San Vicente, 07811 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Look out over the golden sands and clear waters of San Vicente Beach from this hotel. It is surrounded by some of the natural scenery on the island of Ibiza. At El Somni Ibiza Dream Hotel by Grupotel you can enjoy a game of tennis on the hotel’s own courts before a refreshing dip in the outdoor swimming pool. The hotel offers la carte restaurant with sea view and the evening’s entertainment of shows, live music and dancing. The hotel has a Spa & Wellness area with indoor pool with jets, sauna, ice fountain and massage cabin.

name: The Purple Hotel by Ibiza Feeling - Adults only
address: Carrer D'Antoni Riquer, 23, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: The Purple Hotel - Gay Super Friendly boasts an outdoor pool and sun terrace in Sant Antoni De Portmany. Cafe del Mar, Mambo, Savannah and Coastline Cafe are 7 minutes' walk away. Painted in purple, the air-conditioned bedrooms include a flat-screen TV and free WiFi and a bathroom. Guests have access to a lounge and bar. The hotel also features a restaurant. The Purple Hotel - Gay Super Friendly is within walking distance of the harbour with its seafront promenade, only 400 metres away, and the West End with all its shops and nightlife.

name: Agroturismo Xarc
address: Can Cosmi, Es Nuvells, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Agroturismo Can Pardal
address: Carrer De Missa 3, 07815 Sant Miquel de Balansat, Ibiza Island
description: The attractive Can Pardal is located in Sant Miquel de Balansat in Ibiza. This restored 15th-century country house offers a garden, outdoor pool and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at Agroturismo Can Pardal feature traditional Balearic décor, with tiled floors, white walls and wooden beams. Each one has flat-screen satellite TV and an iPod docking station. A pillow menu is available. The hotel’s restaurant serves a set menu on request. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Ibiza. Massage, bicycle and car rental services are also available. You can drive to Ibiza’s north coast in just 7 minutes. Ibiza Town is a 20-minute drive from Can Pardal, and Ibiza-San José Airport is around 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Brisa
address: Carrer De Valencia, 15, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: The adults-only Hotel Brisa - Adults only is located in San Antonio, Ibiza, just 400 metres from the beach. It has a swimming pool, and is 5 minutes’ walk from Café del Mar. The rooms in the Brisa Hotel are simple and spacious, and most have balconies. All have air-conditioning and a TV. WiFi is available for a supplement in rooms and free of charge in public areas. Next to the pool is a large sun-bathing terrace with loungers, as well as a snack bar. The Hotel Brisa - Adults only also has a lounge with satellite TV, billiards and table tennis. The centre of Sant Antoni, with its shops, is just 5 minutes’ walk away. Other nearby sunset bars include Mambo.

name: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only
address: Playa Es Canar, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: AluaSoul Ibiza - Adults only is a 4-star hotel featuring a wellness centre, a fitness area, swimming pool and Balinese beds located in Santa Eularia des Riu. Las Dalias Hippy Market is 3.5 km away. Each modern room here will provide you with air conditioning, a balcony and satellite channels. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. A free safe is also available. There is an a la carte restaurant and a buffet-style restaurant, two bars and a show cooking. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff and a tour desk. The hotel is 3.3 km from Ibiza Conference Centre and 1.2 km from Nikki Beach Ibiza. Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport is 23 km away.

name: Hostal Adelino
address: Alicante, 16, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hostal Adelino is located 500 metres from San Antonio's central bus station, in Ibiza. It offers 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool with a sun terrace and bar. Each air-conditioned room at Hostal Adelino comes with a TV, safe and minibar. All have a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Many also have their own balcony. Adelino’s café-bar opens from 08:00 until late. Here guests can enjoy a wide range of light meals, ice creams and cocktails. A snooker table, TV and a free internet point can be found in Adelino’s lounge. Staff at the guest house’s 24-hour front desk can book tickets for nightclubs and ferries. The property can also arrange bicycle and car hire, as well as horse riding lessons and routes. Eden Nightclub is 900 metres from the Adelino, and Es Paradis is 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Agroturismo Can Pere Sord
address: Km. 17.4, Ctra. San Lorenzo, 07812 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Axelbeach Ibiza Spa & Beach Club - Adults Only
address: Calle Cala de Bou 46., 07800 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set on the beachfront at San Antonio Beach, AxelBeach Ibiza is an adults only hotel featuring 2 outdoor pools, a free spa and a gym with sea views. The modern, air-conditioned suites and apartments come with a sofa bed and a kitchen with a fridge, microwave and a Bosch coffee machine. All have a balcony or terrace with sea views, as well as free WiFi. The private bathroom includes free toiletries, hairdryer, bathrobe and slippers. The spa includes a hot tub, hammam and sauna. A massage service is also available for an extra charge. There is a restaurant and café with a chill out terrace and a poolside bar. The complex also has direct beach access and a beach club with a restaurant and bar service, and sun beds for rent. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge. There is 24-hour reception and a laundry service is available. Ibiza Airport is 23 minutes' drive away and Ses Salines Beach is 27 km from AxelBeach Ibiza - Adults Only. There is parking onsite at a cost.

name: Hostal Los Pinos
address: Calle Pou Den Cardona 27, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Santa Eularia des Riu, Hostal Los Pinos is a perfect starting point from which to explore Ibiza. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hostal Los Pinos. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with flat screen television, linens, towels, closet, fan. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Ibiza has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hostal Los Pinos.Agoda

name: Invisa Hotel Club Cala Blanca
address: Platja d' Es Figueral, Sant Carles de Peralta, Ibiza Island
description: This hotel is situated in the residential area of Playa d’Es Figueral, 10 km from Santa Eulalia del Río and in complete harmony with the landscape and the surrounding beach. A full late breakfast is served at the Marina Restaurant. Guests can also enjoy a bar as well as other on site facilities such as a fitness centre and a sun terrace. These spaces are ideal for family tourism. You can enjoy the magnificent beach here, the swimming pools and themed dinners. The little ones can enjoy their own swimming pool and other recreational activities.

name: Ocean Drive Talamanca
address: Carrer de Jesús, 28, 07800 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Ocean Drive Talamanca is just 50 metres from Talamanca Beach and offers sea views. It features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, and rooms with balconies and free WiFi. Set in a fine location in Ibiza, the hotel offers a concept that aims to personalize the guest experience with a variety of services. The property offers simple, bright décor. Each of its air-conditioned rooms has satellite TV. Guests benefit from 2 free bottles of water upon arrival. The Ocean Drive Talamanca buffet restaurant serves breakfast buffet and overlooks Talamanca Bay. You can get lunch at the hotel's snack bar. There is a direct bus to nearby Ibiza Town, which stops 25 metres from the hotel. Nightclubs including Pacha and Space are a 15-minute drive away. Ferries to the other Balearic islands and mainland Spain leave from the city’s port, 2 km away. Seasonal hotel open from May until October.

name: Nereida Aparthotel
address: Carrer De Madrid, 10, 07829 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This aparthotel is located on the seafront in the beautiful rocky coast of Southern Ibiza, only 300 metres from a sandy beach and in a quiet place near a leisure and entertainment zone. It offers spacious studios and apartments with a large range of excellent facilities such as a balcony, kitchen and private bathroom. The aparthotel has a chill-out terrace from which guests can enjoy the spectacular sunsets of this Balearic Island or have a swim at the pool, while listening to DJ music. The aparthotel also has a buffet restaurant serving a wide variety of national and international dishes.FarePortal

name: Typic Marina Playa - Adults Only
address: Carrer Del Sol Sortint, Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Set on Es Pueto Beach and offering panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, Marina Playa features an outdoor pool and a sun terrace with Balinese beds and sun loungers. The air-conditioned modern rooms feature stylish, Mediterranean décor. There is a living room with a sofa bed and a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a kitchenette. Free Wi-Fi is included. Apartments also feature a furnished balcony or terrace. The Marina Playa has a rooftop bar, Aperture, where guests can enjoy snacks, cocktails and sea views. The complex also features a sports bar, Toro, offering a wide range of beers and sandwiches. A continental breakfast is served every morning. There is a 24-hour reception and staff can help with tourist information, tickets and excursions. They can also arrange car hire, boat hire, and other activities such as water sports. The town centre is 10 minutes' walk down the seafront promenade, and there is a bus stop just meters away, offering easy access to all parts of Ibiza. Hotel Apartamentos Marina Playa is 23 km away from Ibiza Airport, and a transfer service is available to and from the airport.

name: Trs Ibiza Hotel
address: Carretera Cala Gracio (Cami Del Portixol 1) Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: TRS Ibiza Hotel -All Inclusive Adults Only Hotel, a luxury hotel with direct access to the beach, is located in the San Antonio area next to Cala Gració and Cala Gracioneta, two beautiful coves with crystal clear waters surrounded by Mediterranean vegetation. This environment of great beauty is perfect for you to enjoy exclusive vacations as a couple or with friends that include premium services, an exquisite gastronomic offer of its 3 a la carte restaurants, 24-hour butler service and the Infinite Indulgence experience, the All Inclusive that goes further beyond excellence. The Signature Level rooms includes services, amenities, exclusive drinks, minibar. Access to the Gravity Sky Lounge with Infinity pool, access to exclusive sun lounger area by the Io pool. Access to the Zentropia Spa to enjoy water circuit. Selected events at Ushuaia, Hard Rock and Hi club. Dine out, that include exclusive menus in a selection of Ibiza´s restaurants. TRS Ibiza offers you rooms and suites with hydromassage bathtubs, treatments and massages from Zentropia Palladium Spa & Wellness, three restaurants and four bars, three swimming pools and a complete menu of activities like yoga, Pilates and live music.

name: Aparthotel Vibra Bay
address: Carrer Vedranell, 6, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor pool and a gym, this hotel is only 3 minutes’ walk from the beach. Aparthotel Vibra Bay features a large sports court. La Sirena has a pool-side bar and a restaurant. There is also a lounge and a games room with a billiard table. The pool area has a sun terrace with free hammocks. The air-conditioned rooms come with free WiFi, a satellite TV and a kitchenette. They have a private bathroom and some of them offer views of the pool. Water sports and other activities can be practised in Es Puet Beach, which is a few metres away from Aparthotel Vibra Bay. Located in San Antonio Bay, the town centre is 600 metres away, while the harbour is less than 1 km away. Ibiza Airport is a 23-minute drive.

name: Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa
description: Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa is a luxury apartment complex, located 150 metres from Playa d’en Bossa beach. It has outdoor pools, free WiFi, 24-hour reception and free public parking nearby. The complex offers modern apartments with stylish décor. Each air-conditioned apartment at Migjorn Ibiza has a kitchenette and a spacious living area with satellite TV. Set in attractive gardens, the Migjorn Ibiza Suites & Spa is designed in traditional Ibizan style. It has a business centre, a spa, a gym and a hot tub which can be used for a surcharge. There are 4 swimming pools, including 2 for children, and a pool bar. There is also a children's playground and a gastronomic restaurant. The complex is located in the heart of lively Playa d’en Bossa. Ibiza’s largest water park is nearby. There is also good access to the airport and to Ibiza Town, where you can find Pacha and Hi Nightclubs.

name: Hotel Vibra Riviera
address: Carrer Des Caló, 49, 07829 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Vibra Riviera overlooks San Antonio Bay offering lovely sea views and is situated in a buzzing resort, just steps from the beach. All rooms have free WiFi. The complex boasts a sun terrace, 3 pools, a buffet restaurant, gardened areas and a terrace bar. The resort has a relaxed friendly atmosphere; just metres away you will find the beautiful Punta Xinxó Beach. Many of the bars and cafés have enticing outdoor terraces and there is an array of family activities on offer in the area, such as parasailing, scuba diving, banana boating and crazy golf. The complex offers 2 nightly shows per week. San Antonio town centre is a short drive away but the immediate surroundings have a good selection of boutiques, bars and restaurants. It is easy to get around, there is a regular bus service and ferries depart from the beach. The property offers free private parking (Subject to Availability).

name: Insotel Tarida Beach Sensatori Resort
address: C/ La Morena, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: The peaceful bay of Cala Tarida and the beautiful beach are situated just a short walk from this resort for families and adults. A range of beach clubs, restaurants, a shopping centre and links to the public transport network are located in the hotel's immediate vicinity. San José is around 6 km away and San Antonio is some 10 km from the establishment. Apart from the main buffet restaurant, there are five inviting à la carte restaurants with highchairs. The resort has two swimming pool areas, one of them only for adults with hot tubs, waterloungers and bali beds. Guests may choose to relax with a massage treatment at the on-site spa while children can have fun at the splash park. There is also a number of sport facilities and a gym and dance studio for the more active ones at The Retreat, which is situated 500m from reception, a 5 minute walk or by shuttle.FarePortal

name: FERGUS Style Bahamas
address: Playa d'En Bossa, 07817 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: FERGUS Style Bahamas is located on Playa D’en Bossa Beach, Ibiza. It offers an outdoor pool and air-conditioned rooms with a balcony and sea, pool or garden views. Bright rooms have a seating area, a minibar, and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The FERGUS Style Bahamas offers 2 restaurants, one of them with pool views. The main restaurant has an open kitchen. There is a snack bar, lobby bar and a poolside bar with a terrace from which guests can watch night-time entertainment shows. Two of Ibiza's most famous nightclubs, Hi and Bora Bora, are located just a few metres away. Tickets for night clubs and excursions can be arranged at the 24-hour reception. Ibiza Town and Airport are a 5-minute drive away.

name: Outsite Ibiza
address: Avenida Punta Arabi, 146, 07840 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Set in Es Canar, Outsite Ibiza - is 2 minutes’ walk from the beach. It offers air-conditioned rooms, shared kitchenette, living room and workspace, and free WiFi throughout. Rooms come with a private bathroom and flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a private balcony or terrace and sea views. The famous Es Canar hippy market is held every Wednesday in summer. Beautiful unspoiled beaches, such as Cala Nova or Cala Marina can easily be reached on foot. Ibiza city centre is only 20 km away.

name: 7Pines Resort Ibiza
address: Calle Puig Delfin, 07830 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Sant Josep de sa Talaia in the Ibiza Region, 18 km from Ibiza Town, 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt is surrounded by pine trees and boasts views of Es Vedrà Island, has three pools in total including one outdoor pool in our public area of the spa centre. Each Suite at this resort is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a seating area for your convenience. All suites feature a terrace or balcony, and some have a private pool. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. We are provided by three restaurants and three bars: - The View, awarded by 1 Sol by 2023 Repsol Guide and included in the 2023 MICHELIN Guide (Spain & Portugal) offers a fine dining experience with an elevated and sublime tasting menu with a Nordic twist. - Cone club offer dazzling evening during the most popular sunset in Ibiza where guests can drinks exquisite cocktails accompained by nice tapas and a comfort food menu - Pershing Yacht Terrace is the place where modern Asian cuisine meets signature drinks in a sophisticated atmosphere and exceptional setting with infinite views to the Mediterranean Sea. The resort has a 1.500 m2 area with two saunas, a steam bath, showers and waterbeds. The Laguna area is a place where families enjoy in a fantastic pool adapted to kids next to a food truck and our sustainable Kids Club concept, KIO. This resort offers water sports facilities for an extra charge, and bike hire is available. San Antonio is 7 km from 7Pines Resort Ibiza, part of Destination by Hyatt, while Playa d'en Bossa is 17 km away. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Destino Pacha Ibiza - Entrance to Pacha Club Included
address: Cap Martinet s/n, 07819 Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Set around an outdoor pool, and offering panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, Destino Pacha Ibiza is set on the hillside in Cap Martinet. Talamanca Beach is a 5-minute walk away. Air-conditioned rooms feature a stylish, white décor and large windows. Each one includes free Wi-Fi, a TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom. Destino Pacha Ibiza's restaurant offers fusion cuisine, with Japanese, Mediterranean and Central American influences. It uses fresh, local products. The pool is surrounded by palm trees and hammocks, and poolside massages are available. There is also a large hot tub and hot yoga classes. Pacha Ibiza Club is a 20-minute walk from the resort, while Ibiza city centre is around 3.5 km away. Ibiza Port can be reached in a 10-minute drive, and boats to Formentera, Mallorca and Valencia leave from here.

name: Hotel Garbi Ibiza & Spa
address: C./ de Murtra Nº 5 Ap.Co. 128, 07830 Sant Jordi de ses Salines, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 298 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and shopping on site. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location When you stay at Hotel Garbi Ibiza & Spa in Sant Josep de sa Talaia, you'll be on the beach, a 1-minute drive from Bossa Beach and 6 minutes from Port of Ibiza. This 4-star hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Dalt Vila and 4.2 mi (6.8 km) from Talamanca Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite for dinner at the hotel's restaurant, Comedor, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Need to unwind? Take a break at the bar/lounge, the beach bar, or the poolside bar for a tasty beverage. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 30 April, EUR 0.83 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 0.41 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 May - 31 October, EUR 3.30 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 1.65 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges In-room safe fee: EUR 4 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Hotel Ses Savines
address: Avinguda Del Doctor Fleming, 22, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This beach hotel is located directly beside the sea, within a few paces of the nearest inviting sandy beach. Public transport departs from stops that lie just a stone's throw from the hotel and scores of shopping facilities, countless restaurants, bars, nightclubs and additional entertainment venues are to be found in the surrounding area (350 m away). The town centre can be reached within 30 minutes on foot. Built in 1936 and renovated in 1999, the hotel comprises a total of 155 rooms spread over 5 floors of which 54 are doubles. Facilities include a lobby with a 24-hour reception desk, a safe, a currency exchange facility, a lift and a café. There is also a bar, a games room, a TV room and an air-conditioned à la carte restaurant with non-smoking area and highchairs for infants on offer to guests. Furthermore, the hotel has its own car park and a garage. The welcoming rooms all come with tiled en suite bathrooms, a direct dial telephone and a safe. Guests may make use of the hotel's indoor swimming pool, freshwater pool, snack bar, sun loungers, parasols, sauna and solarium. Sports enthusiasts have the opportunity to make use of the hotel's tennis courts, play table tennis, squash, billiards or snooker, and minigolf as well as to work out in the hotel gym. A seasonal entertainment programme for adults rounds off the hotel's offerings. A fine buffet is available in the mornings and evenings;Viajes Exito Hotels

name: Hostal Restaurante Pou des Lleó
address: Pou Des Lleó, Sn, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Offering an outdoor pool, Hostal Restaurante Pou des Lleó guest house is located in a protected natural area in Sant Carles de Peralta. The sea is 3 minutes’ walk away. Each room here has a flat-screen satellite TV, a balcony, a wardrobe, a desk and a small fridge. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower. Bed linen and towels are provided and there is free WiFi. At Hostal Restaurante Pou des Lleó you will find a garden, a terrace and a bar and a restaurant serving local traditional cuisine. The property is well situated for outdoor activities such as hiking and cycling. Bikes are available for rent on site. Ibiza Town is 28 km away and a 15-minute drive will take you to Santa Eulària des Riu.

name: Hotel Sa Clau by Mambo
address: Carrer Progreso 1, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Sa Clau by Mambo is set in San Antonio, a 4-minute walk from Es Paradis Ibiza. 600 metres from Café Mambo, the property is also 300 metres away from San Antonio Bus Station. The property provides a shared lounge. All guest rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Every room has a private bathroom, while certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. All units at the hotel have air conditioning and a wardrobe. Around the clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Catalan, German, English and Spanish. Eden Ibiza is a 5-minute walk from Hotel Sa Clau by Mambo. Ibiza Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Hotel Rural & Spa Can Curreu
address: Ctra Sant Carles Km 12, 07850 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Located in the village of San Carlos, this luxurious 5-star hotel and spa resort includes an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a gym and equestrian centre. It includes free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms at Can Curreu are spacious with soft lighting and pastel décor. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV, a balcony with pleasant views and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. The suites also have a kitchenette and large lounge area with sofa. Can Curreu’s modern restaurant serves breakfast, as well as traditional cuisine from Ibiza. The hotel has a bar, and room service is also available. The resort has a spa and wellness centre with hot tub, Turkish baths and massage treatments. It is located 200 metres from Dalias Market and there are 10 different beaches within a 10-minute drive. You can drive to Ibiza Airport in around 15 minutes.

name: Invisa Hotel Ereso
address: Playa De Es Cana 07 840 Santa Eulalia Del Rio Ibiza, Ibiza, Ibiza Island
description: Location This hotel lies in the outskirts of Es Caná, only around 200 m from the beach. Ibiza Town is around 20 km. Scores of shops, restaurants, bars, pubs and excellent public transport links are situated in the hotel's immediate vicinity. Facilities The hotel features 240 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift provides easy access to the upper floors. Amenities include a safe and currency exchange facilities. Internet access is available in public areas. Gastronomic options offered by the hotel include a restaurant, a café and a bar. Children can have fun playing in the garden. Additional features of the hotel include a TV room and a playroom. Facilities include medical assistance. A bicycle hire service gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating and a bathroom. A balcony or terrace is also included as standard. All accommodation units offer a safe, a telephone and a TV. Each accommodation unit includes a bathroom with a shower. Sports/Entertainment The hotel features an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols are also available. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. The hotel offers an extensive outdoor sport and leisure programme, with tennis, volleyball, handball, golf and archery. Those who enjoy watersports can have fun with aqua aerobics and aquafit. Table tennis and pool/billiards are some of the sports and leisure options available at the hotel. Entertainment options and leisure facilities include an entertainment programme and an entertainment programme for adults. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

name: Apartmentos Nort
address: Cala Portinatx 107, 07810 Sant Joan de Labritja, Ibiza Island
description: Apartmentos Nort is located in Portinatx, 25 km from Ibiza Town. San Antonio is 24 km away. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a microwave and refrigerator. A stovetop and coffee machine are also available. There is a private bathroom with a bath in each unit. Towels are provided. Apartmentos Nort also includes an outdoor pool. Playa d'en Bossa is 27 km from Apartmentos Nort, while San Jose de sa Talaia is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Aeropuerto de Ibiza Airport, 29 km from Apartmentos Nort.

name: Marvell Club Aparthotel
address: Carrer Calo Cala de Bou 7820 Sant Agusti Ibiza Spain Spain Sant Josep de sa Talaia, 07839 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 103 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Don't miss out on recreational opportunities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and supervised childcare. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Marvell Club Aparthotel in Sant Josep de sa Talaia (San Antonio Bay), you'll be steps from Punta Xinxó and 7 minutes by foot from Cala de Bou Beach. This family-friendly hotel is 12.1 mi (19.5 km) from Port of Ibiza and 11.8 mi (18.9 km) from Dalt Vila. Dining You can enjoy a meal at Cap Nono serving the guests of Marvell Club Aparthotel, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 8 AM to 10:30 AM. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the local government and will be collected at the property. The tax is reduced by 50% after the 8th night of stay and children under 16 years of age are exempt. Other exemptions and reductions may apply. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the reservation confirmation received after booking. A tax is imposed by the city: From 1 November - 30 April, EUR 0.55 per person, per night, up to 9 nights, and EUR 0.28 thereafter. This tax does not apply to children under 16 years of age. name: Rosamar Ibiza Hotel Only Adults
address: Huelva, 14-18 - Cala de Bou, 07839 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in San Antonio, 200 metres from Playa de Pinet, Rosamar Ibiza Hotel Adults Only features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Featuring a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Certain rooms are fitted with a kitchen with a microwave. At Rosamar Ibiza Hotel Adults Only rooms have bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Round-the-clock assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Spanish. Cala Pinet Beach is 600 metres from Rosamar Ibiza Hotel Adults Only, while Es Pouet Beach is 1.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Coral Beach By Llum
address: Avda. Cala Nova 63, Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Coral Beach has an outdoor swimming pool and Es Canar and Cala Nova Beaches are both a 5-minute walk away. It is located in a quiet neighbourhood and offers spectacular sea and mountain views. All rooms at the Hotel Coral Beach by LLUM are air-conditioned and have balconies. The rooms feature tiled floors and simple décor. Each is equipped with satellite TV and private bathrooms. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves international food. There is also a bar and a poolside snack bar. Hotel Coral Beach by LLUM has a games room with pool and table tennis tables. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Ibiza, and a car rental service is also available. Free parking is available nearby and Ibiza Town is 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Blau Parc
address: Velaquez, 9, Playa Calo Des Moro, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Secret Oasis Ibiza-Only Adults
address: Carrer De Cantàbria, 48, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Ibiza Island
description: Located in Sant Josep de Sa Talaia, Ibiza, Secret Oasis Ibiza is 750 metres from the beach. This adults-only property offers a communal outdoor pool and a chill-out terrace with bar. The property offers free Wi-Fi throughout and free parking. There is a 24-hour reception and a laundry service can be provided for an extra cost. The bar is open 24-hours and offers snacks, tapas, pizzas and drinks. Featuring an Ibicencan-style design, the apartments at Secret Oasis Ibiza are air conditioned and come with a living-dining room with flat-screen TV, a kitchen and a bathroom with shower and hairdryer. Set in a quiet area, there are various shops, supermarkets and restaurants just a few metres away. Ibiza is 25 km away, while the airport is 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Nativo Hotel Ibiza
address: Calle De Los Claveles 24, 07849 Santa Eulària des Riu, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in Santa Eularia des Riu, within 6 km of Las Dalias Hippy Market and 1.9 km of Ibiza Conference Centre, the Nativo Hotel Ibiza, offers accommodation with a restaurant and free WiFi. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and room service from 11:30 am to 11:30 pm. The property is set 1.3 km from Santa Eulalia Bus Stop. The units in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Each room includes air conditioning, and certain rooms are fitted with a balcony. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the restaurant of the Nativo Hotel Ibiza The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness center. Santa Eulalia Port is 1.5 km from the Nativo Hotel Ibiza. The Airport is 18 km from the property.

name: Las Mariposas Ibiza
address: Camí Des Fornas 7481, 07820 Sant Rafael de sa Creu, Ibiza Island
description: No description found

name: Hostal Alicante
address: Alicante, 9, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Situated in the tourist area of San Antonio, the hotel is just a few minutes away from the resort centre, with all kinds of shops, bars, cafes, restaurants and nightlife.#Information about the type of meals included in the price is indicated in the rate details. City tax in the amount of 2.20 EUR (up to 8 nights of stay) is not included in the accommodation price. This tax is not applicable to children under 16 years of age. Pets are allowed for an additional fee.Expedia

name: Hostal Marí
address: c/Progreso,42, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: This family-run guest house is located in the centre of Ibiza's San Antonio and features a charming cafe and Mediterranean restaurant. Browse the Wi-Fi for free on the public areas. The interiors of the Marí are cheerful and typically Mediterranean with warming colours and bright spaces. Relax in the seating area or chat with friends in the welcoming bar. Thanks to the central location, you can easily tour the sights and attractions within San Antonio Village on foot. You can also cycle to the local beach and store your bike safely at the Marí.

name: Arenal
address: Avinguda Del Doctor Fleming, 16, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Ibiza Island
description: Hotel Arenal is conveniently located in the popular Sant Antoni de Portmany area. Featuring a satisfying list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hotel Arenal. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like fan, air conditioning, heating, wake-up service, desk. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Ibiza has to offer by making Hotel Arenal your base.Agoda

name: La Pandilla Ibiza
address: Carrer de Formentera 2-4, 07817 Sant Francesc de s'Estany
description: Set in Sant Francesc de s'Estany, 1.6 km from Es Cavallet Beach, La Pandilla Ibiza offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. 1.8 km from Las Salinas Beach and 2.8 km from Es Codolar Beach, the property provides a terrace and a bar. The accommodation features entertainment staff and free WiFi. At the hostel, every room includes a wardrobe. At La Pandilla Ibiza the rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast is available every morning at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. You can play table tennis at La Pandilla Ibiza, and the area is popular for fishing and snorkelling. Ibiza Port is 10 km from the hostel, while Marina Botafoch is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ibiza Airport, 3 km from La Pandilla Ibiza.

name: Hotel Las Arenas
address: C/ Tit Livi, 14, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set overlooking the sea, this hotel is only a short walk away from Ca’n Pastilla beach. It is only 100 metres from the bus stop that takes you to Palma city centre. Palma Airport is 5 minutes' drive away. Hotel Las Arenas features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace bar with sea views. There is also a buffet restaurant, and a lounge bar with music and shows. Las Arenas hotel is the ideal place to enjoy a holiday on the beach and in the Majorcan sunshine. From here you can also easily get to a variety of shops, and bars. Alternatively, the centre of Palma de Mallorca, the capital of the island is just a short bus ride away. There you can find numerous excellent bars, and a lively nightlife.

name: Hipotels Playa De Palma Palace
address: 7600 Avd. Fra Joan Llabres Playa De Palma, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Located in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa features a garden, a terrace, an outdoor pool and a spa centre. There is free WiFi throughout. All rooms are spacious and have a balcony, a flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some feature a seating area and views of the sea or the pool. The spa offers a range of beauty treatments, a hamman and a sauna for an extra cost. There is also a free hot tub and a fitness centre. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. The hotel also offers car hire. Palma Aquarium is 2.6 km from Hipotels Playa de Palma Palace & Spa, while Playa de Palma Beach is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 4 km from the property. Private parking is available on site.

name: Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma
address: Avenida Fra Joan Llabrés, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set in Playa de Palma, Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma boasts a seasonal outdoor pool and views of the sea. This modern hotel is 2 km from Aqualand El Arenal. Free WiFi is offered throughout. Featuring plenty of natural light, each room is equipped with a flat-screen TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms have a seating area. Hipotels Gran Playa de Palma has a restaurant where guests can enjoy a meal. The hotel also offers 24-hour front desk service. The area is an ideal destination for cycling lovers and the hotel has bicycles for rent. Car hire is available as well. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 8 km from the hotel.

name: THB Niagara
address: Padre Bartolome Salva, 5, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: THB Niagara features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Playa de Palma. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At THB Niagara every room comes with bed linen and towels. You can play table tennis at the accommodation, and car hire is available. Playa de Palma Beach is 200 metres from THB Niagara, while Calo de Sant Antoni Beach is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Ca n'Alexandre - Turismo de Interior
address: Plaza Alexandre Jaume 8A, 07002 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Palma de Mallorca, Ca n'Alexandre - Adults Only provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.1 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms have a safety deposit box, while some rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer city views. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available daily at Ca n'Alexandre - Adults Only. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Intermodal Station and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 7 km from Ca n'Alexandre - Adults Only.

name: BQ Belvedere Hotel
address: Mitja Lluna, 4, 07015 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set just 850 metres from Cala Mayor, BQ Belvedere Hotel offers a free shuttle service to Palmanova Beach and free parking. It features a large lagoon pool and 2 hot tubs. All of the rooms at BQ Belvedere Hotel come with a private balcony. They all have air conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. A regular entertainment programme is provided for children, including activities in the kids’ pool and live shows. A mini club is also available. All-inclusive accommodation is offered at a good price at the hotel. The Belvedere has a large garden area and sun terrace with snack-bar service, as well as a buffet restaurant. There is also a private bicycle parking. BQ Belvedere Hotel is 4 km from central Palma de Mallorca and less than 15 km from Son Sant Joan Airport. The shops of Cala Mayor are only 500 metres away.

name: Bo Hotel Palma
address: Carrer Jaume Ferrer 2, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Offering a sun terrace and hot tub, BO Hotel Palma is located in Palma de Mallorca in the Majorca Region. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Enjoy a cup of coffee while looking out at the sea or city. All rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Superior rooms have a spa bath. The hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel offers a continental breakfast. The area is popular for golfing and cycling. The hotel also offers bike hire. Palma Yacht Club is 500 metres from BO Hotel Palma, while Palma Port is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Universal Hotel Neptuno - Adults Only
address: Calle Llaut 34, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel enjoys a fantastic position right on the beachfront at Majorca’s Playa de Palma. Its 2 outdoor pools overlook the glistening Mediterranean Sea. At the Neptuno you can work up a sweat in the sauna or gym before cooling off in the outdoor hot tub or swimming pool. There is also an indoor heated pool open in April and October for the guests. You can also choose to simply relax on a sun lounger on the terrace. In the evening, try a delicious meal in the cafe-restaurant before enjoying a refreshing drink in the lounge bar. Majorca’s nearby capital of Palma is an ideal daytrip from this hotel. This historic city is known as one of the most picturesque in Spain. It 1 outdoor pool overlooks the glistening Mediterranean Sea. This seasonal hotel is open between February and November.

name: Hotel Timor
address: Calle Montemar, 12, 07600 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Hotel Timor is a 4-star hotel located 150 metres from the beach in Playa de Palma. It offers a wide range of leisure facilities including outdoor and indoor swimming pools. Air-conditioned rooms at the Timor hotel feature a private terrace, some of them with spectacular views of Palma de Mallorca Bay. They come with a flat-screen satellite TV and a bathroom with hairdryer. There is also a mini fridge and free Wi-Fi. The area around the outdoor swimming pool has a snack bar, hammocks and loungers, while the indoor swimming pool features a sauna, a hot tub and a gym. Other facilities at Hotel Timor include a buffet restaurant, a paddle court and a games room. There is a discotheque and a daily entertainment programme. Guests practicing bicycle touring can store their bikes in the special garage. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 15 minutes’ drive away.

name: Bq Aguamarina Boutique Hotel
address: Carrer de Sant Antoni de la Platja, 41, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: BQ Aguamarina Boutique Hotel is in Can Pastilla, overlooking Cala Estancia Beach. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a welcome gift and private balconies, most with sea views. Free WiFi is available. This charming boutique hotel is close to Palma de Mallorca Airport. It is 12 km to the centre of Palma and there are regular buses from near the hotel. BQ Aguamarina Boutique Hotel has a bar and a buffet restaurant. Guests are also welcome to enjoy a rooftop pool and bar, at BQ Lounge. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk. Bicycle rental and luggage storage are offered. For reservations of more than 5 rooms, special conditions will apply; The establishment may contact the client to request a prepayment. The establishment may cancel a group reservation if it is suspected of being fraudulent.

name: THB El Cid
address: Calle Vaixell 2, 07610 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This recently refurbished holiday resort has a fantastic seafront location in a beautiful Mediterranean setting, conveniently positioned just a short drive from the airport. It has free Wi-Fi. THB El Cid - Adults Only, with its peaceful, seaside location, offers well-appointed accommodation, sea views and great facilities and offers a great base while you enjoy all Majorca has to offer. You will never be short of things to do at this complex that features 3 swimming pools (one heated), gardens, a tennis court, a bicycle garage and table-tennis. Guests will also find a sauna, steam bath and a gym. Seasonal hotel: open from February to October.

name: Concepció by Nobis, Palma, a Member by Design Hotels
address: Carrer De La Concepció 34, 07012 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Palma de Mallorca. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and 1.8 km from Playa Ca'n Pere Antoni. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels offers a sauna. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Palma Yacht Club, Palma Port and Passeig del Born Avenue. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from Concepcio by Nobis, Palma, a Member of Design Hotels.

name: Antigua Palma Casa Noble
address: Calle Del Sol 1, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Well located in the Old Town of Palma de Mallorca, Hotel Antigua Palma - Casa Noble provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, hammam and a 24-hour front desk. Guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. At Hotel Antigua Palma - Casa Noble each room has a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Guests can enjoy the spa and wellness centre, take a dip into the indoor pool, organise trips at the tour desk, or rent a car to explore the surroundings. Popular points of interest near Hotel Antigua Palma - Casa Noble include Plaza Mayor, Palma Cathedral and Palma Convention Centre. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Brondo Architect Hotel
address: Carrer Can Brondo, 4, 07001 Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: This hotel is located in central Palma’s charming Old Town, just 10 minutes’ walk from the Cathedral. The Architect Hotel combines Mallorcan architecture with Bohemian design. The hotel consists of 2 buildings, one of them with a lift. Some suites at Brondo Architect Hotel feature themed décor, with wooden floors and natural light. Each one comes with free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV, and a bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Suites and some of the Premium Rooms have a private terrace. Brondo Architect Hotel has a fitness centre which offers personalised training and relaxation programmes. It also has a roof terrace with sofas where you can relax in the sun. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about Mallorca. They also provide booking a table at a restaurant, tickets to live shows and other events. The emblematic Bar Bosch is just 50 metres from Brondo Architect Hotel. Palma Airport is just 12 minutes’ drive away.

name: Melia South Beach
address: Avenida Notario Alemany, Nº 1, Calvià Beach Resort, Palma de Mallorca, Mallorca
description: Set on the beachfront at Calvia Beach, Meliá South Beach features 4 seasonal outdoor pools and stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel offers an a la càrte restaurant,The Cape Nao Beach Club. Each spacious room at Meliá South Beach has bright, contemporary décor. There is air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes free organic toiletries, plus bathrobe and slippers. Meliá South Beach's poolside bar offers Spanish tapas, fresh seafood and other light dishes. Restaurants, bars and cafés can also be found by the seafront. It is located next to Nikki Beach Club & Restaurant, The hotel Yhi Spa features unique beauty treatments and massage services and a fitness room. Free yoga and pilates classes are also included. One of the pools is adults-only, where you can find Balinese beds to relax on, another one is only for the level guests and the other pool is for children. Room service is available 24 hours. The centre of Palma is 15 km from the Meliá South Beach, while the city’s airport can be reached in 20 minutes by car. The hotel also offers a private jet service.
