These include a fantastic spa and wellness centre as well as activities for younger guests.

name: Hotel El Guía
description: Located a minute walk from Plaça de sa Constitució Square, in the old town of Sóller, Hotel El Guia features a shared lounge and a restaurant with local dishes. Free Wi-Fi in all areas. Each room includes a private bathroom with a bath or shower and hairdryer. Some rooms have a view of the mountains. The hotel has a free bicycle storage. There are various shops and a market within a 3-minute walk of the property. The tram stop to Sóller Port and Soller Railway Station are both just outside the property. Local beaches are 4 km away.

name: Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World
address: Carretera Es Capdella-Galilea, Km 1.7, Calvià, Mallorca
description: Set just outside Es Capdellà in the Mallorcan countryside, Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World is a restored castle, made of 7 different historic buildings. It boasts an outdoor swimming pool with stunning views. Each room at the Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World, has a unique design and size. All the stylish air-conditioned rooms and suites have Egyptian cotton bed linen and a flat-screen TV. The luxurious bathroom comes with a large shower, bathrobes, slippers and free designer toiletries. There is free Wi-Fi and free wired internet in each room. The elegant suites feature a separate living area with a dining table and sofa, as well as a private terrace or garden. Bellesa de Claret Spa offers a range of treatments, including massages outside in the beautiful hotel gardens. The Castell Bar, set in the former chapel, serves unique cocktails and a large selection of whiskies. Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World also has meeting rooms, inside a restored mill in the grounds. Puerto Portals is 14 km from Castell Son Claret - The Leading Hotels of the World and the centre of Palma de Mallorca is 25 km away.

name: Cas Ferrer Nou Hotelet
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and free WiFi, as well as a high-definition TV and an iPod dock. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, hypo-allergenic bedding, a memory foam bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: Grupotel Parc Natural & Spa
address: Crta. Alcudia - Artá, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Surrounded by the stunning S’Albufera Nature Reserve, Grupotel Parc Natural & Spa enjoys magnificent views over the Bay of Alcudia. This luxurious hotel features an outdoor pool and gardens. The elegant rooms at Parc Natural & Spa each include a balcony or terrace with views over the gardens, pool or sea. They also come with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and air conditioning. The hotel offers a spa and wellness area with facilities including a fitness centre, heated pool and Turkish bath. Massage services are available and there is also a hairstylist. Grupotel Parc Natural & Spa is located in front of Playa de Muro Beach. A bus stops in front of the hotel with direct routes to Can Picafort, Port d’Alcúdia and Alcúdia. The hotel features a buffet restaurant offering a selection of international cuisine, while Bistro Mar Blau serves Mediterranean dishes overlooking the sea. There is also a lounge bar.

name: Reverence Life Hotel - Adults Only
description: Offering views of Santa Ponça Beach, Reverence Life Hotel - Adults Only offers 4 seasonal outdoor pools, 2 of them with a swim-up area, a bike station, and a free spa and wellness centre. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. The hotel is set over 4 different buildings. Each air-conditioned and quiet room comes with modern décor, a free safe, fridge, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and coffee & tea making facilities. Most have a balcony with views of the sea or the pools. The private bathroom comes with with a rainshower, hairdryer, amenities and vanity mirror. The hotel's spa and wellness centre include free access to the gym, sauna, whirlpool, Turkish bath, indoor pool, and massage and treatment cabins. Guests in Premium rooms and suites have exclusive access to the rooftop pools and terraces during the day. The hotel has a pool snack bar and a buffet restaurant for dinner.

name: Aluasun Torrenova
description: Located in Palma Nova, Hotel Aluasun Torrenova has a large outdoor swimming pool, a children’s splash pool. It is just 100 metres from Palma Nova Beach and has great sea views. The Aluasun Torrenova’s air-conditioned rooms include satellite TV, private balcony and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms also have views over the sea. The buffet restaurant at the Aluasun Torrenova offers international dishes. There is also a snack bar by the pool. The Aluasun Torrenova has excellent facilities for children, with a games room and an outdoor play area. The indoor Mini Club caters for children from 4 to 12, and a nursery is also available. There is an entertainment programme throughout the day and night, as well as professional shows. Car and bicycle rental are available on site.

name: Viva Blue & Spa
address: Carrer Del Passeig De Bateman, Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: This seasonal aparthotel is 200 metres from Playa de Muro Beach, beside the S’Albufera Nature Reserve, in northern Mallorca. It offers a semi-Olympic outdoor pool, indoor and outdoor pool, heated during winter months, a spa and free parking. All air-conditioned apartments at Viva Blue have a satellite TV, private balcony and a safe. Some have views over the S'Albufera Nature Reserve. The open-plan kitchen is equipped with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. There is a poolside snack bar, a mini-market and a buffet restaurant with special menus for children. The hotel is well equipped to welcome athletes. The Viva Blue spa includes a sauna, a fully equipped gym and massage services on request. The hotels has special facilities for cyclists, including bike storage, a cycling shop, tools and an area to clean the bikes. The local area offers a great variety of outdoor activities such as trekking and cycling. There is a games room, a children’s play area, and the children's club offers organized activities with an entertainment team. This is a seasonal hotel, open from February to November.

name: Hotel Bon Sol Resort & Spa
description: This enchanting, family-run hotel overlooks the Bay of Palma, nestling amongst pine trees and tropical gardens. Descend through these gardens to the rock-lined pools and the secluded beach below. At the top of the Bon Sol you will find a Moorish tower offering amazing views across this picturesque bay in southern Majorca. From here, you can head down through the lush gardens, passing by the sun terraces, scenic swimming pools, spa facilities and down to the small, sandy beach on the Mediterranean Sea. Other great facilities include tennis courts and a winter conservatory. Inside, the Arabian-influenced decor, antique-style furniture and precious artwork combine to give the feel of a Medieval castle. This unique atmosphere is made more welcoming by the informal, family atmosphere.

name: H10 Casa Del Mar
address: Gran Via Del Puig Major, 2, 07180 Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: H10 Casa del Mar is set on Mallorca and offers 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi. It also has a gym, a sauna and a swimming pool. Guests can enjoy a range of massage treatments and beauty therapy at the on-site spa and wellness centre, Despacio Beauty Centre. For families H10 Casa del Mar offers babysitting/child services. The hotel features 245 rooms, each equipped with a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. There are also several rooms especially for families. Guests are able to enjoy a drink at H10 Casa del Mar's bar and dine on international style food in the restaurant. Alternatively, the surrounding area features many bars and restaurants serving a choice of different cuisines. The area surrounding H10 Casa del Mar is well-known for its nightlife, with plenty of places to go for a drink or dance. It is also a short drive from Santa Ponsa and Palma de Mallorca.Revato

name: Sallés Hotel Marina Portals
description: The traditional-style Marina Portals offers stunning Mediterranean Sea views just 7 minutes’ walk from the beach. It has a pool and a spa, and the air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV. Guests have free access to the spa. The spa includes a water circuit, sauna and steam bath, as well as chromotherapy and other relaxation and beauty treatments. It also has a large sun terrace with loungers. All the spacious rooms in Marina Portals Majorca have a private balcony and free Wi-Fi. They have antique-style furnishings and safes. Many of the rooms have sea views. The hotel offers a breakfast and dinner buffet service. The hotel’s snack bar has a terrace, and the Coral Bar offers a range of drinks. The hotel is Bike Friendly, it has the necessary services so that your bike is ready for each outing. Bike services like safe bike storage rooms, repair services, cleaning and route information. Salles Hotel Marina Portals is less than 10 minutes’ drive from the capital of Palma de Mallorca. The bars and restaurants of Portals Nous, as well as the marina, are within 10 minutes’ walk. The hotel has private parking and there is also public parking nearby.

name: Grupotel Maritimo
description: Situated just 150 metres from Alcudia Beach, Grupotel Marítimo offers 2 outdoor pools and a tennis court. The relaxation zone includes an indoor pool, hot tub and massage service. All air-conditioned rooms at Grupotel Marítimo have a private balcony. Each room includes satellite TV and a minibar. A varied breakfast buffet is served in the hotel’s restaurant. The buffet dinner includes a wide range of international cuisine and typical Majorcan dishes. There is also a lounge bar and terrace. You can enjoy evening entertainment, including live music and dancing, at Grupotel Marítimo. There is a kids’ club and play area for children. The hotel is situated next to S’Estany Gran Lake, in Alcudia Bay. The popular resort of Port d’Alcudia is just a 5-minute drive away.

name: BQ Maria Dolores
description: BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only is just 200 metres from the beach in the heart of Peguera. It offers a quiet atmosphere and a swimming pool. The rooms in the BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only have fully fitted bathroom, satellite TV and safe. They all have air conditioning and heating. The outdoor pool is set in gardens with pine trees. Next to it is a sun terrace with free loungers. Inside there is a TV room and a business centre with internet access. The restaurant at the BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only offers Spanish and international dishes. There is also a bar. Peguera is located in the west of Mallorca. The BQ Paguera Boutique Hotel - Adults Only is about 100 metres from Peguera’s main street. There you can find a wide range of restaurants, bars and shops.

name: Palmanova Suites By Trh
description: Palmanova Suites by TRH has a hillside location in Mallorca. It features a lagoon-style outdoor pool. The hotel has suites and apartments, all with private balconies. The apartments have a kitchen with microwave and fridge. The suites do not have a kitchen, only mini fridge. A bar service is available by the pool at the complex. It is surrounded by a large sun terrace with sun loungers. Palmanova Suites by TRH is only 150 metres from Magaluf Beach and the resort centre, where there are several bars, clubs and restaurants, is just 10 minutes’ walk away. Aqua Land Water Park is 1.7 km away, while Palma de Mallorca is within 11 km.

name: Hotel Coronado Thalasso & Spa
description: Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge).#Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon We have adult only area: SPA, gym, Panoramic Pool, Panoramic Restaurant and the Pool Suite do not admit children.Expedia

name: Hipotels Hipocampo - Adults Only
description: Enjoy the beachfront location and extensive facilities of this 4-star hotel, located overlooking the bay of Cala Millor. The setting of the Hipotels Hipocampo is ideal for a relaxing break on Majorca’s golden sands. Dive into the clear Mediterranean waters or take a dip in the hotel’s own outdoor swimming pool, surrounded by comfortable sun loungers. Relax with a session in the sauna before cooling off in the hot tub. You will also find a heated indoor swimming pool within the hotel. Choose between dining at the hotel’s own buffet restaurant or strolling along the seafront to the nearby resort centre, where you can enjoy the range of restaurants.

name: Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa
description: Situated in Palmanova, 500 metres from Magaluf Beach, Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation offers nightclub and a concierge service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Every room is fitted with a kettle, while some rooms are fitted with a balcony and others also feature sea views. At Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. Son Maties Beach is 600 metres from Elba Sunset Mallorca Thalasso Spa, while Palma Nova Beach is 1.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Chevy & Suites
address: Carrer Reis Catòlics, 11, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: The hotel renovated in 2017. Featuring an outdoor swimming pool, Hotel Chevy & Suites is located 200 metres from Cala Ratjada Beach and a 10-minute walk from Cala Ratjada Marina. The property also offers free WiFi. The Hotel Chevy & Suites offers a minimalist design with tiled floors. All rooms have air conditioning, and a safety deposit box, Guests can enjoy a selection of Mediterranean cuisine in the Hotel Chevy & Suites’s buffet restaurant and pool bar. There is also a bar and a lounge with satellite TV. Punta de Capdepera Forest is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, while the town’s castle is less than 2 km away. The city of Palma and its airport are less than a 1.5-hour drive.

name: Hotel Cala Gat
address: Carretera d'es Faro, 5, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Enjoy peace and quiet at the Hotel Cala Gat, with an outdoor swimming pool and sauna facilities, set in a secluded location just minutes from the beach. An airport shuttle is available to take you to this charming, cottage-style building, whose interiors are modern and well air conditioned. You can soak up the sun on your room's balcony, out on the hotel's terrace, or around the outdoor swimming pool. You can also treat yourself to a massage. Free WiFi is available on the terrace and in the cafeteria. The famous Cala Ratjada Lighthouse is just 10 minutes´ walk away and the March Palace is located in Palma. The town centre offers a selection of shops. The Cala Gat is also perfectly set for excursions into nature, including hiking, horse-riding, and a variety of water sports. Here you can make the most of a packed lunch service, as well as 24-hour reception, to enjoy a whole day out. The property can arrange an airport transfer service for an extra cost.

name: Parque Nereida Suites Hotel
address: Avenida Cala Lliteras, 4, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Hotel Venecia Paguera
description: Set 100 metres from Peguera Beach, this hotel has elegant interiors and an inviting bar and buffet restaurant. It offers an outdoor pool, sun terrace and rooms with free Wi-Fi and and a private balcony. There are tennis courts located 5 minutes' walk from the Hotel Venecia Paguera, and a golf course 3 km away. After a day exploring the island, relax in the Venecia’s spacious television and reading lounges. Then head to the Venecia’s restaurant for an excellent choice of hot and cold dishes which include regional specialities.

name: BG Hotel Rei del Mediterrani
description: Hotel Rei Del Mediterrani Palace is located on Mallorca and offers 4-star accommodation in addition to free Wi-Fi and miniature golf. It is also steps from Muro's well-known attractions and landmarks. The hotel offers a range of wellbeing facilities, such as a spa, a fitness centre and a swimming pool. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. Hotel Rei Del Mediterrani Palace has air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. Each have an in-room safe, a desk and a private bathroom with a shower. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. The hotel is an ideal base to discover nearby Alcudia and Puerto de Alcudia, which are within a 10-minute drive. Son Sant Joan Airport is a 45-minute drive away.Revato

name: Barceló Illetas Albatros - Adults Only
description: Barcelo Illetas Albatros Adults only is an exclusive hotel; just for adults; where you can enjoy the best holiday that Majorca can offer B-Rooms; decorated in a minimalist style; with services and equipment using the latest technology The hotel has a swimming pool area; Balinese beds; Whirlpool Baths and its own cove with private access Foodies will appreciate the best designer cuisine while enjoying the unique sea views; or they can sip a delicious cocktail on the Urban Sky Terrace open during the summer months What is more; guests can communicate directly with the hotel reception via our 24 hour Whatsapp Concierge ServiceBarcelo.com

name: Son Moll Sentits Hotel & Spa
description: Son Moll Sentits Hotel & Spa boasts an outdoor and indoor pool, furnished terrace and a spa and wellness centre. Located in Cala Ratjada, Son Moll Beach is just 250 metres away. Each bright bedroom at Son Moll Sentits Spa features a balcony, air conditioning, heating and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The rooms also include a telephone, radio and safety deposit box. The bathrooms come with a shower and a hairdryer. All rooms allow you to customize the sound, aroma and lighting. There is a fitness centre and massages are offered for a surcharge. Guests can enjoy a drink at the hotel's bar. Free WiFi connection is available in the lobby and there is also an exclusive Gourmet Restaurant and a Panorama Bar at the top of the hotel. Capdepera Golf Club is 6 km from the hotel. Other beaches, such as Cala Agulla, are within 7 minutes' drive away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 1 hour away by car.

name: Soller Plaza
address: Carrer de Vicari Pastor 4, 07100 Soller, Mallorca
description: Located in Sóller, Soller Plaza provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. With a patio, the property also features a shared lounge. At the hotel, every room is equipped with a desk. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries. At Soller Plaza every room is fitted with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Palma de Mallorca is 26 km from the accommodation, while Paguera is 46 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 32 km from Soller Plaza.

name: Sóllerooms Guesthouse
address: Carrer de Sant Bartomeu 2, 07100 Soller, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Hotel Js Yate
description: Located in the north of Majorca, in Ca'n Picafort, Js Yate is only 100 metres from a fine, sandy beach. It features a large outdoor swimming pool and kids' pool. Free WiFi is provided. Js Yate boasts a tranquil setting in an area full of shops. From here you can stroll into the town and grab a coffee, before heading to S'Albufera Nature Reserve. Alternatively, for complete relaxation, grab a sun lounger and soak up the sunshine in the gardens surrounding the hotel. All of the rooms are fully air conditioned and heated. Each one has satellite TV, fridge and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Safes are available for a surcharge. The Js Yate also offers buffet dining and show cooking at its restaurant, which has great garden views. Snacks are available on the outdoor terrace. This is a seasonal hotel, open from May to October.

name: Ecocirer Healthy Stay
description: Ecocirer Healthy Stay features air-conditioned accommodation in Sóller. Both free WiFi and private parking are accessible at the hotel. At Ecocirer Healthy Stay, every room is equipped with a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower, while certain units at the accommodation also boast a seating area. A fresh home made vegan/vegetarian breakfast is served each morning at the property. Palma de Mallorca is 22 km from Ecocirer Healthy Stay, while Alcudia is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 24 km from the property.

name: Hotel Son Matias Beach - Adults Only
address: Duque de Extremera, 2, 07181 Palma Nova, Mallorca
description: Enjoying beautiful views over the sandy beach and Bay of Palma Nova, this adults-only hotel is perfect for a peaceful beach break in the sun of Majorca. Choose to spend your days on the adjacent beach or on a sun lounger around the outdoor swimming pool. You can then enjoy a meal in the Son Matias Beach’s restaurant, where you will find a wide selection of British dishes along with Majorcan and Spanish favourites. For your evening’s entertainment you can easily walk into the resort of Palma Nova in around 10 minutes. The neighbouring resort of Magaluf is also within walking distance.

name: Hotel Sky Bel Mallorca by Bluebay - Adults Only
description: Located in Cala Ratjada, 1.9 km from Cala n'Aguait, Hotel The Sky - Adults Only features air-conditioned rooms and a bar. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel provides an outdoor swimming pool and a tour desk. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Hotel The Sky - Adults Only. The accommodation offers a terrace. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at Hotel The Sky - Adults Only. Cala de S'Aguila Beach is 1.9 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 78 km from Hotel The Sky - Adults Only. This property is a 12-minute walk from the beach. The Hotel The Sky - Adults Only, very central, is located in Cala Ratjada, very close to Cala Agulla beach and the promenade. The hotel has a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool, hammocks, Balinese beds, SKY-Bar and live music on some days. The rooms with a Mediterranean / modern style have air conditioning, TV, private bathroom, balcony and free Wi-Fi. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel restaurant. At night it becomes the meeting point for lovers of Mediterranean cuisine. Reception service available 24 hours, car and bicycle rental and tourist information.

name: Grupotel Alcudia Pins
description: Facing the beachfront, Grupotel Alcudia Pins offers 3-star accommodation in Playa de Muro and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation offers an ATM, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. At Grupotel Alcudia Pins every room includes bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or gluten-free options. The accommodation offers a children's playground. You can play table tennis at Grupotel Alcudia Pins, and bike hire and car hire are available. Es Comu Beach is 500 metres from the hotel, while Playa de Muro Beach is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca Airport, 63 km from Grupotel Alcudia Pins.

name: Grupotel Aguait Resort & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida de los Pinos, 61, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Featuring direct access to Ratjada Beach, the adults-only Grupotel Aguait Resort & Spa - Adults Only offers views of this pretty cove. It features a spa with free entry, outdoor pool and rooms with balconies. Take a refreshing dip in the swimming pool surrounded by a large sun terrace with views of the Mediterranean waters. There is a heated indoor swimming pool, hot tub, sauna, massages, gym, tennis club Aguait with 11 clay courts, table tennis and a billiard table. When booking more than 5 rooms, different policies and additional supplements may apply.

name: Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa
description: Located just a short walk to the Can Picafort beach, surrounded by gardens lays this complex made up of the hotel and apartments with free spa access and free WiFi. The complex offers guests all they need for a fun filled, enjoyable family holiday, including; 2 large swimming pools with children’s pool, mini-club and children’s playground, entertainment programmes, a free Spa & Wellness centre, Conference room for up to 40 people and a sports centre. Alcudia is 12 km away and Palma de Mallorca is 50 km from Grupotel Gran Vista & Spa. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 50 minutes' drive away.

name: Js Alcudi-Mar
description: Set less than 100 metres from Playa de Muro Beach, Js Alcudi-Mar features air-conditioned rooms with balconies. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a spa and free WiFi. For an extra charge, the hotel has a cycling centre with a garage and equipment shop. There is also cycling equipment in the gym, and the spa provides relaxation. The Alcudi-Mar’s spa has Turkish baths, a hot tub and sauna. Treatments on offer include massage and hydrotherapy. Guests can enjoy a range of international cuisine in the Js’ buffet restaurant. There is also a café-bar, which opens onto the poolside terrace. All air-conditioned accommodation at the Js Alcudi-Mar has simple décor with parquet floors. Each room comes with satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel is less than 1 km from the centre of Playa de Muro and 12 km from S’Albufera Park. Alcúdia and its port are less than 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Los Geranios
address: Paseo de la Playa 15, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Los Geranios is a comfortable hotel situated in the Platja d'en Repic beach resort in Puerto de Sóller. The majority of rooms have side sea or sea view. Rooms at Los Geranios are modern with a private balcony. Each room comes with a fridge, air conditioning and work desk. The use of the safes carry an additional surcharge. The hotel offers a sauna and massage service, at an additional cost. There is free WiFi throughout. The location is ideal for fishing, hiking, diving and windsurfing.

name: Hotel Florida Magaluf - Adults Only
description: Adults-only Hotel Florida Universal sits in Bay of Magalluf, Majorca, close to the nightlife and about 10 minutes’ walk from Palma Nova Beach. It has a swimming pool with sea views. The rooms at Florida Hotel Magalluf have a balcony, TV and private bathroom with bath. Next to the outdoor pool is a sun terrace with free loungers. The air-conditioned dining room offers a buffet dinner. During the summer the hotel has a lunchtime barbecue on the terrace. Hotel Florida Magalluf is a short walk from lively beaches and discos, bars, nightclubs and restaurants offering fun into the early hours. The city of Palma de Mallorca is about 10 km away.

name: Cabot Pollensa Park Spa
description: Cabot Pollensa Park Spa is located just 100 metres from the beach, in Majorca’s Port de Pollença. Surrounded by gardens, it offers an outdoor swimming pool, gym and a spa completed with hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath, foot bath and heated pool. Rooms at the Cabot Pollensa Park Spa are spacious and bright, with tiled floors and air conditioning. Each room has satellite TV and most have a private balcony with sea views. Guests can enjoy breakfast and dinner in the buffet restaurant. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar. Live entertainment and children’s activities are organised by the hotel. Cabot Pollensa Park Spa is located on Calle Bot, a popular street with many bars. Pollença Harbour and the old town are within a 15-minute walk.

name: Grupotel Farrutx
address: Avenida Trias s/n, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Situated just 200 metres from Ca'n Picafort Beach, the Farrutx Hotel offers a great location for an enjoyable holiday on the popular island of Mallorca. You can relax in its large swimming pool, hot tub or on the terrace, where there are sun loungers and parasols. There is also an outdoor terrace café. It offers rooms with balconies, air conditioning and satellite TV. Alcúdia and its port are approximately 5 km from the Farrutx. Seasonal hotel: open from end April to October.

name: Las Gaviotas Suites Hotel
description: This design hotel is just 100 metres from Majorca’s Playa del Muro Beach. Las Gaviotas Suites Hotel & Spa is set in 15,000 m² of gardens, with outdoor pools and sun terraces. Las Gaviotas offers elegant rooms and suites. They all have a private balcony, free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Bathrobes are also included. The hotel is near the beautiful S’Albufera Nature Reserve in Alcúdia Bay. The historic centre of Port d’Alcúdia is around 5 km away. Las Gaviotas Suites Hotel & Spa has a free spa, a gym and a hot tub. Massages are available for an extra cost, and there is one quieter pool area which is adults-only. There is also a poolside snack bar, offering international food. The hotel reception has a tour desk and currency exchange. Car rental is also offered.

name: Hoposa Hotel & Apartments Villaconcha
address: Carrer De Nanses, 5, Puerto De Pollensa, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Hoposa Hotel & Apartaments Villaconcha is located in the charming Port de Pollença, 200 metres from the beach. The complex boasts an outdoor pool. The apartments at the Hoposa Villaconcha all have a balcony. They offer a kitchen area with a microwave and a fridge. Satellite TV is available in all apartments. Hoposa Villaconcha has a café-terrace with views over the swimming pool. There is a bouncy castle and a pool table. The property includes a children's activity club and water activities for toddlers. In-room breakfast is available free of charge. The local area is quiet and attractive. Diving and horse riding are possible nearby. The property offers a range of sports facilities on site, including a heated outdoor pool, a fully equipped gym, and spa. Bike facilities include free bicycle storage, workshop, tools and washing equipment. There is also an area for relaxation, practice, and massage, and a TV room with sports channels. The gym is free, while other facilities carry a surcharge.

name: Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only
description: Set overlooking Costa d’en Blanes Beach and Punta Portals Marina, Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only +(16) is a well-equipped complex featuring an outdoor swimming pool and restaurant. The Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only +(16) features brightly decorated double bedrooms and suites with balconies. Suites and Junior Suites have living areas with satellite TV. A safety deposit box is available. The à la carte restaurant at Tomir Portals Suites - Adults Only +(16) serves a selection of international cuisine. Guests can enjoy a drink by the pool, or in the lounge bar with live music some days a week. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange car rental and provide information on Portals Nous and the surrounding area. There is also an airport shuttle service to Palma, 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Bellavista Hotel & Spa
address: Carrer Miquel Garau, 30, Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: This holiday hotel is located just 200 metres from the port in the lively Majorcan resort of Cala Ratjada. Located 5-minute walk from the resort centre, the Bellavista has a spa centre with hot tub, sauna, Turkish bath and treatment rooms for an extra charge. lt provides WiFi internet service. The property has an outdoor pool, ping pong, mini golf and a terrace. The property also has a drink at the bar or meal in the restaurant. The Cala Ratjada resort is nearby. you will also find a range of bars, restaurants and clubs all within 300 metres of the hotel. Note that the payment of the tourist tax (ecotasa) must be made at the hotel reception at the time of check-in.

name: Robinson Cala Serena
address: 7660 Cala Serena/Cala D`Or Felanitx, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: Featuring outdoor pools overlooking the Mediterranean Sea, this hotel lies between 2 small bays on the East coast of Mallorca. It includes a spa and tennis courts. Surrounded by palm trees, the ROBINSON Cala Serena has air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony or terrace. In-room facilities include refrigerators, bathrobes and satellite TV. Varied buffets and late breakfasts are served in the Robinson Club’s main restaurant. There are also 2 elegant, à-la-carte restaurants serving Spanish specialities. The hotel organises a range of water sports and has direct beach access. Guests can book spa treatments or enjoy a round of golf on site. In the evenings, the club theatre provides entertaining shows. The sandy beach of Cala Serena is located in the Cala d'Or resort, just 7 km from the Cala Mondrago Nature Park. Robinson Club offers rental bicycles, rental cars and free parking.

name: Hotel Es Molí
description: Set on a hilltop in north-west Majorca, Es Moli is set in a 17th-century mansion with panoramic views of the sea, Deià village and the Tramuntana Mountains. It has a 32-meter fresh-water pool and an access to the sea, Sa Muleta(rocky cove) located 9Km from the Hotel. Four times a day, the hotel offers a free shuttle to Sa Muleta. There you can find a snack-bar, loungers and changing facilities. Muleta, access to the sea IMPORTANT INFORMATION: There is a limited capacity, we therefore kindly ask you to reserve your access to Muleta in advance on recepcion@esmoli.com or at the desk during your stay. A reservation will be required for the access. We herewith inform you that, in accordance to regulations, as from now, sunbeds cannot be placed at a distance which is less than 15 metres from the sea. There is a limited number of sunbeds. The Hotel Es Moli rooms offer: free WIFI, air conditioning, desk, safe, tea and coffee making facilities, satellite TV, telephone, mini bar, room service (only available in the main building). Guests can enjoy lunch by the pool at Sa Font d'es Moli Restaurant, and dinner at the Es Jardi á la carte restaurant or at the Tapas-Bar (closed Thursday´s). Leisure facilities at Es Molí Deia include more than 15.000sqm garden, well equiped GYM and a tennis court. Palma de Mallorca and its airport are around 30 minutes’ drive from Hotel Es Molí.

name: Trh Jardin Del Mar
address: Huguet des Far, s/n, 07748 Santa Ponsa, Mallorca
description: Overlooking Santa Ponsa Bay in south-western Mallorca, Jardín del Mar offers air-conditioned apartments with a private balcony. It has an outdoor pool with a sun terrace offering fantastic views. The apartments and rooms at TRH Jardín del Mar have a kitchenette with a fridge. They have tiled floors and are equipped with satellite TV. The Hotel Jardín del Mar has a café-bar with big screens. There is also a poolside snack bar. Leisure facilities include a seasonal indoor pool and a sauna, available for a surcharge. The lively resort of Magaluf is around 10 minutes’ drive from the Jardín del Mar. You can walk to Santa Ponsa Beach in around 5 minutes.

name: Cap Rocat
description: Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is a former military fortress, carefully restored to offer 5-star luxury accommodation. The hotel offers wonderful views of the Mediterranean Sea and the Majorcan countryside. Hotel Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World is set in a quiet area of Palma Bay, near Cala Blava. The hotel has direct access to the sea. There is also an outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace. The hotel offers a Spa which guests can use for free, and a Hammam at an extra cost. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre with a personal training service. Outdoor yoga and pilates classes are also offered. Rooms at the hotel offer a private balcony, air conditioning and a minibar. They also come with a bathrobe and slippers, as well as a CD and DVD player. Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World’s restaurant serves fresh Mediterranean food. The hotel also offers large public lounges and patios. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all areas. For safety reasons due to the unique architecture of the fortress, Cap Rocat, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World cannot accommodate children younger than 15 years old.

name: The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca Resort
description: A refined tastemaker located on the southwest coast of Mallorca, The St. Regis Mardavall Mallorca is a luxurious family resort offering an exceptional retreat. Arranged across four terracotta-hued buildings, the 125 guestrooms and suites all have large private terraces with an alluring Mediterranean vista. An arbiter of the island’s most distinctive flavors, connoisseurs from near and far converge to dine at our exceptional Michelin-starred Es Fum Restaurant, while the St. Regis Bar with its modern design sets new heights as a lobby art bar on the island. Our new contemporary designed Terra Restaurant brings a fresh air to the hotels classic look with its “Farm to Table” concept, celebrating the island’s rich culinary heritage and local produce. Mar Sea Club will make for a luxurious shore side atmosphere, a go-to destination for those seeking the ultimate in relaxation and indulgence with captivating sea views or by our newly renovated cascade swimming pool.Marriott

name: Viva Sunrise
description: The Aparthotel VIVA Sunrise is located in Puerto Alcudia, just 400 metres from the beach. It offers free Wi-Fi, separate adult and children’s pools, surrounded by sun terraces with loungers and parasols. Apartments and studios feature air conditioning and a kitchenette equipped with a fridge. They also include a balcony and private bathroom. VIVA Sunrise has a poolside bar, La Palapa, serving snacks and light meals, including pizza. Guests can enjoy buffet meals at Caprice restaurant and an à la carte menu at El Patio. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at Sunrise’s tour desk. This is a seasonal hotel, open from April to October.

name: Ca's Xorc Luxury Retreat- Adults Only
address: Carretera de Deia, Km 56.1, Soller, Mallorca
description: No description found

name: Hotel & Spa S'Entrador Playa
address: Carrer de l'Agulla, 123, 07590 Cala Ratjada, Mallorca
description: Hotel & Spa S’Entrador Playa is set near Cala Agulla Beach, in Majorca’s Cala Ratjada. It is surrounded by pine forests, and has impressive views of the coast and hills. The hotel has an outdoor swimming pool, a sun terrace and gardens. There is a play area for children. There are also tennis courts and a fitness centre. Rooms at the S’Entrador Playa are bright and comfortable. They all have a balcony and satellite TV. The hotel spa has a sauna, hammam and Turkish bath. There is an indoor pool with hot tub. Massages and other treatments are also available. The hotel has a restaurant and a bar. There is also a 24-hour reception, with a tour desk and currency exchange.

name: Hotel Finca Ca's Curial
description: Set in a beautiful estate offering views of the Tramuntana Mountains, Finca Hotel Ca's Curial features an outdoor swimming pool and attractive rooms. Located in Sóller’s L’Horta district, it is 4 km from the coast. Housed in 19th-century buildings, the spacious rooms at Finca Hotel Ca's Curial have beamed ceilings and Mallorcan-style décor. Each has free Wi-Fi, a coffee maker and satellite TV. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Ca’s Curial’s dining room. There is also a charming terrace surrounded by orange and lemon trees. The Sóller Valley is ideal for hiking, cycling and horse riding. Port de Sóller and the nearest beaches can be reached in 10 minutes by car, while Palma is 30 km away.

name: Gran Hotel Soller
description: Gran Hotel Soller is a popular choice amongst travelers in Majorca, whether exploring or just passing through. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. 24-hour room service, free Wi-Fi in all rooms, facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park are just some of the facilities on offer. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless, internet access wireless (complimentary), whirlpool bathtub, non smoking rooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include hot tub, fitness center, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that Majorca has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Gran Hotel Soller.priceline.com

name: Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous
description: Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous is located within Mallorca’s Bendinat Golf Course, 5 km from Palma. It offers a free spa, indoor and outdoor swimming pools and spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony and free WiFi. Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous has colonial-style décor, with African influences. It is surrounded by extensive gardens and terraces, ideal for relaxing. The spa features 2 saunas, a Turkish bath, sunbeds and experience showers. Treatments are available for an extra charge. Overlooking the golf course or swimming pool, each room has flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a seating area. A bathrobe, slippers and hairdryer are included in the bathroom. Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous Resort’s restaurants serve gourmet international and Mediterranean-style cuisine. There is also a poolside bar. Free private parking is offered at the Lindner Golf Resort Portals Nous. Palma and the Porti Pi Shopping Centre can be reached in 10 minutes by car or bus.

name: Hotel Bahia
description: Set in stunning gardens, surrounded by hundred-year-old pine trees, this charming, colonial-style hotel is located 100 meters from Paguera beach. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Hotel Bahia boasts a beautiful interior design, including wooden beams in the ceilings and wonderful porches and hallways. Here you can admire the historical architecture and decor of the hotel, whilst strolling through the gardens. Spend the day relaxing and soaking up the sunshine by the magnificent outdoor swimming pool. Take a dip to cool off in the warm summer temperatures. There is an indoor swimming pool Finish the day by freshening up in your charming room, before heading down to the on-site à la carte restaurant. Sample the local-style cuisine, and follow it up with a drink in Bahias bar.

name: Bordoy Don Antonio
description: Surrounded by forests, the Bordoy Don Antonio offers stunning panoramic sea views and modern rooms with a balcony. The hotel has indoor and outdoor pools, and a spa area with hot tubs. Spacious rooms come with air conditioning and they also include a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities. Hotel Bordoy Don Antonio is 20 km from the capital of Majorca, Palma. There are three 18-hole golf courses within 7 km of the hotel. The hotel provides a free shuttle to the beaches and centre of Peguera. Mediterranean and international cuisine can be enjoyed in the hotel’s buffet restaurant. During summer, a snack bar is open on the hotel’s terrace, between the 2 outdoor pools. There are conference facilities for up to 80 people on site, with free internet and audiovisual equipment.

name: Grupotel Montecarlo
description: Situated 300 metres from the beach in the centre of Ca'n Picafort, Grupotel Montecarlo offers spacious rooms alongside elegant lounges, beautiful gardens and terraces. The Montecarlo Hotel has double and single rooms. Other features include luggage storage, a courtesy room with shower for day of departure and confirmation of flights, swimming pool towels, medical service.

name: Grupotel Amapola
address: C/ Circuit Del Llac, 49, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Located next to a lake and just 500 metres from the beach, this smart, family-friendly hotel has a great outdoor pool and tennis court. Kids will make new friends and have fun in the children's playground. Enjoy hearty meals in the buffet restaurant which serves a selection of hot and cold dishes. Have fun with friends and family on the mini-golf course or with a game of pool before the evening entertainment. All rooms feature a smart decor and have a balcony with views of the lake or the park. Each room has a private bathroom. Later in the evening, enjoy a delicious cocktail on the open-air terrace adjacent to the bar. Take the short walk down to the beach where you will find the mild Mediterranean waters.

name: Marins Beach Club Hotel Adults Only
description: Situated 300 metres from Cala Millor Beach, Marins Beach Club - Adults Only Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Cala Millor and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. A hot tub and a bicycle rental service are available for guests. The property has a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and garden. Free WiFi is accessible to all guests, while some rooms have a balcony. A Full English/Irish, Italian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Staff speak German, English and Spanish at the reception. Sa Coma Beach is 2 km from the hotel, while Cala Bona Beach is 2.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Palma de Mallorca, 70 km from Marins Beach Club - Adults Only Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca
description: La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca is located in the charming artist village of Deià, Mallorca. With its building dating back to the 16th century, the hotel features 2 outdoor pools, an award-winning restaurant and a spa. Offering sea and mountain views, the hotel has a hot tub and 2 tennis courts, and a tennis coach is available. There is also a sauna and a wellness centre. Complimentary boat excursions are offered during the summer. All rooms at the hotel are unique and feature traditional Mallorcan decor and antique furnishings. WiFi is free in all areas. There are fresh flowers and fruit in rooms every day. La Residencia, A Belmond Hotel, Mallorca boasts a permanent art exhibition and a sculpture garden. There are also classical music concerts and the hotel has a Steinway Piano. Fun donkey trails can be organised with the hotel´s resident donkeys in the olive groves. Staff can organise a private airport transfer. Owners of the property, artists themselves, can provide painting and sculpting lessons to the guests upon request. El Olivo is an award-winning à la carte restaurant. Café Miró is casual and offers tapas and local cuisine. There is also a pool restaurant and a snack bar. Free private parking is available.

name: Zafiro Tropic
description: Zafiro Tropic is located 200 metres from the beach in Port d’Alcúdia in northern Mallorca. It has a large garden, 3 swimming pools and a spa with Turkish baths. All apartments and studios at Zafiro Tropic are air-conditioned and have a private balcony. They also have satellite TV. Hotel Zafiro Tropic has one pool with a pirate ship and slides and one chillout pool with Balinese beds. In the garden there are loungers and parasols, and the hotel offers a varied entertainment programme for adults and children. Zafiro Tropic’s Caprice restaurant serves Mediterranean and international food. The hotel also has a poolside snack bar, La Palapa. El Patio bar and restaurant offers nightly shows, and you can enjoy cocktails in Cafe-Bar Babalú. The S’Albufera Nature Reserve is just 5 km away from Zafiro Tropic- The town of Alcúdia, located 2 km away, has a 14th-century wall.

name: Cabot Romantic- Adults Only
address: Passeig de Londres, 48, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: The Romantic is situated just metres from Puerto de Pollensa Beach and 5 minutes’ walk from the marina. This hotel features a restaurant and rooms with balconies. The Romantic has traditional décor with tiled floors. The air-conditioned rooms are spacious and most feature sea views. The hotel restaurant offers a range of buffet cuisine and traditional, Spanish dishes. Guests can enjoy a drink in the Romantic’s on-site bar or relax in the hotel lounge, which has a TV. There is also a 24-hour reception. The Romantic is within walking distance of the centre of Puerto de Pollensa, where there are a range of bars, cafés and restaurants. Local activities include horse riding, tennis and golf. The hotel can also arrange bike and car rental.

name: La Goleta Hotel de Mar - Adults Only
address: Paseo Saralegui 118, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Featuring an a la carte restaurant and swimming pool, La Goleta Hotel de Mar - Adults Only is located 30 metres from the beach in Port de Pollença. This stylish hotel offers rooms with free WiFi. Each air-conditioned room comes with a flat-screen TV, minibar, desk, and laptop safe. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Modern cuisine is served at La Goleta Hotel de Mar’s on-site restaurant, while the hotel also has a terrace and bar. There is also a 24.hour reception, as well as a tour desk and ticket service. La Goleta de Mar - Adults only is equipped to welcome cyclists. It offers a bicycle garage and repair shop. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 52 km away.

name: Sol House The Studio Calviá Beach
description: Sol House The Studio - Calviá Beach - Adults Only is 50 metres from Calvià Beach in Magalluf and features a terrace with Balinese beds, 2 outdoor pools. The hotel offers events such as live music, pool parties and sunset DJ sessions during the summer months. All guests enjoy the Fun Pass special offer at Katmandu Park or Golf Fantasia. The air-conditioned rooms feature modern décor, a furnished balcony and a flat-screen TV. Guests have access to an App with 24-hour Social Guest Service, event information and playlists. There is also a 24-hour gym where you can enjoy fitness activities and a personal trainer. Sol House The Studio - Calviá Beach - Adults Only has a buffet-style restaurant open for breakfast and dinner, offering international and regional dishes. Snacks and drinks are available at the lounge bar or outside at the pool bar. Palma de Mallorca city centre is 18 km away and the bus stop is just 50 metres from the hotel. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 26 km away.

name: Tacande Portals Wellness & Relax
description: Tacande Portals Wellness & Relax is situated in a residential area in Portals Nous, surrounded by natural beauty, away from the hustle and bustle of the town. The facilities the hotel offers make it the perfect place to relax and have fun. There are two swimming pools and a terrace with gardens where you can relax and soak in the Mediterranean sun. Two unique experiences in one hotel, the Cala Zone and the adults-only Costa Zone.The two areas of the complex near the sea and are less than 300 metres from each other. All rooms come with air conditioning, heating, safe and free WiFi. Some include VIP amenities and access to the executive lounge. The comfortable hotel is just a short walk to the beach, and to the town centre, where there is an attractive marina, dolphin aquarium and nearby a well-kept golf course. There are a number of restaurants around the marina and more along the main street.

name: Viva Eden Lago
address: Carrer De Les Savines, Urb. Lago Esperanza, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: The Eden Lago’s setting just 300 metres from the beach on Majorca’s Alcudia Bay makes it an ideal spot for a relaxing break in the sunshine. The aparthotel’s facilities also allow you to make the most of the island’s amazing climate, with an outdoor swimming pool and terraces surrounded by lush gardens. You can also enjoy the tranquillity offered by the nearby S’Albufera Nature Park and the historic seaside city of Alcudia.

name: Aimia Hotel
address: Carrer Santa Maria Del Cami, 1, 07108 Port de Sóller, Mallorca
description: Aimia Hotel & Spa is located just metres from the Sóller Port, in the northwest of Mallorca. It offers a magnificent outdoor pool, free internet and a well-equipped spa. Offering free spa access, the rooms at the Aimia are equipped with a private terrace, satellite TV and great views. All are air conditioned and also come with a bathrobe and hairdryer. The Aimia’s Blue Spa features an indoor pool, Turkish bath, hammam, hot tub and sauna. A resident therapist offers a range of beauty treatments and massages. The Airecel restaurant serves bistro lunch menus and gourmet-style cuisine. It has a large window with views over the garden and the Tramuntana Mountains.

name: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only
address: Avinguda De Cala Egos, Cala D'or, 07660 Cala d'Or, Mallorca
description: AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is a four-star hotel located in a beautiful cove in south-east Mallorca, facing Cala Egos Beach. It has 3 outdoor pools, one for My Favorite Club guests. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort has extensive solarium areas and chill out. The rooms at the AluaSoul Mallorca have all the facilities: rain shower, air conditioning, equipped balcony, safe, kettle, 42'' TV, free Wi-Fi, hair dryer. The modern rooms at this hotel feature a balcony and satellite TV. The private bathroom include free toiletries. This hotel has 5 restaurants with both à la carte and buffet options and 2 bars, one of which is a beach bar. The Mare Nubium Restaurant offers a selection of international dishes and the bar serves aperitifs and cocktails in the evening. The property offers a varied entertainment programme and has a beach club. The hotel also offers gym, wellness area, 3 swimming pools and solarium. AluaSoul Mallorca Resort - Adults only is just 2.5 km from the centre of Cala d’Or, with its shops, bars and restaurants. The establishment also offers My Favorite Club®, with exclusive services such as: -Personalized check-in and check-out -Access to the My Favorite Club Lounge with snacks and beverages -Reserved areas in indoor and outdoor areas -Selection of the best rooms including superior attributes

name: Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa
description: Located on Mallorca’s north-west coast, this modern hotel overlooks the Port de Sóller Bay. It offers an impressive infinity pool, a fitness centre and a spa, all with fantastic views. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa feature a private balcony, free WiFi and a flat-screen satellite TV. Each one has a coffee maker and a minibar. Jumeirah Port Soller Hotel & Spa has 3 restaurants which serve a wide range of dishes and offer fantastic sea views. Cap Roig offers traditional Mediterranean food and Es Fanals serves a creative selection of Spanish tapas and Sunset Sushi Lounge is popular for its selection of freshly prepared sushi, Asian-style tapas and locally inspired cocktails.There are also 2 pool-side bars. Talise Spa at Jumeirah Port Soller features a hammam suite, a heated hydropool and a thermal area. The town of Valldemossa is a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Central Palma and Palma Airport are each 35 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Bendinat
address: C/ Andrés Ferret Sobral, 1, 07181 Calvià, Mallorca
description: Located on the seafront, tucked away in the exclusive residential area of Bendinat, is this small Mediterranean style hotel with nice gardens and beautiful terraces, offering a peaceful, welcoming atmosphere. A stony cove with a big rock goes into the sea, a spot ideal for swimming and diving, there is also a sandy beach just 500 metres away. Las Terrazas de Bendinat restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and offers a terrace overlooking the sea. Bendinat also has a poolside snack bar open in the summer. You can also enjoy a poolside massage, on prior request. There are computers with free internet access at reception, as well as free WiFi throughout the hotel.

name: THB Gran Playa - Adults Only
description: Just 100 metres from the beaches of Ca’n Picafort, in northern Mallorca, the adults-only THB Gran Playa offers a pool, hot tub and sauna with sea views. All rooms have air conditioning and balconies. The THB Gran Playa’s spacious and light rooms all have free Wi-Fi and cable TV. The private balconies have a table and chairs, and some have sea views. THB Gran Playa offers a gym. The THB Gran Playa has a beer garden, a bar-café and a buffet restaurant. The breakfast buffet includes Mediterranean and international dishes. The centre of Ca’n Picafort is just a few minutes’ walk away, where you will find a variety of bars and discos. A bus stop just 2 minutes’ walk from the hotel offers a regular service into Palma de Mallorca city. Albufera Natural Park is less than 1 km away.

name: Hsm Solivera
description: Situated 300 metres from Palmira Beach in Paguera, HSM S’Olivera offers a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace with gardens. In winter, there is a free indoor pool, hot tub and sauna. Each air-conditioned room at HSM S’Olivera has a balcony and satellite TV. Decorated in light colours, rooms have tiled floors and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s spacious buffet restaurant offers a wide selection of cold and hot dishes, including homemade desserts. There is a poolside bar service in summer. HSM Hotel S’Olivera is just 250 metres from Paguera’s seafront promenade, which is full of shops, bars and restaurants. You can walk along the seafront to Santa Ponsa, Palmanova or Magaluf. Palma de Mallorca is 22 km away, and buses to the city stop just 250 metres away.

name: Sol Palmanova
description: Located just 120 metres from the beach of Palma Nova, this Katmandu-themed hotel is ideal for a family break in the Majorcan sunshine. All rooms are air conditioned and come with a balcony and a desk. The bathrooms include a hairdryer. At Sol Palmanova All Inclusive children between 8 months and 17 years old are entertained all day at the 4 different kid’s clubs, divided between age groups. Sol Palmanova All Inclusive also offers guests special rates for Katmandu Park. You will find gardens, 2 outdoor swimming pools and a terrace. Sports activities for adults include aquagym, waterpolo, table tennis tournaments, spinning classes, pilates and varied evening entertainment. Sol Palmanova Mallorca is14 km from Majorca's capital of Palma. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 25 minutes' drive away.

name: Morlans Garden
description: This traditional-style, family-run hotel is set just a short walk from the beach in the resort of Peguera, on Majorca’s sheltered west coast. Spend your day relaxing on the nearby sandy beach, 200 metres away, or around the hotel’s own outdoor swimming pool. This pool is surrounded by attractive gardens, adding to the hotel’s tranquil ambiance. Meanwhile, facilities for more active guests include a fitness room.

name: HSM Atlantic Park Hotel
address: C/Calderon De La Barca 2, Magaluf, Mallorca
description: The hotel stands out mostly for its situation, very close to the beach and leisure centre of Magalluf, but at the same time in a quiet place, without the noise and hustle of the resort´s famous nightlife. It is set at 25 km away from the airport and 15 km from the centre of Palma. The hotel offers spacious rooms that present elegant and modern decoration and colours. Each room comes with air-conditioning, cable TV and a bathroom with bath amenities. The hotel also offers high standard facilities and service with spacious and modern restaurant offers buffet style. The hotel is specialised and certified in golf: it offers the general information about golf courses in Majorca, as well as discounts in “green fees” in the most important golf courses, etc. Possibility to practice sports in the area.FarePortal

name: Ilusion Markus & Spa
description: Located in Majorcans Can Picafort and just 200 m from the beach, this hotel has great facilities including an outdoor pool and spa. Workout in the gym and dine in the buffet restaurant. The Markus Park allows you to make the most of Majorcas fantastic climate thanks to its proximity to the local beach and the great sun terrace located next to the pool. There is a childrens area of the pool. After exploring the surroundings, unwind in the Markus Parks spa with sauna and whirlpool. Alternately have a sit and chat with friends or family in the lounge areas of the Markus Park. All the Markus Parks bedrooms have private balconies and complete bathrooms with bathtubs. Choose from a wide range of hot and cold dishes in the Markus Parks buffet restaurant which also serves regional specialities. Accompany your meal with a fine Spanish wine. Begin the day with the continental breakfast.

name: Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only
address: Circuit Del Llac 105, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Ideal for a romantic break, Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has swimming pools surrounded by lovely gardens. This adults-only property offers free WiFi throughout. The Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has an outdoor hot tub, as well as a sauna. There is also a fitness centre, tennis and a multi-sports area. Bicycle rental, massages and treatments are offered at an extra cost. Each room at Garden Holiday Village - Adults Only has a balcony or terrace with views over the pool or gardens. The property is only 750 metres from the beaches of Alcudia Bay. The S’Albufera Natural Park is just metres from the hotel. The local area is ideal for hiking, horse-riding and water sports. Free parking is possible on site and a free shuttle to the beach is offered.

name: Occidental Cala Viñas
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Cala Vinas hotel is situated in one of the most beautiful spots on the Mallorcan coast on the edge of a white sand beach with crystalline waters. This brand new modern hotel offers magnificent rooms with sea views that you will enjoy from the moment you wake up. After getting up you will be able to have a dip in the incredible Majorcan waters before enjoying the exquisite cuisine of the hotel. This 4-star hotel has communal areas and facilities that are carefully designed to offer guests the utmost wellbeing. Enjoy bathing in the swimming pools of the hotel while your children have fun in the new swimming pool that features a water park. And to crown your holidays you can relax and pamper yourself with a session in the Thalassotherapy Spa while your children have fun in the Barcy Club featuring a ball pool.Barcelo.com

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Mallorca Palmanova Bay
description: The apart-hotel was refurbished in 2017 and is very comfortable equipped. It is situated on the Torrenova headland next to the Leonardo Royal Mallorca, the excellent location in front of the sea makes a perfect holiday. The ideal environment for families and couples alike, where the beach and the mountains are always within sight. From the panoramic terrace you can enjoy the swimming pools, pool bar, the sea view and a lively atmosphere. A magnificent place that combines tranquillity and comfort. You can have fun with all types of watersports offered at the beach or just relax watching the sunset.

name: Bakour Garbi Cala Millor by Checkin
address: Urb. Son Moro, 07560 Cala Millor, Mallorca
description: Perfect for families, this lovely hotel is located in Cala Millor. Nestled within 600 metre(s) from the town centre, the hotel allows easy access to all this destination has to offer. The property is close to the city's main public transport connections. The hotel is within 600 metre(s) from the nearest beach. The hotel is within 1000 metres from the harbour. The establishment consists of 170 units. This hotel was established in 1999. Wi-Fi internet connection is available for further comfort and convenience. The front desk offers 24-hour reception. Bakour Garbi Cala Millor does not offer cots on demand. There is a car park at Bakour Garbi Cala Millor. Guests may avail for airport transfer service. Visitors can enjoy the delicious dining options offered in the pleasant surroundings. An array of world-class entertainment options is available at Bakour Garbi Cala Millor for guests' convenience. Thanks to the wide range of health amenities, those staying at this hotel will be able to indulge themselves during their stay. There is a full programme of organised activities ideal for sports enthusiasts and for those wishing to enjoy an active stay. Some services may be payable.FarePortal

name: Hotel Triton Beach
description: Set in a prime location of Majorca, Chillout Hotel Triton Beach puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Chillout Hotel Triton Beach. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Chillout Hotel Triton Beach.Agoda

name: Iberostar Playa de Muro
description: Iberostar Playa de Muro has an ideal setting overlooking Muro Beach, 100 metres from Albufera Nature Reserve. This resort has a main pool, two children's pools and an indoor pool in the Spa area, a spa and rooms with balconies. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. The Playa de Muro features elegant décor throughout. Its rooms have TVs with satellite channels and a minibar. The hotel has 3 restaurants,1 snack bar with sea views and a food truck by the pool. The on-site spa features an indoor swimming pool, a hot tub, heated loungers, a rain-effect shower and 2 saunas. There is also a gym. A kid's club is available from May to October. Iberostar Playa de Muro offers unique services for cyclists and sports travelers. There is a repair shop, garage and a fully equipped gym. Bicycles are available for hire, there are special menus, sports shop and a dedicated team. S’Estany Gran Lake is just 15 minutes’ walk from the resort.

name: FERGUS Bermudas
description: Footsteps from Palmanova beach, FERGUS Bermudas has a large garden with outdoor pool. Relax with the entertainment program and dine in the restaurant before heading to the bar. Enjoying an exotic position on the stunning island of Majorca, this hotel has a sunny, tropical feel with a privileged position near the beach and a design which makes the most of its surroundings. All bedrooms have private balconies where you can breathe the fresh sea air and soak up the Majorcan sunshine. Browse the nearby shops, bars and restaurants of Palmanovas centre and take the short stroll down to the beach for a swim in the Mediterranean and admire gorgeous sea views. Have fun taking part in the day and night entertainment programme. Kids will have fun and make new friends in the childrens miniclub. This hotel features 10.000 square metres of lush gardens. There is free private parking on site.

name: Hotel Creta Paguera
description: Featuring a terrace and free WiFi, Hotel Creta Paguera is set in Paguera. Among the various facilities of this property are a shared lounge and a bar. The restaurant serves international cuisine. The units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Rooms have a private bathroom, while some boast a sea view. All guest rooms at Hotel Creta Paguera feature air conditioning and a desk. The accommodation offers a continental or à la carte breakfast. Palma de Mallorca is 17 km from Hotel Creta Paguera, while Playa de Palma is 25 km away. Palma de Mallorca Airport is 24 km from the property.

name: Sol Guadalupe
address: Crta. La Porrasa, 4 - Calvia Beach, 07181 Magaluf, Mallorca
description: Sol Guadalupe is 200 metres from Mallorca’s Magalluf Beach, and offers a 24-hour self-service kitchen for families with babies. It features a large lagoon-style pool with hot tub, indoor pool and 2 children's pools. The bright, air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and a small fridge. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Rooms come with a spacious terrace overlooking the pool, mountains or sea. Sol Guadalupe restaurant offers buffet meals and show cooking in the dining room, which is air-conditioned in summer. There is also an Italian corner and a poolside snack bar. A daytime and evening entertainment programme is provided, including fitness sessions, Tai-chi and yoga. Children have their own playground and mini club. Free WiFi is available throughout. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. On-site parking is available for an extra charge. Aquapark is 2 km away and Poniente Golf Club is a 5-minute drive from the hotel. Reservations include a free Sol Katmandu Fun Pass with discounts at the Katmandu Theme Park and the Wave House.

name: Sol Katmandu Park & Resort
description: Sol Katmandu Park & Resort is located just 5 minutes' walk from Magalluf Beach and it is within the Katmandu Theme Park. It offers 2 swimming pools, one of which is only for children, and free WiFi throughout. The property organises a varied entertainment programme for children with Boro & Friends Musical Buffet & Show. Guests have free access to Katmandu Theme Park's wide range of rides including a splash park, a soft play adventure area and a 4D cinema. Sol Katmandu Park & Resort offers rooms with a furnished terrace or balcony, offering views of the mountains or the pool and garden. There is a satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar, and telephone. A safe is available for an extra charge. The bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The hotel’s themed buffet restaurant offers international food. There is also a lounge bar and a poolside bar. There are many golf courses nearby, and the Western Water Park is just 2 km away. Within 5 minutes you can walk to Magalluf's main shopping and leisure areas. Palma de Mallorca is 15 km away.

name: Hotel Exagon Park
address: Ronda de Pleta, 46, 07458 Can Picafort, Mallorca
description: Hotel Exagon Park is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Majorca. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, family room, restaurant, tours are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, internet access wireless (complimentary), air conditioning, heating, wake-up service. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including hot tub, sauna, outdoor pool, indoor pool, spa. Convenience and comfort makes Hotel Exagon Park the perfect choice for your stay in Majorca.priceline.com

name: Aluasoul Alcudia Bay
address: Carrer De La Gavina, 4, 07410 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Set on Alcudia Bay, this tranquil hotel is ideal for a break on the long, sandy beaches of northern Majorca, or for simply lying back beside the pool. AluaSoul Alcudia Bay is surrounded by pine trees and lies just 300 metres from several kilometres of fine white sand and clear, Mediterranean waters. Take a dip in the sea or dive into the outdoor swimming pool at the hotel, which comes surrounded by comfortable sun loungers. You can choose to get involved in the organised aerobics, volleyball, tennis or football. After a delicious buffet meal, settle down to enjoy the live entertainment offered each evening.

name: Aparthotel Alcudia Garden
address: Avinguda De La Platja, 1, 07408 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Located 80 m from the magnificent, spacious and sandy Alcudia Bay Beach, the hotel offers an ideal location for a relaxing holiday, with 2 swimming pools and 8000m² of beautiful gardens. Enjoy a fun-filled break for all the family at the Alcudia Garden Aparthotel, whose spacious, air-conditioned accommodation has a balcony where you can soak up the sun. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Relax in the sauna and hot tub, or spend the time swimming in the sea or the hotel’s pools. Choose from activities including free-of-charge sports such as archery, table tennis and aerobics, or visit the Alcudia Garden’s fitness centre. At night, enjoy performances and shows, including live music in the summer. There is a bar by the pool. Children can have fun at the playground, in the children’s pool, and with the entertainment programme led by the hotel’s monitors. There is also a mini-club for kids aged 4-12. The Aparthotel Alcudia Garden is also set close to s’Albufera, the top Natural Park in the Balearic Islands. You can explore the natural surroundings with a bike rented at the hotel, or head to the cosmopolitan Puerto del Alcudia for a range of activities.

name: Mar Hotels Playa Mar & Spa
address: Carretera Formentor s/n, 07470 Port de Pollença, Mallorca
description: Playa Mar & Spa offers bright studios, 50 metres from the beach in Puerto Pollença, Mallorca. There is a tennis court, outdoor pool, and spa with heated indoor pool, sauna and Turkish bath. Each apartment has a balcony, twin bedroom and living room with a sofa bed and TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The complex has an air-conditioned restaurant, bar and snack bar. There are several lounges and a TV and video room. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Playa Mar & Spa has 24-hour reception and you can hire a car or bicycle. An airport shuttle service is available for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Na Forana
description: Hotel Na Forana is set on Son Moll Beach, between Cala Rajada and Capdepera. It features a gym, hot tub, an indoor pool and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool overlooking the beach. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Hotel Na Forana has elegant décor, a TV, a safe and a minibar. Many rooms offer balconies with sea views. You can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes in the Na Forana’s buffet restaurant, which offers show cooking twice a day. There are also spacious lounge areas with free Wi-Fi. Free kayak tours are organised from the Hotel Na Forana reception desk. The centre of Cala Rajada is a 5-minute walk from the hotel, while Capdepera is a 20-minute walk away. There are 2 golf courses within 5 km of the Na Forana.

name: Hotel More
address: C. Tirant Lo Blanc, 8, 07409 Alcúdia, Mallorca
description: Featuring a sun terrace with sun loungers, garden and outdoor pool, Hotel More is a beachfront property featuring room with sea-view balconies. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Each room is air-conditioned and has a double bed or 2 single beds. It includes a safety deposit box and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom has a bath or shower and hairdryer. The hotel also has a buffet restaurant and bar. There is also an evening entertainment, but various bars can be found within a 15-minute walk. Alcanda Golf Course is 5 km from the property and Port of Alcudia and Pollentia are both 3 km away.

name: Aparthotel Novo Mar
description: Aparthotel Novo Mar is 100 metres from Paguera’s Torá Beach, in south-western Mallorca. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, free WiFi and air-conditioned apartments with a terrace and flat-screen TV. Each bright and modern Novo Mar apartment has tiled floors and a living room with a sofa. The private bathroom comes with amenities, and the well-equipped kitchenette includes a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. Most apartments have sea views. (upon request and subject to availability) A buffet breakfast is available at the Novo Mar complex. You can also have dinner in the restaurant on prior request, and show cooking is offered. Special diet menus can be requested and there is also a lounge with a flat-screen TV and a bar. Wi-Fi is offered throughout the complex, and is free in public areas. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car or bicycle from the tour desk. Santa Ponsa Golf Course is 3 km away and Camp de Mar Golf Course is 3.5 km away.

name: Catalonia Atenas
description: Set 3 metro stops from central Barcelona, the Atenas Catalonia has a rooftop swimming pool, offering views of the nearby Torre Agbar and Sagrada Familia. It also features free WiFi, a gym and a spa with a Turkish bath. The bright rooms of Hotel Atenas Barcelona have simple décor with wooden flooring. Each has air conditioning, a mini fridge with complimentary water, and satellite TV. The hotel's buffet breakfast features a show kitchen. There is a snack bar and guests can enjoy stunning city views from the pool, set on the 11th floor. The Sagrada Familia is just over one kilometre from the hotel, while Glòries shopping centre can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. The Catalonia Atenas has a convenient left luggage service, on-site parking, and is 2 minutes’ walk from Clot Metro Station; and 200 metres from Clot Train Station; here you can take a direct train to Barcelona Airport.

name: Grupotel Gran Via 678
address: Gran Via de Les Corts Catalanes, 678, 08010 Barcelona
description: The stylish Gran Via 678 is situated 700 metres from Plaza Catalunya in central Barcelona and features an outdoor pool with a sun terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Modern rooms at this design hotel include satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom is complete with a hairdryer. Grupotel Gran Via 678 offers a restaurant which serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. Guests can enjoy meals on the terrace. Urquinaona Metro Station is 400 metres away while the Arc de Triomf monument is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel.

name: Sercotel Caspe
description: This design hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Arc de Triomf Metro Station and Estació del Nord Bus Station. It has a gym, and offers free Wi-Fi and free bottled water. Rooms at the Sercotel Caspe are air-conditioned and soundproofed. They feature satellite TV, a minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The Sercotel Caspe has an outdoor terrace, an attractive restaurant and a café-bar. Room service is also available. The hotel is a short walk from Gaudí's buildings on Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is approximately 20 minutes' walk away. There is a tour desk and 24-hour reception. Car hire is available and there is on-site parking for an extra charge.

name: Catalonia Eixample 1864
description: Located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, this 19th-century building offers stylish modern interiors and free WiFi.
