It is just 300 metres from the designer shops and Gaudí buildings of Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is housed in one of the Eixample’s oldest buildings, and its painted façade gives it the Speciality Monument status. All soundproofed en-suite rooms sleek wooden floors and furniture, air conditioning and all rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. Some rooms have a private terrace and pool. A buffet breakfast with show cooking is offered every morning at the Sala Minerva; while the hotel's Les Finestres de Llúria restaurant serves traditional Catalan food with a creative twist. Room service is also available. Catalonia Eixample 1864 boasts a rooftop swimming pool, sundeck and bar; as well as a gym. The Catalonia Eixample 1864 is ideally located just a 5-minute walk from Passeig de Gracia Station. Plaza Catalunya Square is a 10-minute walk away. The hotel offers private parking on-site for an extra cost and an electric vehicle charging station.

name: Hotel Balmes, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
description: Balmes is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes’ walk from the famous Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. It offers a swimming pool, a gym/fitness center and modern rooms with satellite TV. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Balmes feature parquet floors and smart, simple décor. They all come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel’s restaurant serves typical Catalan food using fresh market produce. B Bar, like the rest of the hotel, is decorated with works of African art. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There is a computer in the lobby which guests can use for free. Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are both under 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel. You can walk to Las Ramblas and Barcelona’s charming Gothic Quarter in around 15 minutes.

name: Ilunion Les Corts Spa
description: Ilunion Les Corts Spa features a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a terrace and bar in Barcelona. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation provides a concierge service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Ilunion Les Corts Spa every room comes with bed linen and towels. A gluten-free breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Camp Nou is less than 1 km from Ilunion Les Corts Spa, while Sants Railway Station is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the hotel. The hotel is a 15-minute drive from Plaza España, from where the shuttles leave to the Montjuic field.

name: Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira
description: Situated in Barcelona, 1.5 km from Palau Sant Jordi, Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Camp Nou is 2.9 km away and Boqueria Market is 4 km from the hotel. At Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira offers a terrace. Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 2 km from the hotel, while Montjuïc is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 8 km from Leonardo Royal Hotel Barcelona Fira.

name: Catalonia La Maquinista
description: Catalonia La Maquinista is ideally located next to the La Maquinista Shopping Centre in Barcelona’s Sant Andreu District. Plaza de Catalunya is just a 15-minute Metro journey away. The Maquinista’s bright rooms have air conditioning and flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. All rooms have a work desk and safe. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast and Mediterranean cuisine for lunch and dinner. The neighbouring Maquinista Shopping Centre has a selection of cinemas, a bowling alley, as well as cafés and bars. Catalonia La Maquinista is 500 metres from Barcelona’s ring road, the B10 Ronda del Litoral, connecting guests to the beach in 10 minutes. Sant Andreu Metro and Railway Station is just a 10-minute walk from Catalonia La Maquinista and has direct trains to Passeig de Gràcia and to El Prat Airport. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are 8 Metro stops away. As with reservations of more than 4 rooms, special conditions and supplements will apply to those of more than 8 nights.

name: Melia Barcelona Sarria
description: Meliá Barcelona Sarriá features a spa, a 24-hour gym and a restaurant. Gaudi’s major works, such as La Pedrera and Casa Battló are 2 km away. There is free WiFi available throughout. The Melia Barcelona Sarriá’s rooms feature chic, contemporary décor with 42-inch TVs and bathrooms with marble finishing and baths or showers. All Level Lounge Rooms offer superior services including exclusive private areas, a private reception area with personalized attention and 1 free access per stay to the on-site Serena spa. A welcoming international buffet breakfast, including gluten-free products and options and special dietary options, is served every morning. The Nonna Maria restaurant serves mediterranean and international cuisine. The city’s upmarket Avenida Diagonal shopping avenue is just 1 block away; while Barcelona Camp Nou is within 10 minutes by car. Francesc Macià square is just 200 metres from the hotel and you can walk to the elegant Passeig de Gracia Boulevard in about 20 minutes.

name: Hotel Ronda Lesseps
description: Ronda Lesseps Hotel is located in Barcelona and offers free Wi-Fi. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This luxury hotel offers a 24-hour reception, a concierge and luggage storage. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. Ronda Lesseps Hotel provides 100 rooms, each with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. After settling in to their room, guests can explore the local area with use of Lesseps Metro Station, which is a short stroll from the hotel. Ronda Lesseps Hotel's on-site restaurant, La Terrasseta del Lesseps, is a popular spot to have a meal. The hotel is close to shops, dining and Barcelona's nightlife. Guests can also visit Park Guell, Carrer Gran de Gracia and the Gaudi House Museum.Revato

name: Zenit Barcelona
description: Zenit Barcelona is 250 metres from Plaza Francesc Macià on Barcelona’s Diagonal Avenue. This modern hotel offers stylish air-conditioned and soundproofed rooms, with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu. The Zenit is a 15-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard, where Gaudí’s famous La Pedrera and Casa Batlló can be found. Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas are a further 15 minutes’ walk away. Rooms at the Zenit Barcelona feature satellite TV and a safe and minibar. There is a work desk and a kettle with free tea and coffee set; the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Zenit Hotel’s restaurant offers gourmet Spanish and international cuisine. A special gluten-free breakfast and children's menus are available, and packed lunches and room service can be requested. There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. A laundry, dry cleaning and ironing service is offered. Parking is available 10 minutes' walk away, for an extra cost.

name: NH Barcelona Stadium
description: Formerly known as NH Rallye, the NH Barcelona Stadium hotel is in a convenient location in the Les Corts area of Barcelona. Several local points of interest are easily accessible within walking distance such as the FC Barcelona stadium and museum, El Corte Inglés, and the L'illa Diagonal shopping mall. The metro station Les Corts with links to the city center is only a few minutes away. Contemporary comforts such as air-conditioning, Wi-Fi and satellite TV come as standard in each of our 106 modern guest rooms. Other rooms offer a spacious sitting area and a coffee or tea maker. A delightful breakfast buffet is freshly prepared for our guests every morning. Made-to-order hot meals and an early bird breakfast are also available upon request. The Ristorante Don Giovanni by renowned chef Andrea Tumbarello with its typical Italian flavors and top-quality seasonal products or enjoy an aperitif with some snacks at the Gastrobar right next to the restaurant. Our friendly staff is on hand to offer recommendations for excellent local restaurants for additional lunch or dinner selections. We are pleased to host events both large and small. The NH Barcelona Stadium has seven meeting rooms which hold up to a maximum of 250 guests. With advance notice, our special events services team can assist with menu planning, equipment and services.NH Hoteles

name: Best Western Premier Hotel Dante
description: The Best Western Premier Hotel Dante is located in the Eixample district of Barcelona, a few minutes walking from the elegant Paseo de Gracia, Plaza de Catalunya and the famous Pedrera and Casa Batlló. With a functional design, the Hotel has a Lobby Bar, meeting rooms, internet corner and private parking. The rooms are spacious and bright. They have free WI-FI connection, coffee maker, electronic safe, LCD satellite TV and air conditioning, as well as a complete bathroom. The Suites are located on the 7th floor and have a large terrace with views of Barcelona. The Buffet Breakfast offers a wide variety of milk and vegetable drinks, juices, coffees, infusions, pastries and salty. Many of the products served are gluten free. The Hotel's Lobby Bar, serves Mediterranean cuisine, both for lunch and dinner. It is also possible to taste an aperitif. The Hotel also has 4 fully equipped meeting rooms and private parking, as well as free Wi-Fi in rooms and common areas. It is about 20 minutes away by car from Barcelona airport and 10 from the AVE station.bestwestern.com

name: Well and Come Boutique Hotel
description: Featuring a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool and city views, Well and Come Hotel is located right beside Verdaguer Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Sagrada Familia. This boutique hotel offers soundproofed rooms with free WiFi, a flat-screen TV and laptop safe. There is also a Nespresso coffee machine, kettle and minibar with free water in all rooms. Rooms have individually controlled air conditioning and heating. They also come with a private bathroom which includes a rain shower, free toiletries, hairdryer and vanity mirror. Some rooms come with a balcony, terrace or city views. Hotel Well and Come features a 24-hour reception, a lounge area with a fireplace, an on-site bar and a fitness area. The famous Passeig de Gracia Boulevard is 5 minutes’ walk from Well and Come hotel. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló houses can be reached within a 15-minute walk.

name: El Avenida Palace
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes, 605, 08003 Barcelona
description: El Avenida Palace Hotel is set on Barcelona’s Gran Via, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Catalunya, La Rambla and Paseo de Gracia. Its grand interior features an impressive staircase and marble columns. Many famous guests have stayed at the Hotel Avenida Palace, including the Beatles in 1965. The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature satellite TV and carpeted or parquet floors. Rooms are soundproofed and have a minibar, work desk and a safe. The hotel's panoramic rooftop terrace offers views over the city, a sun deck and a swimming pool. There is also a lounge bar, a 24-hour front desk and both free WiFi and room service are available.

name: Ocean Drive Barcelona
description: Ocean Drive Barcelona features air-conditioned rooms with satellite flat-screen TV in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a seasonal outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy a selection of international cuisine in the in-house restaurant. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at Ocean Drive Barcelona also offer free WiFi. All guest rooms include a wardrobe. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Guests will have free access to Urquinaona Holmes Place Gym, 800 metres from the hotel. Ocean Drive Barcelona offers a terrace. Casa Batllo is 300 metres from the hotel. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Novotel Barcelona City
description: Upon arrival you will be greeted by our team in a close, friendly way. Enjoy our buffet breakfast and the magic of show-cooking, plus the Mediterranean cuisine served in our restaurant with fresh and seasonal products. Visit the 19th floor and enjoy the spectacular panoramic view of Barcelona, with a cocktail or some tapas. Immerse yourself in our pool under the sun's rays.accorhotels.com

name: Aparthotel Atenea Barcelona
description: This modern aparthotel is located just off Diagonal Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. It offers large rooms with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a kitchen. The elegant rooms at Aparthotel Atenea Barcelona are equipped with carpeted floors and air conditioning. Each one has a seating area with a sofa, as well as a kitchen with a fridge and 2 electric hobs. The hotel’s restaurant offers a breakfast-to-go box for a surcharge, and serves healthy food for lunch and dinner. There is also a lounge bar, where guests can relax while having a glass of cava or a soft drink. Les Corts Metro Station is just a 3 minutes’ walk away. Sants Train Station is only 2 Metro stops from Atenea. Barcelona’s main tourist attractions can be reached within 15 minutes by Metro.

name: Mercure Barcelona Condor
description: In the district of Sarrià-Sant Gervasi, enjoy the tranquility of the upper area and the proximity to several Barcelona landmarks. It is a 25-minute walk from downtown and 10 minutes from Diagonal and Gràcia neighbourhood. The railway is a 3-minute walk and reaches downtown in 10 minutes. It has a gym with views of Tibidabo and a breakfast with local and seasonal products. We will make you feel at home!accorhotels.com

name: NH Sants Barcelona
description: The NH Sants Barcelona hotel, previously named NH Numancia, is located within walking distance of Sants station in the heart of Barcelona’s financial district. Situated just a few steps away from the trade fair, it is at the center of Barcelona’s financial district. Guests will find Camp Nou, the home ground of the Barcelona soccer team, and Gaudi’s Casa Batlló a few minutes’ distance from the hotel. Our bright, contemporary selection of 203 guest rooms offer free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, and minibars, with some suites overlooking the Olympic Village. The larger upgraded suites provide guests with a balcony or terrace and a sitting room with a sofa bed. A daily breakfast buffet is served and includes made-to-order hot dishes upon request. The NH Sants Barcelona restaurant, serving fresh Catalan cuisine in a modern dining area, is open for lunch and dinner. An á la carte menu, vegetarian, and children’s options are also available. For additional requests, our professional and friendly staff is ready to provide NH Sants Barcelona guests with an outstanding experience. We also have 4 meeting rooms available, which can hold up to 200 people.NH Hoteles

name: Catalonia Born
description: Set in a 19th-century building in Barcelona’s El Born district, Catalonia Born offers a rooftop pool, an attractive central courtyard and free Wi-Fi. Arc de Triomf Metro Station is 250 metres away. The classic rooms at Catalonia Born Hotel come with an elegant marble bathroom. They also include a satellite TV and centrally controlled heating or air conditioning, depending on the season. A buffet breakfast is served, and the snack bar is open for lunch and dinner. There is also a bar in the lobby. Located minutes from França Train Station, the hotel is well-connected to the rest of the city and its surroundings. Car rental is also available from the tour desk.

name: Acta City47
description: Acta CITY47 is 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Sants Train Station and 15 minutes from the Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The rooms at Acta CITY47 feature simple, modern décor and a private bathroom. Each one comes with a TV, free safe, and a work desk. Guests have free access to an ironing room open 24 hours. The hotel’s modern Nass City restaurant serves international food and a gluten-free breakfast is available on prior request. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The Acta CITY47 is 20 minutes’ walk from Barcelona FC’s Camp Nou Stadium. Sants Metro Station connects you with the centre of Barcelona in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Barcelona Center
description: Barcelona Center is 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, and a 15-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya. Guests have free access to the small gym and rooftop hydromassage tub. The modern rooms at the Barcelona Center Hotel have satellite TV and free WiFi. There is a minibar and safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The Center Hotel has a traditional Spanish restaurant. There is also a bar and a terrace. There is a 24-hour front desk. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Upper Diagonal
description: Situated in Barcelona’s Pedralbes neighbourhood, Upper Diagonal offers modern accommodation with free WiFi and a gym just 1 km from the Camp Nou football stadium. All rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. All rooms have ironing facilities. The hotel has an on-site restaurant serving seasonal food, and you can find more restaurants and shops on Diagonal Avenue, just 600 metres away, and in the L’Illa Diagonal shopping centre. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property and the hotel also offers car hire. La Pedrera is 3.3 km from Upper Diagonal, while Tibidabo is 3.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from Upper Diagonal.

name: Pol & Grace Hotel
description: Pol & Grace Hotel is located just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaça Molina and Sant Gervasi Train Stations. It offers spacious, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi access. This modern hotel features a library and an area displaying works by local artists, as well as a free work area. A free coffee and tea service is offered from mid-morning onwards. Each soundproofed room at Pol & Grace Hotel has functional, modern décor and includes a small fridge, a free safe and a welcome gift. The fully equipped bathrooms come with toiletries. A varied buffet breakfast is served every morning. Room service is also available. The hotel has a 24-hour reception with car rental service and a tour desk. Private parking is available on site. Fontana Metro Station is 600 metres away, and offers direct access to Plaza Catalunya, Las Ramblas and Parc Güell. The popular Gràcia district is within a 2-minute walk of the property and has a range of shops, restaurants and lively bars.

name: Hotel Casa Elliot
description: The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is located in the centre of Barcelona, less than 10 minutes’ walk from Plaça de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel features free Wi-Fi access. Rooms at the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group feature contemporary décor and balconies or windows, while some also have large private terraces. Each room has a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Breakfast is served in the hotel’s buffet-style restaurant. Guests can make use of the Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group’s library, lounge and tour desk. A bar service is also available. The Casa Elliot by Bondia Hotel Group is under 200 metres from Universitat Metro Station and is a 10-minute walk from Passeig de Gràcia. El Prat Airport can be reached in 30 minutes, by bus.

name: Abba Sants Hotel
description: Located just a short stroll from Barcelona Sants Railway Station, Abba Sants provides guests with an ideal base while in Barcelona. Guests can also make use of free Wi-Fi during their stay. This 4-star hotel offers massage services, a 24-hour reception and meeting rooms. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature soundproofed windows, a private bathroom, a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. They each include a laptop safe, an in-room closet and an in-room safe. Abba Sants houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of the day. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood offers several bars and restaurants serving a range of different cuisines. Abba Sants is also located near the area's popular restaurants and bars, and Dona i Ocell is within walking distance. Sants Estacio Railway Station is within a two-minute stroll, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Guitart Grand Passage
description: This modern hotel offers spacious, air-conditioned suites with a separate seating area, private balcony, free WiFi and 2 TVs. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard. There are several restaurants within a 5-minute walk from Guitard Grand Passage. Also, the hotel is only 500 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station. There are good transport connections to Barcelona El Prat Airport from Passeig de Gràcia Metro Station, located around 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Allegro Barcelona
description: Allegro Barcelona is a futuristdesing boutique hotel located in the well known neighbourhood of Eixample next to Rambla Catalunya and 3 minutes away from Passeig de Gracia The hotel desinged by the architect Nadal Moneo and the interiorist designer Tomas Alia integrates perfectly in the neighbourhood Its 56 modern bedrooms a functional and perfect comfort to all the travelers The hotel offers breakfast Room Service Concierge service Dry cleaning ecornerBarcelo.com

name: H10 Metropolitan
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Barcelona. There is also a gym with a terrace and a swimming pool. There are a variety of amenities on offer to guests of H10 Metropolitan, such as a 24-hour reception, luggage storage and meeting facilities. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer assistance. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature soundproofed windows, an alarm clock, an in-room closet and a flat-screen TV. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the area with use of Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, which is a brief walk from the hotel. H10 Metropolitan features both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day with dinner and a drink. The hotel also provides breakfast each morning. H10 Metropolitan is close to Passeig de Gracia Train Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Barcelona and its surrounding areas. Barcelona Cathedral, the Liceu and La Rambla are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Ofelias Hotel
description: Set just off Gran Vía and a 2-minute walk from Plaza Espanya Metro Station and the Fira Exhibition Centre, Ofelias Hotel offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi. It features a roof terrace with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Ofelias Hotel has a flat-screen TV. Each one comes with a private bathroom. A free bottle of water is provided upon arrival. The hotel has an on-site bar where you can get a drink. There is a range of cafes and bars around Plaza Espanya. Restaurants can be found on Las Ramblas and in the Gothic Quarter, just 4 Metro stops away. Staff at the reception can give you information about different Slow Travel activities.These include free bicycles on request, allowing you to discover hidden places and enjoy local cultures. The Magic Fountains and Montjuïc Park are less than 1 km from the Ofelias, and Las Arenas Shopping centre is just opposite the hotel. The airport bus stops just 200 metres from the hotel. Bicycle rental is available on request from reception.

name: H10 Art Gallery
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 4.5-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Barcelona. It also offers a rooftop terrace, free Wi-Fi and a swimming pool. Guests staying at H10 Art Gallery Hotel can enjoy taking a dip in the plunge pool, working out in the fitness centre or relaxing with a drink at the on site bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private bathroom, heating and a mini bar. They all have ironing facilities and a telephone. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Barcelona's attractions, such as Avinguda Diagonal, La Pedrera Casa Mila and Passeig de Gracia, are within easy walking distance of H10 Art Gallery Hotel. Guests can also visit University of Barcelona, the Casa Batllo and Casa Lleo Morera.Revato

name: Occidental Diagonal 414
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility.Barcelo.com

name: Ilunion Almirante
description: Located between the Gothic Quarter and the fashionable Born district, this stylish hotel has a fitness centre and free WiFi in all areas. Barcelona Cathedral is just 200 metres from the Ilunion Almirante, and guests can walk to the famous Las Ramblas in less than 10 minutes. Jaume I Metro Station is 300 metres from the hotel. Rooms feature wooden furniture and an en suite bathroom with marble finishes. They all include a large flat-screen TV with satellite channels, safe and minibar. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. The Ilunion Almirante features a stylish breakfast room where an à-la-carte breakfast is served daily. Room service is available during limited hours. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

name: Holiday Inn Barcelona - Sant Cugat, An IHG Hotel
address: Carrer Del Danubi, 24,Sant Cugat Del Vallès, 08174 Barcelona
description: Welcome to Sant Cugat del Vallès The Holiday Inn Barcelona Sant Cugat is a modern 4-star hotel. The city hotel is located on Carrer del Danubi in the Sant Cugat district. Built with care and attention to detail, the hotel is of great value for families, business travellers, and all other discerning guests. You are guaranteed to feel at home at the Holiday Inn Barcelona Sant Cugat. Our comfortable rooms are equipped with a flatscreen TV and a desk. All rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom with a shower. Our city hotel has event and meeting rooms for your convention or conference in Sant Cugat. A fitness room is available at our hotel. The reception is staffed 24 hours a day. With a delicious breakfast buffet our guests are ready to start the day and discover Barcelona. There are two train stations within 2-4 km, Rubi and FGC - Sant Cugat. The Sant Cugat Shopping Centre is very close to the hotel, as are several parks and a hiking area such as the Torrent dels Alous. You can arrive Barcelona by train in only 30 minutes. From here you can reach: Camp Nou several parks Teatre Joventut Palau Blaugrana many restaurants & bars port of Barcelona Aquarium Maremagnum shopping centre Barceloneta district with its city beaches Barcelona-El Prat Airport (BCN) is only 31 km from the hotel.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Sercotel Rosellón
description: Located 300 metres from Sagrada Familia, Sercotel Hotel Rosellon offers 4-star accommodation in Barcelona and features a bar. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Sercotel Hotel Rosellon each room comes with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. La Pedrera is 1.6 km from Sercotel Hotel Rosellon, while Casa Batllo is 2 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Acta Atrium Palace
description: This elegant hotel is 250 metres from Paseo de Gracia Metro Station and Boulevard. Plaza Catalunya is a 5-minute walk away. It offers free Wi-Fi. Set in an attractive building, dating from 1888, rooms at the Acta Atrium Palace are modern and chic, with air conditioning and satellite TV. The private bathrooms offer free toiletries and a bathrobe. The hotel has 24-hour room service. Gaudí's famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera are 10 minutes' walk away. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car at the hotel tour desk. Public parking is available nearby.

name: Arya Stadium Hotel
description: Situated in Barcelona, 1.1 km from Camp Nou, Arya Stadium Hotel features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms come with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature city views. At Arya Stadium Hotel the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak Catalan, English, Spanish and French. Sants Railway Station is 1.8 km from Arya Stadium Hotel, while Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 11 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky
description: The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky is located in Barcelona’s Poblenou district. This stylish hotel offers a range of luxury services, including 1 on-site restaurant and free spa access. The Serena SPA Wellness includes a sauna, Turkish baths, bithermal shower and a heated pool with whirlpool. Guests also have access to a discount on massages. The modern, air-conditioned rooms at The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky feature free WiFi, a 55-inch flat-screen satellite TV, a coffee maker and a minibar. Each one has a private bathroom with a rain-effect shower, bathrobe and slippers. There is a restaurant serving Mediterranean dishes, and guests have the option of a buffet breakfast with views over Barcelona. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky has a poolside bar. On the 24th floor of the hotel The Level at Meliá Barcelona Sky you can enjoy a cocktail or premium drinks at the Skyline 24 which offers views over the city. The Level at Melia Barcelona Sky offers a personalised reception with flexible check-out times, as well as helping to arrange tickets for trips, shows and car hire. Poblenou Metro Station is 450 metres from the hotel, and you can walk to the seafront in around 15 minutes. Torre Agbar Tower is 1 km away.

name: Catalonia Gracia
description: This hotel is located next to Avinguda Diagonal and Passeig de Gràcia, ideal for shopping. Guests can easily access Plaza Cataluña and the city’s historic gothic quarter. Free Wi-Fi is available. Situated along the modernist route, Hotel Catalonia Gracia is surrounded by much of the interesting architecture that Barcelona is famous for, such as Gaudí and Domenech i Muntaner's key buildings, including La Pedrera. A buffet breakfast is available at the on-site restaurant; room service is also available. Guests can easily enjoy this cosmopolitan city as Hotel Catalonia Gracia is within walking distance of Barcelona’s many attractions. As well as the excellent public transport links providing swift access to the entire city and the surrounding area, the hotel offers great value for money. The hotel also includes meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets.

name: H10 Port Vell
description: Conveniently located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Barcelona. It also features a plunge pool and a rooftop terrace. This trendy hotel provides a concierge, a 24-hour reception and a coffee bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. H10 Port Vell offers air conditioned rooms with slippers, a mini bar and a rain shower. Each includes a private bathroom with a hair dryer and bathrobes. H10 Port Vell is close to Estacio de Franca Railway Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Barcelona and its surrounding areas. Palau de la Musica Catalana, Barcelona Cathedral and La Rambla are a brief walk away.Revato

name: Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Welcome to the Alexandra Barcelona Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton. This designer boutique hotel is where fascinating history, modernist details, and avant-garde meet. Moments from Passeig de Gràcia – the fashion, culture, and commercial heart of Barcelona – our hotel is a quick walk to Rambla de Catalunya, Casa Batlló, La Pedrera, and other top attractions. Our fully renovated 19th-century building reflects the charm, elegance, and spirit of our Barcelona surroundings. You'll love the local photography that lines our walls, designer furniture from the ‘50s and ‘60s, original mosaic flooring, framed ceilings, and natural oak throughout the hotel. Every guest room features parquet flooring or modernist tiles, plush bedding, and complimentary WiFi. Upgrade to one of our spacious suites for a king size bed and a minimum 40-inch HDTV. Some of our suites feature a living room area with sofa, an indoor/outdoor bathtub plus bathrobe and slippers, and terrace. Alexandra Barcelona offers excellent dining experiences including a Catalan gastronomic breakfast buffet with local quality products, a brasserie featuring ingredients grown in our own vegetable garden, a Charcuterie bar with Catalan specialties, and a stunning patio terrace by the pool. We are also pleased to send delicious meals to your door, 24-hours a day. Pamper your mind and body in our outdoor pool with chill out sundeck, dry Finnish sauna, massage cabins, or fitness center. We offer an extraordinary central location with stylish indoor/outdoor function spaces for up to 150 guests – perfect for business meetings, social events, and weddings.Hilton

name: Hotel Glories
description: Hotel Glories is set in Barcelona and is within a short walk of local attractions, including Glories, the Disseny Hub and Agbar Tower. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Glories Barcelona features an around the clock reception, plus a concierge and free Wi-Fi. For added convenience, it offers luggage storage, a tour desk and a car rental desk. The rooms include a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a desk. The bathrooms have a shower and a bathtub and offer a hair dryer. Glories Barcelona Hotel houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can relax at the end of the day. Alternatively, the local area offers many bars and restaurants serving a choice of different cuisines. Barcelona's attractions, such as the Museu de les Arts Decoratives and the L'Auditori, are within easy walking distance of Glories Hotel Barcelona. The hotel also provides parking for guests.Revato

name: Yurbban Passage Hotel & Spa
description: Situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia Region, 400 metres from Portal de l'Angel, Yurbban Passage Hotel boasts an outdoor pool and spa centre. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. All rooms include a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area to relax in after a busy day. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room includes a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes and slippers. Yurbban Passage Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can enjoy an authentic Catalan breakfast each morning. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire. Plaça Catalunya is 500 metres from Yurbban Passage Hotel, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Hotel Rialto
description: Situated just off famous La Rambla Boulevard in central Barcelona, Hotel Rialto occupies a historic building where the artist Joan Miró was born. It offers air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV. Each room at the Rialto Hotel Barcelona has wooden floors and a simple, functional design. The modern bathrooms include basic toiletries. Safes are available to rent. Guests can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast and delicious Mediterranean meals at the Rialto’s Miró restaurant. There are also many restaurants and lively bars in the surrounding streets. Hotel Rialto’s 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Boquería Market and Barcelona Cathedral are both within 400 metres. Liceu Metro Station is only 300 metres away, and Plaza Catalunya is a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel SB Glow
description: Situated in Barcelona, 1.8 km from Bogatell Beach, Hotel SB Glow Sup features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can use the sauna and the hammam, or enjoy city views. The rooms at the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. At Hotel SB Glow Sup rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Grill Bbq cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at Hotel SB Glow Sup. Speaking Catalan, English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Nova Icaria Beach is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Mar Bella Beach is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 15 km from Hotel SB Glow Sup.

name: Hotel Primero Primera
description: Offering stylish rooms with free, high-speed Wi-Fi and iPod docking stations, Primero Primera is located in the Sarrià district. 5 minutes’ walk from Les Tres Torres FGC Station, this boutique hotel is set in gardens. Each air-conditioned room at the Primero Primera has contemporary décor. All rooms have tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and minibar. A buffet breakfast is served in the Primero’s restaurant "Planta Baja" or on the charming terrace. The Sarrià district features a range of cafés, bars and restaurants. Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas can be reached in 15 minutes by train. FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is 2.5 km away.

name: Hotel Serhs del Port
description: Set on Paral-lel Avenue, this modern design hotel is just a 5-minute walk from the famous Las Ramblas and Barcelona Port. Its stylish, air-conditioned rooms feature free WiFi and a satellite TV. Hotel Serhs del Port´s modern rooms offer a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Montjuïc Hill is within a 10-minute walk of Hotel Serhs del Port. A funicular train connects Montjuïc with Paral-lel Metro Station, located 500 metres from the hotel. Direct Metro services also connect Paral-lel to Plaça Catalunya Square, Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard and Gaudí’s famous Parc Guëll. Hotel Serhs del Port´s tour desk can provide information about the city.

name: Ikonik Ramblas
description: This ultra-modern hotel is located right on central Barcelona’s Ramblas, just 300 metres from the seafront promenade. It offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. The rooms at the Ikonik Ramblas feature parquet floors and chic décor. Each one comes with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what Barcelona has to offer. They can also help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. Many famous sites are within easy walking distance. The Liceu Theatre is 400 metres away, while Plaza Real is a 3-minute walk away. Barcelona Cathedral is less 800 metres away. You can walk to Barcelona’s famous Boquería Market in 7 minutes from the hotel. Airport buses leave from Plaza Catalunya, located 15 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Sofia Barcelona, In The Unbound Collection By Hyatt
description: Hotel Sofia Barcelona is set on Barcelona's Diagonal Avenue, a 5-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium. It features free WiFi throughout, on-site restaurants and stunning city views. Guests have free access to a bright, modern 24-hour gym with a variety of equipment. Designer rooms at Sofia offer home automation technology, a 49-inch Smart TV, a safe, and air conditioning. Their private bathroom includes Natura Bissé amenities, bathrobes and slippers. The hotel offers several gastronomic spaces, including SOFIA Be So restaurant serving traditional dishes, and Impar Restaurant, which serves fresh Mediterranean dishes prepared with international culinary techniques. It also features a spacious outdoor terrace. Guests will also find a sophisticated book cafe, Philosofia, which serves confectionery and fresh pastries, to eat in or take away. Sofia Oasis Wellness & Spa houses more than 1000 m² space for well-being, including water circuits, saunas and steam baths. You can relax with one of the range of treatments available onsite and coordinated by expert therapists. Sofia Barcelona, in The Unbound Collection by Hyatt is 400 metres from Maria Cristina Metro Station and the central Plaza España Square is 3 metro stops away. L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre is 15 minutes away on foot We accept dogs up to 18 kg in weight, with a maximum of one per room. For pets. Dogs classified as dangerous breeds are not allowed. Pets must comply with current health regulations. They must be supervised by an adult at all times and steady on a leash when going through public areas. €100 will be charged for deep cleaning of the room at the time of departure. (Service dogs are exempt from said fee) €25 per pet per day will be charged in addition to the room rate.

name: Room Mate Anna
description: Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a solarium, Room Mate Anna is set in Barcelona City Centre. The hotel features cutting-edge and modern design as well as personalized service. The hotel serves a daily hot and cold buffet breakfast until midday. Each stylish, air-conditioned room comes with free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day as well as a balcony with views over Casa Batlló. Extras include a wide variety of free toiletries, a hairdryer and safe box. Other facilities include a portable WiFi and meeting and conference rooms. On the eigth floor of the hotel the bar Terraza de Anna by Vida Mona offers views over the city, cocktails and mediterranean tapas. The restaurant Vibra Speakeasy, inspired by the style of 1920, offers live music, food and cocktails from that time. The Room Mate Anna is set in the heart of L'Eixample, just 100 metres from Casa Batlló. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and cultural spots. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios
description: Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios is just 5 minutes’ walk from Passeig de Gràcia and Diagonal Avenue. This eco-friendly boutique hotel features 12 attractive rooms. Each room at Casa Bella Gracia by Aspasios has contemporary décor finished in bold colours. All rooms have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi, as well as a kettle and organic teas. A range of cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding Gràcia district. The charming squares at Plaza del Sol and Plaza de la Vila de Gràcia can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. Diagonal Metro Station is just 400 metres away and is 3 stops from Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas. Gaudí’s La Pedrera is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Bella Gracia.

name: Seventy Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, Seventy Barcelona is within walking distance of Passeig de Gracia and offers a swimming pool and a sauna. It is steps from Avinguda Diagonal, restaurants and nightlife options. Guests can enjoy the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Amenities include free wireless internet and a coffee bar. Rooms are air-conditioned and feature top-of-the-range amenities such as a coffee maker and a flat-screen TV. They provide a private bathroom, an in-room safe and heating. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. Barcelona's well-known attractions are within close proximity to Seventy Barcelona, with La Pedrera Casa Mila only a few minutes away. Casa Lleo Morera, the Casa Batllo and Carrer Gran de Gracia are a short stroll away.Revato

name: Intercontinental Barcelona, An IHG Hotel
description: InterContinental Barcelona is the perfect base for enjoying all the culture the city offers. Elegant interiors and sophisticated design details matched with unparalleled hospitality. Nestled in the heart of Montjuic, we are the closest hotel to the stadium. Easily connected to the airport and walking distance to city center Enjoy a drink in our signature bar Gebre, dine at our exclusive Quirat restaurant or take in the magnificent views from our 173 Rooftop Terrace.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: NH Barcelona Eixample
description: NH Barcelona Eixample, formerly known as NH Máster, is set in the residential Eixample district. The lively Passeig de Gracia with designer shops and trendy restaurants is only a 15-minute walk away, as are Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and Casa Milà. Close to the Hospital Clínic metro stop, guests have direct links to the Sagrada Familia Church, Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona exhibition center. The Sants train station is only two stops away, with direct access to the airport and city surrounding areas. NH Barcelona Eixample has 81 modern soundproof rooms all equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. There are three superior rooms and a Junior Suite that has a large terrace and street view. A large breakfast is offered daily with a varied selection of local and international goods. For fresh snacks, a quick drink or some ice-cream, guests can use the self-service 24/7 Open Bar. Around the hotel, guests can find some of the best gastronomical offerings in the city, including lively tapas bars, a-la-carte restaurants and lovely lunch spots. For meetings, there are 2 meeting rooms with capacity for up to 100 people. Coffee breaks and snacks can be arranged by NH Barcelona Eixample staff.NH Hoteles

name: Magatzem 128
description: No description found

name: The Hoxton Poblenou
description: Set in our favourite corner of Barcelona, The Hoxton, Poblenou gives you a real flavour of local life. We've got 240 rooms, a rooftop pool and taqueria, a bright and airy lobby, a sunny pizza terrace and slice shop, and a multi-functional basement space.Our 240 rooms suit all kinds of stays settle into a Cosy, Roomy, Biggy or Homey. Terracotta floors and faded florals make you feel right at home in the Med, whilst statement headboards, Roberts radios, and handcrafted artworks add that homely Hoxton touch. Nobody leaves here hungry. Enjoy poolside tacos and margaritas up on the roof at Tope, or tuck into Detroit-style pizza at Four Corners, a terrace, all-day restaurant and slice shop. Whatever the occasion, we've got the space. Our bright and airy Apartment is meeting and events space like no other, with three differently sized rooms, a pantry kitchen-come-bar, and its own dedicated street-level entrance.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel 1898
description: Hotel 1898, located in the midst of Barcelonas famous Ramblas, and housed in what was once the headquarters of the General Philippines Tobacco Company, offers luxury accommodations for visitors who like to travel in style, and who appreciate attention to detail. The hotel offers three suites and 5 room types, all featuring soundproof walls, fine dcor, and state-of-the-art technology.The restaurant at H1898 is also one of the best ways to become familiar with the fabulous cuisine of Barcelona. On the hotel terrace, La Isabela, you can admire views of the city skyline while enjoying our exquisite house-made tapas or one of our original cocktails. Meanwhile, the Colonial touches of Bar H1898 make it an ideal gathering spot; centrally located, relaxed, and sophisticated, its the perfect place to meet up with friends or colleagues.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Rec Barcelona - Adults Only
description: A hotel in which past and present come together seamlessly to offer guests a new way of experiencing Barcelona, discovering its history, and exploring one of its oldest and most authentic neighborhoods, La Ribera.REC HOTEL BARCELONA is named after the neighborhoods original character, defined by the canal that once powered mills and fuelled the handiwork of artisanal craftspeople. The new REC reflects the cosmopolitan nature of the city in the 21st century and celebrates Barcelonas vibrant cultural scene thanks to collaborations with local artists that embellish and vitalize its spaces.Light, color, and simple open spaces create the perfect atmosphere in which to connect, relax, and get to know the city from a unique vantage point.REC HOTEL BARCELONA is designed for the cosmopolitan guest who enjoys blending in with natives, exploring the citys lesser-known spots, trying new foods, soaking up the charm of favorite local joints, and ending the day with a few cocktails on a terrace overlooking the cityscape all this and more awaits you at the Rec.iHotelier/iStay

name: Ilunion Auditori
description: Situated 10 minutes' walk from the Arc de Triomf Metro and Train Station, the Ilunion Auditori features a rooftop swimming pool 3 m wide by 5 m long and gym. Free WiFi is available throughout. All modern rooms at the Auditori have wooden floors, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and a safe. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer and free toiletries. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. The Ilunion Auditori serves a daily breakfast and offers à- la-carte dishes made with seasonal products. There is also a special menu for celiac and food intolerant guests. Room service is available during limited hours, and a snack bar is open during the evening. A range of restaurants and bars can be found in the nearby areas of the Eixample, Born and Gothic Quarter. Guests can enjoy a work out at the gym, which is equipped with cardiovascular equipment. The seasonal rooftop pool, which is surrounded by sun loungers, offers the ideal place for relaxation with stunning views over the city. Free internet access is available at the computers in the reception area. The famous Barcelona Auditorium is a 5-minute walk away, while the the Sagrada Familia and the Ciutadella Park are 1.5 km away. Underground private parking is available on site for an additional charge. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility.

name: chic&basic Habana Hoose
description: Featuring a restaurant, bar and views of city, chic&basic Habana Hoose is set in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Barceloneta Beach. Popular points of interest nearby include Picasso Museum, Cathedral of Barcelona and Plaça Reial. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At chic&basic Habana Hoose all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near chic&basic Habana Hoose include Sant Miquel Beach, Somorrostro Beach and Santa Maria del Mar. The nearest airport is Girona-Costa Brava, 75 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel del Mar
description: Hotel del Mar is set in a listed building just 800 metres from the seafront and Barceloneta Metro Station. It is a 5-minute walk from the trendy Born neighbourhood and Ciutadella Park. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel del Mar have flat-screen satellite TV. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities, and some rooms have a private balcony. A safe is also available with a surcharge. Hotel del Mar has a 24-hour front desk. Barcelona’s França Train Station is a 5-minute walk away, and you can walk to Barcelona Cathedral and Maremagnum Shopping Centre in 10 minutes. Parking is available 5 minutes' walk from the property.

name: Mercer Hotel Barcelona
description: Featuring a rooftop swimming pool, Mercer Hotel Barcelona is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, within 10 minutes’ walk of Las Ramblas. This boutique hotel is set in one of the city’s ancient buildings, next to the Roman walls. The stylish rooms at Mercer Hotel Barcelona have chic décor with original beamed ceilings and exposed brick walls. There is free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and flat-screen satellite TV. The bathroom has a rain-effect shower. The hotel features an interior courtyard with orange trees. There is also a poolside bar and a terrace with loungers. Several cafés, bars and restaurants can be found in the charming, winding streets and pretty squares surrounding the hotel. Jaume I Metro Station is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Mercer. The trendy Born district is approximately 300 metres away, while Barcelona Cathedral can be reached in 5 minutes by foot.

name: Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona
address: Gran Via de Las Cortes Catalanas 327, 08014 Barcelona
description: Set just off Plaça d’Espanya and at the foot of Montjuïc, Hotel Acta Azul Barcelona offers stylish accommodation in central Barcelona. It features a roof terrace, 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Las Ramblas and the city’s Gothic Quarter can be reached in less than 10 minutes, by Metro and here you will find where a selection of bars and restaurants. Each of the Azul’s spacious rooms has bright décor and wooden flooring. All rooms have air conditioning, satellite TV and a desk. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Barcelona’s Fira Conference Centre and Plaça d’Espanya’s Magic Fountains. Montjuïc Park and the MNAC Gallery are within 1 km of the hotel. The bullring-turned-shopping centre of Las Arenas is next door.

name: Monument Hotel
description: Located on the fashionable Paseo de Gracia, within 5 minutes’ walk from both Gaudi’s masterpieces Casa Battló and La Pedrera, Monument Hotel offers luxury services including a gourmet restaurant and a spa. Elegantly decorated, all soundproofed rooms have a flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels, Bluetooth sound system, and a safe deposit box with plug for charging laptop devices. Most of the room types have a private bathroom with a free-standing bath, velour bathrobe and luxury toiletries. Most of the rooms have a balcony with city views. The 3 Michelin-starred restaurant, Lasarte, offers a range of options designed by the chef Martin Berasategui; while the on-site bistro-style restaurant, Oria, serves fresh cuisine following the Mediterranean gastronomy. Monument Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Las Ramblas; regular trains to Barcelona El Prat Airport leave from Paseo de Gracia Train Station, located 300 metres away. Free high-speed WiFi is provided. The hotel is housed on Enric Batllo’s house, an architectural jewel of 19th century that constitutes one of the characteristic works of the Eixample Quadrat d'Or and which gives it the Specialty Monument status.

name: Ramblas Hotel Powered By Vincci Hoteles
description: RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is set in the centre of Barcelona’s old town, a few metres from Las Ramblas. This stylish hotel offers free WiFi and rooms with satellite TV. RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles features contemporary design and modern rooms decorated elegantly. Each room has air conditioning, a minibar and a desk. RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles is ideally situated for visiting Barcelona’s main attractions. There are several restaurants, bars and cafés in the nearby Gothic Quarter and the famous Boquería Market is less than 100 metres away. Barcelona Port is a 10-minute walk from the hotel and the city’s cathedral is one kilometre away. Liceu Metro Station and Liceu Theatre are a 1-minute walk from the RAMBLAS HOTEL powered by Vincci Hoteles.

name: AC Hotel Irla by Marriott
description: The AC Hotel Irla is located in one of the most affluent commercial and residential areas in Barcelona. It has excellent transport links including quick access to the Sants train station, Avenida Diagonal, and Paseo de Gracia. This urban Barcelona hotel features a fitness centre, our AC Lounge where you can enjoy a varied gastronomic offer and 36 modern rooms readily equipped to welcome the business or leisure traveler. The hotel’s meeting spaces are tech- and AV- ready and can hold any variety of events. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want. Register Number: HB-004304.Marriott

name: Barcelona Hotel Colonial
description: This elegant hotel is set in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, in an impressive, colonial, stone building with a clock tower. It is a 10-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral and Barceloneta Beach. Hotel Colonial’s bright, air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors. They are soundproofed and have a flat-screen TV and minibar. You can hire the safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. A buffet breakfast is served in the Colonial Hotel café. Guests can relax with a free newspaper in the stylish lounge, with its white leather sofas, where Wi-Fi is free of charge. Barcelona Hotel Colonial has a tour desk. Barcelona Marina and the boutiques of the trendy Born district are 5 minutes’ walk away. Parking is also available within a 5-minute walk of the property.

name: Limonaia
description: No description found

name: Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Barcelona, Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. Popular points of interest nearby include Passeig de Gracia Metro Station, Tivoli Theatre and Casa Batllo. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.5 km from Sant Miquel Beach. At the hotel, all rooms are fitted with a wardrobe, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room has a safety deposit box, while selected rooms will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. Buffet and à la carte breakfast options are available every morning at Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel. Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Boqueria Market, Passeig de Gracia and Plaça Catalunya. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from Yurbban Ramblas Boutique Hotel.

name: H10 Casa Mimosa
description: Housed in a 19th- century modernist building, just behind La Pedrera, H10 Casa Mimosa offers an impressive chill-out terrace with a plunge pool and a sun lounger area with privileged views of Casa Milà’s terrace. All rooms are outward-facing, with both views over Pau Claris Street or over the courtyard garden which has Gaudí’s chimneys in the background. All have smart temperature control and high-quality amenities including a Nespresso Coffee Machine and a digital safe box. Some rooms also have spacious terraces. The on-site El Til•ler Restaurant serves a delicious breakfast with a buffet consisting of natural products and a selection of à la carte dishes. The Lobby Bar also offers light meals and is also an excellent meeting point for a drink. The beautiful garden retains some former cabins which are located in a courtyard that is typical of the Eixample district; and has a large variety of Mediterranean greenery such as a century-old palm tree, an impressive lime tree and mimosas, which give the hotel’s name. In the garden there is also an elevated swimming pool and a sun lounger area. From here, there is access to the Las Cocheras meeting room, a former garage with high-ceilings and a capacity up to 100 people. Ideally located, H10 Casa Mimosa is 10 minutes’ walk from Casa Battló; Plaza Catalunya and Ramblas can be reached within 15 minutes’ walk. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout.

name: Almanac Barcelona
address: Gran Via de Les Corts Catalanes 619-621, 08007 Barcelona
description: Almanac Barcelona is the first in a collection of luxury hotels and opened its doors in the fall of 2017. Located on Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 619-621, the boutique hotel features 91 luxurious accommodations. In a prime location, the hotel is steps from Passeig de Gracia, where guests can find stylish shopping, restaurants, bars and museums.A new luxury hospitality tastemaker, Almanac Hotels is developing iconic hotels in landmark locations. Our mission is to enhance the guest experience through the elements of travel that make up an entire journey: Scent, Taste, Light and Touch. When all those things come together in an exciting way, your heart may skip a Beat or it may beat faster in either case you will know they got it right.iHotelier/iStay

name: Catalonia Catedral
description: The Catalonia Catedral is set in a traditional Modernist building, just 100 metres from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers free use of Smartphones, Wi-Fi access, a rooftop seasonal pool and a Japanese-style terrace and garden. The Catedral has stylish rooms, which have contemporary décor. Each has a flat-screen smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, air conditioning, a minibar, a Nespresso machine. A smartphone is available for guests during their stay free of charge. The hotel’s Ascent Restaurant by Eboca serves Mediterrean cuisine and offers views of the nearby Palacio Pignatelli Art Gallery. There is also a bar in the hotel lobby where guests can use the computers with internet access and printers for free. The Catalonia Catedral is around 10 minutes’ walk from landmarks such as Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya Square. Barcelona’s Old Port and Marina are less than one kilometre away. Jaume I Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away.

name: Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel
description: Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel is conveniently located in Barcelona’s Plaza Europa Square, next to the Fira Convention Centre Comprised two 110 meter towers joined by a spectacular panoramic restaurant and a terrace-vantage point with views over the city of W.Architecturally the Renaissance Barcelona Fira Hotel, highlights a vertical garden oasis of palm trees and lush vegetation. All 357 bedrooms are designed with a two-toned chromatic effect in mind. The hotel has 11 module-based meeting rooms. our Palmer restaurant, Oasis and El Cel are perfect for Business travellers, and couples taking a weekend break in beautiful Barcelona. Marriott Bonvoy guests who book direct receive complimentary WIFI for the duration of stay.Marriott

name: Hotel Gotico
description: Hotel Gótico is 50 metres from Barcelona’s Jaume I Metro Station and a 2-minute walk from Barcelona Cathedral. It offers a rooftop terrace, and stylish, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Soundproofed rooms are heated and feature beautiful tiled floors. They have a safe and work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the Gótico hotel café-bar, which features impressive stone arches. Packed lunches can be requested and there are vending machines for drinks and snacks. There is a 24-hour reception, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge. The hotel is just 5 minutes’ walk from La Rambla.

name: Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto
description: Family run Best Western Plus Hotel Alfa Aeropuerto of Barcelona, would like to welcome you to our hotel, where the relaxed atmosphere stems from the courtesy and friendliness of the staff guarantees a convenient and comfortable stay whether your visit is on business or leisure. Convenient hotel’s location to the public metro & bus stations is only minutes away from the Airport of Barcelona-El Prat-Josep Tarradellas, Cruise Pier, International Exhibitions and Trade Fair, and the city center. Enjoy a quality night’s sleep in one of our 100 bedrooms from a large suite, comfortable double and triple rooms or cozy up in a cute single room. All of them come with superb bathrooms, rainforest showers, free Wi-Fi, tea and coffee facilities, satellite TV. Discover exceptional dining in our Gran Mercat Restaurant with a selection of delicious dishes of a traditional Catalan and Mediterranean cuisine from our executive Chef or enjoy a pre-dinner drink, cocktail or glass of cava and feel like at home in our lounge and cafeteria Mercabar with their comfortable Chester sofas. Before going to the Airport do not forget to choose one of our breakfast options available every morning; hearty and healthy buffet breakfast or an early bird express breakfast, all of them at a very affordable price. Additional on-site amenities include a newly refurbished multi-functional meeting rooms suitable for business functions or family events; free access to our Alfa Gym, which offers a variety of top-quality training equipment. Moreover, it offers an indoor pool and sauna room. All you need to increase your feeling of well-being! Our complimentary shuttle service running between both airport terminals and the hotel between 5 a.m. and 10:30am and from 18:15 to 12:30 a.m. The hotel boasts secure on-site parking for guests. Our hotel sincere aim is to offer an impressive and highly pleasing experience after of before a transatlantic flight and pre/post-cruising.bestwestern.com

name: Hesperia Barri Gotic
description: Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gòtic is in Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter, just 100 metres from the port and 500 metres from Las Ramblas. Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute stroll from the Hesperia Barcelona Barri Gotic. Its bright, modern rooms offer free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. They also have air conditioning or heating and a safe. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer and toiletries. You can find a range of lively bars in the surrounding streets. Barcelona Aquarium and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are 800 metres away.

name: Hotel Nouvel
description: Offering air-conditioned rooms, free WiFi and an on-site restaurant, Hotel Nouvel is located on a pedestrianised street just 100 metres from Barcelona’s Plaza Catalunya Square and the Ramblas. The hotel features ornate ceilings, cast bronze and crystal lamps, and marble floors, in the style of its 19th-century building. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, double-glazed windows and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. A safe is available to rent. The hotel’s La Lluna Restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Vending machines with snacks, ice, and drinks, are also available. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help you arrange car hire, a laundry service and tickets for shows. You will also find luggage storage and a reading room with two computers. Portal de Angel shopping street is just 2 minutes’ walk away, while Barcelona Cathedral and the Gothic Quarter are a 10-minute walk from Hotel Nouvel.

name: Exe Cristal Palace
description: The Exe Cristal Palace is very well located next to the prestigious Passeig de Gràcia, the main shopping area and most important places of interest in Barcelona. All rooms at the Exe Cristal Palace have air conditioning, a safe, satellite TV, a minibar, a desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Exe Cristal Palace rooms have a safe and a minibar and feature wooden floors. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Exe Cristal Palace has a 24-hour front desk. You can hire a car from the tour desk, and on-site parking is available for an additional charge. The hotel serves a varied buffet breakfast, including a healthy corner option. The buffet breakfast includes a wide variety of dishes and an area with juices and coffees. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from Plaza Catalunya and Casa Batlló.

name: Sercotel Porta Barcelona
address: Avinguda de la Generalitat de Catalunya, 2-6, 08960 Barcelona
description: This bright, modern hotel offers free Wi-Fi, free sauna and hot tub, and a convenient location on the A-2 motorway, just 8 km from central Barcelona in the suburb of Sant Just Desvern. Sercotel Porta Barcelona is linked to the centre of the Catalan capital by road and tram, with journeys taking between 10 and 30 minutes. The hotel is also well located for those visiting the legendary Camp Nou football stadium – home to FC Barcelona. After a day of business or sightseeing, unwind with a session in the gym or sauna. You can then cool off in the hot tub or by enjoying the sunshine on the sun terrace. The hotel’s Mediterranean restaurant offers breakfast from Mondays to Sundays, and dinner from Mondays to Fridays.

name: Room Mate Gerard
description: Room Mate Gerard in Barcelona provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. It boasts a sun terrace and location, set in the Eixample district, near attractions such as Tivoli Theatre and within 700 metres of Portal de l'Angel. At the hotel all rooms offer a simple yet elegant décor. They come with a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. Air-conditioning is featured, and certain rooms include a balcony. All units include a private bathroom with shower and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Speaking English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Other facilities include portable WiFi. Plaça Catalunya is a 9-minute walk from the accommodation. Barcelona El Prat Airport is 13 km away.

name: Hotel Laumon
description: Situated just 200 metres from Sagrera Metro Station in Sant Andreu, the modern Hotel Acta Laumon is 25 minutes from the centre of Barcelona by metro. It features stylish rooms with air conditioning, a plasma TV and a private bathroom. Free WiFi is offered. Hotel Acta Laumon also offers apartments, located in front of the hotel. Guests have access to the hotel facilities. The hotel have a spacious lounge to rest, work or have a coffee. There are also 24-hour vending machines for snacks and drinks. The hotel offers tourist information and ticket services.

name: H10 Madison
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Barcelona. It provides free Wi-Fi, a swimming pool and a rooftop terrace. H10 Madison has a fitness centre with a swimming pool, a rooftop terrace and a sun deck. Facilities include an all-hours reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. H10 Madison offers air conditioned rooms with a rain shower, luxury toiletries and a mini bar. Each includes its very own bathroom with bathrobes, a hair dryer and slippers. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. Room service is also offered during limited hours. Situated a short walk from Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, the hotel offers a tour desk with information on what to see and do in Barcelona. Guests can also easily visit Placa de Catalunya, La Rambla and the Liceu.Revato

name: Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description: With the arrival of Labtwentytwo Barcelona, a Tribute Portfolio hotel, the brand's first venture into the city, an opulent destination is now available for locals and professionals seeking luxurious accommodations. Positioned in the midst of the high technology business area and upcoming 22@ district in Poblenou neighborhood, guests can immerse themselves in the lively atmosphere of the area. This ultra-modern establishment represents a remarkable symbiosis of technology, creativity, and sustainability, boasting a human-focused design supported by cutting-edge technology that ensures both comfort and user-friendliness. Our meticulously designed guest rooms and suites offer stunning views of the city's iconic Sagrada Familia or the mesmerizing sea, providing an ideal setting for both relaxation and work. The dining offerings encompass the all-day Alcachofa, a seafood-minded restaurant, along with Za'atar Pool & Bar, an establishment that serves Middle'terranean cuisine.Marriott

name: Hotel Ciutadella
address: Avinguda Del Marques De L'Argentera, 4, 08003 Barcelona
description: Offering beautiful, stylish rooms Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has an ideal central setting within 300 metres of Santa María del Mar Church, Ciutadella Park and Barceloneta Metro Station. It offers easy access to the historic Born and Gothic districts. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Ciutadella Barcelona has contemporary décor. All rooms have a TV and a private bathroom. Bars and cafés can be found along Passeig del Born, 200 metres away. There are several seafood restaurants along the seaside Passeig de Joan de Borbó, a 5-minute walk from the Hotel Ciutadella. The nearest beaches can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are within 2 km of the hotel.

name: Hotel Sant Agustí
description: Open since 1840, Sant Agustí is set in a restored convent just 150 metres from Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas. It offers free Wi-Fi and functional air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. Each room at Hotel Sant Agustí has simple, modern design and wooden flooring. Rooms come with a safe and a bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private balcony. The Sant Agustí serves a daily continental buffet breakfast. Downstairs there are computers which guests can use for free. Reception is also open 24 hours a day. Set in a quiet square, the hotel is a 2-minute walk from Liceu Metro Station and La Boqueria Market. Plaza Catalunya is within 700 metres and offers various bus and train connections, including direct airport buses.

name: Duquesa de Cardona 4 Sup
description: The 19th-century Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup, opposite Barcelona’s marina in the Gothic Quarter, is 600 metres from the Ramblas and has free Wi-Fi. Its rooftop terrace offers panoramic city views and includes 2 plunge pools and a bar. Property also features a Gym. Duquesa de Cardona has spacious, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bathrobe and slippers. The hotel’s restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine. During summer, the snack bar serves creative tapas, BBQ dishes and cocktails. The famous Sagrada Familia is 2.5 km away, and Barceloneta Metro Station is only 300 metres away. The Maremagnum Shopping Centre and Barcelona Aquarium are 500 metres from Duquesa de Cardona 4* Sup.

name: Hotel España Ramblas
description: Hotel España is situated in a 19th-century building in central Barcelona, within 100 metres of the Ramblas and Liceu Theatre and 200 metres from Boqueria Market. Its Mediterranean restaurant is run by famous chef Martín Berasategui. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout. The stylish and elegant rooms include a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. They also come with a modern bathroom. Hotel España offers a variety of drinks and cocktails at AlAire rooftop terrace bar. There is also a small swimming pool. Liceu Metro Station is 100 metres away and the Gothic Quarter is less than 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Indigo Barcelona Granvia Plaza Espana
address: Gran Via de Las Corts Catalanes 322, 08004 Barcelona
description: Hotel Barcelona - Gran Via Plaza España is a modern design hotel with a bright central courtyard. It offers free Wi-Fi and a convenient location, next to Barcelona's Plaça Espanya. The modern rooms at the Barcelona - Gran Via Plaza España feature a private bathroom, and free mineral water for the first night. All are soundproofed, with flat-screen TVs, and air conditioning. The Barcelona Via is set next to the Fira Exhibition Centre, at the bottom of Montjuic. This hill is home to a castle, the National Art Museum, and the Magic Fountain. Espanya Metro Station is 150m from the hotel. The historic center of Barcelona and the famous Ramblas are just a few steps away. A direct bus service to the airport stops in Plaça Espanya, near the hotel. Breakfast is available at an additional cost; the hotel also offers a large bar and a refined restaurant with a gastronomic proposal that is aroused with live music and other events every week.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Neri Relais & Chateaux
description: This chic, exclusive hotel is set in an 18th-century aristocratic house overlooking a secluded square in the heart of the Gothic Quarter. Its contemporary style contrasts with the impressive historic surroundings. Set right beside the city’s Cathedral, the Hotel Neri lies just a short distance from the bustling Las Ramblas. The building’s original period charm has been preserved and enhanced by the hotel’s sophisticated interior design. This design blends with relaxing music and sensual aromas to create a unique setting in this ancient, atmospheric area of central Barcelona. Dine on delicious specialities in the hotel restaurant or enjoy a drink at the terrace bar. You can also spend a relaxing moment in the tranquil library or on the pretty rooftop garden terrace. Hotel Neri Relais & Châteaux preserves its impressive façade to Sant Felip Neri square as well as a 17th-century stone wall, which separates the lounge bar area of the restaurant. It has the status of Specialty Monument. Hotel Neri also offers apartments housed in a restored classic building located few metres away. Please see the individual apartment description for more details.

name: Boutique Hostemplo Sagrada Familia
description: Offering free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Boutique Hostemplo is located on a pedestrian street just 100 metres from Barcelona's Sagrada Familia. The hotel has a friendly and very peaceful atmosphere. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. You will find a kettle in the room.
