description: Hotel Concordia Barcelona is situated 800 metres from Plaza España and the Fira de Barcelona Exhibition Centre. It features a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool, hot tub, cocktail bar and solarium. The Hotel Concordia Barcelona’s bright, spacious rooms feature contemporary décor and air conditioning. Each room includes free WiFi, a flat-screen TV, safe, minibar and a private bathroom with a range of amenities. The Concordia Barcelona’s modern, elegant Bistro Triple Sec Restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. The varied breakfast buffet includes healthy options. There is also a café and cocktail bar open daily. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost and electrical cars charging station is available. Located next to Poble Sec Station, the hotel is a 5-minute Metro journey from Barcelona Port and La Rambla. You can also walk to the Rambla in 15 minutes. Direct airport buses stop in Plaza España, a 15-minute walk away. Private parking is available on site for an extra cost.

name: Nobu Hotel Barcelona
description: Situated in Barcelona, 400 metres from Sants Railway Station, Nobu Hotel Barcelona features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel rooms have air conditioning and a safety deposit box. Magic Fountain of Montjuic is 1.4 km from Nobu Hotel Barcelona, while Casa Batllo is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Derby Barcelona
description: Situated 300 metres from L’Illa Diagonal Shopping Centre, the Derby is a 20-minute walk from FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou stadium. Each air-conditioned room offers flat-screen satellite TV and free internet access. The stylish Derby Hotel has an impressive collection of Catalan art, including pieces by Miró and Tàpies. Rooms have functional design and parquet flooring. They all include a safe and a minibar. Drinks and light meals are served in the Derby’s coffee shop, The Times. L'Illa Shopping Centre offers a range of restaurants. Located just 10 metres away, the Gran Derby Hotel allows guests access to its gym and swimming pool. Hospital Clinic Metro Station is 800 metres away, while the Feria Trade Fair in Plaza Espanya can be reached in a 20-minute walk.

name: Mesón Castilla Atiram Hotel
description: Set in the heart of Barcelona, Hotel Meson Castilla Atiram is situated near Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, and provides easy access to nearby bars and eateries. It is situated a short walk from Placa de Catalunya and La Rambla. The hotel offers free wireless internet in public areas, as well as a garden for guests to unwind in. Staff are available 24/7 and can assist with booking tours and tickets. After a day of discovering the nearby area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They are all soundproofed and include an alarm clock, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. Hotel Meson Castilla Atiram is close to Sant Antoni Metro Station, making it easy for guests to explore Barcelona and its surrounding areas. The local area is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Hotel Arts Barcelona
description: Hotel Arts Barcelona is a landmark with perfect credentials as a premier destination within a destination. An urban resort that stands as the tallest hotel on the coast, overlooking the beachfront offering panoramic city and beach views. The hotel effortlessly combines tranquility and genuine luxury with individual and personalized service provided by a well-connected and passionate team. Offering panoramic city and beach views, the guestrooms, suites and luxury, serviced penthouses are light-filled, luxuriously comfortable.Gastronomy is an inherent part of Hotel Arts Barcelona offering five gastronomic restaurants and a cocktail bar. The hotel has a unique collection of open and leisure spaces exceptional in Barcelona. The artfully designed Infinity Pool and family pool overlook the gardens, offering an oasis of calm by day and vibrant hot spot at night. 43 The Spa, located on the 43rd floor, floating high above the city, captures organic luxury and a sense of well-being.Marriott

name: Catalonia Barcelona Plaza
description: Located in Barcelona's Plaza de España, Hotel Catalonia Barcelona Plaza offers a seasonal rooftop pool and a terrace with panoramic city views. It also has a fitness room, beauty salon and free Wi-Fi. The property is located next to Espanya Metro Station. In the square there are numerous bus stops that connect with other parts of the city, with the Fira Barcelona fairground and with Barcelona airport. All spacious rooms are equipped with air conditioning, satellite TV, a safe and a private marble bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout, and Smart TVs with Chromecast apps are available. Choose one of the two clock suites and you will have incredible views of Montjuïc from the floor-to-ceiling windows. If you prefer, the hotel also has rooms and suites with private terrace. The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza serves a daily buffet breakfast in the Simultáneo space, Barcelona's new meeting point that fuses cultural and leisure activities with the best gastronomic offer. Come to Simultáneo to telework with free wifi, to have an informal meeting, to enjoy a concert or to have an afterwork cocktail. Do you already know the Simultáneo Gastrobar? An avant-garde space that offers unique haute cuisine dishes. If you book half board, you can enjoy the Gastrobar menu during lunch or dinner. The Filigrana restaurant specialises in modern Catalan cuisine made with local ingredients. You can also visit the Japanese restaurant Kurai or have a drink on The Clock terrace, overlooking Montjuïc. The Catalonia Barcelona Plaza has a spacious business centre with 3 large conference rooms and 8 meeting rooms, all equipped with the latest technology. This is our guests' favourite part of Barcelona, according to independent reviews.

name: Pestana Arena Barcelona
description: Pestana Arena Barcelona is less than 5 minutes’ walk from Barcelona’s Plaza Espanya and Fira Exhibition Centre. It offers a gym, sauna and modern, air-conditioned rooms with free wired internet access. Some rooms offers free use of the Maritimo Meeting Room, up to 12 people, for private meetings. Pestana Arena Barcelona is just 3 minutes’ walk from Las Arenas Shopping Centre and you can walk to Sants Station in 8 minutes. You can get to the Rambla in 5 minutes from Plaza Espanya Metro. Rooms feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Each one has work desk, a pillow menu and an LCD TV with satellite channels. The hotel’s restaurant serves Mediterranean food and has a terrace. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs.

name: The Moods Oasis
description: Boasting a terrace, The Moods Oasis is situated in Barcelona in the Catalonia region, 1.1 km from La Pedrera and 1.5 km from Casa Batllo. Featuring a fitness centre, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Passeig de Gracia. At the hotel, the rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV. At The Moods Oasis the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. The Moods Oasis provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Speaking Catalan, German, English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Passeig de Gracia Metro Station is 1.8 km from the hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 2.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from The Moods Oasis.

name: ABaC Restaurant Hotel
description: Located in Barcelona, 1.9 km from Park Güell, ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and sauna, as well as a garden. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento offers a range of wellness facilities including a hot tub and a hammam. La Pedrera is 3.3 km from the hotel, while Casa Batllo is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat, 14 km from ABaC Restaurant Hotel Barcelona GL Monumento, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Barcelona House
description: Set in the heart of the city, Hotel Barcelona House provides easy access to Barcelona's main sightseeing and retail areas. Only a short walk from La Rambla, it offers comfortable rooms equipped with blackout curtains, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV. This modern hotel provides a number of amenities, such as a 24-hour reception, a coffee bar and a hair salon. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer assistance. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a shower, cable/satellite channels and a hair dryer. They provide a desk, an alarm clock and heating. For guests who enjoy exploring local dining options, there is a wide range right on the doorstep. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Barceloneta Metro Station and Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: numa I Brio
description: A 5-minute walk from Diagonal and Fontana Metro stations, Numa I Brio is set in Barcelona’s bohemian Gràcia district. It features modern rooms with rain-effect showers. Numa I Brio's simply decorated, air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed. Each room has a TV and private bathroom. A safe is available. Restaurants and bars can be found in the surrounding streets. Popular Plaza del Sol is just 500 metres away. There is a garden patio and guests can also enjoy a working space with high-speed free WiFi. Gaudí’s La Pedrera and Casa Batlló are within 15 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Las Ramblas and Plaza de Catalunya are just 2 Metro stops from Diagonal station.

name: NH Collection Barcelona Constanza
address: Carrer de Deu i Mata 69-99, 08029 Barcelona
description: Created by Pritzker prize-winning architect Rafael Moneo, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza exudes calm elegance. A 15-minute drive from the city center, it is situated in the Les Corts financial district of Barcelona. This is the perfect choice for business travelers, with the Axa Auditorium right next door. Landmarks, such as the FC Barcelona Camp Nou is also close by. NH Collection Barcelona Constanza has 308 rooms, including 7 Junior Suites and 1 Suite. Each has flat-screen TVs, a Nespresso machine and free Wi-Fi. Enjoy contemporary design with polished wood, glass and large windows, along with modern comforts, such as a rain-effect shower and a pillow menu. Breakfast will be the perfect start to your day with a large spread of options, including eggs prepared-to-order and gluten-free dishes. Lunch and dinner can be enjoyed at GoXO Restaurant and accompanied by a cocktail. Enjoy these on a beautiful terrace. For business travelers, NH Collection Barcelona Constanza is the perfect choice, with 11 rooms holding up to 800 guests. To unwind, head to the outdoor 7th floor pool or visit the fitness center and the spa.NH Hoteles

name: Grums Hotel & Spa
description: The modern Hotel Grums is located in central Barcelona, 5 minutes' walk from Barcelona’s port, ferry terminal and cruise terminal. The Ramblas are 600 metres away, and Parallel Metro Station 300 metres away. Hotel Grums Barcelona offers elegant, bright and spacious rooms with themed design décor and panoramic floor-to-ceiling windows. There is free high-speed WiFi available throughout. All our rooms have free RITUALS Cosmetics amenities. The Hotel Grums Barcelona features a wellness spa which is not included in the room rate and can be accessed for a small surcharge. Guests can relax in the hot tub, Finnish sauna or steam bath. A selection of massage and treatments are also available at an extra cost.

name: Sunotel Central
address: Gran Via De Les Corts Catalanes, 570, 08011 Barcelona
description: Featuring a rooftop swimming pool and hot tub with views of Barcelona, Sunotel Central is set in the centre of Barcelona, just 10 minutes' walk from Plaza Catalunya. Modern rooms at Sunotel Central include free high-speed WiFi, satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities. Universitat Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel. The Ramblas, famous for its street performers, can be reached in 10 minutes by foot. In the morning guests can enjoy a varied, fresh and healthy full buffet breakfast. The hotel’s 24-hour reception offers a ticket booking service and luggage storage. There are computers in the lobby which guests can use for free. Meeting rooms are also available.

name: Occidental Barcelona 1929
description: Occidental Barcelona 1929 is situated in Barcelona and is close to the area's popular attractions. It offers free Wi-Fi, a bar and is close to Placa d'Espanya. There are a range of facilities available to guests of the hotel, such as a seasonal swimming pool, a coffee bar and meeting rooms. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. Occidental Barcelona 1929 has 152 rooms that are fitted with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Barcelona's attractions, such as Magic Fountain of Montjuic, are within easy walking distance of Occidental Barcelona 1929. Espanya Metro Station is right next door, connecting guests with the local area.Revato

name: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero
description: Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona is opposite Barcelona’s International Convention Centre and Barcelona's Forum Auditorium. It has a spa, a gym, a seasonal panoramic pool and a solarium on the hotel rooftop. There is free access to the hotel gym. The spa is only for guests over 14, and includes a Turkish bath and Finnish sauna. Beauty and massage treatments are available at a surcharge. All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel SB Diagonal Zero Barcelona have flat-screen satellite TV, free WiFi and a laptop safe. The soundproofed rooms have facilities to connect iPods. All rooms have ironing facilities, tea and coffee making facilities, and a kettle. There is a touch-screen control for lights and temperature. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer, and bathrobes and slippers can be provided upon request.

name: One Shot Aragó 257
description: Ideally situated in the Eixample district of Barcelona, One Shot Aragó 257 is situated 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia, 500 metres from Passeig de Gracia Metro Station and less than 1 km from Plaça Catalunya. With a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is less than 1 km from the city centre and a 1-minute walk from Casa Batllo. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe. Each room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV, and some rooms at One Shot Aragó 257 have a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. Speaking Catalan, English and Spanish, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near One Shot Aragó 257 include La Pedrera, Boqueria Market and Tivoli Theatre. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: H10 Universitat
description: Centrally located, H10 Universitat Hotel allows for easy access to Barcelona's popular retail areas and tourist attractions. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or have a drink at the lounge bar. Complimentary wireless internet is provided for guests who want to stay connected while travelling. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms provide a desk, a mini bar and an alarm clock. They all have a telephone, heating and a radio. To ensure the day gets off to a great start, a buffet breakfast is served every morning at H10 Universitat's restaurant. In the evening, guests can wind down in the cosy lounge bar. Guests can also try one of the various bars and cafés nearby. H10 Universitat Barcelona is moments from Placa de Catalunya. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Barcelona.Revato

name: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi Barcelona
description: Aparthotel Mariano Cubi can be found just 200 metres from Barcelona’s Avinguda Diagonal and 15 minutes' walk from Passeig de Gracia. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and some have a kitchenette. All spacious rooms have wooden floors, satellite TV, and a desk. The Aparthotel Mariano Cubi's tour desk can help guests plan their stay in Barcelona. There is also a free business centre with internet access. The area has a wide range of shops. Fontana Metro station is about 500 metres away and Gràcia FGC Station is only 150 metres away. From there you can get to Plaça Catalunya and the Ramblas. Gaudí's La Pedrera is about 20 minutes’ walk away.

name: Niu Barcelona Hotel
description: Located 600 metres from Plaza Reial in Barcelona, Niu Barcelona Hotel features an outdoor pool on the rooftop. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property Every room at this hotel comes with a flat-screen TV; while the private bathrooms come with shower and hairdryer. Rooms are air-conditioned in summer and heated in winter. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests benefit from a complimentary bottle of water upon arrival. Portal de l'Angel is 800 metres from Niu Barcelona Hotel, while Plaça Catalunya is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 12 km from Niu Barcelona Hotel.

name: ibis Barcelona Meridiana
description: If you want to enjoy Barcelona, Ciudad Condal, close to the downtown area, but in a quiet area, book your room at our ibis Barcelona Meridiana hotel now. Our ibis Sweet Beds will provide you with the best comfort, whether you come for business or to enjoy some leisure timeaccorhotels.com

name: Gran Hotel La Florida
description: Set on Tibidabo Hill, the 5-star Gran Hotel La Florida G.L Monumento offers views over Barcelona and the Mediterranean Sea. Guests enjoy free access to the Spa. Rooms at La Florida feature free Wi-Fi access and 37-inch interactive plasma TVs. The bathrooms come with l’Occitane amenities, a bathtub and shower. Some also have a private balcony. Guests can admire the views from the La Florida’s panoramic terraces and gardens. The Spa by L'Occitane includes a stainless steel swimming pool, both indoor and outdoor. A hot tub, sauna, pressure showers and a range of fitness equipment are also available. The hotel’s restaurant serves gourmet Catalan, Spanish and Mediterranean dishes. There are also 2 bars.

name: NH Barcelona Les Corts
description: The NH Barcelona Les Corts hotel is a mere 6-minute walk from L’Illa Diagonal Mall and less than a kilometer from Les Corts metro station which provides links to the city center. Additional local points of interest include Las Ramblas, Camp Nou, and Santa Eulalia Cathedral. For buses to the beautiful beach, guests need only walk to the stop located 5 minutes away from the hotel. All of the our 81 bright and contemporary guest rooms come with modern comforts such as free Wi-Fi, wood floors, flat screen TVs, and minibars. Larger, upgraded room types also offer coffee and tea makers, and extra space for an additional bed. Each morning a scrumptious breakfast buffet is freshly prepared for our guests. Made-to-order hot dishes and an early bird breakfast are also available upon request. For delicious lunch and dinner selections, our friendly staff will gladly provide recommendations for highly-rated local restaurants. Our professional 24-hour front desk staff are ready to respond to guest requests for additional amenities such as providing extra beds and wake up service.NH Hoteles

name: Catalonia Rigoletto
description: The stylish Catalonia Rigoletto is set 500 metres from FC Barça’s Camp Nou stadium and 5 minutes’ walk from Maria Cristina Metro Station. It offers an outdoor pool and rooms with free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. The Rigoletto’s spacious rooms are air conditioned and decorated with dark woods and luxurious fabrics. All rooms have satellite TV, free smartphone, a minibar and safety deposit box. A buffet breakfast is on offer in the dining room and Mediterranean cuisine is served in the stylish La Traviata restaurant. There is also a bar in the hotel featuring attractive art work. Sights including Las Ramblas and Gaudí’s Casa Batlló can be reached in 15 minutes, by Metro. Sants Railway Station, where there is an airport train connection, is just 1.5 km from the Rigoletto.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona
description: Set on Barcelona’s fashionable Passeig de Gràcia, the luxurious Mandarin Oriental, Barcelona is within 5 minutes’ walk of Gaudi’s Casa Batlló and La Pedrera. Plaça Catalunya is just a 10-minute walk away. The hotel features a spa, rooftop pool, indoor pool, fitness centre, wonderful city views, and 24-hour room service. The spacious rooms feature bright, minimalist design. They include a home theatre, a seating area, large flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. Bathrooms have large bathtubs or showers, and include Acqua di Parma free toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers. Additionally, you can dine al fresco in the Mimosa garden, and discover Terrat, the rooftop terrace, where guests can enjoy cocktails and Peruvian food. Banker's bar is also serves cocktails and tapas. Mandarin Oriental spa offers a wide range of treatments. Spa access is free and includes the indoor pool, hot tub, Hammam and 24-hour gym. The spa also features suites for couples. Headphones, towels and chilled drinks are provided for the gym. There is a 24-hour front desk, and you can hire a car from the tour desk. Parking is available nearby for an extra charge.

name: Catalonia Mikado
description: This elegant hotel is situated in the exclusive Sarrià area and has a garden terrace with an outdoor pool and hot tub. It offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV, a mini fridge with complimentary water and free Wi-Fi. The Catalonia Mikado's restaurant serves breakfast and evening meals, specializing in international dishes. There is also a bar. Only 500 metres away, the charming centre of Sarrià is famous for its cake shops. The Catalonia Mikado is within a 10-minute walk of Ramon Llull University and the International University of Catalonia. It is also well located for some of Barcelona's most important medical centres, including the Teknon Centre and IMO and the Institut Catalá de la Retina. Sarrià Train Station is just 10 minutes’ walk away. From here you can get to central Barcelona in 5 minutes.

name: B-Hotel
description: Providing a rooftop pool, B Hotel Barcelona is located in Barcelona and is a short walk from Placa d'Espanya. It provides free wireless internet in public areas, an all-hours reception and massages. Providing views of Montjuic Mountain, B Hotel is a convenient place to stay for those wanting to scope out local attractions in Barcelona. Multilingual staff can assist with organising tours and activities, and an express check-in/check-out facility is offered for guest convenience. The hotel also has its very own fitness centre, Swimming Pool. Hotel B in Barcelona has air conditioned rooms with a mini bar and a flat-screen TV. Each provide a desk, an in-room safe and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Those staying at B Hotel Barcelona can relax at the in-house bar, conveniently located for a drink. B Hotel is close to Espanya Metro Station, making it easy for guests to explore Barcelona and its surrounding areas. The hotel is also close to the area's popular establishments, plus Fira de Barcelona, Barcelona Pavillion and Magic Fountain of Montjuic are within walking distance.Revato

name: Hcc St. Moritz
description: Set in a listed 19th-century building and 5 minutes’ walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, the St. Moritz offers stylish accommodation. It features modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and LCD satellite TV. The Hotel HCC St. Moritz maintains its original central staircase and marble reception. Its rooms offer simple, classic décor with a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, slippers and toiletries. A varied buffet breakfast is served daily, and you can enjoy a range of Mediterranean dishes for dinner in the St Gallen Restaurant, where menus use fresh, seasonal produce. Passeig de Gràcia and its Metro Station are just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Plaza de Catalunya and Las Ramblas are one stop away. Barcelona Port is just over 1 km from the St. Moritz.

name: Catalonia Avinyo
description: Situated 200 metres from Las Ramblas in central Barcelona, Catalonia Avinyo features a rooftop pool and gym. It offers chic, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Rooms are decorated in a modern, minimalist style with large wall photos. They include a minibar, safe and telephone. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The modern bathrooms have a shower and a hairdryer. Barceloneta Beach is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Catalonia Avinyo. The Liceu and Jaume I Metro Stations are just 300 metres away and Barcelona Cathedral is 4 minutes' walk away. The Avinyo’s central location means there are many shops, bars and restaurants close to the hotel. Bicycle and car hire can be arranged at the tour desk.

name: H10 Itaca
description: H10 Itaca is within 10 minutes’ walk of Sants Train Station, the AVE High-Speed Railway, Plaza España and the FIRA Exhibition Centre. It features a stylish 700 m² terrace with a plunge pool. Each bright room at this modern hotel includes free Wi-Fi, a safe, a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a desk. They all have a private bathroom including a hairdryer and Textures Collection amenities. Barcelona city centre, including Plaza Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia, can be reached in 10 minutes by Metro, and FC Barcelona’s Camp Nou Stadium is just 2 stops away. Sants Station runs local and national rail services, including the airport train and the AVE link to central Madrid. Hotel H10 Itaca offers a free welcome glass of cava for all guests. The hotel features a smart restaurant serving signature cuisine and you can enjoy a drink in the chic lobby. The relaxing terrace features sofas and comfortable chairs set under parasols, ideal for enjoying a cocktail. The Itaca also features a fitness room and a sauna. There is a business corner open 24 hours a day. Free national and international newspapers are provided.

name: Hotel Urquinaona
address: Ronda De Sant Pere, 24 Traslados, 08010 Barcelona
description: Located in the heart of Barcelona, Casa Trafalgar Barcelona offers modern-style rooms with free Wi-Fi access. The shops and restaurants of Paseo de Gracia Boulevard are a 5-minute walk away. The air-conditioned rooms all come with a satellite TV, cable channels and some have a terrace. Each has a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer. Urquinaona Hotel is just 30 metres from the Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 stops from Barceloneta and its beach. Urquinaona Hotel will be reopened on April 2023 since it's been renovated.

name: Vincci Mae
description: Set beside Barcelona's Francesc Macià Square, Vincci Mae features a terrace with a plunge pool and fantastic views of Diagonal Avenue and Tibidabo Mountain. Vincci Mae boasts an on-site restaurant and bar, it also has a 24-hour front desk and offers free WiFi throughout the property. An assorted buffet breakfast is offered everyday. Stylish rooms feature a simple and bright décor, air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, kettle, and minibar. The fancy private bathroom includes a shower, free toiletries,and a hairdryer. Casa Batlló is 1.6 km from Vincci Mae, while La Pedrera is 1.3 km away. You can reach Plaza Catalunya in 20 minutes in public transport.

name: Vincci Gala
description: Located in the heart of Barcelona, Vincci Gala hotel offers luxurious rooms in a protected 19th-century palace. Free Wi-Fi is available. The orginal façade, floor and central staircase of this unique hotel have all been preserved, creating a balance of traditional arquitecture and modern design. The air-conditioned rooms include a private bathroom with hairdryer, free toiletries, and bath or shower. The rooms also come with a free laptop safe, extra large beds, satellite TV with pay-per-view channels, and a minibar. A restaurant and snack bar are available on-site, and the hotel offers a breakfast buffet. Laundry and car rental services are available at a surcharge, and the property can provide tourist information. Vincci Gala hotel is located opposite Urquinaona Metro Station, 2 minutes' walk from Plaça Catalunya Square. There are many bars, restaurants and shops in the surroundings, and you can reach Gaudi's La Sagrada Familia in 15 minutes by metro.

name: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas
description: Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas is situated in the centre of Barcelona’s Old Town, just 200 metres from Las Ramblas. It features a rooftop terrace with a seasonal swimming pool. The hotel offers simple, attractive décor and rooms are spacious. Each has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. The Leonardo Hotel Barcelona Las Ramblas serves a daily, buffet breakfast. There are several bars, cafés and restaurants within walking distance of the property. Guests can make use of computers with internet access, available in the hotel reception area. Staff at the tour desk can provide information on Barcelona’s tourist attractions and arrange car rental. The hotel is 10 minutes’ walk from Barcelona Cathedral and the city’s Gothic Quarter. The Old Port is around 700 metres from the hotel, whilst Liceu Metro is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Continental Palacete
description: Stay in the refined elegance of this classic hotel, set in a renovated, 19th-century palace surrounded by classy boulevards right in the heart of Barcelona. As soon as you enter the Continental Palacete you will experience a feel of luxury thanks to the exquisite Baroque decor. This elaborate interior features priceless chandeliers and elaborate frescoes, and combines with modern facilities such as free Wi-Fi throughout to provide a unique setting for your visit. Start each day with a delicious hot and cold breakfast. The Hotel Continental has a varied food and drink buffet on offer throughout the day and evening. The hotel lies on the elegant Rambla de Catalunya, just a 5-minute walk from the citys main square of Plaa Catalunya. The surrounding streets are full of Barcelonas distinctive architecture, smart restaurants and exclusive boutiques.iHotelier/iStay

name: Catalonia Barcelona 505
description: Catalonia Barcelona 505 offers spacious rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool in Barcelona’s Sant Gervasi area. From El Putxet Train Station, 400 metres away, you can reach the centre in 15 minutes. The hotel is close to important medical centres, such as the Teknon Clinic, Sant Jordi Clinic, Dexeus and Barraquer. It is also next to the Blue Tram, which takes you to the cable car for Tibidabo. Air-conditioned rooms have a satellite TV, a safe and minibar. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The restaurant C50&5 offers international cuisine. There is a bar and room service is available. You can hire a car from the 24-hour front desk. On-site parking is offered for an additional charge, and the hotel has easy access to the B20 Motorway.

name: Hotel Jazz
description: Centrally located in Barcelona, Hotel Jazz is just minutes on foot from Placa de Catalunya Metro Station and offers a rooftop pool. It provides city views and free Wi-Fi. The hotel has a fitness centre with a swimming pool. Those staying at the property have access to express check-in/check-out, around the clock reception and a meeting room. Just moments from nearby clubs and bars, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover what the local nightlife has to offer. After a day of exploring the area, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all have a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and an in-room safe. Hotel Jazz is surrounded by some of the city's most popular shops and cafés. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Sant Antoni Metro Station, which allows for convenient access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Ronda House
description: Ronda House is set just off Ronda Sant Antoni Avenue, 10 minutes’ walk from Las Ramblas. This hotel has a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV. The Ronda features bright, simple décor. Its air-conditioned rooms have fully equipped private bathrooms. A daily buffet breakfast is served in the Ronda’s café which includes a variety of coffees and pastries. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant and the bar. The MACBA Art Gallery is just 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Sant Antoni Metro Station is 200 metres from the hotel and connects guests to sights such as Gaudí’s Sagrada Familía and Casa Batlló in less than 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Ramblas Internacional
description: Hotel Ramblas Internacional is set right on the famous Las Ramblas, 50 metres from Liceu Metro Station and close to La Boquería Market. Each of the soundproofed rooms is individually decorated and has plenty of natural light. Most rooms offer views of central Barcelona and some look onto Las Ramblas. Hotel Ramblas Internacional serves a daily breakfast. Located just 150 metres from Liceu Theatre, the hotel has easy access to Barcelona’s Gothic Quarter and the city’s cathedral is less than 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Casa Bonay
address: Gran Vía de Les Corts Catalanes 700, 08010 Barcelona
description: Strategically located in the heart of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Barcelona. It also offers a coffee bar, a rooftop terrace and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Casa Bonay features a 24-hour reception, plus a sun deck and live music. For added convenience, it offers a roof garden, a shuttle service and a safe. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with cable/satellite channels, a rain shower and a mini bar. All have movies-on-demand, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests of Hotel Casa Bonay can enjoy a unique dining experience at the trendy bar and trendy bistro. Dining options at the hotel include Satan's Coffee and Chiringuito. Those staying at the property can also sit down to a buffet breakfast every morning. Local attractions close to Hotel Casa Bonay include Palau de la Musica Catalana, Placa de Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia. It is within a 20-minute walk of Passeig de Gracia Train Station and Placa de Catalunya Metro Station, which allows for easy access in and around Barcelona.Revato

name: Catalonia Park Putxet Hotel
description: Featuring a sunroof terrace with a pool and views over Barcelona, Catalonia Park Putxet offers tranquil rooms and a modern fitness centre onsite. There is free WiFi available throughout. The Park Putxet has simple, bright décor. Each air-conditioned room comes with a mini fridge with complimentary water, a satellite TV and a fully equipped bathroom with a hairdryer. You can enjoy a varied buffet breakfast with Show Cooking. Light meals are prepared at the hotel snack bar; and room service, including sushi room service, is available. The hotel is located in a residential area. There is a wide selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the neighbouring district of Gràcia, which is just 15 minutes’ walk from the hotel. Gaudi's famous Park Guell is just 600 metres away. The closest metro station is Lesseps, 600 metres away.

name: Exe Ramblas Boqueria
description: Exe Ramblas Boquería is situated right on Barcelona’s famous Las Ramblas, next to La Boquería Market. The stylish, air-conditioned rooms offer free WiFi, flat-screen satellite TV and a private balcony. Exe Ramblas Boquería features elegant modern décor, with hardwood floors and designer furniture. The soundproofed rooms have views of Las Ramblas or the colourful Boqueria Market. A varied buffet breakfast is served in the Exe Ramblas Boquería’s bright dining room. The Boquería is an ideal place to sample typical tapas and fresh fruit, while numerous restaurants and bars can be found nearby. Barcelona Cathedral and Plaça Catalunya are both within 400 metres of the hotel. Liceu Metro Station is just 100 metres away.

name: Wittmore Hotel - Adults Only
description: Offering wiews to the vertical garden and the patio, The Wittmore - Adults Only is located in Barcelona in the heart of the Gothic Quarter of Barcelona, 400 metres from Picasso Museum. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each comfortable and quiet room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV. Some rooms have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. The rooms come with a private bathroom. Extras include bathrobes, slippers, and luxury toiletries. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Also a bar, and a restaurant with a variety of regional dishes and a wide selection of local and international wines and cocktails. There is a rooftop terrace that features a plunge pool, solarium, and terrace bar. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Plaza Reial is 400 metres from The Wittmore - Adults Only, while La Seu, Cathedral of Barcelona is 500 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Olivia Balmes Hotel
description: Offering an outdoor swimming pool, Olivia Balmes Hotel is set 400 metres from Barcelona’s Passeig de Gracia, in the elegant Eixample neighbourhood. The modern hotel features stylish air-conditioned rooms and a restaurant. Each bright spacious room includes free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen satellite TV and a laptop safe. The contemporary bathrooms have an open-plan design. The hotel’s restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Olivia Balmes offers a sun terrace with an outdoor swimming pool and sun loungers. There is also a bar, serving cocktails and snacks, as well as several meeting rooms. Olivia Balmes Hotel has private parking and Barcelona Airport is around 20 minutes’ drive away. Plaza Catalunya is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and you can reach Gaudi’s famous Casa Batlló and La Pedrera within a 5-minute walk.

name: Casa Camper Barcelona
description: The stylish Casa Camper Barcelona boutique hotel is located in central Barcelona, between Las Ramblas and MACBA art gallery. Each room has a separate lounge, and there is a free 24-hour buffet. Casa Camper Barcelona's designer bedrooms overlook either a peaceful vertical garden or city views. The lounges have a flat-screen TV, a sofa and a desk. All rooms have free WiFi. The 24-hour snack area includes free water, soft drinks and coffee, as well as sandwiches, salads, soup, sliced fresh fruit and desserts. Casa Camper Barcelona’s well-known restaurant, Dos Palillos, offers Asian tapas. Casa Camper Hotel Barcelona is located just a 5-minute walk from the famous Boqueria market, the Liceu opera house and the city's famous Gothic Quarter. Plaza Catalunya and the main shopping streets are just a 10-minute walk away.

name: Sir Victor Hotel, part of Sircle Collection
description: Situated in Barcelona’s modernist district on Passeig de Gràcia, Sir Victor's rooms and suites are inspired by the Catalonian lifestyle of sun, sea, and style. A state-of-the-art spa, two restaurants, a speakeasy-style bar, two meeting rooms, a library, and a sensational rooftop pool and terrace bar overlooking major historic buildings round out offerings that attract locals and travelers alike. The rooms are designed with an emphasis on comfort and nature, while the artwork features local standouts, such as Antoni Muntadas and Alfons Borrell.Marriott

name: Hotel Brick
address: Gran Via de les Corts Catalanes, 304, 08004 Barcelona
description: Located in Barcelona, 1.2 km from Sants Railway Station, Hotel Brick Barcelona features views of the city. Among the facilities at this property are a business centre and a concierge service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 600 metres from Magic Fountain of Montjuic. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Brick Barcelona the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Languages spoken at the reception include Catalan, English, Spanish and French, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed. Palau Sant Jordi is 1.8 km from the accommodation, while Passeig de Gracia is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Barcelona El Prat Airport, 10 km from Hotel Brick Barcelona.

name: Hotel Roger de Lluria Barcelona
description: This boutique hotel offers comfortable rooms with 42-inch (101 cm) flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. The Roger de Lluria is set in an elegant area, 2 streets from Plaça Catalunya. The Roger de Llúria is a 10-minute walk from Gaudí’s Casa Batlló, on Passeig de Gràcia and around 700 metres from Las Ramblas. Rooms at the Roger de Lluria are spacious and well-equipped. Each room has a marble bathroom with a bath, bathrobe and hairdryer. There is a daily turn-down service. The Roger de Lluria offers a transfer service from the airport, at an additional cost. There is also a ticket service and business centre. A large buffet breakfast is served every morning. There is also a lounge bar.

name: Gaudi Hotel
description: Located just 50 metres from the famous Las Ramblas in Barcelona, Gaudi Hotel features a shared terrace with views of the Palau Güell and the city. Free WiFi is available. The hotel is 300 metres from Liceu Metro Station. You can visit many of the city’s attractions on foot. The Boqueria Market is 450 metres from the hotel. The Port and Maremagnum Shopping Centre are a 10-minute walk away. All air-conditioned rooms at the Gaudi Hotel have a private bathroom and a TV. Some have a private balcony and safe. Rooms are modern, with wooden floors, and some offer excellent views of the city or Palau Güell. A continental breakfast is served in the Gaudi’s restaurant. There is a bar and a snack bar. There is a 24-hour front desk, and a laundry and ironing service are available. Guests also have free use of the hotel's 2 computers with internet access.

name: El Palauet Royal Suites
description: Located in a Modernist building, El Palauet Royal Suites features a rooftop spa with spectacular city views. It offers elegant, modern suites with free Wi-Fi. El Palauet Royal Suites’s spacious suites include 2 bedrooms with private bathrooms, a spacious living room and a fully-equipped kitchen including a hob, microwave, small fridge and a dishwasher. Some include a balcony. All suites come with 2 bottles of water and a platter of apples, replenished every day, as well as a 380 ml bottle of Spanish wine and Wallpaper guide to Barcelona. This luxury hotel delivers breakfast to the rooms. Main restaurants and bars can be found on Barcelona’s elegant Passeig de Gràcia Avenue, where it intersects with Diagonal Avenue. El Palauet Royal Suites offers a personal assistant service. A shuttle service is available at an additional cost and guests can rent cars at the hotel.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal
description: Set in the 22@ district, the Four Points by Sheraton Barcelona Diagonal is a family friendly hotel within walking distance of museums, shops, restaurants, beaches and major attractions like Sagrada Familia and the Agbar Tower. Barcelona Sants Station is just 6 kilometers away and Barcelona El Prat Airport (BCN) is 22 kilometers away. Our 24-hour fitness center's state-of the-art equipment will help you stay fit while you're traveling. Get your evening going with our diverse beer and wine selections. For business meetings and social events, our soundproof function rooms feature wireless High-Speed Internet Access, audiovisual technology and outstanding catering options. Choose from 154 guest rooms to get a Classic Room, or upgrade if you want more space or a great view. All of them have the plush signature Four Points bed, a flat-screen TV, a large work desk, High-Speed Wi-Fi, a coffee and tea maker and two bottled waters daily.Marriott

name: W Barcelona
description: Step inside. See for yourself. Designed by world-renowned architect Ricardo Bofill, W Barcelona sets the scene for a spectacular stay. W Barcelona is a luxury hotel offering a combination of luxury and comfort in each of its 473 fabulous guestrooms and suites. This 5-star hotel is located on the beachfront along the famous Barceloneta Boardwalk. Each guest room and suite provide panoramic views over the Mediterranean Sea and the city of Barcelona.Marriott

name: Acacia Suite
description: Acacia Suite is located in Barcelona’s Eixample district, just 50 metres from Hospital Clinic Metro Station. It offers air-conditioned apartments with free Wi-Fi and a shared roof terrace. The modern apartments feature a lounge with carpeted floors, sofas and a TV. The kitchenette includes an electric hob and a microwave. Bed linen and towels are changed daily. The Acacia serves a daily continental breakfast directly at the apartments. The aparthotel also has a free business centre. Board games are also available for guests’ use. The Acacia offers discounts on Barcelona’s popular tourist bus. The city’s financial district is 800 metres away, and you can reach Passeig de Gràcia Boulevard in 3 minutes by metro.

name: Ac Hotel Cuzco By Marriott
description: The AC Hotel Cuzco by Marriott is located in the prestigious Paseo de la Castellana in Madrid just 5 minutes away from the Santiago Bernabeu Real Madrid´s stadium. It features a gym and has free Wifi throughout the hotel. The AC Cuzco 318 guest rooms are spacious and modern equipped with a 49” plasma TV with satellite and international channels. Each room has a minibar and a private bathroom. They also have independent air conditioning and heating. The hotel serves a high quality breakfast buffet and a offers a large variety of international dishes prepared with fresh and seasonal products for lunch and dinner. The AC Lounge serves a variety of cocktails and snacks. AC Hotel Cuzco by Marriott is located next to Cuzco's Metro Station, while the Chamartin train station is just 2 km away. The hotel is very well connected by bus, metro, and the M -11 motorway, which connects to the convention center Ifema and Barajas airport. Offers private parking.Marriott

name: Apart-Hotel Serrano Recoletos
description: These functional apartments lie just off the grand street of Paseo Recoletos, offering spacious and independent accommodation right in the commercial heart of Madrid. Each unit at Apartamentos Recoletos comes with its own kitchenette, allowing you to prepare your meals as and when you like. Its climate-controlled accommodation also includes a digital TV and full bathroom. Free high-speed WiFi is available. Accommodation is available for people with reduced hearing. Use this property as a base to stay near Madrid’s famous Calle Serrano – full of some of the city’s most prestigious shops. Also nearby is the charming park of the Retiro. Products for a continental breakfast are served in the room. Convenient public transport – including the Metro from Colón and Serrano Stations – means you can easily travel around the Spanish capital.

name: BLESS Hotel Madrid
description: Located in the Salamanca district, the most emblematic and exclusive neighborhood in the center of the city, BLESS Hotel Madrid stands out for its unique style and timeless design the work of top interior designer Lázaro Rosa Violán, capturing the essence of the capital. The hotel is only steps away from the best attractions, museums, designer shops, and nightlife. Absolute comfort is carefully thought out and reflected in every detail, beginning even before guests arrive. The hotel is distinguished by its sensory architecture, and equipped with the most advanced technology a BLESS Hotel is also dynamic and surprising, promising fabulous experiences and personalized services. Featuring a top terrace pool,3 bars, 2 restaurants a bowling alley and a spa, this property also provides guests with a gym and meeting areas.A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Retiro Park is 1.4 km from Bless Hotel Madrid, while Museo del Prado is 1.8 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 11 km from the hotel. Velazquez and Serrano Metro Stations are both within 500 metres.

name: H10 Tribeca
description: Just 10 minutes' walk from Santiago Bernabeu Metro Station, H10 Tribeca has an accessible location, making it an ideal place to stay while visiting Madrid. Guests can also enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi access during their stay. This 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour reception, a coffee bar and meeting rooms. Guests are able to relax with a book in the library. H10 Tribeca features 140 air conditioned rooms equipped with all the necessities to ensure an enjoyable stay. Each provides a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests staying at H10 Tribeca can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, suitably located for those who want to stay close by when looking to sit down to a meal. In the evening, guests are able to enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. A wide choice of cafés and restaurants are also available nearby. Madrid's attractions, such as Europa Tower Madrid and Santiago Bernabeu Stadium, are within a 10-minute walk of the hotel. The Madrid Central Mosque and Torre Picasso are also located within 20 minutes' walk.Revato

name: Melia Castilla
address: Calle Del Poeta Joan Maragall, 43, Madrid
description: The Meliá Castilla offers comfortable accommodation just metres from the Paseo de la Castellana. The hotel features classic décor and has a seasonal outdoor pool, a fitness, and a Caroli Wellness Centre. The L'Albufera restaurant serves a range of delicious rices and paellas. A buffet breakfast with a large variety of fresh products is offered. Other bars and restaurants are also available on site and in the surroundings. Rooms are spacious and offer a pillow menu and free WiFi. They come with a private bathroom and air conditioning. A wide range of family rooms are available, perfect for a family gateway in Madrid. Some areas of the hotel are dedicated to The Level exclusive rooms and services, featuring private check-in and check-out space, private buffet breakfast, open bar and snacks, daily cocktail in a private area, as well as concierge service and organization of activities around the city. Swimming pool is open only during summer season (please, check opening times and days with the hotel). Cuzco Metro Station is 200 metres away from the hotel. The nearby motorways offer easy access to IFEMA, the Palacio Municipal de Congresos, and Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport. Real Madrid’s Santiago Bernabeu Stadium is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Melia Avenida de America
address: Calle Juan Ignacio Luca de Tena, 36, 28027 Madrid
description: Located just off the A2 Motorway, this hotel is 15 minutes’ drive from central Madrid. The air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá Avenida América feature modern décor. Each one has satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel offers some superior rooms and the exclusive service The Level with premium amenities. In The Level lounge guests can have a private buffet breakfast and taste tapas and snacks. There is also a working area with internet access, fax and printer. The hotel features a convention centre with 32 rooms for up to 1000 people, available for an extra cost. Madrid’s Barajas Airport is a 10-minute drive from the Avenida América and the IFEMA Convention Centre is just over 2 km away. Buses to Plaza Mayor leave from a stop just outside the hotel.

name: Hotel Opera
description: Located in the classy Austrias district of central Madrid, this elegant city hotel is set near to the Opera House and Royal Palace. It offers an ideal base to explore the magnificent Spanish capital. A short walk from some of Madrid’s most popular sights, Hotel Opera occupies a renovated, 19th-century building in one of the city’s most prestigious areas. Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol and Gran Via are all within 20 minutes’ walk. With the Opera House close by, the hotel has a musical theme running throughout. The restaurant hosts musical soirées attended to by singing waiters, and all meals are complemented by live piano music.

name: Hotel Chamartin The One
description: Set in Chamartin Train and Metro Station, in Madrid’s financial district, Hotel Chamartin The One features air-conditioned rooms with a buffet breakfast service and free WiFi. The hotel has a bar and 24-hour reception. Each bright spacious room includes a flat-screen TV, safe and telephone. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Lunch and dinner, as well as drinks and snacks, are served at the hotel's Restaurant Salon Intercity. You can also enjoy a drink or a coffee at the English bar. Car hire, tickets and day trips can be organised for you at reception. Hotel Chamartin The One also offers meeting rooms and business services. There are direct train and metro links to Madrid’s Adolpho Suarez Airport, Atocha AVE Train Station and Puerta del Sol Square. Real Madrid’s Santiago Bernabéu Stadium is a 25-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Hotel Avenue - Lovely hotel
description: Set in Madrid, within 6.9 km of IFEMA and 14 km of Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, Hotel Avenue offers accommodation with a bar and as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Featuring a terrace, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The hotel has an indoor pool, hot tub and room service. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. At Hotel Avenue the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and Spanish. El Retiro Park is 14 km from Hotel Avenue, while Gran Via Metro Station is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Dwo Colours Alcalá
description: Situated in Madrid, 3.7 km from IFEMA, DWO Colours Alcalá features accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The property is non-smoking and is located 7.4 km from Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At DWO Colours Alcalá rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A buffet, à la carte or continental breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak Catalan, English, Spanish and French. El Retiro Park is 7.5 km from the accommodation, while Gran Via Metro Station is 7.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 5 km from DWO Colours Alcalá.

name: Hotel Madrid Gran Via 25 Affiliated by Meliá
description: Hotel Madrid Gran Vía 25, managed by Meliá is set in a classic building featuring its original façade. Located on Gran Vía, it features free WiFi, 4-minutes’ walk from Puerta del Sol. Rooms at the hotel feature classic-style, functional décor and are soundproofed. All include flat-screen satellite TV, a safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer. There is central air conditioning and heating, available depending on the season. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast daily and has a café. Various bars, restaurants and shops are within 2 minutes’ walk. Lively Plaza Mayor is 8 minutes’ walk away. The Madrid Gran Vía 25 is ideally located for exploring historic Madrid. The Royal palace and Madrid Cathedral are 10 minutes’ walk away, while the Art Triangle and Retiro Park are within 15 minutes’ walk. The hotel is located just next to Gran Vía Metro Station. Car rental and currency exchange services are both available.

name: Hotel Nuevo Boston
description: Hotel Nuevo Boston is a design hotel, 10-minute drive from IFEMA Exhibition Centre and 5-minute drive from Civitas Metropolitano Stadium. It offers free WiFi and a free airport shuttle service to Madrid’s Barajas Airport, 5-minute drive away. Rooms at the Nuevo Boston hotel are air-conditioned. They include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and the marble bathroom comes with a hairdryer. There is also a safety deposit box and a desk. Hotel Nuevo Boston has a restaurant, serving modern Mediterranean food, and a café-bar. The dining area features a glass roof and palm trees. The hotel operates a shuttle service to IFEMA during trade fairs. Nuevo Boston is adapted for guests with reduced mobility. The hotel has a pool and sun terrace available in the summer.

name: JW Marriott Hotel Madrid
description: The new JW Marriott Hotel Madrid is ideally located in the city center, close to attractions such as Puerta del Sol, Gran Vía, and Plaza Mayor. From here, you can enjoy a luxury commercial atmosphere or stroll in the renowned Art Walk, included in the UNESCO World Heritage List as The Landscape of Light, where you will find some of the best art museums in the world: El Prado, the Thyssen-Bornemisza and the Reina Sofia. The hotel’s elegant décor resonates with the building's historic past, revealing the old 19th century wrought iron columns. Our 139 rooms and suites, most with private balconies, boast ample spaces with sophisticated touches to provide our guests with a holistic experience. From our top floors, you can marvel with incredible views of Madrid. Relax in our lobby or discover traditional dishes with a gourmet twist by Michelin-star chef Mario Sandoval at Qú restaurant. Modern facilities, a large, fully equipped fitness and wellness room and attentive hotel staff ensure a luxurious experience.Marriott

name: Cats Hostel Madrid Sol
description: Cats Madrid Sol is located in central Madrid, just 150 metres from the lively Santa Ana Square. Organises trips to visit Madrid’s nightlife. The dormitories at Cats Madrid Sol are set around a beautiful courtyard with an 18th-century Moorish-style fountain. Each one includes wooden floors, individual lockers and a shared bathroom. This property serves a daily breakfast in the coffee room and has vending machines for snacks and pastries. A fridge and a microwave are available for all guests. There is a laundry room with coin-operated machines, as well as an iron. The bar features computers which you can use for free. You can walk from Cats Madrid Sol to the famous Puerta del Sol Square in just 5 minutes. San Sebastián Church is just 50 metres from the hostel, and Antón Martín Metro Station is 200 metres away.

name: Vp Jardín Metropolitano
description: Located next to Cuatro Caminos Square, this hotel’s interior is decorated with plants and palm trees. Its restaurant features Continental breakfast to be consumed in the room an attractive conservatory and the smart rooms come with free Wi-Fi. The large, air-conditioned rooms at VP Jardín Metropolitano have parquet floors and modern décor. Each one comes with satellite TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Cuatro Caminos Metro Station is just 100 metres from the hotel, connecting you with the rest of the city. Paseo de la Castellana, Madrid’s main business area, is 15 minutes’ walk away while Santiago Bernabéu is 7-minutes drive away.

name: Aloft Madrid Gran Via
description: Steps away from the centric Plaza del Callao, Aloft Madrid Gran Vía is located in the buzzing area of the city’s Gran Vía. An area that embraces the upbeat vibe of Madrid, it has the added bonus that it’s not defined by overzealous traffic demands. The 132 urban-inspired guestrooms come with mighty nine-foot ceilings, plush platform beds and trademark Aloft extras like the 49” Chromecast TV, walk-in rainfall shower and DRY BAR® amenities. Re:Fuel by AloftSM is an astute dining concept where fresh, fast and flavorsome dishes are available on a serve-self, buffet basis 24/7. Re:ChargeSM fitness center is open around the clock for guests who need to pump it up or stretch it out.Marriott

name: Zleep Madrid Airport
description: No description found

name: Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid
description: Less than 1 km from Mercado San Miguel and a 13-minute walk from Puerta de Toledo, the property offers a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, spa and free WiFi is available. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower, free toiletries and a hair dryer. The units at Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid have air conditioning and a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the property. Pestana Plaza Mayor Madrid is located in Plaza Mayor, while Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum is 1.1 km from the property. Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 13.8 km away.

name: Hotel Mayorazgo
description: Hotel Mayorazgo’s elegant rooms have a flat-screen TV. The hotel is next to Madrid’s Gran Via, a short walk from Plaza España and the Royal Palace. Plaza de España and Santo Domingo Metro Stations are both 150 metres away. They provide easy access to the Art Triangle, the Retiro Park and Madrid Barajas Airport. The Hotel Mayorazgo has a Mediterranean restaurant and a bar, with classic design and a relaxing fountain. There is an elegant piano bar with live music. Each room at the hotel is air-conditioned and spacious. Rooms come with a full private bathroom with a hairdryer. There is a complimentary safe. A minibar is available for an additional charge. The Hotel Mayorazgo has a gift shop and a tour desk. The hotel can also arrange airport transfers, car rental and packed lunches.

name: L&H La Latina
description: Set 350 metres from Puerta de Toledo Metro Station, L&H La Latina Selection offers studios and apartments in La Latina neighbourhood of Madrid. The property features a 24-hour reception. All apartments and studios are air conditioned and include a TV and a kitchen, fitted with a microwave and toaster, as well as a bathroom. Towels and bed linen are provided. Some units include a balcony or terrace. Baby cots are available on request. You can find several restaurants, bars, and shops within a 5-minute walk of L&H La Latina Selection. Almudena Cathedral and the Royal Palace are 800 metres from the property, while El Prado Museum is 20 minutes away on foot. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 1 hour away by metro.

name: room007 Select Sol
description: Room007 Select Sol is set in Madrid, 200 metres from Plaza Mayor and 400 metres from The Royal Palace. Every room in this guest house is equipped with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Room007 Select Sol features free WiFi throughout the property. A flat-screen TV is provided. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Puerta del Sol is 500 metres from Room007 Select Sol, while Calle Princesa is 800 metres from the guest house. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 14 km from Room007 Select Sol.

name: Hyatt Regency Hesperia Madrid
description: The elegant and welcoming Hyatt Regency Hesperia Madrid is a five-star hotel strategically located in the heart of Madrid, right in the Paseo de la Castellana and next to the art triangle formed by the Thyssen, Prado and Reina Sofia Museums and the financial district of Azca. It is also very close to the Jorge Juan passage and the city's fashionable restaurants. The El Corte Inglés department store with its luxury brand departments and the "Golden Mile" are within walking distance of the hotel. The hotel’s strategic location makes it the ideal choice for combining business trips with the cultural, art, leisure and gastronomic offerings that the city has to offer. The elegant rooms at the Hyatt Regency Hesperia Madrid include a 65" flat screen TV equipped with a ChromeCast system, a Nespresso coffee maker, a kettle, a rain shower, a pillow menu and luxury amenities. Room service is available 24 hours a day and free WiFi in the whole building is featured. We offer a number of unique gastronomic options. La Manzana restaurant, with its characteristic interior courtyard and its play on lights, offers the possibility of enjoying creative cuisine in an exclusive space. Next to La Manzana, the distinctive Mery Bárbola offers cocktails and a selection of signature tapas in a relaxed atmosphere. In addition, for those looking for signature cuisine, Dani García offers two new gastronomic proposals: Leña, which breaks with all the stereotypes of a traditional steakhouse, combines innovation, tradition and product in the best way and the Smoked Room restaurant, awarded with 2 Michelin Stars, offers an exclusive culinary journey and a unique gastronomic experience. The hotel roof comes with a gym, with impressive views of Madrid. There are also 9 meeting rooms and a business center with a computer and printer. Hyatt Regency Hesperia Madrid is located opposite the National Natural History Museum and less than 2 km from the Bernabéu Stadium and with the city's most exclusive shops. Gregorio Marañón Metro Station is 50 m away, while direct airport trains stop at Nuevos Ministerios Station, within a 10-minute walk.

name: Vincci Centrum
description: Set in a historic building, the Vincci Centrum is a boutique hotel located 300 metres from Gran Via and a 10-minute walk from the famous Puerta del Sol. Rooms have a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The Vincci maintains its original façade and features a welcoming and sophisticated décor. Its stylish and comfortable bedrooms have air conditioning, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Some rooms feature a terrace. The on-site Bellini food&bar offers an innovative gastronomic concept, including signature tapas and a selection of wines and cocktails. A varied buffet breakfast is available every morning, including special products for celiacs. Guests can enjoy a drink in the lounge bar, where there is a selection of national and international newspapers. The Centrum is set within the artistic triangle of Madrid, comprised by the Prado, Thyssen, and Reina Sofia Museums. The hotel is less than 1 km from Retiro Park and Madrid’s Atocha Train Station is a 20-minute walk from the hotel. Barajas Airport is around 12 km away. Private parking is available for an additional cost at a location nearby. Shops, bars and restaurants can be found in the surrounding Chueca and Gran Vía districts. The Thyssen-Bornemisza, Prado and Reina Sofía museums are within 20 minutes' walk of the hotel.

name: Hostal San Lorenzo
description: This guest house is situated in the heart of Madrid, near the Puerta del Sol, Palacio Real and the renowned Museo del Prado, and offers free Wi-Fi. Hostal San Lorenzo offers stylish, practical rooms with great facilities. Wake up in the morning to the sound of the radio, and watch the news on the TV. There is air conditioning and heating for your comfort, as well as a seating area where you can read. Enjoy wandering around the buzzing centre of Madrid, full of culture and interesting shops and bars. You can also a rent a bicycle or car at reception, allowing you to explore Madrid to the full. Take advantage of the Hostal San Lorenzo's 24-hour front desk and ticket service to plan your days in Madrid down to the last detail.

name: Hotel Villa Real, a member of Preferred Hotels & Resorts
description: Set in the cultural heart of Madrid, this luxury hotel has a fine art collection and each elegant room has an LCD TV. Hotel Villa Real is located in the Triangle of Art. The Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum is just 150 metres away. The Puerta del Sol, Plaza Cibeles and the Retiro Park are also nearby. Hotel Villa Real is considered a classic among Madrid’s luxury hotels, decorated with wood and marble. The art collection includes Roman mosaics and Greek ceramics, some from the 3rd Century BC. Rooms at the hotel are soundproofed, and have a laptop safe and a minibar. Some rooms have a sofa or a balcony. The hotel’s East 47 restaurant serves creative Mediterranean food, tapas and cocktails. The Property is also Dog Friendly.

name: The Principal Madrid
description: Iconic views of Madrid’s Gran Via Avenue are offered at the elegant rooftop terrace and Atico restaurant/cocktail bar of The Principal Madrid, Small Luxury Hotels. This luxurious boutique hotel offers a gym, and stylish rooms and suites. The Wellness Suite can be booked entirely and exclusively for couples or individual treatment sessions. Some room and suite types include free access to Wellness Suite services. Spacious air-conditioned rooms and suites all have a TV with cable and satellite channels. Each has a desk, safe, minibar and private bathroom with a hairdryer. Just a few of the extras in certain rooms or suites include butler service, and Nespresso coffee machines. Apart from spectacular views, the hotel’s Atico restaurant/cocktail bar offers avant-garde haute cuisine and classic cocktails in a laid-back atmosphere of modern loft club with glamorous original architecture from 1917. Located at the heart of Madrid, the hotel is surrounded by an array of entertainment, dining and shopping options, and is just 400 metres from the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum.

name: Tótem Madrid Hotel
description: TOTEM Madrid is located in the heart of Madrid, in the Salamanca neighborhood. It offers a cocktail bar and free WiFi. Room service is available. Rooms at TOTEM Madrid have modern décor and parquet floors. They all offer air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and a stylish bathroom with black marble finishes and free toiletries. The hotel is set in a historic building. The Retiro Park, the Golden Triangle and Cybeles Fountain are all nearby. Goya Metro Station is a 2-minute walk away. TOTEM Madrid also has a private parking, available at an extra cost. Public areas are bright and attractive.

name: Hyatt Centric Gran Via Madrid
description: Hyatt Centric Gran Via Madrid is located in the heart of Madrid and features a 24-hour gym, a bar and on-site dining. Gran Via Metro Station is 150 metres away. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Each room is stylishly decorated featuring custom designed furniture, city views, functional work areas, 55-inch TV, air conditioning, and heating. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, bath or shower, and hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily at the property and in the summer months. Hyatt Centric Gran Via Madrid also features a music studio, Ondas, where guests can enjoy a vermouth or gourmet coffee while listening to some foot-tapping tunes or enjoy a light snack. On the first floor you will find Hielo y Carbón, an exclusive grill restaurant, with a wide variety of local meats, as well as an extensive wine list in its wine cellar and different cocktails served in the Gintonería. Finally, Ondas, a bar inspired by a music studio, where guests can enjoy a vermouth or a gourmet coffee, small snacks or a slice of cake to the rhythm of the music. In addition, the hotel offers an extensive room service 24 hours a day, which can be served directly in the comfort of your room. The property has a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service and books and magazines about Madrid are available in the lobby. A 7-minute walk will take you to Puerta del Sol while El Retiro Park is 1.4 km away. Madrid-Barajas Airport is a 45-minute metro ride away.

name: AHM Aparthotel Marcenado
description: Located between Barajas Airport and Madrid city centre, UVE Marcenado is 100 metres from Prosperidad Metro Station. It offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TV. Some room features a balcony and a seating area. The UVE Marcenado has its own restaurant. There is also a 24-hour reception, with a safety deposit box, laundry service and tour desk. The hotel is a 5-minute drive from the IFEMA Trade Fair and Chamartín Train Station. Retiro Park and the Prado Museum are just a short Metro or bus ride away.

name: Hotel Sardinero Madrid
description: Set in a charming historical building, Hotel Sardinero Madrid is located in central Madrid’s Alonso Martínez Square. It offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi. The rooms at Hotel Sardinero Madrid feature traditional high ceilings, modern parquet floors and attractive, minimalist décor. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a large rain-effect shower. The hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast in the bright interior courtyard. There is also an on-site bar, and you can enjoy a drink in the library. Hotel Sardinero Madrid is located on the edge of the lively Chueca district, and there are numerous charming cafes and tapas bars, as well as vibrant nightlife, within a short walk. Alonso Martínez Metro Station is right outside the Hotel Sardinero Madrid, with Puerta del Sol just 3 stops away.

name: Petit Palace President Castellana
address: Calle Del Marques de Villamagna, 4, 28001 Madrid
description: Located in Madrid’s Salamanca District, this hotel is 50 metres from Paseo de la Castellana. It features bright and stylish rooms and free Wi-Fi. The soundproof rooms at the 4-star Petit Palace President Castellana feature contemporary décor and the latest technology. They include a 32-inch flat-screen TV. Other facilities include free bicycle hire and children's push chairs. The Petit Palace President Castellana is just a short walk from Plaza de Colon Square, and Rubén Darío Metro Station is 500 metres away. The Cibeles Fountain and Retiro Park are within 2 km of the hotel.

name: Hotel Urban, a member of Design Hotels
description: This boutique hotel houses a permanent display of art from Papua New Guinea. Hotel Urban has a small rooftop swimming pool and a terrace open in summer, and a cocktail bar. The hotel has beautiful design, and facilities include a gym. The hotel features a gastronomic restaurant: CEBO, with Michelin-starred duet Javier Sanz and Juan Sahuquillo (Oba-) as main chefs. There is also a cocktail-bar on the roof-top terrace "La terraza del Urban", and Cocktail Bar Glass by Sips with barista made cocktails. The décor of the hotel and the rooms includes special lighting, natural wood and stone and Oriental art. All rooms are soundproofed and offer free wired internet, a flat-screen TV and a ChromeCast. The Thyssen-Bornemisza Gallery is 200 metres away. Puerta del Sol, Madrid’s main square, is just 300 metres away.

name: Petit Hostel Palacio Real
description: No description found

name: Petit Palace Preciados
description: Petit Palace Preciados is located 250 metres from the famous Gran Vía Avenue. Rooms include a flat-screen TV, and free WiFi are available. The Petit Palace Preciados features contemporary décor and wooden floors. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. During the summer guests can also enjoy breakfast outside on the terrace. Sol, Callao and Gran Vía Metro Stations are within 5 minutes' walk of the Petit Palace. Discounts on nearby parking facilities are also available. Petit Palace Preciados is just 2 minutes' walk from Puerta del Sol and Gran Via Avenue. Both Plaza Mayor Square and the Royal Palace are less than 1 km away.

name: Chic & Basic dot
description: Situated conveniently in the Centro district of Madrid, Chic & Basic dot is set 500 metres from Plaza Mayor, 300 metres from Gran Via and 300 metres from Puerta del Sol. Featuring a terrace, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is 100 metres from the city centre and 500 metres from Mercado San Miguel. The units at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a safety deposit box. At Chic & Basic dot all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a gluten-free breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near Chic & Basic dot include Gran Via Metro Station, Plaza de España Metro Station and Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Ilunion Pio XII
description: This design hotel offers free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu. Direct buses to Puerta del Sol stop outside, and Madrid’s IFEMA Exhibition Centre is a 10-minute drive away. The contemporary, air-conditioned rooms at the Ilunion Pio XII feature satellite TV, and have a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. The Pio XII’s restaurant offers a daily breakfast, as well as à la carte and set menus. There is also a special menu for celiacs and food intolerant guests. Guest also can enjoy of their international cuisine for lunch and dinner and finishing with a drink in the hotel’s café-bar. Ilunion Pio XII has internet points with free internet access for guests. The hotel also offers information on the surrounding area and a ticket service. Chamartin Station and Pio XII Metro Station are a 15-minute walk from the hotel. Madrid-Barajas Airport is a 15-minute drive from the hotel. You can hire a car from the 24-hour reception, and on-site underground parking is available for an extra charge.

name: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Madrid
description: Leonardo Boutique Hotel Madrid is located in Madrid’s Chamberi district, 100 metres from the Canal Theatre in the heart of the university area. It offers satellite TV and car-parking space. All rooms at the 'Leonardo Boutique Hotel Madrid are air conditioned and come with an en suite bathroom complete with hairdryer. There is also a minibar. Free WiFi is available throughout. Leonardo Boutique Hotel Madrid is a 10-minute walk from Calle Princesa, a shopping street where you can find numerous restaurants, or 15-minute drive from Santiago Bernabeu Stadium. There is easy access to the A-6 Motorway. Canal and Islas Filipinas Metro Stations are a short walk away, connecting you with the city centre within 15 minutes. It offers satellite TV and car-parking space, suitable to medium and small cars.

name: Hotel Princesa Plaza Madrid
description: Princesa Plaza is situated in the west of Madrid, in the Argüelles District.
