Some of the elegant rooms at the hotel feature a large reproduction of a famous painting from the Museo del Prado. The hotel comes with the Holiday Gym fitness centre, featuring a small indoor pool where aquagym classes are organised. The pool is available for guests over 16. Complimentary fitness classes are offerred, as well as cardiovascular equipment. Rooms at the Princesa are spacious with large windows and come with a seating area. They have satellite TV and air conditioning. Princesa Plaza is close to Plaza España Square, Gran Via Avenue and the Royal Palace. It offers car rental and currency exchange services. The tour desk can provide useful information on the surrounding area. The hotel also gives information about a company that organizes shuttle service at an extra cost.

name: Intercontinental Madrid, An IHG Hotel
description: An emblematic property, with elegant rooms and luxurious décor, reflecting Madrid itself with its perfect combination of classic and contemporary elements. The InterContinental Madrid is a haven of comfort. Sunday brunch in the palatial, marble-lined lobby; fine-dining, award-winning business facilities, and a 24-hour gym are just a few of the temptations on offer. A luxury property near to the city’s prestigious museums and shops.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Palacio del Retiro, Autograph Collection
description: Palatial home built in the beginning of the 20th century converted into a discreet 50 room luxury hotel. Unique building protected by National Heritage status where you can enjoy the pleasure of resting in one of the historic buildings of the centre of the city, located in front of the famous Retiro Park and close to the Paseo de Recoletos. It occupies the centre of the magical Art Triangle, Prado Museum, the Thyssen-Bornemisza Collection and Reina Sofía National Art Museum. Ideally located in the centre of the cultural, financial and business area. A full service business centre, counting with 5 meeting rooms of different sizes equipped with internet WIFI system makes of the Hotel Palacio del Retiro, Autograph Collection the ideal venue for holding meetings, conferences and celebrations.Marriott

name: Ekilibrio Hotel & Apart-Suites
description: No description found

name: CoolRooms Palacio de Atocha
description: Situated in Madrid, 800 metres from Puerta del Sol, CoolRooms Palacio de Atocha features accommodation with a restaurant, private parking, a bar and a garden. Boasting family rooms, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel rooms come with a private bathroom with free toiletries. Guests at CoolRooms Palacio de Atocha can enjoy an à la carte breakfast prepared upon request. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Mercado San Miguel, Prado Museum and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from CoolRooms Palacio de Atocha.

name: Barceló Torre De Madrid
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The new hotel Barcelo Torre de Madrid designed by Jaime Hayon is the ideal place to discover Madrid in the most comfortable way because of its excellent location in the Plaza de Espana just steps from the Gran Via with all its offer Theatres accommodation tapas bar shopping centers or live the nightlife combined with the best design taste and service exclusive.A 10-minute walk to Palacio Real and 15 minutes to Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor. Plaza de Espana metro station is located just opposite to the hotel and you can easily connect with other areas of the city in just a few minutes. Airport Madrid-Barajas Adolfo Suarez is 21 km of distance.All rooms follow the quality standard Barcelo have free Wi-Fi access King size bed or 2 beds of 1.05 cm rain shower TV 42 individual air conditioning minibar free safe and sophisticated decoration.We also offer 24 hour room service valet Guest Experience Manager Meeting rooms A la Carte Restaurant Buffet Restaurant Lobby Bar and our gym and Spa located on the 8th floor with sublime views of the city.Barcelo.com

name: One Shot Fortuny 07
description: Set in Madrid and with Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum reachable within 1.6 km, One Shot Fortuny 07 offers concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The hotel has family rooms. At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all guest rooms at One Shot Fortuny 07 have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also offer a terrace. At the accommodation all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast is available every morning at the property. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English, Spanish and Italian. Popular points of interest near One Shot Fortuny 07 include Gran Via Metro Station, El Retiro Park and Gran Via. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 17 km from the hotel.

name: Hospes Puerta de Alcalá
description: The elegant Hospes Puerta de Alcalá is set next to Puerta de Alcalá, in Madrid’s Salamanca district. It offers free WiFi, great views of the Retiro Park and free access to the Bodyna Spa. The stylish rooms at Hospes Puerta de Alcalá come with a flat-screen TV, a bathrobe and special amenities. The Bodyna Spa area has 4 treatment rooms, a soundproofed relaxation room, a hammam, gym and a small relaxation pool. All guests have access to the spa. The Malvar Restaurant offers meals, tapas and a large terrace with views of the Puerta de Alcalá. Guests can also enjoy a drink or relax in the Patio Chill Out. Private parking is available onsite for an additional cost. An elegant 5-star hotel, Hospes Puerta de Alcalá is set in a historic building dating from 1883. The Prado, the Reina Sofía Museum and Cibeles Fountain are within a short walk.

name: NH Madrid Sur
address: Avenida de la Ciudad de Barcelona, 113, 28007 Madrid
description: This stylish, modern hotel is located in the south of Madrid, close to the Méndez Álvaro Bus Station. It offers a varied buffet breakfast and free WiFi. Catalonia El Retiro is situated under 3 km from the Retiro Park and the Art Triangle. It has easy access to the A-3 and M-30 Motorways and a bus stop and Puente de Vallecas Metro Station are just metres from the hotel. All rooms are modern, spacious, bright and with wooden floors. They have air-conditioned, courtesy, flat screen TV with satellite channels, safe, free high-speed Wi-Fi and minibar. Full bathroom with hairdryer and bathtub with rain shower. This hotel only accepts one dog or cat under 20 kg. Pets must be requested in advance for accommodation with pets. A supplement of EUR 22 per night per pet and a security deposit of EUR 200 is required.

name: The Walt Madrid
description: Located in the heart of Madrid, just 150 meters from the world famous Gran Via, the Walt Madrid offers modern accommodation in Madrid. This hotel features an on-site bar Free WiFi is available. Each room and suite have parquet floors, and they include a flat-screen TV, minibar, and a safe. Air conditioning and free WiFi are available. Family Suites also offer a small kitchen. Some rooms include private terraces. The on-site bar serves fresh juices, a variety of teas, Mediterranean wines, and spirits, as well as a variety of tapas. Guests will find a wide range of restaurants, bars, and nightclubs within a 10-minute walk away. Private parking is available next to the property for an additional cost. The Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, the Royal Palace, Opera and the Mercado de San Miguel are within walking distance. The Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, Reina Sofia and Prado Museum are an easy stroll from The Walt Madrid.

name: Zenit Conde de Orgaz
description: This stylish hotel is located in northern Madrid, 8 minutes’ drive from the IFEMA Convention Centre. It offers a gym and rooms with free Wi-Fi and a pillow menu. The Zenit Conde de Orgaz is less than 15 minutes’ drive from Madrid’s Barajas Airport. Esperanza Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel, connecting you with central Madrid in 20 minutes. The air-conditioned rooms at the Conde de Orgaz feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one comes with a pillow menu and satellite TV. The hotel offers a varied buffet breakfast, and the Bouquet Restaurant serves Spanish and international food. There is also a bar where you can get a snack or a drink.

name: Gran Hotel Inglés
description: Located in the Barrio de las Letras, Gran Hotel Inglés - The Leading Hotels of the World is set on a 19th century building, and offers 5* accommodation 300 metres from Puerta del Sol and only 600 metres from the main museums. All rooms feature a stylish décor reminding its original art-decó style. They are all fitted with a seating area, and flat-screen TV. Guests can enjoy an à la carte buffet breakfast with hot and cold options. Guests can also enjoy a meal at the cocktail-bar LobByto located at the hotel’s hall. The Gran Hotel Inglés - The Leading Hotels of the World also offers business facilities such as conference or meeting rooms. Wellness services can also be provided at their wellness centre. The Royal Palace is 20-minutes’ walk from the accommodation while El Retiro Park is only 1 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Petit Palace Cliper Gran Vía
description: Set in the heart of Madrid, Petit Palace Cliper Gran Via is situated near Gran Via Metro Station, and provides easy access to nearby restaurants and bars. It provides 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of the hotel, including executive floor, free wireless internet in public areas and car hire. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. The rooms at Petit Palace Cliper Gran Via feature a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a laptop safe. The bathrooms have a shower and come with a hair dryer. To make sure the day gets off to a good start, a buffet breakfast is offered daily at Petit Palace Cliper Gran Via's restaurant. The hotel is conveniently located for sightseeing in Madrid, with Gran Via and Puerta del Sol just a short stroll away. Royal Palace of Madrid and Plaza Mayor are within walking a distance.Revato

name: Icon Embassy
description: Offering free Wi-Fi, ICON Embassy by Petit Palace is set on Calle Serrano, in Madrid´s Salamanca District and main commercial area. Housed in an elegant 19th-century building, this design hotel is located 450 metres from Plaza de Colón Square. The hotel has good access to all parts of the city by bus and metro. Serrano Metro Station is just 100 metres from the hotel. Rooms at the ICON Embassy are stylish and spacious and include a private bathroom. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. The National Library is an 8-minute walk away, and Retiro Park can be reached in 12-minutes on foot. Madrid-Barajas airport is 20-minute ride away from ICON Embassy by Petit Palace.

name: Emperador
description: Located in the heart of Madrid, Emperador is set next to Madrid’s Gran Vía. This elegant hotel offers a seasonal rooftop swimming pool and terrace with fantastic city views. The elegant and stylish rooms offer accommodation with free WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with marble floors. Emperador is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Royal Palace and Puerta del Sol, Madrid’s main square. Santo Domingo, Plaza de España and Callao Metro Stations are within a 3-minute walk, connecting you with the famous Art Triangle in just 15 minutes. Open from May to September, the Emperador offers a seasonal swimming pool and solarium with sun loungers. The cocktail-bar located at the terrace boasts with views of the Royal Palace, Almudena Cathedral and Gran Vía Avenue. The hotel has a lobby bar with a permanent art-gallery offering temporary exhibitions. There is a variety of restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the Emperador. Other useful facilities at the hotel include a hairdressing salon and a 24-hour reception.

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Madrid Prado
description: This boutique hotel is in the heart of the Art Triangle, opposite the Prado Museum and 500 metres from Atocha high-speed Train Station. There is free Wi-Fi. All rooms at this design hotel have a flat-screen TV and Nespresso coffee machine. They are designed by famous interior decorators Sandra Tarruella and Isabel López. Rooms at the Radisson Blu Madrid Prado are fully air conditioned and soundproofed. The en suite bathrooms all include slippers and a bathrobe. The restaurant is a typical Spanish food & Tapas restaurant, it is located on a little public square at the entrance of the hotel not in a patio. The hotel has a superb location just minutes from the Thyssen and Reina Sofia galleries. It is by the Caixa Forum cultural centre.

name: NH Collection Madrid Colón
description: NH Collection Madrid Colón, formerly known as NH Madrid Sanvy, is situated in Salamanca, one of Madrid’s exclusive neighborhoods. Nearby, you can shop at luxury brands: Gucci, Rolex, Loewe and Armani. If you wish to taste Spain’s gastronomy, head to the Platea gourmet food hall, managed by the city’s Michelin-starred chefs. Madrid’s museums and Retiro Park are close by and Recoletos station is reachable on foot providing links to the rest of the city. NH Collection Madrid Colón has quiet and spacious rooms equipped with free Wi-Fi. Some have a beautiful view of Plaza Colón and every room has a pillow menu. Our Guest Relations team can organize tickets and reservations during your stay. If you prefer to relax at the hotel, sunbathe on the 4th floor terrace, take a dip in the open-air pool and unwind with a drink at the poolside bar. NH Collection Madrid Colón offers an excellent daily breakfast. For lunch and dinner choose between our restaurant or bar – the Bar Colón or Sushi Bar 99 which offers fine Japanese cuisine. Accompany your meal with the perfect wine from our cellar or opt for a delightful cocktail. There are a gym and meeting rooms on-site.NH Hoteles

name: NH Madrid Lagasca
description: NH Madrid Lagasca hotel is set in the Salamanca district of Madrid, right by the golden mile of luxury shops and designer boutiques. Enjoy a stroll through the Retiro Park and a walk around its famous pond. A longer walk will get you to Plaza Cibeles and Puerta de Alcalá. Business travelers have easy access to the IFEMA Exhibition Complex, which is only 10km away. For quick links to the rest of the city, hop on the metro at the Serrano or Recoletos stations. NH Madrid Lagasca features 100 relaxing rooms with hardwood floors. Each comes with free Wi-Fi, which is also available throughout the hotel. The Superior rooms come with Nespresso machines and mini-bars, and three have spectacular views of Madrid’s skyline from their private terraces. Let our breakfast be the highlight of your day; offering up a healthy selection of cold cuts, cheeses, fresh pastries and other delights, it can be enjoyed with fresh fruit juice, fragrant coffee or a hot cup of tea. The bar serves drinks and snacks, which you can enjoy while watching a game on the TV or just relaxing on one of the cozy sofas. Simple dishes can be ordered through our room service, and the TAGOMAGO restaurant serves lunch and dinner daily.NH Hoteles

name: Agumar Hotel
description: Conveniently situated opposite central Madrid's Atocha Station, Hotel Agumar is under 10 minutes’ walk from the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofía Museums. It offers simple, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. A breakfast buffet is served in the Piano Room at Agumar, including fresh fruit and hot dishes. Las Arenas restaurant offers Mediterranean cuisine and light meals are available at the cafeteria throughout the day. The rooms feature a marble bathroom equipped with a bathrobe and hairdryer. They also come with a safe and a selection of pillows. Atocha Train Station is 300 metres away, with a high-speed AVE service and links to Barajas Airport. Madrid’s beautiful Retiro Park is also close to the Agumar Hotel.

name: NH Collection Madrid Suecia
description: The NH Collection Madrid Suecia hotel, formerly known as NH Madrid Suecia, is in the heart of the city’s historic center. Steps away from the shopping of Callao, and Calle Fuencarral, it's a chic hotel ideal for exploring the nearby museums as well as downtown Madrid. Completely refurbished in 2016, our 123 rooms are bright and airy with unique artwork and ambience. Our deluxe rooms offer panoramic views and connecting rooms are also available. Start the day with a buffet breakfast and try local delicacies as well as mediterranean dishes throughout the day in the multiple dining spaces spread out over various floors decorated by Lázaro Rosa Violán. Explore the coty's hidden gems with the help of the hotel's Guest Relations team, and keep in shape in the fitness center. For those travelling on business, there are also 3 multi-functional spaces available for up to 154 people and Wi-Fi is free throughout.NH Hoteles

name: Avani Alonso Martínez Madrid Hotel
description: The recently renovated Avani Alonso Martínez Madrid Hotel, formerly known as NH Madrid Alonso Martínez, hotel is set within a historical building dating back to 1919. The hotel is in a central location, close to shops, tapas bars, and the city’s top restaurants. Within minutes, guests will find the architectural gems of Plaza de Alonso Martínez, as well as Fuencarral Street and the Salamanca neighborhood. A few steps further are the Prado, Reina Sofía and Thyssen museums, as well as the famous Paseo del Prado. For connections to the rest of the city, hop on the metro at the Alonso Martínez Station. The 101 rooms at Avani Alonso Martínez Madrid Hotel are decorated in contemporary whites, greys, and dark blues. Each comes with a TV and free Wi-Fi for connectivity, as well as thick mattresses and a choice of pillows for comfort. Breakfast is a truly delicious affair, which includes a variety of sweet and savory dishes buffet-style, with features such as traditional churros with hot chocolate. For lunch and dinner, head to one of the many surrounding restaurants and tapas bars. Enjoy complimentary freshly brewed coffee throughout the day while you sit back with a newspaper in our lounge area or work out in our compact gym. For meetings, there are 3 compact function rooms.NH Hoteles

name: Ilunion Atrium
description: Ilunion Atrium is 10 minutes’ drive from Barajas Airport and the IFEMA Convention Centre. It offers a seasonal outdoor pool, gym and free WiFi zone. Air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, a pillow menu and minibar. Located within the Arturo Soria District, the modern and stylish Atrium Hotel is built around an impressive glass atrium. Madrid city centre is 15 minutes away by bus, and there is a stop 50 metres from the hotel. This cosy rooms have a safe and a work desk. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. Some rooms come with a terrace, bathrobe and slippers. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. Seasonal cuisine is offered in the hotel’s modern restaurant, which has a summer terrace. There is a café-bar and room service is available. You can hire a car from the 24-hour reception and tour desk. On-site parking can be reserved for an extra charge. The hotel is beside the M30 Motorway, has easy access to the Paseo de la Castellana Avenue.

name: Ac Hotel Atocha By Marriott
description: AC Hotel Atocha is a modern design hotel situated in the heart of Madrid, only 200m away from the train station Puerta de Atocha. The hotel is located very close to Paseo del Prado and to three of the most emblematic museums: Thyssen, Prado, Reina Sofia. The hotels centric location also offers easy access to other points of interest in Madrid, such as Puerta del Sol or Plaza Mayor. The hotel garden features beautiful Pine trees, hundred-year-old Olive trees, and Rosemary and Lavender bushes, in addition to a variety of other plants used in classic Mediterranean cuisine. AC Hotel Atocha has 161 rooms, all equipped with a spacious and transparent shower-cabin, a 37’’ TV, an electronic Safe and air conditioned amongst other services. The hotel also has meeting rooms available for all kind of events, a private exterior terrace, a very practical Fitness Room, and their own parking. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Eurostars Casa de la Lírica
description: The Eurostars Casa de la Lírica is 300 metres from the Puerta del Sol in central Madrid. Its lobby has a beautiful glass roof, and it offers rooms with shower. The air-conditioned rooms at the Casa de la Lírica are elegant and comfortable. They are equipped with a TV and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. Eurostars Casa de la Lírica is 10 minutes’ walk from Paseo del Prado, home to the Thyssen, Prado and Reina Sofía Museums. The hotel is well connected to the rest of Madrid, with 3 metro stations within 300 metres. Due to the Sustainable Mobility Ordinance in the city of Madrid, there are currently traffic restrictions in the area where the hotel is located. It is mandatory that the vehicles have the environmental label since, failing that, they can be penalized with a fine. Please consult the "Madrid 360" strategic plan page for the conditions that apply to each device.

name: Vp Plaza España Design
description: Located in Gran Via, in Madrid city centre, VP Plaza España Design offers 5-star accommodation with parking, a wellness centre. All rooms in this stylish hotel offer an exclusive décor and are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, free WiFi, and a desk with a coffee machine, and a private bathroom with shower and bath tub, including free high-end toiletries and bathrobe. Some rooms include a terrace. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast, or have a meal at Botania, the Mediterranean restaurant located on-site. Guests can also relax after work at the Ginkgo Sky Bar, enjoying the stunning view of Madrid City. VP Plaza España Design offers 1400 square metres of meeting and conference-rooms, as well as green areas and parking. Shops, bars, and public transport can be found within 2-minute walking distance. Metro station Plaza de España is 1-minute walk away, while the Royal Palace or the Almudena Cathedral are 700 metres away from the property. Train Station Principe Pío is 700 metres from the VP Plaza España, while Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 14 km away. Biloba Spa of the hotel: SPA access is reserved for adults and children 13 years old and above. Children must be accompanied by and adult. The cost per entry is 10 EUR, with exceptions for Junior Suite and Presidential Suite guests. Seasonal Pool is temporarily closed.

name: NH Collection Madrid Paseo del Prado
description: NH Collection Madrid Paseo del Prado is situated in the heart of Madrid’s art triangle, across the street from the Prado, Reina Sofía and Thyssen museums. Shop at the nearby designer boutiques and exclusive cafés in the Salamanca district and Calle Serrano or stroll through Retiro Park. For links to the rest of the city and the airport, Banco de España and Atocha stations are minutes away. NH Collection Madrid Paseo del Prado is set in a historic Neo-Baroque palace with some of the rooms overlooking the famous Neptuno fountain. Designed in relaxed, neutral colors, rooms are enriched with handmade carpets from the Real Fábrica de Tapices and beautiful paintings adorn the walls. For modern comforts, guests enjoy free Wi-Fi, as well as tea and coffee making facilities. Connecting rooms are available. A fresh breakfast buffet is served daily and offers a delicious variety of hot and cold dishes. In the afternoon and evening, delight in tapas creations by Paco Roncero, a Michelin-starred chef. The Estado Puro tapas bar offers a wide selection of wines and al fresco seating. Our tea room offers a unique Suite & Tea service with a surprising collection of teas and sweet as well as savory snacks. To invigorate your body, make use of our rooftop gym and enjoy spectacular views of Madrid during your workout.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Montera Madrid, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: No description found

name: VP Jardín de Recoletos
description: Located 200 metres from Madrid’s Recoletos Station, VP Jardín de Recoletos is a 5-minute walk from Retiro Park. It offers free Wi-Fi and spacious rooms with a kitchenette, seating area and terrace. The VP Jardín de Recoletos hotel has an amazing restaurant called Ginkgo Garden. Its menu is based on Spanish and Asian cuisine with international touches. In addition, in Ginkgo Garden you can discover one of the most outstanding secret terraces in the Barrio de Salamanca. Each bright, air-conditioned room at Hotel VP Jardín de Recoletos offers a safe and a private bathroom. Kitchenettes include a microwave, fridge and ceramic hob. Guests can enjoy the breakfast served every morning. Set next to the National Library in Madrid’s elegant Salamanca district, the hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Prado and Thyssen-Bornemisza Museums. Shops and bars can be found within walking distance. Retiro and Colon Metro Stations are both within 400 metres. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 12 km from the accommodation.

name: Nyx Hotel Madrid By Leonardo Hotels
description: Situated a 10-minute walk from Real Madrid’s Bernabeu Stadium, NYX Hotel Madrid by Leonardo Hotels offers functional, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. Trains to Madrid Airport stop 500 metres away at Nuevos Ministerios Station. The hotel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi throughout, and 100% cover for 3G mobile phones. Each room at the NYX Hotel Madrid by Leonardo Hotels has a stylish décor and a work desk. All rooms include a safe, minibar and trouser press, while bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The hotel has a bar, and serves a daily buffet breakfast. You can also find various restaurants in the Moda and Orense Shopping Centres, both 10 minutes’ walk away. NYX Hotel Madrid by Leonardo Hotels is only 450 metres from Alvarado Metro Station, which offers direct connections to the historic centre of Madrid. Madrid Complutense University and San Pablo University are within 2.5 km.

name: Leonardo Hotel Madrid City Center
description: Leonardo Hotel Madrid City Center enjoys a quiet setting in the Chamberi area of Madrid, 200 metres from San Bernardo Metro Station. The modern, comfortable rooms have air conditioning and plasma-screen satellite TVs. All rooms have wooden floors and plenty of natural light. Some offer views onto Alberto Aguilera Avenue. Free WiFi is available. Leonardo Hotel Madrid City Center's elegant lounge-bar serves a varied, high-quality breakfast. From San Bernardo Metro Station it is just 4 stops to Puerta del Sol in Madrid’s centre. Alternatively, you can reach Gran Via on foot in less than 15 minutes. The surrounding area offers a wide range of tapas bars, department stores and shops. Onsite parking is available on request.

name: Catalonia Goya
description: Catalonia Goya is set in a 19th-century building, next to Velázquez Metro Station, in Madrid’s exclusive shopping district. It offers free Wi-Fi, and is 5 minutes’ walk from Retiro Park. The soundproofed rooms have air conditioning and feature wooden floors and elegant dark furniture. All rooms feature double-glazed Climalit windows. Each has flat-screen satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast app, and there is a minibar and safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel features a café-bar, which is open until 23:00. There is a 24-hour front desk and room service until 23:00h. Guests can enjoy a small fitness center and the new plunge pool in the patio next to the bar. It is open during summer months. We can arrange airport shuttle service with companies external to Catalonia Hotels (external service), available for a supplement. Public parking can be found near the hotel, at an extra cost. The Wizink Center is 5 minutes' walk from the property.

name: Hotel Maydrit Airport
description: Set 200 metres from Madrid’s El Capricho Metro Station, Hotel Maydrit Airport offers a free transfer service to Barajas Airport. Air-conditioned rooms have a flat-screen TV, free Wi-Fi and minibar. The Maydrit’s à la carte restaurant serves creative international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy snacks and tapas in the café-bar. The Hotel Maydrit Airport is 500 metres from Madrid’s Juan Carlos I Park. Madrid city centre is less than 30 minutes away by Metro, and there is good access to the A2 and M40 Motorways.

name: NH Madrid Balboa
address: Calle De Nunez De Balboa, 112, 28006 Madrid
description: Set in the exclusive Salamanca district, the 4 star NH Madrid Balboa hotel gives guests premium access to designer shops and fine restaurants. The Paseo de la Castellana district is only steps away, as is the National Auditorium of Music, where you can hear world-class concerts. Take a stroll through the Retiro Park, which is less than 2km away, or hop on the metro at Avenida America and Nuñez de Balboa stations and visit the rest of Madrid’s attractions. The 111 rooms at NH Madrid Balboa are light and airy and feature hardwood floors. 13 of the rooms come with a private terrace with views over Madrid. A fresh breakfast buffet is served daily and offers a variety of sweet and savory dishes, including made-to-order eggs on weekdays and churros with chocolate - a local favorite. You can also catch up on the latest news by reading the newspapers on one of the comfy sofas. On Sundays, sleep in and enjoy breakfast until noon and the complimentary late check-out. The hotel has a gym for fitness fanatics, outdoor parking, and free Wi-Fi, as well as a restaurant, Saona, offering delicious dishes with a creative touch.NH Hoteles

name: H10 Puerta de Alcalá
description: Situated amongst well-known tourist attractions, shops and eateries, H10 Puerta de Alcala is ideal for guests wishing to discover Madrid and its surroundings. It also offers a coffee bar, 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. The hotel has a gym with a swimming pool. For trendy travellers a cocktail bar provides a happy setting for an after-meal drink. H10 Puerta de Alcala features 138 air conditioned rooms. A mini bar, an in-room safe and a private bathroom are also provided. H10 Puerta de Alcala houses La Galeria, which serves breakfast and presents guests with everything they need for an enjoyable night within the hotel. Lunch, afternoon tea and dinner are served daily at Lobby Bar El Mirador. Madrid's attractions, such as the National Archaeological Museum of Spain, the Monument to Alfonso XII and the Puerta de Alcala, are easily accessible on foot from H10 Puerta de Alcala. Principe de Vergara Metro Station is only a two-minute stroll, linking guests with the rest of the city.Revato

name: Hotel Avenida Gran Via
description: The modern Hotel Avenida Gran Vía is just off Madrid's Gran Vía, 100 metres from Callao Metro Station, air-conditioned, rooms with free Wi-Fi. All of the rooms in the Hotel Avenida Gran Vía have a flat-screen TV, while the modern bathrooms have hydromassage showers. Breakfast can be enjoyed in the hotel’s restaurant. The hotel is surrounded by a wide range of shops, theatres and restaurants. Puerta del Sol Square is just 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Zenit Abeba
description: Hotel Zenit Abeba is located in Madrid’s prestigious Salamanca district, 300 metres from Diego León Metro Station. It offers a gym and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. The modern rooms at the Abeba feature parquet floors and modern décor. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The hotel’s restaurant Nadir offers a variety of Spanish and international food, including gluten-free and low-calorie dishes. There is also a lounge-bar with sofas, and guests can try the hotel's menu of chocolates and herbal teas. The Zenit Abeba offers on-site parking, and staff at the 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. There are also conference rooms available for business events. The Salamanca area is popular for shopping. Zenit Alba is just a 10-minute walk from the streets of Calle Serrano, Velázquez, Ortega y Gasse, which feature many national and international companies. Retiro Park and the Las Ventas Bullring are within 20 minutes’ walk.

name: Intur Palacio San Martin
description: Situated in the city centre, Intur Palacio San Martin offers easy access to Madrid's main retail and sightseeing areas. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a range of facilities on offer to guests of Intur Palacio, including a coffee bar, a sauna and an executive floor. Corporate amenities include meeting rooms. Those staying at Intur Palacio San Martin Hotel Madrid can enjoy the stylish rooms that offer a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. All provide an alarm clock, blackout curtains and a desk. Guests are able to relax with a drink at Intur Palacio San Martin's bar and dine on international style food in the restaurant. For those preferring to dine out, the local area offers several bars and restaurants serving a choice of varied cuisines. Located in Madrid City Centre, Intur Palacio is surrounded by popular bars and establishments. It is also not far from Royal Palace of Madrid, Plaza de Oriente and Gran Via.Revato

name: Thompson Madrid
description: With a stay at Thompson Madrid, you'll be centrally located in Madrid, within a 5-minute walk of Puerta del Sol and Gran Via Street. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).Hotels.com

name: Ac Hotel Carlton Madrid By Marriott
description: AC Hotel Carlton Madrid is located in the heart of Madrid, near the Retiro Park, the Botanic Gardens, and the Atocha train and metro station. It is also just a stone's throw away from the most popular shops and business areas in the city. This 122-bedroom urban hotel features a Wi-Fi Internet connection throughout all communal areas and a bar where you will find a tempting menu of salads and sandwiches throughout the day. It is minutes away from the Prado, Reina Sofia, and Thyssen-Bornemisza art galleries as well as the Casa Encendida and Caixa Forum cultural centres, ensuring that our guests are within arm's reach of some of the most famous art galleries in Spain. The AC Hotel Carlton Madrid is perfectly located to allow easy access to the historical city centre, Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol, and other essential Madrid landmarks.Marriott

name: One Shot Luchana 22
description: Located 5 minutes away by metro from the famous Puerta del Sol in Madrid, One Shot Luchana 22 features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Bilbao Metro Station is 30 metres away. Most rooms feature a private balcony with views of the city. They have modern décor and parquet floors throughout, and include a flat-screen TV, work desk, and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. One shot Luchana 22 offers a breakfast a la carte, and also has an on-site bar. There is a 24-hour reception, and staff can provide you with tourist information about the area. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and bars within a 5-minute walk of One Shot Luchana 22. The famous Plaza España is 2 stops away by metro, and Madrid Royal Palace is 4 stops away. A 7-minute taxi ride will take you to the Prado Museum, next to Retiro Park. Atocha Train Station is 3.5 km from the property, and Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 12 minutes´ drive away.

name: Petit Palace Plaza del Carmen
description: Located just 350 metres from Puerta del Sol in Madrid's centre, this boutique hotel offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and free bicycle use. All rooms at the Petit Palace Plaza del Carmen have a hydromassage shower and 23-inch flat-screen TV. They come with air conditioning and a free laptop-sized safe. Guests can rent bikes for free at Petit Palace Plaza del Carmen. They also enjoy discounts at the nearby public car park. Reception also offers tickets for the Warner Bros Theme Park and the Prado, Reina Sofia and Thyssen Museums. Free coffee is available at reception from 12:00 until 23:30. Petit Palace Plaza del Carmen is situated a 3-minute walk from Gran Via Casino, and Teatro Principal Gran Via is only 50 metres away.

name: One Shot Recoletos 04
description: Located in Madrid's upscale Salamanca district, only 200 metres from Parque del Retiro Park and Cibeles Square, One Shot Recoletos 04 offers stylish rooms with 46" flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi and spacious rain-effect showers. Rooms at this hotel also include air conditioning, heating, telephone, safety deposit box, a desk and a private bathroom with a hairdryer, free toiletries, bath or rain-effect showers. One Shot Recoletos 04 is just 100 metres from the pedestrianised Paseo de Recoletos Boulevard and 200 from Calle de Recoletos Street, where you will find many bars and restaurants. Banco de España Metro Station is a 5-minute walk away and Calle de Serrano, with designer clothes shops is 1 km away.

name: Hotel Indigo Madrid - Gran Via
description: Hotel Indigo® Madrid Gran Via, on the quiet, pretty Calle de Silva, is just steps from the Gran Via, in the heart of the city, cosmopolitan life in Madrid. Our boutique hotel’s design and decor is influenced by the neighborhood’s leading role in Spanish innovation in film and screen as well as architecture and fashion. Each of our stylish guest rooms provides a spa-inspired bathroom experience with a rainfall shower, quality toiletries and complimentary Wi-Fi. With one of the best Sky-gardens of Madrid. Where you can enjoy the hotel's infinity swimming pool and amazing views of the city and the most stunning sunset. Royal palace and the Plaza Mayor are only a stone throw away.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only
description: Set in Madrid city centre, Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only offers accommodation only 15 minutes’ walk away from Chueca, known by its LGBT atmosphere and welcoming entertainment offer, the hotel is hetero-friendly too. Every stylish room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a TV. The rooms include a private bathroom with free toiletries, bathrobes and a hairdryer. Axel Hotel Madrid offers a restaurant where you can enjoy a modern approach to the local food. There is a roof-top terrace with its sky bar and a pool with stunning city view. A Cocktail bar can be found at this property as well. Plaza Mayor is 600 metres from Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only, while Atocha train station is 15 minutes’ walk away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from Axel Hotel Madrid - Adults Only.

name: Only You Boutique Hotel Madrid
description: Only YOU Boutique Hotel Madrid is a 4-star boutique hotel set in a restored palace from the 19th century. It has a modern interior design with Colonial details and uniquely decorated rooms. The lounge area at the Only YOU Boutique Hotel Madrid has a relaxed atmosphere with background music, offering a range of cocktails and gourmet dishes. The set menu changes constantly. Newspapers and WiFi connection are offered for free. A 24-hour room service is available. Guests can find several areas and corners to relax, drink coffee or meet. Soundproofed rooms include a 42-inch Smart TV, iPhone/iPod and MP3 dock, electronic safe and a well-equipped minibar. Bed duvets are made of goose feathers, cotton and silk. Bathrobes, slippers and luxury toiletries can be found in each bathroom. Located in the trendy Chueca area in Madrid, this design hotel is 20 minutes’ drive from Barajas Airport and IFEMA Congress Centre.

name: Eurostars Central
description: Located in Madrid city centre, 250 metres from Tribunal Metro Station, Eurostars Central is a modern hotel with an on-site fitness centre and bar. It offers stylish air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Each room comes with a flat-screen satellite TV and minibar. There is a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Eurostars Central has a 24-hour reception, and staff can give you information on what to see and do in Madrid. You can find a wide variety of fashionable restaurants, bars and shops within a 5-minute walk of the property. The Retiro Park and Puerta del Sol Square are both a 15-minute walk from the hotel, while the Prado Art Museum is 20 minutes away on foot.

name: Ibis Styles Madrid City Las Ventas
description: Our Ibis Styles is located next to the main artery of Madrid; the design of the hotel is modern with a relaxed atmosphere. The rooms are designed for your absolute comfort. It has 96 rooms, fully renovated, free Wi-Fi, 24h reception, summer pool, restaurant, bar and parking. An innovative hotel with easy access to airport, Ifema, conference center and the best museums in Madrid.accorhotels.com

name: 60 Balconies Iconic
description: 60 Balconies Iconic features accommodation within 600 metres of the centre of Madrid, with free WiFi, and a kitchen with a microwave, a fridge and kitchenware. Private parking is available on site. All units are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, washing machine and kettle. There is a private bathroom with shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The apartment offers a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy the rooftop pool at 60 Balconies Iconic. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Gran Via Metro Station, Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum and Gran Via. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 12 km from 60 Balconies Iconic.

name: Novotel Madrid Center
description: Novotel Madrid Center is in Madrid's Salamanca district, close to Metro stops and 219 yards from the bus line to Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas Airport. Just 8 minutes' walk from Retiro Park, this elegant hotel has free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are modern and the conference rooms offer state-of-the-art technology and different adaption and capacity options designed for all kinds of events.accorhotels.com

name: Canopy by Hilton Madrid Castellana
description: We’re in the heart of Azca financial district surrounded by restaurants and shops and just a five-minute walk from Real Madrid Santiago Bernabeu Stadium and Paseo de la Castellana. Experience urban gastronomy at Canopy Central or the vibrant Food Truck on our outdoor terrace. A rooftop pool, fully equipped gym and evening tastings complete your stay.Hilton

name: Vincci Soma
description: The Vincci Soma is situated in central Madrid, next to Goya Metro Station. The hotel features a gym, restaurant and free WiFi access throughout. Rooms at the Soma are spacious and feature contemporary design. Each room has a TV and pillow menu. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast where you can also find gluten-free products. The restaurant Soma offeres Mediterranean and local gastronomy. Other facilities include a 24-hour reception, meeting and conference facilities. The Wizink Centre is located 500 metres from Vincci Soma, located in the Salamanca district of Madrid and 5 minutes’ walk from the beautiful Retiro Park. The Prado Museum and Puerta del Sol can be reached in around 5 minutes by Metro.

name: Artiem Madrid
address: Calle de Juan Perez Zuniga, 20, 28027 Madrid
description: ARTIEM Madrid is located in Madrid’s commercial centre, a 15-minute drive from Barajas Airport. Free WiFi is provided. Rooms are comfortable and spacious. All have air conditioning, satellite TV, and living area with a desk, as well as a private bathroom with a rainshower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Breakfast is served in The Slow Lounge, while a selection of food and drinks is available in the hotel's 24-hour The Green. Bus and Metro stops can be found within walking distance. The nearest Metro stop is Barrio de la Concepción, just 500 metres away. The hotel has easy road access to Barajas Airport and IFEMA events centre is 5 km away from the property. Santiago Bernabeu football stadium is just 3.5 km away. There is parking with direct access to the hotel.

name: Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport
description: Stylish Airport hotel with airport shuttle (has a fee) near the northeast Madrid business parks. Crowne Plaza Madrid Airport hotel is just 10 min ride away from Madrid, Barajas Adolfo Suarez Airport. Flying out? Use our special Park, Stay and Go package. We are 500 mts away from bus routes connecting to Canillejas and Avenida de America metro stations. Direct trains from San Fernando Station, 7 min drive away, takes you to the city centre in 30 min. City centre highlights, like the Museo del Prado, are within easy reach, either by bus, metro or train. Shopping, dining and entertainment at the Plenilunio Shopping Centre is only 10 min ride away. The Santiago Bernabeu Stadium, home of the Real Madrid, it is only 20 min away from us. We offer 7 meeting rooms for up to 220 delegates. Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. Our Crowne Plaza Meetings Director will assist you with anything you need. San Fernando, Las Mercedes and Coslada business parks are less than 10 min drive, and the offices of Iveco and Airbus are close by. The IFEMA Exhibition Centre is 10 minutes away by car. Our elegant and spacious rooms offer comfortable beds, high quality bathrooms and flat-screen TV. Family rooms are also available. Sleep Advantage programme include premium bedding and a quiet zone for your comfort. Wake up to our tasty and assisted breakfast buffet and enjoy our gastronomy in our Restaurant.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: NH Collection Madrid Gran Vía
description: The newly opened NH Collection Madrid Gran Vía is in the heart of one of Madrid's most iconic streets. This city center hotel is in an ideal location for shopping at designer boutiques, as well as exploring Gran Vía's restaurants, coffee shops, book stores and cocktail bars. The hotel is within walking distance of Madrid's central attractions, including La Puerta del Sol, Plaza Mayor, Plaza España, Plaza de Cibeles and the Prado museum. It's also near Gran Vía underground station and around one hour from the airport. The hotel's 94 elegantly decorated rooms each have Nespresso machines and free Wi-Fi. Accommodation includes Superior rooms, Premium rooms and Junior suites. Guests will enjoy a refreshing night's sleep on new mattresses with a choice of pillows. Start the day with our a la carte breakfast, featuring international favorites including breads, pastries, fruit and hot dishes, as well as local specialties like Spanish sausage. One of the highlights of this Madrid city center hotel is the 8th floor roof terrace with spectacular views over Gran Vía, and watched over by the Titan god Atlas. Here you'll find the restaurant, Picalagartos, with a menu of Spanish classics with a twist. Bar service includes snacks and cocktails designed by top bartenders.NH Hoteles

name: Ac Hotel Los Vascos By Marriott
description: The modern, 51 guest room AC Hotel Los Vascos is ideally located near the Ciudad Universitaria in Madrid and the A-6 motorway (A Coruña) with easy access to public transportation (Nuevos Ministerios train station), the city center, and the grounds of the IFEMA exhibition centre. In addition, the AC Lounge is the perfect place to relax, chat with friends or have an informal meeting and taste delicious meals and drinks. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Ocean Drive Madrid
description: Situated in Madrid, 700 metres from Gran Via, Ocean Drive Madrid features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 400 metres from the city centre and less than 1 km from Gran Via Metro Station. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Ocean Drive Madrid rooms include bed linen and towels. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Ocean Drive Madrid include Plaza de España Metro Station, Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum and Temple of Debod. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Hilton Madrid Airport
description: The Hilton Madrid Airport hotel is just minutes from Madrid Barajas International Airport, the IFEMA exhibition center and the vibrant city center. Take advantage of the complimentary shuttle bus service to and from all airport terminals, running daily from 05:30am to 01:00am. This Madrid Airport hotel offers modern hotel accommodation and facilities. Swim in the hydrotherapeutic pool or savor fine dining at Reserva Grill specializing in grilled meats and fish or dine on tapas at Ferrum Bar. Marvel at masterpieces in the Prado museum or soak up in the atmosphere of Madrid's colorful cafes. We´re located in an iconic building designed to be a great hotel, inspired in the four elements of nature coming to life through the hand carved walls, water features, and the wonderful natural light that embraces every space and meeting room in the hotel. Plan your function or event in one of 13 meeting rooms, a stylish boardroom or the elegant Ballroom with space for up to 450 delegates.Hilton

name: Vincci The Mint
description: Featuring a stunning terrace with views of Madrid's most emblematic buildings, Vincci The Mint presents a new kind of accommodation in Madrid. Experience a unique check-in/out process while enjoying a drink, all done at the hotel's reception-bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. Designed by Jaime Beriestain, this fun and original accommodation is set on the famous Gran Via, offering rooms and suites, as well as a wide range of services, including a 24-hour reception. The on-site gastrobar serves special à-la-carte gourmet breakfasts every day from 07:00 to 23:00. The modern and fresh-looking rooms at The Mint feature parquet floors. Combining green and white walls, they include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV, work desk, minibar, and a coffee machine. The bathroom comes with a bath or shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Some rooms also include a seating area where you can relax. Puerta del Sol is 500 metres from Vincci The Mint, while Fnac is 600 metres away. Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 13 km from the property.

name: Hotel Victoria 4
description: This historic hotel is in the heart of Madrid, by the Puerta del Sol. Facilities include free Wi-Fi and a café-bar on the large outdoor terrace. The Hotel Victoria 4 Puerta del Sol dates back to 1850 and offers elegant, renovated interiors. Rooms at Victoria 4 Puerta del Sol are soundproofed, with a free safety deposit box. They all offer a spacious bathroom with a bathtub and hairdryer. The hotel has a traditional restaurant, La Carmela, where guests can enjoy breakfast, lunch or dinner. The restaurant also offers a range of tapas. Sol Metro Station is metres away and offers easy transport around the city. Victoria 4 Puerta del Sol is in a lively area, within walking distance of Gran Vía and the Art Triangle.

name: Vincci Capitol
description: Vincci Capitol is set on Madrid’s Gran Via, a few meters from Callao Metro Station. This stylish hotel features a roof terrace with impressive city views and rooms with flat-screen TVs. The Capitol offers Art Deco-style design, and its soundproofed rooms are spacious and air conditioned. Each has a pillow menu, a minibar and a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available in all areas. A daily breakfast is served, including products for celiacs. The popular Puerta del Sol District with its many bars and restaurants is just 500 metres from the hotel. Plaza Mayor can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot.

name: The Madrid Edition
description: The hotel showcases 200 beautifully appointed guest rooms and suites, some with terraces and five unique food and beverage outlets including a signature restaurant, cocktail bar, Pool Bar and rooftop terrace, together with an outdoor pool, state-of-the-art gym and spa. Flexible studios with over 350 sqm of dedicated space host creative meetings and events for large or small groups. Set in a tranquil square surrounded by historic buildings, The Madrid EDITION is near Puerta del Sol in the heart of the Spanish capital, one of the city’s most famous sites, and within walking distance to The Golden Triangle of Art – three of most important art museums in Madrid. The hotel manifests the people and the culture of the city and is synonymous to a stunning microcosm of one-of-a-kind food, beverage and entertainment offerings, innovative design, and luxury service. The Madrid EDITION is the second EDITION Hotel in Spain, following the successful opening of The Barcelona EDITION in 2018.Marriott

name: The Level At Melia Castilla
address: Calle Del Poeta Joan Maragall, 43, 28020 Madrid
description: Set in a prime location of Madrid, The Level at Melia Castilla puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Facilities like 24-hour check-in are readily available for you to enjoy. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Convenience and comfort make The Level at Melia Castilla the perfect choice for your stay in Madrid.Agoda

name: NH Madrid Nacional
description: When staying at the NH Madrid Nacional hotel, you will be in a privileged location on Paseo del Prado and steps away from Madrid’s Art Triangle. The Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofia museums are right by the hotel. The 1920s building was designed by the famous architect Modesto López Otero and is located across the street from the Atocha train station. This means it provides excellent links to everywhere in the city, including the airport. NH Madrid Nacional has 206 rooms with a choice of classic or contemporary designs. Each features sleek wooden floors and free Wi-Fi. Some of the rooms come with views of the Atocha Plaza or the Botanical Gardens, while Superior rooms have Nespresso machines, among other extras. The Tablafina restaurant serves up light bites and Mediterranean and Spanish dishes, which you can enjoy along with the lovely city view. Breakfast is also served and includes a wide variety of fresh fare including cooked-to-order eggs. A gym is available on-site. For meetings, there are 6 function rooms for up to 150 people, where catering can be arranged. On Sundays, sleep in and enjoy our free late checkout and breakfast served till noon.NH Hoteles

name: NH Madrid Chamberí
address: Calle De Breton De Los Herreros, 29, 28003 Madrid
description: The NH Madrid Chamberí hotel, formerly known as NH Bretón, is in the Chamberí district of Madrid - a charming spot with some of the best gastronomic choices in the city, lovely tapas bars, trendy shops, and a leafy park. Paseo de la Castellana, the city’s financial and business corridor, is only five minutes away on foot, so the location is also perfect for business travelers. For access to Madrid’s city center, hop on the metro at one of the many nearby stops, such as Alonso Cano or Gregorio Marañon, and be there in just 20 minutes. NH Madrid Chamberí has 56 rooms that let in lots of natural light and feature a classic decor with sleek hardwood floors. Each room comes equipped with free Wi-Fi. An extensive breakfast buffet is served each morning in our cozy breakfast room. The varied spread features classic continental breakfast choices alongside local favorites such as churros with hot chocolate and Spanish omelets. While we don’t have an on-site restaurant, guests will find a delightful variety of dining options just steps away from the hotel.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Fenix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World
description: The Hotel Fénix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World is a luxurious hotel located next to Plaza de Colón, in the Salamanca district of Madrid. It features elegant rooms and free Wi-Fi. The spacious bedrooms at the Hotel Fénix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World feature classic English-style décor. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, iPod station, pillow menu, bathrobes and slippers. Facilities at the Hotel Fénix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World include the Aduana Restaurant and Fenix Cocktail Bar. In summer, dinner can be served on the terrace in Plaza Colón. The Hotel Fénix Gran Meliá - The Leading Hotels of the World has a fitness centre and also offers services including a butler and secretary services. The Gran Meliá Fénix - The Leading Hotels of the World is less than 300 metres from Colón Metro station, and is next to Madrid’s Hard Rock Café. The city centre, Gran Via and the Prado and Reina Sofia Museums are within 20 minutes' walk from the hotel. Santiago Bernabeu football stadium is 35 minutes' walk away.

name: The Westin Palace, Madrid
description: Commissioned by King Alfonso XIII in 1912, the iconic hotel The Westin Palace, Madrid is located in the renowned Art Walk, included in the UNESCO World Heritage List as Paisaje de la Luz” (The Landscape of Light). This area links the city’s most enriching museums, El Prado, Reina Sofía, and Thyssen-Bornemisza, and owns the most important monuments and some of the best tapas restaurants in town. Topped by a breathtaking stained-glass cupola, La Rotonda Restaurant offers delicious locally sourced market cuisine and serves meals for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Lovers of high quality cocktails will be surpassed with the delicious creations at the 1912 Museo Bar. The 470 guest rooms and suites are fully equipped to meet the needs of today’s travelers including the plush Heavenly® Beds and the refreshing Heavenly® Bath.Marriott

name: Ac Hotel Coslada Aeropuerto By Marriott
address: Camino De Las Rejas, 5, Coslada, 28022 Coslada, Madrid
description: AC Hotel Coslada Aeropuerto is a modern hotel in Coslada located in the most important commercial and industrial area in the city. It is easily accessible from the A-2 highway, which also provides guests with a quick way to the Corredor del Henares business area, Barajas Airport, IFEMA exhibition center, Alcalá de Henares (a city classified as a world heritage site), and the center of Madrid. The Hotel offers a free Airport Shuttle service running from 7:00 am to 23.00 pm, Monday to Sunday, at approximately 30-minute intervals that can be changed by external reasons. Limited seats Under Availability. See Shuttle schedule for more info. Available on request. This hotel also features a fitness room and Turkish bath. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Eurostars Plaza Mayor
description: Within 150 metres of Tirso de Molina Metro Station, Eurostars Plaza Mayor offers a central location, 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Mayor. This stylish hotel offers free WiFi and a 7th-floor breakfast room with panoramic city views. The spacious, modern rooms at Eurostars Plaza Mayor feature contemporary décor with parquet floors, and finishes including exposed stonework and ceramic mosaic tiles. All rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel is housed in restored buildings which were part of the former Frontón Madrid Sports Arena, which dates from the 1930s. Puerta del Sol and its bars, cafés and clubs, can be reached in 5 minutes by foot. The Art Triangle and Paseo del Prado can be reached in 15 minutes by foot. Atocha Railway Station and the AVE High-Speed Railway are 2 stops away. You can reach Barajas Airport in an hour by Metro.

name: Hotel Cortezo
description: Situated 300 metres from Madrid’s Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor Square, Hotel Cortezo has a rooftop terrace overlooking the city. This chic hotel offers a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at Hotel Cortezo have simple, elegant décor, with hardwood floors. All rooms include air conditioning and flat-screen TVs. The Hotel Cortezo serves a varied American-style buffet breakfast including a gluten-free corner, and there is an on-site café and bar. There are also many typical tapas bars within a 5-minute walk, in the popular Plaza Santa Ana Square and La Latina district. The museums of Madrid’s Art Triangle are all less than 15 minutes’ walk from Hotel Cortezo. Atocha AVE Train Station is 15 minutes' walk from the hotel, and Tirso de Molina Metro Station is just 100 metres away.

name: NH Madrid Paseo de la Habana
description: The NH Madrid Paseo de la Habana hotel is set in a quiet area that provides easy access to Madrid’s business and leisure attractions. The Paseo de la Castellana business district is just steps away, while the famous Santiago Bernabéu Stadium is also close-by. To shop for Spain’s best brands head to the Moda Shopping mall and El Corte Inglés store near the hotel. Getting to the center of the city is easy from Colombia metro station. The rooms at NH Madrid Paseo de la Habana have been designed with your comfort in mind, with neutral color schemes, comfy mattresses, and pillow menus. You will also feel at home with a flat screen TV and free Wi-Fi. For a little more luxury, stay in one of our Superior rooms and enjoy freshly brewed coffee from the Nespresso machines. Breakfast will be the highlight of your morning, with the varied spread of excellent fresh products and local favorites like churros with hot chocolate. The NH Madrid Paseo de la Habana Restaurant serves up delectable Mediterranean dishes and tapas, using only the freshest local ingredients. In the afternoons, you can catch up on some sports at our lobby El Malecon Bar, while sipping local wine.NH Hoteles

name: Travelodge Madrid Coslada Aeropuerto
description: The Travelodge Madrid Coslada Aeropuerto hotel is located less than 5 minutes’ walk from the centre of Coslada and 15 minutes by commuter train or metro from the centre of Madrid. It is also well located for access to the airport and the IFEMA trade fair grounds, as well as directly connected to the Civitas Metropolitano Stadium. In the vicinity of the hotel there are numerous bars and restaurants with varied national and international food. Easy access to the centre of Coslada and Madrid and excellent connections to the airport, IFEMA, the Plenilunio shopping centre and the Civitas Metropolitano Stadium. Our 78 rooms are decorated in warm tones and feature wooden floors, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, heating and a desk. The hotel has private parking for a daily fee. There is also free WiFi available in the rooms if you book on our website or for an extra fee if you book externally. WiFi is always offered free of charge in the common areas. The hotel has a 24-hour coffee shop and serves a full breakfast buffet. There are vending machines for drinks and snacks, and a number of bars and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Next to the hotel there is a bus stop that connects to the Metropolitan Stadium and the Airport. The hotel has two superior rooms on the top floor that have their own terrace with panoramic views.

name: 7 Islas Hotel
description: Set in the centre of Madrid, 7 Islas Hotel is situated near Gran Via Metro Station, and just a few steps from local bars and eateries. Guests can also enjoy complimentary internet access. This unique hotel provides a coffee bar, meeting rooms and 24-hour room service. Staff are available 24/7 and can help with booking tours and tickets. After a day of discovering the area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. 7 Islas Hotel has a conveniently located café where guests can unwind with a drink after exploring the local area. 7 Islas Hotel is close to Sol Metro Station, making it easy for guests to travel around Madrid and its surrounding areas. The local neighbourhood is also well known for its shops and boutiques.Revato

name: Melia Madrid Princesa
description: With views of the Royal Palace, Meliá Princesa is a hotel located in Madrid, 8 minutes’ walk from Plaza España and Gran Via. It offers a gym. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Free access to heated indoor pool for guests. The elegant rooms at the Meliá Madrid Princesa include a safe and a flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The upper floors of the hotel are dedicated to The Level exclusive rooms, with panoramic views over the city or the mountains as well as specific superior services and facilities such as a wellness area. Guests can enjoy elegant and spacious rooms with pillow menu, private check-in and check-out space, Nespresso space with biodegradable coffee capsules, concierge service, a private area with drinks and snacks, private show cooking, and press in the lounge, among others. Mosaico à la carte restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine using traditional cooking recipes and seasonal products. Guests can also enjoy a hearty buffet breakfast. Complimentary coffee is offered in the early morning from 05:00 to 07:00. There is also a bar integrated in the reception and a 24-hour room service. Oeste Park and the beautiful Debod Temple are 7 minutes’ walk from the Meliá Princesa. Ventura Rodríguez Metro Station, located next to the hotel, provides links to the centre of town in around 10 minutes.

name: Petit Palace Tres Cruces
description: Petit Palace Tres Cruces is a boutique hotel less than 50 metres from Madrid’s Gran Vía. The elegant rooms include free Wi-Fi, a hydromassage shower and flat-screen TV. All of the rooms at this Petit Palace are air conditioned and feature a minibar. Offer Breakfast buffet. The Tres Cruces’s 24-hour reception can arrange museum tickets for you, as well as bicycle rental. Petit Palace Tres Cruces is only 300 metres from the Puerta del Sol. Gran Vía Metro Station is around 150 metres away. The Art Triangle, the Royal Palace and the Puerta de Alcalá are all a short walk away.

name: Hotel Gran Legazpi
description: Practically located around Calle 30, one of Madrid's fastest-growing areas, the Hotel Gran Legazpi is a budget hotel with great services. Free WiFi is available. Hotel Gran Legazpi's rooms are bright and functional, with full air conditioning and a television, ensuring a comfortable base from which to explore Spain's capital city. Take it easy in the hotel's elegant interior, with fine marble floors and Guinean wood furniture, which boasts a number of paintings by well-known artist Angel Urangas.

name: Hotel Claridge Madrid
description: Centrally located in Madrid’s Conde Casal Square, the elegant hotel Claridge is next to Conde de Casal Metro Station and 10 minutes’ walk from Retiro Park. It offers 24-hour reception, a spacious free gym and free Wi-Fi. Air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV. There is a safe, minibar and desk. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Suites offer excellent views over Madrid, a living room and hydromassage bath. The hotel’s café offers regional specialities based on market cuisine. The restaurant serves Spanish dishes. A snack bar and room service is available. You can hire a car and the concierge desk offers a ticket service. Bike rentals and an airport shuttle service are also available for an extra charge.

name: Hotel Santo Domingo
description: Unique hotel in the heart of Madrid, located in San Bernardo Street, between Gran Va and Callao square. Excellent location, with 200 rooms. Amongst the charms of the Hotel, we highlight the Themed Rooms, the distinctive Lobby, crowned by our porcelain and gold leaf vault, or the Parking, decorated with evocative scenes. We also count with more than 1200m of meeting rooms with natural light, and an outdoor swimming-pool on the roof-terrace, from where the guests can enjoy Madrids best views.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Acta Madfor
description: Offering smart rooms with great views of Casa de Campo Park and Madrid’s Royal Palace, Hotel Acta Madfor is set on Paseo de la Florida, just a few metres from Príncipe Pío Metro Station. It features a 24-hour front desk and a terrace. Each stylish, air-conditioned room at Hotel Acta Madfor has contemporary décor with dark brown finishes. There is free Wi-Fi, a safe and a flat-screen TV. The slate-tiled bathroom includes free toiletries. Hotel Acta Madfor offers a lounge area with snacks and breakfast. Restaurants, bars and cafés can be found along Paseo de la Florida. The lively La Latina and Puerta del Sol districts can be reached in less than 10 minutes by Metro. Gran Vía Avenue with its many theatres and shops is within 15 minutes’ walk of the Acta Madfor. El Retiro Park, the Museum Triangle and Atocha Railway Station can be reached in around 20 minutes by Metro.

name: Boutike Cibeles
description: Located just 200 metres from Retiro Park and Banco de España Metro Station, Boutike Cibeles offers stylish accommodation with free Wi-Fi. Each air-conditioned apartment and suite comes with free toiletries. Boutike Cibeles features contemporary décor with wooden floors. All apartments and suites come with a spacious seating area with satellite TV. The separate kitchens are equipped with a microwave, fridge, electric hob and oven. Featuring a shared terrace with city views, the property serves a buffet breakfast every day. There is also a 24-hour reception. The famous Prado, Reina Sofia and Thyssen-Bornemisza Museums are within 1 km of Boutike Cibeles. The popular Puerta del Sol Square has a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk of the apartments.

name: Umusic Hotel Madrid
description: Check in Time: 15:00 Check out Time: 12:00 UMusic Hotel Madrid is UMusic Hotels' first property in Europe, located in the heart of the Spanish capital, on Calle de La Paz, in the central neighborhood of Sol, with additional access from Calle Carretas, just steps away from the city's main cultural, historical, and culinary attractions, and 30 minutes from the Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas airport. The 5-star hotel features 130 guestrooms and suites and is located within a complex alongside the historic Albéniz Theater, perfectly situated to provide unique and immersive musical and entertainment experiences, as well as a lounge to host concerts, shows, and orporate events. This hotel manifests the city's beautiful culture and people, captured in its tunning design, combining historic architecture with modern touches, along with one-of-a-kind restaurants and bars. Built in the 1940s and with a façade of colonial architecture,the hotel is located in the Albéniz Theater, a historical building with a heritage of immense architectural and cultural value. Its exceptional location in the center of the capital and its historic character, make this new hotel a unique platform in the international entertainment and hospitality scene.The new UMusic Hotel Madrid is located in the heart of the Spanish capital, at La Paz street, 11, 28012, in the central neighborhood of Sol, with additional access from Carretas street and within walking distance of the city's main cultural, historical and gastronomic attractions. It is 30 minutes from the Adolfo Suárez Madrid-Barajas airport, located 18 km from the city center. Built in the 1940s with a facade of colonial architecture, the hotel is located in the former Albéniz Theater, a historic building with a heritage of enormous architectural and cultural value. Its exceptional location in the center of the capital and its historic character make this new hotel a unique platform in the international hospitality and entertainment scene.Ticket Package

name: Holiday Inn Express Madrid Airport, An IHG Hotel
description: Make travel easy with a comfortable stay at our hotel near Barajas Airport Holiday Inn Express Madrid - Airport hotel is only 5 - minutes away from the airport terminals at Madrid Barajas Adolfo Suarez International (MAD) Airport. Direct access to the motorways A2 Barcelona and M21 makes it the ideal start base for wherever you go. Madrid city is only 15 min drive away. Perfect hotel for busi-ness trips also, IFEMA Exhibition Centre is only 10 min drive away. Besides, one of the most important sports facilities in Madrid, the Metropolitano Stadium is just 8 min away by car. No car? No problem, 20 minutes bus ride on the local bus service will whisk you directly into Madrid - Avenida de America. The stop is only 200 metres away from the hotel. Hard day? Relax yourself in our outdoor swimming pool or have a drink in our terrace - bar while you see planes taking off. If mantaining your fitness routine while traveling is a must, work out in our fitness center. Whether you’re staying for business or sightseeing with family, the best way to start your day is with the Express Start Breakfast, included in the room rate. Rest assured that you will sleep well in our comfortable beds with pillow menu, have a refreshing shower or take a complimentary tea in our in-room tea&coffee-making facilities.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Globales Acis & Galatea
description: Conveniently situated, this cosmopolitan hotel is just 5 minutes from the Ifema exhibition and events centre and 10 minutes drive from the airport and the city centre. Free Wi-Fi is available. Wanda Metropolitano Stadium is 4.5 Km from the property. This unique, boutique hotel is situated in a quiet, residential area and has chic design. Its careful interior design has taken its inspiration from mythology and the Acis and Galatea opera. You will find the metro station Canillejas a 5-minute walk away, which links directly with the main tourist hub of the city. In addition, the hotel is within close proximity to an 18-hole golf course and both the El Capricho and Juan Carlos I parks.

name: One Shot Prado 23
description: Centrally located, One Shot Prado 23 offers design-rooms with TV, and free Wi-Fi. Just 150 metres from Plaza Santa Ana Square, the hotel is a 7-minute walk from Puerta del Sol. Fitted with wooden flooring, each soundproof room boasts modern, functional décor. The mirror TV has a HDMI connection. The bathroom has a large rain-effect shower, and there is also a safe, an à la carte minibar and a dressing area. A breakfast is served at a nearby bar every day, and there are plenty of places to eat out in the surroundings. You can find Latina District nearby, it's popular for its traditional tapas bars in a 10-minute walk. The famous Reina Sofía Museum is 1 km away, while the Thyssen Museum is only 200 metres away. The Prado Museum is 500 metres away, and charming Retiro Park can be reached on foot in 20 minutes. Airport can be reached via public transport in 40 minutes. The closest metro stations are Anton Martin and Sevilla.

name: AC Hotel Avenida de América by Marriott
description: Our modern hotel with 144 bedrooms was designed to offer a pleasant and relaxing atmosphere. Free Premium WIFI. Hotel is located in the central neighbourhood of Salamanca, one of the most exclusive areas in Madrid, close to the high-fashion shops of Calle Serrano and an exciting range of restaurants. Each room lets guests enjoy the comforts AC Hotels are known for including minibar, television with over 20 channels, full bathroom, laundry service and much more. During your stay in Madrid, keep in shape and look after your physical health at our fitness room and Coloring your well-being in our AC Bar. Indulge in a buffet breakfast or a relaxing moment at our AC Lounge. This hotel has excellent transport links through its proximity to the Avenida de América interchange (where underground and bus merge), Barajas Airport and the IFEMA exhibition centre. It is just a few minutes away from tourist sites, like Calle Alcalá, Parque del Retiro, Santiago Bernabeu and Civitas Metropolitano Stadium and Wizink CenterMarriott

name: Exe Suites 33
description: Located in central Madrid, 100 metres from Plaza España Square and Metro, Exe Suites 33 is set in a 19th-century building. Free Wi-Fi and rooms with flat-screen TVs are on offer. Each room at the Exe Suites 33 has simple, stylish décor with tiled floors. All rooms have a fully equipped bathroom. There is a selection of cafés, bars and restaurants in the streets surrounding the hotel, and the popular Puerta Del Sol area is just 10 minutes’ walk away. A buffet breakfast is available at a nearby hotel, at an extra cost. Exe Suites 33 is set in a picturesque part of central Madrid, within 200 metres of 5 parks. The Royal Palace can be reached in 15 minutes by foot, while sights such as the Prado and Reina Sofia Art Galleries are 3 Metro stops away.

name: Motel One Madrid-Plaza de España
description: The modern Motel One Madrid-Plaza de España is located in the center of Madrid, just 250 meters from Plaza de España and 500 meters from Gran Vía and its theaters, and offers spacious rooms with air conditioning. The rooms have a modern and bright decor. They have free WiFi, 42-inch TV with international channels. There is also a laptop safe, desk and minibar. Each room has a private bathroom with hairdryer, vanity mirror and 1 set of free toiletries. Motel One Madrid-Plaza de España houses a modern bar with a selection of gin and tonics and other drinks. There are several restaurants, stores and bars in the surrounding area. Motel One Madrid-Plaza de España is just a 5-minute walk from the Parque del Oeste, which houses the Temple of Debod. Plaza del Callao and the Royal Palace are a 10-minute walk away. The hotel is about 250 meters from the Plaza de España and Ventura Rodríguez metro stations, which offer connections to the rest of the city. The hotel provides private parking for a supplement. Our guests say this part of Madrid is their favorite, according to independent reviews.

name: NH Madrid Ribera del Manzanares
address: Paseo De La Virgen Del Puerto, 57, 28005 Madrid
description: The NH Madrid Ribera del Manzanares hotel is set in a peaceful area of Madrid and overlooks the green and luscious Manzanares River gardens. You will find the Royal Palace and the Almudena Cathedral nearby. For business travelers, the Casa de Campo fairgrounds are also close to the hotel, and the M30 highway provides easy access by car.
