There are 224 rooms at NH Madrid Ribera del Manzanares, each with a flat screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Your sleep won’t be disturbed thanks to the soundproof windows and comfy mattresses, while the warm neutral colors and hardwood floors will help you relax. Some of the rooms offer lovely views of the river and the Royal Palace. Enjoy our daily fresh breakfast, with cold cuts, cheeses, eggs cooked-to-order, and fresh pastries. Mediterranean and Spanish dishes are available at the La Ribera restaurant and can be enjoyed on our sunny terrace, along with drinks and snacks. There is also a bar at the hotel. Get the most out of your relaxing stay by heading to the gym, outdorr pool in the summer months,  or making use of our massage services. For transportation, we have parking, e-bikes for rent and electric car chargers.NH Hoteles

name: Hostal Montaloya
description: Centrally located, Hostal Montaloya is 5 minutes’ walk from Puerta del Sol Square, and only 10 minutes’ walk from Gran Via Avenue and Madrid’s main shopping district. Free Wi-Fi is available. All air-conditioned rooms at Hostal Montaloya are simply decorated and offer a TV and a private bathroom. Tirso de Molina Metro Station is less than 1 minute walk from the guest house. Madrid’s main tourist attractions such as El Prado and Reina Sofia museums can all be reached within walking distance. Hostal Montaloya is also close to the famous Plaza Mayor Square. Here you will find a variety of bars and restaurants serving local cuisine and a continental breakfast is available in a nearby cafe. Atocha Train Station is 1.7 km from Hostal Montaloya.

name: Petit Palace Arturo Soria
description: The Petit Palace Arturo Soria Alcalá is located only 100 metres from Ciudad Lineal Metro Station. The rooms have a simple yet elegant décor. They all come with a flat-screen TV, and private bathroom with shower. Free WiFi is provided. Petit Palace Arturo Soria Alcala serves a varied and buffet breakfast with healthy options, including hot and cold dishes. A range of restaurants can also be found in the surrounding streets. Petit Palace Arturo Soria Alcala is situated in a quiet area of Madrid, near all the connections to the city centre and a 10-minute drive from the IFEMA Exhibition Centre or Madrid Barajas Airport. Alcala Norte Shopping Centre a 2-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Dwo Yuste Alcalá
description: Set in Madrid, 3.6 km from IFEMA, DWO Yuste Alcalá offers accommodation with a garden, private parking, a terrace and a bar. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 6.8 km from Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At DWO Yuste Alcalá all rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. El Retiro Park is 7 km from the accommodation, while Santiago Bernabéu Stadium is 7.1 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 4 km from DWO Yuste Alcalá.

name: Círculo Gran Vía, Autograph Collection (Adults Only)
description: The history of Madrid remains throughout the corridors and rooms of Hotel Círculo Gran Via. Occupying the former home of The Circle of Trade and Industrial Union of Madrid, our historic building was inaugurated un 1924 and recently renovated to become an Adults Only 18 plus hotel in the heart of the city. Because of it’s excellent location, Hotel Círculo Gran Vía offers the perfect accommodation for discovering the city’s main attractions, such as Plaza Mayor, Puerta del Sol and the Royal Palace. The main airport, Adolfo Suárez, is located only 17 km away. Offering 71 fully equipped rooms which combine tradition and design to ensure your utmost comfort, as well as a fitness room, meeting rooms and complimentary wifi throughout the hotel. Here, both business and leisure travelers will find everything they need to create a memorable experience. Relive the history and discover the city at Hotel Círculo Gran Vía.Marriott

name: NH Madrid Barajas Airport
description: The NH Madrid Barajas Airport, formerly known as NH Barajas, is a modern hotel set in a tranquil location close to the lovely 18th century Capricho Park. Guests can take the metro from the nearby El Capricho station to the city center of Madrid and enjoy sights such as the Royal Palace and the Plaza Mayor which are only a few minutes away. The trade fair center IFEMA is only a 10-minute walk, and the Wanda Metropolitano Stadium is only 20 minutes away on public transport. All of our 173 bright guest rooms offer contemporary comforts such as free Wi-Fi, and air-conditioning. The spacious rooms can accommodate an extra bed as needed. In the mornings, guests can enjoy a delicious breakfast buffet complete with sweet and savory options. Made-to-order hot dishes and an early bird breakfast are also available upon request. The NH Barajas Restaurant is our quiet yet inviting in-house dining establishment serving Spanish cuisine for lunch and dinner from Monday to Friday. Our Bar serves a great selection of light refreshments in a light and airy ambiance. We offer an airport shuttle service operating between the hours of 6am and 12:30am every day. The shuttle is free to hotel guests and will deliver you to any terminal you choose. To make sure each of our guests enjoys the perfect stay, Our professional 24-hour front desk will be happy to assist with any additional requests.NH Hoteles

name: Petit Palace Chueca
description: Located in the lively Chueca district in the centre of Madrid, Petit Palace Chueca is set in a traditional 19th-century mansion. The famous Gran Via is just 25 metres away. The rooms at Petit Palace Chueca include a flat-screen TV. Free WiFi is available. The hotel operates a 24-hour reception with a tour desk. Guests have access to free bicycles, subject to availability. Luggage storage service is also available. Guests will find a wide range of shops, restaurants and bars within a 1-minute walk of the hotel. Fuencarral Street is just 75 metres from Petit Palace Chueca, and the famous Puerta del Sol is less than 400 metres away. The Thyssen-Bornemisza and Prado Museums are within a 10-minute walk.

name: AC Hotel Aitana by Marriott
description: The AC Hotel Aitana is located in the heart of Madrid’s financial district, on the Paseo de la Castellana, next to the Santiago Bernabéu (Real Madrid FC) Stadium, and within walking distance of commercial and cultural areas, with quick connections to Madrid-Barajas airport and Atocha Renfe train station. It is ideally situated just across from the Azca business & shopping area, and next to Santiago Bernabeu or Cuzco subway stations. The hotel features 111 comfortable and well-designed rooms, a restaurant that offers a wide and delicious buffet breakfast, and the AC Lounge. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: ibis Styles Madrid Prado
description: Stay for a sweet price in the city centre at ibis Styles Madrid Prado, a 3-star hotel with parking and free Wi-Fi. Start the day with a generous breakfast buffet of sweet and savoury options, including gluten-free items, before heading to a meeting or exploring the city. Ask our team for advice on visiting attractions around the hotel. Children under 16 stay free, and pets are welcome in our air-conditioned rooms that can accommodate up to three people.accorhotels.com

name: Mandarin Oriental Ritz, Madrid
description: No description found

name: Petit Palace Arenal
description: Set on a pedestrian street, Petit Palace Arenal is in Madrid's Puerta del Sol district, just 2 minutes’ walk from Sol and Opera Metro Stations. It offers rooms with flat-screen TVs. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Set in a historic building, the Petit Palace Arenal and maintains original features, including French windows and a marble reception. The rooms at the Opera are bright and feature contemporary décor. A buffet breakfast with healthy products is served daily in the hotel restaurant, which features a vaulted ceiling. There is a large selection of cafés and bars in the surrounding Sol district. Free bicycle rental is available at the Petit Palace Arenal's 24-hour reception, subject to availability. There is also an internet point. You will find a wide range of bars and restaurants within a 2-minute walk. Museums and theatres are also nearby. The Royal Palace and Madrid Opera are within 650 metres of the hotel. Guests receive reduced rates on parking in nearby Plaza de las Desclazas. Barajas Airport can be reached in 45 minutes, by bus or Metro.

name: Espahotel Plaza Basilica
description: Espahotel Plaza Basílica is located 10 minutes’ walk from Real Madrid’s Santiago Bernabéu Stadium in Madrid’s financial district. It offers modern apartments with Wi-Fi connection and satellite TV. All Plaza Basílica apartments are equipped with air conditioning and heating. The bedrooms and living rooms feature carpeted floors. The bathrooms come with a hairdryer and bathroom amenities. In the kitchens there is a hob. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Madrid. There are also car rental and currency exchange services available. Espahotel Plaza Basílica is 400 metres from the Corte Inglés and 14 minutes' walk from Santiago Bernabéu stadium. There is a variety of restaurants in the surrounding streets. Madrid’s Convention Centre, the Palacio de Congresos, is 10 minutes’ walk away.

name: Hotel Exe Moncloa
description: Situated next to Intercambiador de Moncloa Station, Hotel Exe Moncloa offers a small outdoor pool, a gym with sauna and a roof terrace with panoramic views. Free Wi-Fi is provided. Each stylish room at the Exe Moncloa features bright, modern décor and smart wooden floors. All rooms have flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Hotel Exe Moncloa is located just off the A-6 Motorway, a 5-minute drive from Casa de Campo Park and the central Plaza España Square. Madrid Barajas Airport is around a 20-minute drive away.

name: Agora Juan de Austria
description: This elegant hotel is located in the historic Chamberi neighbourhood of Madrid and offers free Wi-Fi. The design of the hotel is based on the figure of Don Juan of Austria. It offers spacious and soundproofed rooms, decorated in a colonial style with patterned fabrics. Iglesia and Bilbao Metro Stations are both within 450 metres of Agora Juan de Austria. These offer direct access to the main Atocha Train Station. The Agora Juan de Austria has a café where guests can enjoy drinks and light meals. Private parking is offered at an extra cost.

name: Líbere Madrid Chamberí
description: Located in Madrid’s charming Chamberi district, this modern aparthotel is just 10 minutes by Metro from Puerta del Sol and Gran Vía. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. The rooms at the Líbere Madrid Chamberí feature parquet floors and stylish décor. A safe and private bathroom with a hairdryer. The quiet, residential district of Chamberi is home to the Sorolla Museum, located 950 metres away. There are good public transport connections to Madrid-Barajas Airport and the IFEMA Trade Fair Centre, 12 km away. There is a bus stop just outside, and Alonso Cano Metro Station is 140 metres away.

name: Espahotel Gran Via
description: Espahotel Gran Vía Madrid is located next to Plaza España and 800 metres from Puerta del Sol in Madrid. It offers studio apartments with Wi-fi connection and satellite TV. The apartments at Espahotel Gran Via have carpeted floors and an en suite bathroom with hairdryer and amenities. There is also a kitchenette with a fridge, and a microwave is available upon request. They all have central heating and air conditioning. The complex has a 24-hour reception and offers car rental, laundry services. Room service is also available. Espahotel Gran Vía is centrally located: the Royal Palace and Theatre is just 500 metres away from the hotel, and the shopping street of Fuencarral is 600 metres away.

name: Hotel Puerta de Toledo
description: Located next to the historic centre on Puerta de Toledo, this smart hotel has a great breakfast buffet and a lounge bar perfect for relaxing in after visiting the sights. Prepare for the day ahead with a hearty buffet breakfast in the Hotel Puerta de Toledo. You can choose from a wide selection of hot and cold dishes in the pleasant atmosphere of the Breakfast hall. Breakfast is served from 07:00 until 11:00. Keep up-to-date and email friends on the free, wireless internet connection available in the Hotel Puerta de Toledo. From 08:00 until 23:00 you can visit the Hotel Puerta de Toledo’s informal lounge-bar and enjoy a refreshing drink or light snack. Sleep soundly in the elegant bedrooms which have an attractive colour scheme with touches of Mediterranean tones.

name: Petit Palace Puerta Del Sol
description: Located next to Madrid’s Puerta del Sol, this hotel offers rooms with free WiFi. The modern, soundproofed rooms at the Petit Palace Puerta del Sol are air-conditioned and feature parquet floors. There is a minibar and safe, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel restaurant serves a buffet breakfast. Due to its central location, the Petit Palace is surrounded by restaurants and bars. Staff at the Petit Palace’s 24-hour reception can provide information about what to do in Madrid, and you can hire a bicycle for free. Car hire is available, and guest have discount for a car park nearby. Puerta del Sol is just 10 minutes’ walk from the Royal Palace and the Plaza Mayor. It is also a 10-minute walk to the Prado, Thyssen and Reina Sofía Museums.

name: Eurostars Madrid Tower
address: Paseo De La Castellana, 259 B, 28046 Madrid
description: This sophisticated hotel is located in the 235-metre high SyV Tower, and includes a gym and spa. All rooms have superb views of Madrid as well as free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. The Eurostars Madrid Tower can be found in the Cuatro Torres business area, on Paseo de la Castellana. Begoña Metro Station is just 100 metres away, and nearby Chamartín Station offers easy access to the city centre. All of the Eurostar Madrid's rooms have a pillow menu. They have wooden floors and large windows, and spacious modern bathrooms. All rooms are equipped with steam brush for clothes and a hair care set. The Madrid Tower’s restaurant is located on the 30th floor, and has panoramic views of the city. It serves classic Mediterranean dishes. There is also a piano bar. The hotel offers easy access to the A-1 and M-11 motorways. Real Madrid's football stadium, the Santiago Bernabéu, is just 3 km away. Barajas Airport can be reached in 14 minutes by car.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Madrid - Prado
description: Our boutique-style DoubleTree by Hilton Madrid-Prado hotel is located in the heart of Madrid City Center, within walking distance to Atocha train station. Enjoy the numerous cafes, outdoor terraces and cuisines from around the world, just outside our property in the Las Letras neighborhood. Our hotel combines the charm of a historic building with modern amenities for a comfortable stay. Unwind in one of our spacious rooms with a king- or queen-sized bed. Finish a project or plan your next Madrid adventure at the large desk with complimentary WiFi. Wake up to fresh coffee or tea right in your room and then stop by our café for breakfast. If you’d rather stay in, order room service for breakfast or dinner for a truly relaxing experience. Our on-site restaurant features Kabuki cuisine, which is a combination of Japanese and Mediterranean food. Relax in our DoubleTree by Hilton Madrid Prado Bar with comfortable seating and a calm ambience.Hilton

name: Eco Via Lusitana
description: This smart, modern hotel is set in the residential area of Carabanchel Alto, 6 km from Madrid’s historic city centre. It offers a terrace and free Wi-Fi, 150 metres from San Francisco Metro Station. Rooms at Eco Via Lusitana feature wooden floors and contemporary décor. All include a minibar, and a work desk. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily and the hotel also has a cafeteria serving drinks and snacks. There are bars and restaurants within 10 minutes’ walk and the Islazul Shopping Centre is 15 minutes' walk away. The Via Lusitana is set just next to the Aguacate Industrial Estate and 10 minutes’ drive from the Leganés Technology Park. You can reach the centre via the nearby metro station in around 30 minutes. Eco Via Lusitana has private parking for a fee and is 1.5 km from the M-40 Motorway. Madrid-Barajas Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away.

name: Elba Madrid Alcala
description: Elba Madrid Alcalá is ideally located between the city centre and Madrid IFEMA congress centre. All the spacious rooms offer plenty of natural light, high-speed WiFi, flat-screen TV and private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries. Located on the ground floor, the restaurant offers Mediterranean food and local dishes. There is also a café bar and a dining room. Buffet breakfast is served daily. Restaurants and shops can be found within walking distance, but the Elba Madrid Alcalá is also located 5-minutes’ walk away from the metro station Ciudad Lineal, offering access to the city centre in 15 minutes.

name: Melia Madrid Serrano
description: Set in a privileged location in Madrid’s Salamanca district, set next to the well known Calle Serrano Street and 2 km from the Bernabeu Stadium. Its comfortable, air-conditioned rooms at the Melia Madrid Serrano feature modern décor and include flat-screen satellite TV, pillow menu and WiFi, along with en-suite bathroom and premium toiletries. The hotel also dedicates some of its areas to The Level exclusive rooms and services, where The Level guests have private access to The Level Lounge with a private terrace on the 7th floor. Guests can enjoy premium drinks, snacks and tapas in an elegant and relaxed atmosphere. There is also a private lounge and a working area with internet access. Other services for The Level guests include private check-in and check-out service, private buffet breakfast, pillow menu, Nespresso space and superior bathroom amenities and toiletries. A varied buffet breakfast is available every morning. The Arado Restaurant is a new modern outlet, all-day dinning concept, offering opened kitchen from 11 am to 1 am. The restaurant offers a mix of flavours and kitchen with local and high quality produce. Other facilities available at Melia Madrid Serrano include a fully-equipped gym and 11 meeting rooms with capacity for 300 people. There is paid public parking available with direct access to the hotel. The hotel has many metro stations nearby. It is well connected with the city centre, which is a 10-minute metro ride away via Rubén Darío Metro Station, 200 metres away. It also has easy access to the A-2 and M-30 Motorway.

name: Air Rooms Madrid By Hellosky
description: The hotel is located in the public zone/Land area of Terminal 4, outside the security zone, building of Madrid’s Barajas Airport. HelloSky Air Rooms Madrid offers modern, air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom and flat-screen TV with international channels. All rooms are equipped with a wardrobe, and a desk. Hairdryer and toiletries are also provided. The property also offers business facilities at an extra charge, where free LAN internet points are available. The inter-terminal shuttle bus stops a 5-minute walk from the hotel, and metro and train stations are also within walking distance. Madrid city centre is 15 minutes away by train.

name: Hostal Las Fuentes
description: Hostal Las Fuentes is located in the centre of Madrid, just 5 minutes from the Puerta del Sol. It offers great-value accommodation, with free WiFi access. Bedrooms at the guest house are simple and comfortable. All rooms have en suite bathroom and TV. Dry cleaning, laundry an ironing services are available for an extra charge. A safe is also available for a supplement. Hostal Las Fuentes is located near a public parking available for a surcharge. Hostal Las Fuentes is a great base for visiting the city’s attractions. It is just 150 metres from Plaza Mayor, and 300 metres from the Royal Palace. There are also excellent public transport links nearby, from Opera metro station.

name: Santo Mauro, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Madrid
description: The Hotel Santo Mauro invites you on a journey to the 19th Century, staying in the home of one of the most influential figures in Madrid society at that time, the Duke of Santo Mauro. With its French-influenced design and architecture, the hotel consists of three buildings set in the most sophisticated private gardens in Madrid, with fountains and terraces shaded by ancient chestnut trees. The guest rooms are full of special details and historical references that immerse you in the past. Each public room is unique: The Red Room reflects pure French Classicism, while the oriental pieces in the Chinese Lounge recall the objects the Duke used to collect on his travels. The Wine Bar offers an extensive list of wines and small dishes, while the main restaurant, housed in the Duke's former Library, offers a level of cuisine commensurate with its palatial setting. Music, fresh flowers, arts and crafts, and highly attentive service from the household staff round off the unique experience of staying in a palace.Marriott

name: Jc Rooms Jardines
description: Conveniently situated in the Centro district of Madrid, Jc Rooms Jardines is located less than 1 km from Mercado San Miguel, a 12-minute walk from Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum and 1 km from Prado Museum. The property is situated 400 metres from Gran Via, 1 km from Royal Palace of Madrid and 1.7 km from Reina Sofia Museum. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a tour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. At the guest house, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available daily at Taberna La Española (42 Montera St.). Plaza Mayor is 700 metres from the accommodation, while Puerta del Sol is 300 metres away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from Jc Rooms Jardines.

name: Catalonia Puerta del Sol
description: Catalonia Puerta del Sol is set in a magnificent 18th-century building in the historic centre of Madrid, a few minutes from Puerta del Sol. It offers free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. The hotel is just 50 metres from Puerta del Sol, Madrid's main square and from main tapas restaurants. You can walk to Madrid's famous Art Triangle in 15 minutes. Atocha Train Station is 1 km away. The air-conditioned rooms feature parquet floors and smart décor. ach one has flat-screen satellite smart TV with Chromecast app, a private bathroom and a minibar. The Puerta del Sol's restaurant serves a buffet breakfast each morning, and available until 12:00 at weekends. There is also a bar with a roofed terrace, El Patio, where you can get a snack or a drink. There is also a patio with crystal domes. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app.

name: Pestana CR7 Gran Vía
description: Pestana CR7 Gran Vía has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and shared lounge in Madrid. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel features family rooms. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel the rooms have a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Guests at Pestana CR7 Gran Vía Madrid can enjoy breakfast on the outdoor terrace, try an authentic Neapolitan pizza or enjoy a cocktail with panoramic views of Madrid. The accommodation offers a terrace and is the only rooftop with multiple heights and 360° views of Madrid. Popular points of interest near Pestana CR7 Gran Vía include Gran Via, Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Travelodge Torrelaguna
description: Travelodge Torrelaguna offers accommodation next to Madrid’s A-2 Motorway and 4 km from the IFEMA Exhibition Centre. It features air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV. The Torrelaguna’s spacious rooms are bright and functional. Each has a private bathroom. Wi-Fi internet is available in the rooms at an extra cost. Guests can access free unlimited WiFi in public areas. A buffet breakfast is served in the Travelodge’s café-bar, open 24 hours, where guests can also enjoy light meals for lunch and dinner. There are regular buses to central Madrid, which stop outside the hotel, while Barrio de la Concepción Metro Station is just 500 metres away. The city centre can be reached in 15 minutes, by car.

name: Hotel Madrid Centro Affiliated by Meliá
description: Hotel Madrid Centro, managed by Meliá is ideally set in Madrid's commercial centre, just 100 metres from Plaza España Metro Station. It offers a fitness centre and a dining room with views of Gran Vía Avenue. Centrally located in the heart of Madrid, the hotel is 10 minutes' walk from Puerta del Sol, and you can walk to Plaza Mayor in under 15 minutes. Hotel Madrid Centro offers spacious rooms, with en suite bathrooms. They all have air conditioning/heating (depending on the season) and satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The hotel serves a complete buffet breakfast in the dining room, where gluten-free products are available. There is also a vending machine corner. The hotel's tour desk and ticket service can book tickets to the Warner Theme Park, cinemas and theatres. The reception also offers car rental services.

name: Catalonia Las Cortes
description: Set in a beautiful 18th-century building, Catalonia Las Cortes offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. It is located in Madrid City Centre, 10 minutes' walk from El Prado Museum. All rooms in Catalonia Las Cortes include classic décor and a flat-screen satellite TV. The impressive superior rooms and suites feature antique furnishings and authentic frescoes on their ceilings. Guest will also find a Nespresso® coffee machine and a kettle in the rooms as well as a complimentary welcome water bottle. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app. The restaurant is open for dinner daily and serves international dishes. There is also a cafeteria. There is also a snack area with free sandwiches, salads, pastries, teas and drinks, open every day from 16:00 - 19:00. Breakfast is served until 12:00. Catalonia Las Cortes is located in the Las Letras district. The Thyssen Bornemisza Collection is 350 metres from the property, and the Reina Sofía Art Museum is 12 minutes' walk away. The famous Parque del Retiro Park can be reached in 15 minutes on foot.

name: Novotel Madrid Campo de Las Naciones
description: Enjoy the modern facilities at the Novotel Madrid Campo de las Naciones hotel. In a quiet area, the hotel boasts excellent access to Puerta del Sol, 30 minutes away by metro, and the IFEMA exhibition center, a 5-minute walk away. It is home to nine meeting rooms and rooms that boast a contemporary design with every comfort, including complimentary WIFI. After a day playing golf on the adjoining course, relax at the poolside bar or in the restaurant and enjoy the Mediterranean cuisine served at Novotel.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Madrid - Las Tablas
description: Holiday Inn Madrid Las Tablas hotel is located in northern Madrid, in the geart of the residential and bussiness area of Las Tablas. It's a 10 minutes walk to Las Tablas Metro Station, which offers a direct connection to the city centre. The hotel is just off the M40 ring road and has covered parking. Here on business? The hotel has free WiFi, a 24 hours Business Centre and four fully equipped meeting rooms, the largest of which has space for 100 guests. Several high-profile companies have offices close by, and the IFEMA Feria de Madrid exhibition centre is a 15 minutes drive away. Madrid’s famous sights, such as the grand Plaza Mayor and Puerta del Sol public squares, the expansive Buen Retiro Park and the art-filled Prado Museum, are all within reach. Santiago Bernabéu Stadium, home of Real Madrid, is 20 minutes drive away. It's a 12 minutes drive to El Corte Inglés Sanchinarro shopping centre. The rooms have a trendy vibe and come with a work desk, tea- and coffee-making facilities and a pillow menu. Kids stay and eat for free. Enjoy a buffet breakfast, and relax in the spacious Open Lobby. In the evening, unwind with a cocktail in the bar, then sample delicious Mediterranean cuisine in the restaurant.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Porcel Torre Garden
address: Av. De La Institución Libre de Enseñanza, 190 Bis, 28087 Madrid
description: Hotel Porcel Torre Garden offers modern accommodation with free Wi-Fi access and spacious rooms. It is located just 5 km from central Madrid and 10 minutes’ drive from the airport. The rooms at Torre Garden feature a separate seating area and views. Featuring simple décor, the rooms include air conditioning and satellite TV. The hotel has good access to the city centre by bus or metro. The IFEMA Trade Fair is 15 minutes away by car. La Torre restaurant is open every day for buffet breakfast. The bar-cafeteria at Torre Garden is open from 08:00 until 23:00 for drinks and snacks.

name: Catalonia Gran Via
description: Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid offers a terrace with a pool and views over Gran Via. There is free Wi-Fi and small gym. It is situated in central Madrid, between Puerta del Sol and Plaza de Cibeles. Built in 1917, this charming building features beautiful stained-glass windows. The rooms are decorated in neutral tones and come with satellite smart TV equipped with Chromecast app. and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The restaurant serves Mediterranean and international cuisine. A buffet breakfast is available and the hotel’s bar offers a range of cocktails. The hotel also has a lounge and an internet corner. The Reina Sofía, Thyssen-Bornemisza and Prado Art Galleries are less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Catalonia Gran Vía Madrid. Atocha Station is 20 minutes’ away by foot, with a high-speed AVE service.

name: Vp Madroño
description: El Madroño offers an attractive private garden and large rooms with kitchenettes and free Wi-Fi. It is located in the fashionable Salamanca area of Madrid. All of the Madroño’s air-conditioned rooms have a sofa and light-coloured decoration. The kitchenette includes a coffee machine and microwave. El Madroño is just 200 metres from Diego de León Metro Station. Metro and bus stops by the hotel offer easy access to Barajas Airport. The Lázaro Galdiano Museum is just over 10 minutes’ walk away. The Goya and Serrano shopping streets can be reached in about 15 minutes on foot.

name: Hotel JC Rooms Chueca
description: JC Rooms Chueca is located in Madrid city centre, in the lively neighbourhood of Chueca, only 500 metres from Puerta del Sol. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and offers free WiFi and an HD flat-screen TV. The rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. This JC Rooms hotel has a 24-hour reception which offers services like tourist information. Restaurants, bars and shops are reachable within walking distance from the accommodation. Plaza Mayor is 800 metres from JC Rooms Chueca, while Puerta de Alcalá is 1 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: Quatro Puerta del Sol
description: Quatro Puerta del Sol is 200 metres from Madrid's Puerta del Sol and 500 metres from the Thyssen Bornemisza and Prado Museums. It offers rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. All rooms at Hotel Quatro Puerta del Sol have air conditioning and heating. They come with a flat-screen TV, safety deposit box, and work desk in each room. There is a bathroom equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The Quatro Puerta del Sol Hotel has a tour desk where staff can provide information about what to see and do in Madrid. The reception is also open 24 hours a day. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Plaza Mayor and 10 minutes from the Royal Palace. Retiro Park is 800 metres away from the Quatro Puerta del Sol.

name: Velvet Hostels
description: Situated in Madrid and with Reina Sofia Museum reachable within 6.7 km, Velvet Hostels features a tour desk, allergy-free rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. The property is around 7 km from El Retiro Park, 8 km from Plaza Mayor and 8.1 km from Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum. The property is non-smoking and is located 6.7 km from Atocha Train Station. All rooms at the hostel are fitted with a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and a shower. At Velvet Hostels the rooms include air conditioning and a shared bathroom. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Puerta de Toledo is 8.2 km from the accommodation, while Mercado San Miguel is 8.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 11 km from Velvet Hostels.

name: Hotel Julia
description: This hotel offers excellent facilities including free Wi-Fi in rooms and public areas. It is in a lively business area of Madrid, between Adolfo Suárez Airport and the IFEMA centre. The attractive Hotel Julia has comfortable rooms with exterior views. All rooms are en suite, air conditioned and heated. They have a TV and radio. Ciudad Lineal Metro Station is only 800 metres from the Hotel Julia. There are also many buses and 2 other metro stations nearby. The hotel is close to the shops on the famous Calle Alcalá. Many multinational companies are based in the surrounding areas. There are 2 parks nearby. Cívitas Metropolitano Stadium is 3 km from the property. Breakfast is served daily in the cafeteria. There are also set menus and à la carte dining during the day. The hotel also has vending machines with snacks and soft drinks. There is a 24-hour front desk. The Julia also has excellent facilities for events. These include a 100m² meeting room with natural light.

name: Mercure Madrid Centro
description: Only a twenty-minute drive from the airport, with parking facilities and metro access, 4-star Mercure Madrid Centro boasts a quiet spot in the city centre, near all the emblematic sites. Enjoy our breakfast buffet in a splendid room and organise your events in our three well-equipped meeting rooms, where we also offer a catering service. Our air-conditioned single, double and triple guest rooms and suites with terrace combine modern comfort with a nod to the history of the Barrio de las Letras district.accorhotels.com

name: The Pavilions Madrid Hotel
address: C/ Amador de Los Ríos, 3, 28010 Madrid
description: The modern and elegant rooms at The Pavilions Madrid Hotel are situated 50 metres from Plaza Colón in Madrid. There is a small garden and a terrace bar. The rooms a The Pavilions Hotel include a bathroom equipped with a hydro-massage shower and hairdryer. The hotel is just a few steps from Serrano Street with many exclusive shops, and next to Paseo de la Castellana. Casino Gran Madrid is just a few minutes' walk away.

name: Hotel Suites Feria de Madrid
description: This modern hotel is located in Madrid’s Arturo Soria neighbourhood, just 5 minutes’ drive from the IFEMA Trade Fair. It offers a 24-hour reception, and a bar with terrace. Each bright, spacious room at Hotel Suites Feria de Madrid has a functional design and air conditioning. Rooms include a TV, minibar and a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer. Less than 1 km from the Hotel Suites Feria de Madrid, the Palacio de Hielo Shopping Centre includes restaurants and an ice skating rink. Madrid Barajas Airport and Real Madrid’s Santiago Bernabeu Stadium are within a 15-minute drive. Esperanza Metro Station is only 300 metres from the Hotel Suites Feria de Madrid. Regular bus services to the city centre also stop nearby.

name: Suites Viena Plaza de España
description: This sophisticated designer building has a tranquil location near the Plaza de España. It offers large rooms with flat-screen TV, free internet and a kitchenette. The Suites Viena is in the Arguëlles business district, a short walk from the shops on Gran Via. The lovely Oeste Park and the Royal Palace are both nearby. The rooms at the Suites Viena Plaza de España are elegant, air conditioned and soundproofed. There is a microwave and fridge and a dining table. A varied buffet breakfast is served in the morning. A ticket service and tour desk are available. As well as free Wi-Fi in public areas, guests can also use the internet using the free computer in the PC corner.

name: Silken Puerta Madrid
description: This modern hotel, with a gym, is a 5-minute drive from Madrid’s Barajas Airport and IFEMA Convention Centre. Located next to the A2 Motorway, Silken Puerta Madrid is convenient for transport links. The 146 Bus stops in the next street and takes 30 minutes to central Madrid. The 114 bus will take you to the Avenida de América interchange station. Spacious air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have satellite TV. There is a trouser press, safe and minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and luxury amenities. The hotel's La Orza restaurant offers fresh à la carte cuisine, a daily set menu and an extensive wine list. There is also a café where you can choose from a varied menu at lunch or dinner. There is a 24-hour reception with tourist information. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge. Cancha de Golf Alcalá 525 Golf Course is 3 km away.

name: Hostal Abitum Madrid
description: Hostal Abitum Madrid offers accommodation in Madrid. Alvarado and Cuatro Caminos metro stations are within 300 metres from the property. Rooms have a private bathroom. Hostal Abitum Madrid features free WiFi throughout the property. Paseo de la Castellana is 1 km away. Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport is 12 km from Hostal Abitum Madrid.

name: Four Seasons Hotel Madrid
description: Situated in Madrid, 500 metres from Gran Via Metro Station, Four Seasons Hotel Madrid features accommodation with a bar and private parking. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. Guests can use the spa and wellness centre with an indoor pool, fitness centre, and hot tub, as well as a terrace. The hotel offers some rooms with city views, and rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. A continental, Italian or American breakfast is available each morning at the property. At Four Seasons Hotel Madrid you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, local and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Arabic, English, Spanish and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, Gran Via and Reina Sofia Museum. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas, 12 km from Four Seasons Hotel Madrid, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Golden Alcala
description: Set in Madrid, 4.3 km from Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum, Golden Alcala offers air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and a lift, along with free WiFithroughout the property. The guest house has family rooms. At the guest house, all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. El Retiro Park is 4.4 km from Golden Alcala, while Gran Via Metro Station is 4.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid
address: Ctra. Fuencarral a Alcobendas, Km 8, 28050 Madrid
description: Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid design hotel is located 4.5 km from Paseo de la Castellana Boulevard. It features a gym and free WiFi. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid feature free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with local and international channels. Each one comes with a minibar and a safe. Sercotel Convention Plaza Madrid offers a continental breakfast with room service. The hotel hosts a permanent luxury car exhibition. A shopping centre and movie theatre can be found within 500 metres of the hotel. Las Tablas Metro Station is 800 metres away, with a direct service to Chamartín, Santiago Bernabéu Stadium and Gran Via de Madrid. By making just one change you can reach metro stations Colon, Puerta del Sol, Ifema, Atocha, and the airport. There is a golf course and a paddle tennis court 1 km from the property.

name: Petit Hostel La Latina
description: Set within 500 metres of Puerta de Toledo and 1.5 km of Mercado San Miguel, Petit Hostel La Latina offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Madrid. Among the facilities at this property are a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is allergy-free and is situated 1.8 km from Plaza Mayor. The units at the hostel come with a shared bathroom and bed linen. Puerta del Sol is 2.6 km from Petit Hostel La Latina, while Plaza de España Metro Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Freedom
description: Well set in the Centro district of Madrid, Hotel Freedom is located less than 1 km from Atocha Train Station, a 13-minute walk from Plaza Mayor and 1.1 km from Mercado San Miguel. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is 600 metres from Reina Sofia Museum, and within 800 metres of the city centre. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, all units at Hotel Freedom have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms here will provide you with a terrace. At the accommodation every room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Hotel Freedom include Puerta del Sol, Puerta de Toledo and El Retiro Park. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Eco Alcala Suites
description: There is free WiFi and a flat-screen TV in these designer suites. The Eco Alcala Suites are in a residential and commercial area, 10 minutes´ drive from IFEMA Convention and Congress Centre. The building has a large sun terrace, and an outdoor swimming pool, open in July and August. All suites at the Eco Alcala have a living-room area with a dining table and a double sofa bed. There is also a microwave and a fridge. Ciudad Lineal Metro is within 600 metres, and the famous Alcalá Street is 50 metres away. The nearby M-30 and M-40 Motorways offer easy access around the city. There is a bar/cafeteria with a terrace that serves buffet breakfast every morning.

name: The Bridge Huertas
description: The Bridge Huertas features air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV in the Centro district of Madrid. The property is close to Atocha Train Station, Gran Via Metro Station and Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum. The property is 700 metres from Plaza Mayor, and within 500 metres of the city centre. At the guest house, the rooms come with a desk. Every room includes a coffee machine, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a terrace and some have city views. At The Bridge Huertas every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Mercado San Miguel, Puerta del Sol and Reina Sofia Museum. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 13 km from The Bridge Huertas.

name: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria
address: Avenida de la Capital de Espana 10, 28042 Madrid
description: Pullman Madrid Airport & Feria is in front of the Palacio de Congresos and just a few steps from IFEMA - Feria de Madrid. Its strategic location makes it perfect for a trip to the capital for business or pleasure. Enjoy its leisure spaces, like the terrace or pool, the excellent cuisine of the restaurant El Patio or Cosmopolitan Bar's special cocktails. Book and toast with us at this upscale hotel.accorhotels.com

name: Hostal Hispano Gran Vía
description: Hispano Gran Vía has an ideal setting in Madrid’s Chueca District, 200 metres from the Metro. It features a 24-hour reception and simple accommodation with flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. The Hispano offers traditional décor with wooden furnishings and floors. All rooms have air conditioning and heating. Guests can make use of the Hispano’s luggage storage and its vending machines, which sell drinks. The guest house is within walking distance of Chueca’s many bars, cafés and restaurants. The Puerta del Sol District is less than 10 minutes’ walk away. The Retiro Park, and nearby Prado and Reina Sofia Museums, are less than one kilometre from Hispano Gran Vía.

name: Novotel Madrid City Las Ventas
description: Enjoy the best leisure and business offer in Novotel Madrid City Las Ventas, a modern, functional hotel with excellent communication and location. Its spacious, quiet & fully equipped rooms, some overlooking Madrid, offer a perfect rest from work or touring. After a day in one of its eight multipurpose rooms, it's time to relax in the outdoor pool or on the terrace of your fusion restaurant.accorhotels.com

name: Axor Feria
description: Axor Feria is a modern, design hotel next to Madrid’s Barajas Airport, a 5-minute drive from IFEMA Convention Centre. It offers free Wi-Fi. The hotel has 24 hours free shuttle service to the airport and IFEMA, usually at the begining and at the end of the most important fairs. All air-conditioned rooms are soundproofed and have flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The Axor Feria features themed lounges, including a Chill Out Zone and Wii Room with free access to video-games. Guests also have access to the spa and gym located in Axor Barajas Hotel. The hotel offers laundry, ironing and dry cleaning services. There is a 24-hour front desk and an on-site parking is available for an extra charge. Meeting and conference rooms are available for a surcharge in the Axor Feria. Wanda Metropolitano Stadium is 6.9 km from Axor Feria, while Faunia is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 4 km from Axor Feria.

name: Gran Versalles
description: Gran Hotel Versalles is located in a quiet area of central Madrid, next to Alonso Martínez Metro Station. It is a classic-style hotel offering 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. The Versalles is just 5 minutes’ walk from the vibrant Chueca district. Alonso Martínez is a major metro station and from here you can reach the Art Triangle in around 15 minutes. The air-conditioned rooms at the Versalles Gran Hotel feature carpeted floors. They are equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel’s Café Luxemburgo offers tapas and drinks throughout the day. There are various bars and restaurants in the surrounding area.

name: Rafaelhoteles Ventas
description: Featuring 4-star accommodation, 1881 Madrid Ventas Hotel is situated in Madrid, 3.9 km from Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum and 4 km from El Retiro Park. The property is set 4.2 km from Gran Via Metro Station, 4.8 km from Gran Via and 4.8 km from Santiago Bernabéu Stadium. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. At 1881 Madrid Ventas Hotel, each room has air conditioning and a safety deposit box. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. Languages spoken at the reception include English and Spanish, and guests are invited to request advice on the area when needed. Plaza de España Metro Station is 6.1 km from 1881 Madrid Ventas Hotel, while Plaza Mayor is 6.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Hostal Boutique I Host You
description: Recently opened Boutique Hostel, offers 13 rooms including doubles, superior doubles and deluxe, with all the comforts for the client. Its rooms are equipped with a private bathroom, air conditioning, heating, desk, wardrobe, fridge and hairdryer. Deluxe rooms offer wonderful views. Hostel located surrounded by culture, restaurants and leisure.Sembo

name: Hotel Porcel Ganivet
description: Hotel Porcel Ganivet is centrally located 150 metres from Madrid’s Puerta de Toledo Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Plaza Mayor. It offers air-conditioned rooms with laptop safes and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Porcel Ganivet are modern and comfortable. Each is soundproofed and has a flat-screen satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and toiletries. A buffet breakfast is served at the hotel, and packed lunches can be requested. There is also a bar and a snack bar. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. Private parking is available onsite for a surcharge. Other facilities include an outdoor seasonal hot tub. The Porcel Ganivet Hotel is a 5-minute walk from El Rastro Market and 1 km from the Royal Palace. There is easy access to the M30 road.

name: Hostal Castilla II - Puerta del Sol
address: Calle Del Marques Viudo De Pontejos, 2, 28012 Madrid
description: Only 25 metres from Puerta del Sol and Plaza Mayor, this guesthouse offers rooms with flat-screen TVs and free WiFi. The Prado Museum and Madrid’s botanic gardens are a 10-minute walk away. Hostal Castilla II provides accommodation with individually controlled air conditioning and work desks, as well as a private bathroom. Some rooms include a small balcony. Vending machines with drinks and snacks are available to all guests. In the evening, visitors can discover many authentic tapas bars around the Castilla II area. Hostal Castilla II Puerta del Sol is located 700 metres from the Royal Palace and 800 metres from the Reina Sofia Museum.

name: Far Home Bernabeu
description: Situated in Madrid and with Santiago Bernabéu Stadium reachable within 1.3 km, Far Home Bernabeu features a tour desk, non-smoking rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is around 3.4 km from Chamartin Railway Station, 4.5 km from Gran Via Metro Station and 4.5 km from Temple of Debod. The hostel has family rooms. The rooms have air conditioning, a desk and a TV, and some units at the hostel have a balcony. All rooms have bed linen. A continental breakfast is available each morning at Far Home Bernabeu. Plaza de España Metro Station is 4.5 km from the accommodation, while Gran Via is 4.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Adolfo Suarez Madrid-Barajas Airport, 15 km from Far Home Bernabeu.

name: Ilunion Malaga
address: Paseo Marítimo Antonio Machado, 10, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Set in a contemporary eco-efficient building within the port area and overlooking the sea, Ilunion Málaga offers an on-site restaurant, wellness area with indoor pool, and a fitness centre. Maria Zambrano Train Station is just 5 minutes' walk away. Featuring wooden floors and decorated in warm colours, the spacious rooms at Ilunion Malaga have air conditioning and free WiFi. They include a 32-inch flat-screen satellite TV and a free safe. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Many rooms also offer sea views and some have a private terrace. Daily breakfast is served in the restaurant, while an à la carte menu is available at lunch and dinner. Room service can be ordered from the bar-cafeteria during the day. They all include special products for celiac and food intolerant guests. The wellness area includes a sauna, sensation showers and heated loungers. Beauty treatments are available. There is also an indoor swimming pool, which during the summer months is turned into an outdoor pool. The Picasso Museum is a 20-minute walk from Ilunion Málaga, while Malaga Historic Centre is just 10 minutes away. Private underground parking is available at extra cost. The nearby Maria Zambrano Train Station is 500 metres from the hotel, offering direct connection to Malaga Airport and the rest of the Costa del Sol. Málaga Airport is 9 km away. Pets are allowed. A supplement of 25 EUR per pet per night applies. Please confirm that this is a pet-friendly reservation and call the hotel to check availability and ensure that the room is fully stocked. Pets are only allowed in the pet-friendly double room. Pets are not allowed in the other rooms. Upon arrival at the property, guests will be provided with access rules, which they must read and accept.

name: Hotel Guadalmedina
description: Located opposite Malaga’s Centre of Contemporary Art, this modern hotel offers free Wi-Fi and stylish air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TV. It is just 500 metres from Maria Zambrano Train Station. The Guadalmedina is within a 10-minute walk of Malaga’s old town and the popular shops and bars of Larios Street. La Malagueta Beach is 2 km from the hotel. Each room at the Guadalmedina has simple, elegant décor and wooden floors. Bathrooms come with a hairdryer and a range of toiletries. The nearby train station provides direct links to Málaga Airport and the rest of the Costa del Sol.

name: Salles Hotel Malaga Centro
description: Free Wi-Fi and a seasonal rooftop pool with impressive city views can be found at Salles Hotel Málaga Centro, set less than 5 minutes' walk from Málaga’s picturesque old town. Rooms at the Málaga Centro are brightly decorated and spacious. Each room has satellite TV and exterior views. The Málaga Centro’s Alborán Restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean and Andalusian cuisine. The café-bar serves drinks and snacks. Guests can relax and enjoy city views on the Centro’s rooftop terrace. There is a poolside bar, open in summer. The hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Picasso Museum and less than 1 km from Málaga Cathedral.

name: Gran Hotel Miramar Gl
description: The luxurious Gran Hotel Miramar GL is set in a listed XX century building and is located in Malaga, 10 metres from La Malagueta Beach. This beachfront hotel has a spa centre and a seasonal pool. Featuring views of the beach, the garden, or the city, the elegant rooms at this hotel are air conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, and an entertainment media library, as well as Bluetooth sound system, USB and HDMI connections. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom equipped with a bath, mirror with temperature and clock and Bulgari toiletries. The hotel restaurant Príncipe de Asturias offers International cuisine with a Mediterranean touch, as well as an informal snack bar. It also has roof-top chill-out terrace where guests can enjoy drinks, and stunning sea view. Breakfast is served at the pool level and it consist on an extensive buffet offering a great variety of fruit, cold meat and cheese, pastry, and a show-cooking part for your on-demand requests. Other facilities include a children's pool and a seasonal miniclub, or a wide range of meeting and conference rooms. Alcazaba is 700 metres from Gran Hotel Miramar GL, and the city centre is a 10-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Barcelo Malaga
address: Estación Vialia Maria Zambrano Héroe de Sostoa, 2 | | Málaga | Andalucía | España, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Malaga SpainAt the forefront of city hotelsThe Barcelo Malaga has established itself as one of the best and most modern business hotels in Spain thanks to its avant-garde design high-quality services and its excellent location in the city of Malaga. It has direct access to the high-speed AVE train station enjoys good links to the airport and is just a short walk from the citys main tourist attractions.Its 221 large modern rooms are designed in line with the new B-Room concept that ensures that every stay is a unique experience. This hotel has an exclusive and avant-garde design and boasts one of the most spectacular receptions in the country due to its unique EDHA Sliding Structure for Daring Humans an enormous steel slide that directly connects the first floor to the B-Lounge. In the El Anden restaurant guests can savour dishes prepared with fresh local produce. And if you would like a drink or cocktail after work a visit to its terrace or sophisticated B-Lounge is a must. Whats more the hotel was recognised by the magazine Wallpaper as one of the top 50 business hotels in the world thanks to its 1500 m2 of conference rooms. The Barcelo Malaga will impress even the most discerning guest whether with its unbeatable location its sophisticated design or its magnificent modern facilities. All this ensures an exclusive experience in an avant-garde hotel.Barcelo.com

name: Soho Bahía Málaga
description: Soho Bahia Malaga is located 300 metres from Málaga’s Contemporary Art Museum and Cathedral. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. All rooms at the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a safe and the private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. The Bahia Málaga has a bar. There is a variety of restaurants and bars within 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel. You can enjoy city views from the rooftop terrace bar, where both drinks and light meals are served. There is also a car rental service available. Pablo Picasso’s birthplace, now a museum, is just 500 metres from the Soho Bahia Malaga. The Alcazaba Fortress is 600 metres away. The Terrace Bar Topic opens from Wednesday to Sunday from 4:00 p.m. to 12:00 a.m. Monday and Tuesday it is closed. Soho Boutique Bahía Málaga offers Airport shuttle services.

name: Hilton Garden Inn Malaga
description: Settle into a comfortable and spacious guest room or suite at this Malaga hotel, equipped with everything you need to relax and stay productive. Stay connected with complimentary WiFi at the well-lit, ergonomic desk. Feel at home with a mini-refrigerator, adjustable air-conditioning, tea/coffee making facilities, and a spacious bathroom with complimentary toiletries. Browse Freeview channels on the flat-screen TV, and get a great night's sleep in the plush bed, which is dressed in clean, crisp linens. Host your next corporate event or social function at this Malaga hotel with 300 sq. m. meeting space, including a divisible ballroom - ideal for important business meetings, stylish cocktail receptions and unforgettable weddings for up to 250 people. Find everything you need to stay productive in the 24-hour business center, and enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the hotel and in every guest room. Make the most of your leisure time at this welcoming new hotel in Malaga. Exercise with the latest cardio and resistance equipment in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center, or plunge into the sparkling outdoor pool. Dine on Spanish specialties and international favorites in the relaxed Garden Grille restaurant. Unwind in our stylish Lounge, or enjoy a selection of cocktails, beers, wines and light bites on the sunny outdoor terrace. Buy snacks, drinks and sundries at the 24-hour Pavilion Pantry®, or order something tasty and convenient from our room service menu.Hilton

name: Vincci Malaga
description: Situated on Málaga’s seafront promenade, this design hotel offers views over San Andres Beach and the Mediterranean Sea. Each air-conditioned room at Vincci Málaga includes plasma-screen satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at Hotel Vincci Málaga feature elegant white décor with black and green details. Each room comes with a choice of pillows and a minibar. A hairdryer can be found in the marble bathroom. The hotel serves a daily continental breakfast buffet, with sweet and savory options and products for celiacs. The Vincci also has a stylish snack bar with an outdoor terrace. Málaga Pablo Ruiz Picasso Airport is within 5 km of the Vincci Málaga, while Málaga Trade Fair is just 2.5 km away. The city centre and AVE high-speed train station are within a 10-minute drive.

name: Mariposa Hotel Malaga
address: Calle de Casas de Campos, 17, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Striking rooms with art deco-style design and flat-screen TVs feature in Hotel Mariposa Málaga, 400 metres from Málaga’s popular shopping street, Calle Larios. A buffet breakfast is available until 12.00. Hotel Mariposa Málaga features bright colours and chic décor throughout. All air conditioned rooms have a minibar and a fully equipped bathroom. Málaga’s old town is within 15 minutes’ walk of the Hotel Mariposa Málaga and features a selection of cafés, restaurants and traditional tapas bars. Sights including the Picasso Museum and Cervantes Theatre are less than 1 km from the hotel. Hotel Mariposa Málaga has an ideal setting in central Málaga, 10 minutes’ walk from the port. The city’s bus and railway stations are 1 km away.

name: AC Hotel Málaga Palacio by Marriott
description: The unbeatable location between the Málaga Cathedral and the Paseo del Parque, and the spectacular views of the port, make this hotel the most emblematic in the city. It is near the Picasso museum, the Alcazaba, Castillo de Gibralfaro Castle, Marqués de Larios street and La Malagueta beach. The AC Hotel Málaga Palacio restaurant menu is based on regional cuisine with a variety of dishes from all over the world. Check out Ático, the bar and restaurant on the 15th floor terrace, where you also can find our stunning rooftop pool, the ideal place to cool off during the sweltering months of summer while enjoying the magic views. With a new urban spirit we invite you to take a cocktail in our AC Lounge on the first floor with an informal, sophisticate and modern atmosphere in the main center of Málaga city. Our hotel on the Costa del Sol is ideal for business as well as leisure trips. The hotel is 2 km from the railway station and just a ten minute drive to Málaga Airport. R.T.A Register Number: H/MA/00671Marriott

name: Malaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá
address: Av de la Aurora, 25, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Hotel Málaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá Melia is located in Larios Shopping Centre, next to Málaga’s AVE High-Speed Train Station. It offers a fitness centre and air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi connection. The soundproofed rooms at Hotel Hotel Málaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá Melia are outward facing and feature wooden floors. The private bathrooms come with a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel’s restaurant and there are gluten-free options. There is also a variety of restaurants both within Larios Shopping Centre and in the surrounding streets. The 24-hour reception staff at Hotel Hotel Málaga Alameda Centro Affiliated by Meliá Melia can provide information about what to see and do in Málaga. You can also hire a car from the front desk. Málaga’s old town is 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and you can walk to the city's cathedral and the Picasso Museum in around 20 minutes.

name: Holiday Inn Express Malaga Airport
address: Avenida de Velazquez 294 Salida, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Smart Malaga hotel next to Malaga-Costa del Sol Airport, with breakfast and WiFi included Bus line A takes five minutes from Malaga Airport to Holiday Inn Express® Malaga Airport hotel. Present your ticket at the reception and get one-way ticket per person reimbursed. Bus line A connects to Malaga's old town. Harbor Boulevard or Torremolinos and Benalmádena beaches are a short drive away, and the nearby MA21 motorway makes access to the exciting Andalusia region easy. Plaza Mayor mall and Centro Comercial Málaga Nostrum leisure centres are also at hand. Business guests are close to Polígono Guadalhorce, Polígono Villarosa industrial areas and trade fairs at Palacio de Ferias y Congresos in Malaga and Torremolinos. At this hotel, you can enjoy: - Free WiFi - Free Parking (subject to availability) - Continental Express Start breakfast buffet included in the room rate Relax in the comfortable rooms, enjoying free tea and coffee, while watching movies on the flat-screen TV. Family rooms offer sofa beds, ideal for children. Kids under 17 years can stay free when sharing their parents' room. The inclusive continental breakfast buffet offers regional favourites, and dinner is served daily. Early bird breakfast is served from 4am with a limited selection. Enjoy a drink with friends at the bar, lobby or the lovely sunny terrace.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Soho Boutique Malaga
description: Located in Malaga, this stylish hotel is just 500 metres from Malaga Cathedral. Soho Malaga features a bar, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Each bright room at Soho Malaga offers city views. All rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, laptop safe and a telephone. Some rooms have a balcony. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Other services at the hotel include a snack bar, 24 hour reception and tourist information. You can also rent a car or a bicycle. A variety of restaurants, shops and bars are within 5 minutes' walk from the hotel. Soho Malaga is 1.5 km from The Centre of Contemporary Art (CAC). Malaga Airport is 8 km away.

name: Atarazanas Málaga Boutique Hotel
address: Calle De Las Atarazanas, 19, 29005 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Set in a reformed historic building, this attractive hotel is located in the heart of the city. It offers stylish rooms and free WiFi, 500 metres from Malaga Cathedral. Modern, air-conditioned rooms have a plasma satellite TV and a safe box, and some also have a small balcony. Private bathrooms include a hairdryer and vanity mirror, and beach towels are available to rent. Upon request, the hotel offers rooms specially adapted for guests with reduced mobility. There is a luggage storage and weighing facility, as well as a cafe where a gluten-free breakfast is served. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Malaga. The Picasso Museum is 10-minute walk from Atarazanas Malaga Hotel while Museo Thyssen Malaga is 5-minutes walk away. The hotel has a reserved loading bay nearby and a public parking is available for a fee. It offers great transport connections, with Malaga Airport just 15 minutes’ away by car and Málaga Train Station, 1 km away.

name: Exe Málaga Museos
description: This modern hotel is located in the historic centre, 100 metres from Plaza de la Constitución. It offers a seasonal rooftop outdoor pool, a sun terrace and free Wi-Fi, 400 metres from Malaga Cathedral. Rooms at Exe Málaga Museos feature chic, contemporary décor. All include a plasma TV, a laptop safe and a private bathroom with hairdryer. A minibar with soft drinks and water is available for an extra cost. A varied buffet breakfast is served daily and there is a reading room with a TV lounge. The Exe Málaga Museos is set just in front of the Thyssen Museum and 5 minutes’ walk from the Picasso Museum. You can walk to the famous Calle Larios Street in 1 minute. The hotel offers car rental and is 1 km from Malaga Port and 15 minutes’ walk from the city’s beaches. Malaga Airport is around 10 km away.

name: Sol Guadalmar
address: Moby Dick, 2 - Urbanization Guadalmar, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Surrounded by attractive gardens, the Sol Guadalmar features 2 outdoor swimming pools for adults and children. All air-conditioned rooms enjoy free Wi-Fi and views over the Bay of Málaga from the balcony. The hotel has direct access to Guadalmar and Bajondillo Beaches. Guests have free access to the tennis court and indoor heated pool. For a supplement, you can use the gym, sauna and hot tub. Sol Guadalmar Hotel serves a breakfast buffet. The Cenachero Restaurant offers a buffet dinner with show cooking. You can enjoy cocktails on the terrace at Bar Picasso. Málaga Airport is 3 km from Sol Guadalmar and the historic centre of Málaga is 5 km away. Horse riding, water sports and excursions can be arranged by the hotel. A bus to Malaga City Centre stops outside the hotel.

name: limehome Málaga Calle Ancha del Carmen - Digital Access
address: C. Ancha Del Carmen 21, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: No description found

name: Eurostars Astoria
address: Av Del Comandante Benitez, 5, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Eurostars Astoria has an ideal setting in the centre of Málaga, 10 minutes’ walk from the Picasso Museum and 1 km from the beach. It offers free Wi-Fi internet access. Rooms at the hotel are decorated in neutral tones and are equipped with air conditioning. They all feature a private bathroom. The 24-hour reception has a tour desk and car rental services. The friendly staff are happy to provide tourist information and make suggestions for nearby restaurants and bars. The Eurostars Astoria is situated 500 metres from the María Zambrano AVE Train Station, with direct routes to Madrid and the airport. The area around the hotel has museums and historic buildings, including the cathedral. Reservations of 3 or more rooms are considered groups and may have special conditions. The hotel may request payment in advance and the date of cancellation without charge will be indicated by the hotel.

name: Icon Malabar
description: Attractively situated in the centre of Málaga, ICON Malabar features air-conditioned rooms, free bikes, free WiFi and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from La Malagueta Beach. At the hotel, rooms include a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room is equipped with a safety deposit box, while certain rooms have a balcony and others also boast city views. The rooms will provide guests with a minibar. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes buffet, continental and vegetarian options. Round-the-clock advice is available at the reception, where staff speak English and French. Popular points of interest near ICON Malabar include San Andres Beach, La Caleta Beach and Alcazaba. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: H10 Croma Malaga
description: Within a 20-minute stroll from Malaga Train Station, the hotel offers guests an ideal base when in Malaga. It also offers a plunge pool, a swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can assist with booking tours and tickets. The rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, an in-room safe and a mini bar. They all have an in-room closet, a desk and a ceiling fan. Each morning, guests can enjoy breakfast at Buffet Restaurant or Rooftop Restaurant. There is also the added convenience of an on-site restaurant. Malaga's attractions, such as Calle Larios, are within easy walking distance of H10 Croma Malaga. Guests can also visit the Picasso Museum, Alcazaba of Malaga and the Museum of Malaga.Revato

name: Residencia Universitaria Málaga Centro
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Málaga, Residencia Universitaria Málaga Centro provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a terrace. Private parking is available on site. At the hostel, rooms come with a desk. At Residencia Universitaria Málaga Centro each room includes a private bathroom and bed linen. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Malaga María Zambrano Train Station, Jorge Rando Museum and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from Residencia Universitaria Málaga Centro.

name: Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World
description: In a prime location in the centre of Málaga, Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation features airport transfers, while a car rental service is also available. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while some rooms will provide you with a terrace and others also provide guests with city views. All units at Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Breakfast is available daily, and includes buffet, continental and American options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Malagueta Beach, La Caleta Beach and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 11 km from Palacio Solecio, a Small Luxury Hotel of the World.

name: Hotel Málaga Vibes
description: Situated in Málaga, 1.9 km from Misericordia Beach, Hotel Málaga Vibes features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a terrace and a bar. Each accommodation at the 3-star hotel has city views and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from Sacaba Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hotel Málaga Vibes rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. A buffet, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Round-the-clock advice is available at the reception, where staff speak English, Spanish, French and Italian. Automobile and Fashion Museum is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Malaga María Zambrano Train Station is 5.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 3 km from Hotel Málaga Vibes.

name: Hotel Palacete de Alamos
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout the property, Hotel Palacete de Alamos offers accommodation in Málaga, 200 metres from Pablo Ruiz Picasso Foundation. Certain rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. A flat-screen TV is available. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Picasso Museum is 200 metres from Hotel Palacete de Alamos, while Alcazaba is 400 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Vincci Larios Diez
address: Calle Marqués de Larios, 10, 29005 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Well set in the centre of Málaga, Vincci Larios Diez provides air-conditioned rooms, a terrace, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can make use of a bar. All units at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Every room comes with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while some feature city views. The units include a desk. A buffet, continental or vegetarian breakfast is available daily at the property. Popular points of interest near Vincci Larios Diez include La Malagueta Beach, La Caleta Beach and Jorge Rando Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Room Mate Valeria
address: Plaza Del Poeta Alfonso Canales, 5, 29001 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Featuring a seasonal rooftop plunge pool with views and a courtyard, Room Mate Valeria is 200 metres away from Calle Larios. Free WiFi is available throughout. All air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms in this design hotel include a flat-screen TV with USB and HDMI connection, full-length mirror, minibar, and a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, rain-effect shower and free toiletries. Room Mate Valeria offers a fitness centre and meeting facilities. Breakfast is served until 12:00. Malaga Cathedral is 300 metres away while La Malagueta Beach is 20 minutes’ walk. Malaga Airport is 8 km from Room Mate Valeria.

name: Hostal Romerito
description: Hostal Romerito offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi in the neighborhood of Los Prados, 4 km from the city centre. Málaga Airport is a 10-minute drive from the property. All heated rooms at the family-run El Romerito have a private bathroom, and there is a TV and work desk. The guest house also has a 24-hour front desk, allowing you greater flexibility. Malaga Auditorium is 700 metres from Hostal Romerito, and the Málaga Congress Palace is within a 5-minute drive. You can easily reach central Málaga on the number 24 bus, which stops nearby. There is easy access to the A-7 Motorway, and public parking is available nearby for a small daily charge. The nearest aiport is Malaga Airport, 10 minutes drive away from the property.

name: M Pods Malaga
description: Set in Málaga, 600 metres from San Andres Beach, M Pods Malaga provides air-conditioned rooms and a shared lounge. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.7 km from Port of Malaga, 1.8 km from Malaga Cathedral and 2 km from Malaga Museum. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. At the capsule hotel, all rooms are fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a shared bathroom, bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near M Pods Malaga include Misericordia Beach, Malaga María Zambrano Train Station and Automobile and Fashion Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Only You Hotel Malaga
description: Only YOU Hotel Málaga has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a restaurant and bar in Málaga. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.5 km from La Malagueta Beach, and within 600 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Rooms include a kettle, while certain rooms have a terrace and others also boast city views. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near Only YOU Hotel Málaga include La Caleta Beach, Port of Malaga and Malaga Cathedral. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Futurotel Malagueta Beach
description: Featuring a jacuzzi and a wellness centre, Futurotel Malagueta Beach is set in the centre of Málaga, 1 minute away from the beach. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Picasso Museum, Malaga Cathedral, and Museum of Glass and Crystal. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk and room service for guests. The accommodation offers private jacuzzi. At the capsule hotel every room has air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kitchenette, a dining area, a safety deposit box and a shared bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and free toiletries.
