At Futurotel Malagueta Beach all rooms have bed linen and towels. Futurotel Malagueta Beach has the most advanced technology offering guests services such opening doors from a mobile App, smart mirrors with video, touch screen taps, smart toilets with lid heating and temperature adjustable water jet cleaning. As if this were not enough, Futurotel has a spectacular Gaming Zone with PS5, Arcade Machines, Gaming Computers, Table Football, Billiards and Dartboard. Enjoy your stay in your capsule room with the greatest comfort and advanced technology: Pillow menu, Air Conditioning/Heating, Multifunctional clock, Plug, USB plug, Safe, Flat screen with multifunctional program with games and booking of tourist activities, Mattress adapted to your weight and height, Mini Bar, Locker, Reading light, Choice of ambient light, Table. Popular points of interest near Futurotel Malagueta Beach include Alcazaba, Malaga Park and Malaga Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the capsule hotel.

name: Málaga Boutique Adults Recommended
address: Cañuelo de San Bernardo, 4, 29008 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Málaga Boutique, Adults Recomended is well located in the middle of Málaga. Popular points of interest nearby include Picasso Museum, Pablo Ruiz Picasso Foundation and Malaga Cathedral. Local points of interest like Alcazaba and Carmen Thyssen Museum are reachable within 300 metres and 400 metres, respectively. The units in Málaga Boutique, Adults Recomended are equipped with a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom, rooms at Málaga Boutique, Adults Recomended also have free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a balcony. Guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Calle Larios is 400 metres from Málaga Boutique, Adults Recomended, while Malagueta Beach is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from the property.

name: Vincci Seleccion Posada Del Patio
address: Pasillo Santa Isabel No. 7, 29005 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Posada del Patio is 5-star hotel, situated in the centre of Málaga, with a rooftop swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. It features a fascinating exhibition of historic objects. All rooms come with welcome products, a safe and a flat-screen TV. They feature a contemporary design and include a modern bathroom. Vincci Selección Posada del Patio also offers the exclusive Essence experience, with rooms located separately on an independent floor. Some of the services offered for these rooms include a daily bottled water, national and international daily press, and a private terrace. Snacks and beverages are also available. Important archaeological remains have been found beneath the Vincci Selección Posada del Patio. These include part of the city's Arabic walls, which guests can visit from the hotel. Restaurante Entremuros serves nouvelle mediterranean cuisine. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. The hotel also has a stylish bar. The Posada del Patio is just 10 minutes’ walk from the AVE high-speed Train Station. The Cathedral and the Picasso Museum are 500 metres away.

name: Hotel Ms Maestranza
address: Avd Canovas Del Castillo 1, 29016 Málaga, Andalusia
description: MS Maestranza Málaga is in central Málaga, just 100 metres from Malagueta Beach and Centre Pompidou. It offers a rooftop terrace and hot tub with panoramic city views, and rooms with free WiFi. The hotel is set next to the bullring and the Alameda Gardens. The Alcazaba and Gibralfaro Castle are also nearby. The historic city centre and the Picasso Museum are 10 minutes' walk away. Guests have free use of the hotel relaxation area, which includes a sauna, hot tub and Turkish bath. A massage service is also available, at an extra cost. Rooms have warm colours and stylish décor. They offer a minibar, hairdryer and satellite TV. There is a bus stop just a few metres from the hotel providing transport links to Málaga Airport.

name: Petit Palace Plaza Málaga
description: Located on a pedestrian area just off the popular Larios Street, next to Carmen Thyssen Museum and opposite Málaga Cathedral, this design hotel features free WiFi. The property offers MiFi (subject to availability for an extra cost). Petit Palace Plaza Málaga is set in a 20th-century palatial residence. Some rooms have views of the cathedral. Guests can enjoy a buffet breakfast in the hotel’s traditional Andalusian courtyard. The hotel offers a bicycle and scooter hire service, and baby prams and children's car seats are available (subject to availability). The Plaza Málaga is situated 300 metres from the Picasso Museum and 500 metres from Málaga Port. La Malagueta Beach is a 20-minute walk or a short bus ride away. Revello de Toro Museum is 2 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Eliseos
description: Offering superb views of the bullring directly opposite, Hotel Eliseos offers free Wi-Fi, rooftop terrace with a small seasonal pool and on-site parking suitable for vans and caravans for a daily fee. This hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, some with a balcony. Kettles and hairdryers are available upon request. Throughout your stay, make use of Hotel Eliseos' 24-hour reception. Here you can get useful tips, such as local restaurant recommendations. The Picasso Museum is just 800 metres away, and Playa de la Malagueta Beach is 350 metres away. Malaga Airport can be reached in 22 minutes by car.

name: Alcazaba Premium Hotel
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Málaga, Alcazaba Premium Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. This 2-star hotel offers a bar. The accommodation provides airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room includes a safety deposit box, while selected rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also have city views. The units feature a wardrobe. A continental, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast is available every morning at the property. At Alcazaba Premium Hotel you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Staff speak German, English, Spanish and Italian at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Malagueta Beach, La Caleta Beach and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 10 km from Alcazaba Premium Hotel.

name: Casual del Mar Málaga
address: Avenida de la Aurora, 9, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located within 700 metres of Calle Larios, Casual del Mar Málaga offers private rooms in Málaga. The property is 1 km from the city centre. At the hotel, the rooms come with a air conditioned, private bathroom, desk and a flat-screen TV. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Additional services such as portable WiFi, special package for pets, power banks for mobile photones and selfie sticks are available for a surcharge. A baby pack consisting of a pushchair, a baby bath and a baby carrier is also available upon request for a surcharge. Speaking English, Spanish and Italian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area. Popular points of interest near Casual Málaga del Mar include Alcazaba, Pablo Ruiz Picasso Foundation and Atarazanas Market. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 7 km drive from the property. There are also direct trains to the aiport departing from Malaga Centro Alameda Train Station, 200 metres from the property.

name: Parador Málaga Gibralfaro Hotel
description: This Parador Hotel has an unbeatable central position in Málaga beside the castle. Situated on top of Mount Gibralfaro, you can look over the city and the Mediterranean Sea from a unique perspective. Head to the roof terrace for a fabulous swimming pool and sun terrace with incredible views. Stay active this holiday thanks to the Parador de Málaga Gibralfaro's location beside the Parador del Golf which boasts facilities for practising tennis and golf. Interiors of the Parador de Málaga Gibralfaro are welcoming and charming. Sit and chat with friends in the lounge areas where you can admire the elegant antique furniture, rich fabrics and warm Mediterranean tones. Sample Andalusian specialities in the Parador de Málaga Gibralfaro's restaurant which among other dishes serves delicious fresh fish and seafood.

name: Hotel Villa Guadalupe
description: This charming hotel rests in a residential area in the outskirts of Malaga and has breathtaking views of the city and coast. Newly constructed, the hotel is furnished with quality materials like marble and wood. White walls and large windows create a naturally bright space. The hotel is finished off with tapestries, mosaics, frescoes and edgings from the artist Irene van Vlijmen.

name: Málaga Premium Hotel
description: Málaga Premium Hotel is located in a pedestrian street in the heart of Málaga. Guests can enjoy their 2 on-site restaurants and their rooftop terrace bar. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. Málaga Premium Hotel features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Carmen Thyssen Museum is 100 metres from Málaga Premium Hotel, while Calle Larios is 200 metres away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from Málaga Premium Hotel.

name: easyHotel Malaga City Centre
address: Avda Ingeniero Jose Maria Garnica, 6, 29002 Málaga, Andalusia
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and an LED TV, as well as air conditioning and daily housekeeping. Other amenities include towels, tour/ticket assistance, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.Expedia

name: Hotel Boutique Teatro Romano
description: Hotel Boutique Teatro Romano is located right in the heart of Malaga's old town, opossite the Roman Theatre and 100 metres from Picasso Museum. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen and a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms offer views to the Alcazaba Castle and the Roman Theatre. Hotel Boutique Teatro Romano features free WiFi throughout the property. The reception is open from 8.30 to 21.30. Alcazaba is 200 metres from Hotel Boutique Teatro Romano, while Malaga Cathedral is 300 metres from the property. Malaga Airport is 11 km away.

name: Novotel Suites Malaga Centro
description: Ten minutes from city center, Novotel Suites Málaga Centro is ideal for exploring Malaga. After resting in its comfortable, spacious, soundproofed suites, start the day in the fitness room and enjoy a continental breakfast. You can use your suite's kitchenette with a fridge, microwave and coffee maker. The hotel is pet-friendly and offers 24-hour snacks and paid public parking if you come by car.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Plaza Del Castillo
address: Calle De Fedra (Calle Albania 3-5), 29196 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Featuring a unique medieval design, Hotel Plaza Del Castillo has a distinctive façade resembling a castle and beautiful ornate gardens. Its rooms have air conditioning, heating and a minibar. Featuring stained-glass windows, stone walls and medieval paintings, Plaza del Castillo offers several banquet rooms and a restaurant that serves both traditional and creative cuisine. Room service is available for a surcharge. There is a 24-hour reception and free parking. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout. Hotel Plaza Del Castillo is conveniently located between the A-7 and the A-357 motorways, only 2 minutes’ drive from Mercamálaga wholesale market. The Congress Palace and the Cortijo Torres Fairground are less than 10 minutes by car. The city centre is 10 km away, while Malaga Airport is 12 km away. A bus stop located just 300 metres away connects you with the city centre and Malagueta Beach.

name: Tandem Soho Suites
description: Tandem Soho Suites features air-conditioned guest accommodation in the centre of Málaga, 1.7 km from La Malagueta Beach, 1.8 km from San Andres Beach and 2.1 km from La Caleta Beach. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Malaga Cathedral, Port of Malaga and Malaga Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from Tandem Soho Suites.

name: NH Málaga
description: The elegant modern building of the NH Málaga hotel, completely renovated in 2019, is in a prime location and offers its guests lovely views of the famous Esperanza church. A short 15-minute walk from the hotel takes you to the stunning Spanish beaches and the Muelle 1 shopping center. You can also explore further afield as the train station is near to the hotel. The rooms at NH Málaga ensure deep comfortable sleep with soundproof windows and allow you to stay connected throughout your trip with free Wi-Fi. Each room is outward facing with views over Malaga, the river, or the Esperanza church. The breakfast is spectacular and filling, with a wide range of fresh and healthy options, including cooked-to-order eggs, cold cuts, cheeses, and fresh pastries. For a special experience with a new gastronomic concept, head to our hotel restaurant, Tablafina, a place where you can enjoy good wine with quality tapas. Snacks and drinks can be enjoyed at the Cafeteria Bar. You can also unwind with a glass of delicious local wine on our terrace. The hotel has a gym for workouts and an outdoor pool for relaxation. Meetings or conferences can be easily accommodated in one of our 14 rooms, the largest of which can hold over to 1,500 people.NH Hoteles

name: Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito
address: Avenida Del Lido S/N, Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is situated in Torremolinos, 100 meters from Playamar and Bajondillo beaches and the seaside promenade. A swimming pool, hot tub and free hammam are featured. Their air-conditioned and heated rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, kettle, coffee maker, safe and minibar. The private bathroom includes hair dryer, bathrobe, shower and free toiletries. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, sun terrace, a hot tub and a turkish bath. Their buffet restaurant offers a range of culinary options. Free WiFi is featured. The Essence Hotel Boutique by Don Paquito is within easy reach of all kinds of attractions, places of interest and the renowned nightlife. Malaga Airport is 12 minutes drive away.

name: Hotel Málaga Nostrum Airport
address: Calle Herman Hesse, No.17, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: NEWLY REFURBISHED HOTEL Hotel Málaga Nostrum is located in a key point of Málaga, just 5 minutes by car from the airport, 10 minutes from the center and 10 minutes from the beach. We offer a unique experience aiding rest and relaxation. Our modern and bright rooms have free Wi-Fi, Smart TV with access to Netflix, air conditioning, desk and minibar. The private bathroom has a hairdryer and toiletries. Discover our breakfasts at Global Restaurant & Lounge, located on the ground floor of the hotel, which also houses our Sport Bar and a large leisure terrace. On the 4th floor you can enjoy the views of the sky of Malaga from our pool, and a splendid Chill Out area. We have a 24-hour reception and covered parking for €5/night for all our clients. Dogs are allowed according to availability with an extra cost of €15/night. Dogs weighing more than 10 kg will not be allowed.

name: Parador de Malaga Golf
address: Autovía MA-20 Málaga-Algeciras Salida 1, 29004 Málaga, Andalusia
description: This luxury hotel blends great golfing with an authentic Andalusian feel and fantastic sea views. Come and enjoy a round beneath the warm, Mediterranean sunshine of the Costa del Sol. The Parador de Málaga Golf sits beside its own magnificent and historic 18-hole golf course. Originally dating from 1925, this course was designed by Tom Simpson, who also built the courses at Muirfield and Turnberry. It also includes 3 putting greens and 2 approach greens. After a round in the sunshine, refresh yourself with a dip in the outdoor swimming pool. Then head to the restaurant to try the delicious local specialities on offer. The hotel building itself is a fine example of Andalusian architecture. Its interior is full of fashionable, contemporary design features which create a unique feel. A seasonal outdoor pool is featured. Plaza Mayor shopping centre can be found 500 metres from the property while Malaga town centre is 10 km away. Malaga Airport is 4 km away from the property.

name: Hotel Campanile Málaga Aeropuerto
description: Campanile Málaga Airport Hotel is just 5 minutes’ drive from Málaga International Airport and 10 minutes from the city centre. It offers free Wi-Fi and free parking. Málaga Airport Hotel has bright, modern, air-conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV and a work desk. Children under 10 years old stay free when using existing bedding. The Campanile Málaga Airport restaurant offers breakfast and meals can be ordered in advance. Málaga’s Exhibition Centre, the Picasso Museum and the city’s main beaches are all around 2 km away. Buses run from the hotel to the airport.

name: Hotel Sur Málaga
description: Hotel Sur Málaga is situated in central Málaga, a short walk from the Picasso Museum and Atarazanas Market. This elegant hotel offers a lounge area and free Wi-Fi in all rooms. Rooms at Sur feature a classic design and come with satellite TV. They include air conditioning and a private bathroom. Hotel Sur Málaga operates a 24-hour reception with a tour desk, where guests can receive information on the city. Car rental can also be arranged. The Alcazaba and Málaga Cathedral are all located within 10 minutes’ walk of Hotel Sur Málaga. The shops on Calle Larios are 300 metres away. Private parking is available on site, for an additional cost.

name: Hotel Romerito
description: Hotel Romerito is in Malaga's Los Prados neighborhood, set on the same street as Malaga's Convention Centre, Trade Fair and Auditorium, 800 metres away. It is approximately 5 km from Malaga’s historic centre. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Romerito feature free WiFi, a plasma TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a private terrace. The hotel also has a bar and an excellent restaurant, with à la carte and daily set menus serving Malagan specialities. There are regular bus connections to central Malaga. The nearest beach is 5 km away and Malaga Airport is a 15-minute drive from the Hotel Romerito. On-site parking is available at the hotel.

name: ibis Malaga Centro Ciudad
description: If you're planning to visit Malaga with your family, we recommend ibis Málaga Centro, perfect for a cheap holiday with children. Its location is perfect to travel by public transport or car. This hotel has comfortable rooms with a temperature regulator, AC (according to climatology) & the new Sweet Bed by ibis; the hotel offers free WIFI, parking is available and you can relax and have a drink at our bar.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Humaina
description: Hotel Humaina offers accommodation in the Mountains of Málaga Nature Reserve, a 40 minutes’ drive from Málaga city centre. It features an outdoor pool and charming rooms with balconies offering mountain views. Each air-conditioned room at Hotel Humaina has been carefully decorated and features plenty of natural light. Rooms include a TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer and free toiletries. Hotel Humaina has a restaurant which serves a variety of regional and traditional dishes. There is also a lounge area where guests can relax while reading a book or having a glass of wine by the fireplace. Bicycles are available for an extra charge. The area is ideal for hiking, cycling or horse riding. Staff at the tour desk can also provide tourist information about the area. The city center is 23 km from the property. Málaga Airport is 50 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

name: Alux Boutique Hotel
description: Boasting a terrace and a bar, Alux Boutique Hotel is attractively situated in the centre of Málaga, 1.3 km from La Malagueta Beach. Popular points of interest nearby include Museum of Glass and Crystal, Jorge Rando Museum and Malaga Park. San Andres Beach is 2.8 km away and Malaga Cathedral is 400 metres from the hotel. Popular points of interest near the hotel include La Caleta Beach, Picasso Museum and Alcazaba. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 11 km from Alux Boutique Hotel.

name: Elcano
address: Avd. Juan Sebastian Elcano 103, 29017 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located just 250 metres from the beach in Málaga’s eastern district of Pedregalejo, this hotel provides a peaceful setting for your stay in the capital of the Costa del Sol. Free WiFi is available throughout. The Elcano lies a 10-minute journey from the historic centre of this Andalusian port city. The nearby seafront promenade is also a great place to sample the city’s famous seafood cuisine. The hotel’s interior blends cheerful colors with charming traditional furnishings in wrought iron or attractive woods. Outside, the terracotta and whitewashed buildings create an authentically Andalusian feel. The hotel’s glassed terrace provides a great place to enjoy a quiet coffee or beer with a book. A natural Andalusian breakfast is offered at the property. A bike rental service is available. El Candado Nautical and Golf Club is 3 km away. Málaga city centre is 12 minutes' drive from the hotel. A-7 Motorway is a 3-minute drive away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 20 minutes's drive from the hotel.

name: B&b Hotel Málaga Centro
description: Situated conveniently in Málaga, B&B HOTEL Málaga Centro offers a buffet breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is set 2.3 km from La Malagueta Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units will provide guests with a fridge. Popular points of interest near B&B HOTEL Málaga Centro include Jorge Rando Museum, Picasso Museum and Alcazaba. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Toc Hostel Malaga
description: Well set in Málaga, TOC Hostel Malaga provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Popular points of interest nearby include Alcazaba, Museum of Glass and Crystal and Jorge Rando Museum. The accommodation features a shared kitchen, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at the hostel also provide guests with a city view. All units include bed linen. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available daily at TOC Hostel Malaga. You can play billiards at the accommodation, and bike hire and car hire are available. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Italian at the reception, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area. Popular points of interest near TOC Hostel Malaga include La Malagueta Beach, La Caleta Beach and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga, 11 km from the hostel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Solymar
description: Hotel Solymar is just 100 metres from the Malaga Beach. It offers great-value, modern accommodation in the centre of the city. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Rooms at the hotel are simple and comfortable. They all have an en suite bathroom. Rooms also have air conditioning, TV and a minibar. The hotel features a 24-hour reception desk, a lift and shared lounge with vending machines, kettle, microwave and seating area. Hotel Solymar is located near Malaga’s Train and Bus Station. This makes it ideal for transport connections. It also has good access to the historic city centre.

name: Hotel Domus
description: Situated in Málaga’s quiet Pedregalejo district, Domus is just a 5-minute walk from Pedregalejo Beach. Each stylish room features air conditioning/heating, flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi access. Rooms at the Domus have functional modern design and wooden floors. They all have a work desk and a private bathroom. The Domus serves a simple continental breakfast each morning, and guests can enjoy a drink on the garden terrace. The Domus hotel is located 4 km from Málaga city centre, which can be reached in 10 minutes by bus. The streets around the hotel have a wide range of restaurants and bars.

name: Hotel Brö-Adults Recommended
description: Boasting an outdoor swimming pool, a shared lounge as well as a terrace, Hotel Brö-Adults Recommended is set in the centre of Málaga, 1.3 km from La Malagueta Beach. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and free WiFi. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from La Caleta Beach. At the hotel, all rooms have a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Rooms come with a safety deposit box, while some rooms also offer a balcony and others also have city views. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near Hotel Brö-Adults Recommended include Picasso Museum, Alcazaba and Museum of Glass and Crystal. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 10 km from the accommodation.

name: Castilla Guerrero
description: The Castilla Guerrero hotel in Soho Málaga is within easy walking distance of the Cathedral, Alcazaba and the Picasso Museum. It has free WiFi. The rooms in the Castilla Guerrero are practical and light. All have air conditioning, heating, a small fridge, free safe and TV. The café-restaurant ‘Cordoba 7’ offers breakfast, lunch, dinner and snacks. It has a selection of tapas, typical Andalusian dishes and wines. The Castilla Guerrero can be found close to Alameda Principal, Calle Larios and the port.

name: Hotel Goartin
description: The modern Hotel Goartín is just 10 minutes' walk from Málaga's María Zambrano Train Station and the city's bus station. A private parking is available. Hotel Goartín features comfortable rooms with free Wi-Fi, a TV and private bathroom. Some rooms include a balcony or a terrace. Advice and information on the surrounding area can be requested from the 24-hour reception. Vending machines can be found in the lobby. Huelin Beach is a 15-minute walk from the Goartín Hotel. There are many restaurants nearby the hotel and along the Antonio Machado promenade on the sea front. Malaga Airport can be reached in 15 minutes by car.

name: Malaga Stop Hostel Ab
address: Calle Don Juan de Austria, 2, 29009 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Ideally located in the centre of Málaga, Malaga Stop Hostel AB offers air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.6 km from Alcazaba, 1.5 km from Malaga María Zambrano Train Station and 1.6 km from Malaga Park. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. All guest rooms feature a shared bathroom, a hairdryer and bed linen. Popular points of interest near the hostel include Jorge Rando Museum, Picasso Museum and Museum of Glass and Crystal. The nearest airport is Malaga, 9 km from Malaga Stop Hostel AB, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Feel Hostels Soho Malaga
description: Feel Hostels Soho Malaga is centrally located, 10 minutes’ walk from Málaga Train Station and the Picasso Museum. It offers a sun terrace, 24-hour reception and free WiFi available throughout. You can choose from a private room with shared bathroom facilities, or a bed in a female or mixed dormitory. All have wooden floors and some include a balcony. Sheets are provided, and towels can be rented from reception. A buffet breakfast is offered at the Feel Hostels Soho Málaga. There is a communal kitchen and a TV lounge. The hostel organises activities including guided tours, book exchanges and pub crawls. Luggage storage and a laundry service are available. Feel Hostels Soho Málaga has a tour desk. It is 20 minutes’ walk from the beach and there are bus stops outside the guest house.

name: Soho Boutique Castillo de Santa Catalina
description: Hotel Soho Boutique Castillo Santa Catalina is located in Malaga and offers free Wi-Fi. It also provides a coffee bar, massage services and an express check-in and check-out feature. This 5-star hotel offers a concierge, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. There are 24 rooms at Hotel Soho Boutique Castillo Santa Catalina, each offering all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Honeymoon suites are also available. Hotel Soho Boutique Castillo Santa Catalina offers disabled parking and is an easy car ride from the Picasso Museum, Malaga Cathedral and Malaga (DO). The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Malaga.Revato

name: Soho Boutique Colon
description: Set in the centre of Málaga, 1.7 km from San Andres Beach, Soho Boutique Colón offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is around 2.2 km from Misericordia Beach, 2.3 km from La Caleta Beach and less than 1 km from Malaga María Zambrano Train Station. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.9 km from La Malagueta Beach. At the hotel, all rooms come with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near Soho Boutique Colón include Malaga Cathedral, Port of Malaga and Malaga Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Boutique Villa Lorena by Charming Stay
description: Located in El Limonar, a quiet residential area only 5 minutes’ walk from the beach, Villa Lorena is a charming villa offering a private outdoor swimming pool and free WiFi. Bikes are also available at an additional cost. Hotel Boutique Villa Lorena by Charming Stay Adults Recommended features 7 bedrooms, which have been perfectly decorated. All air-conditioned rooms offer a private bathroom with hairdryer, a safe, flat-screen TV and coffee maker. The Villa has a garden and a sun terrace. Staff at the tour desk is happy to provide tourist information about the area. Malaga City Centre is 5 minutes’ drive from Hotel Boutique Villa Lorena by Charming Stay Adults Recommended or a 10-minute bike ride away. Guests can visit the Picasso Museum or taste the local food in one of the numerous bars and restaurants nearby.

name: Feel Hostels City Center
address: Calle Concejal Agustín Moreno, 1, 29005 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Feel Hostels City Center is set 2 minutes’ walk from the Picasso Museum. It offers a terrace, free WiFi and various city tours, activities and theme nights. Dormitory rooms at the hostel are bright and include air conditioning and heating. There are lockers, individual lamps and bunk beds, while bathrooms are shared. Private rooms are also available. The property has a shared kitchen. There is also a lounge area with games, computers with internet connection and TV. The hostel is just 200 metres from Malaga Cathedral and 5 minutes' walk from lively Larios Street. You can walk to Malagueta Beach in 15 minutes. Buses around the city stop within 3 minutes’ walk of Feel Hostels City Center, which is 15 minutes’ walk from Malaga Train Station.

name: Soho Boutique Equitativa
description: Soho Boutique Equitativa features an outdoor swimming pool, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Málaga. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 600 metres from the city centre and 1.5 km from La Malagueta Beach. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. A buffet breakfast is available daily at Soho Boutique Equitativa. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include La Caleta Beach, Port of Malaga and Malaga Cathedral. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from Soho Boutique Equitativa.

name: Soho Los Naranjos
description: Set just metres from the beach, this charming, Mediterranean-style hotel is located in a privileged residential area of Málaga. The smart, continental-style decor of Los Naranjos creates an inviting venue for your visit to the Costa del Sol. Relax with friends or chat with other guests in the elegant lounge area, complete with plenty of sofa space. You can also research the area and email friends on the free, Wi-Fi internet connection available throughout the hotel. Take the short, 5-minute walk down to the Malagueta Beach where you can soak up the sunshine and take a refreshing dip in the mild Mediterranean waters. Later, stroll into Málaga’s historic city centre to visit the Picasso Museum, dedicated to the artist who was born in the city.

name: Rincón Sol
description: Rincón Sol is set at the beachfront of Rincón de la Victoria. It offers a range of leisure facilities such as a restaurant and cafeteria, a nightclub and a seasonal beach bar. Air-conditioned rooms at Rincón Sol are modern and spacious, featuring a private terrace with views of the promenade, the main street or the sea. They have a minibar, a satellite TV and a private bathroom, as well as free Wi-Fi and a safe. Guests can rent bikes onsite, and activities such as golf, tennis and paddle tennis can be practiced on the area. Other facilities include meeting and banquet rooms. Set on the Axarquía Route, this hotel is 10 km away from Málaga. Private parking is offered for an extra cost.

name: Residencia Universitaria Campus Málaga
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 304 guestrooms featuring microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided. Amenities Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool. Additional features at this hostel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a communal living room. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Limited parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Residencia Universitaria Campus Málaga in Málaga (Teatinos), you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Malagueta Beach and Port of Malaga. This hostel is 3 mi (4.8 km) from Málaga Cathedral and 4 mi (6.4 km) from Picasso Museum Malaga. Dining Enjoy a satisfying meal at Comedor de la residencia serving guests of Residencia Universitaria Campus Málaga. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 8:30 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. name: Welcome Hostel
description: Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Churriana district of Churriana, Welcome Hostel is 2.6 km from Campo de Golf Beach. Among the facilities at this property are a shared kitchen and a shared lounge, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 9.2 km from Automobile and Fashion Museum. The units in the hostel are equipped with a kettle. At Welcome Hostel all rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Benalmadena Puerto Marina is 10 km from the accommodation, while Malaga María Zambrano Train Station is 11 km away. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 1 km from Welcome Hostel.

name: Hotel Best Siroco
address: Carril del Siroco, s/n, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Hotel Best Siroco is situated just 250 metres from Torre Bermeja Beach. Set in gardens, this hotel has 2 seasonal outdoor swimming pools and rooms with balconies. Hotel Best Siroco has brightly decorated rooms with wooden floors and furnishings. Each room has a TV and air conditioning. Free WiFi is available. Buffet meals and Spanish dishes are prepared and served in Best Siroco’s restaurant with its show kitchen. Guests can enjoy a drink in the terrace bar, where there is free WiFi access. Gluten-free food is available. Facilities include a gym, and a Turkish bath and sauna are available at an extra cost. Hotel Best Siroco is just 10 minutes’ walk from Torre Bermeja Marina and Torrequebrada Golf Course is approximately 3 km away.

name: Hotel Maria Cristina
address: Avda. De Málaga, 18, 29720 Rincón de la Victoria, Andalusia
description: The 2-star Maria Cristina Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in RincÃ³n De La Victoria. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. To be found at the hotel are facilities for disabled guests, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, airport transfer, meeting facilities. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including golf course (on site), before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. Friendly staff, great facilities and close proximity to all that RincÃ³n De La Victoria has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Maria Cristina Hotel.priceline.com

name: Soho Boutique Las Vegas
description: Situated on the seafront overlooking La Malagueta Beach, Soho Boutique Las Vegas offers an outdoor pool, gardens and airy rooms with a private balcony. Malaga city centre is just 2.5 km away. Rooms at Soho Boutique Las Vegas are spacious and air conditioned. They all include free Wi-Fi, a safe, satellite TV and a marble bathroom with a hairdryer. A continental breakfast buffet is served in the hotel's poolside café. There is also a café-bar at reception. Luggage storage and visitor information are available from the 24-hour reception. Limited parking is available on site for a surcharge and reservations are not possible. There is a range of bars and restaurants within 50 metres of the Soho Boutique Las Vegas. Málaga Cathedral and the Picasso Museum are a 30-minute walk away, and regular buses to the city centre stop near the hotel.

name: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments
address: Av. Del Sol, 5, Benalmádena, 29630 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Sunset Beach Club Hotel Apartments are located on the shores of the Mediterranean Sea, and feature 2 large outdoor pools, and 2 children’s pools. Facilities include 6 seasonal bars and restaurants, a large supermarket, and free wi-fi. All Apartments at the Sunset Beach Club have a balcony or terrace, fully equipped kitchenette, individually controlled air-conditioning/heating, satellite TV, and safe. A hair & beauty salon and fitness centre are also available (fees apply). Free guest activities and entertainment are offered all year round. Guests can enjoy hot buffet breakfasts and dinners inside the Oasis Restaurant. A la carte lunches and dinners, afternoon snacks and cocktails, are available at La Terraza terrace restaurant. The Panorama Bar boasts spectacular sea views, and shows live international sports on TV.

name: Hostal Tilos
description: Located 500 metres from Malaga Train Station, Hostal los Tilos offers free Wi-Fi. Well connected with public transports, it is 100 metres from Malaga Bus Station. Rooms at Hostal los Tilos come with single and double rooms with a private bathroom with free toiletries and bath or shower. Rooms feature a flat-screen TV, wardrobe and some have a private balcony. Bed linen and towels are also provided. You can find several restaurants and traditional chiringuitos serving fish, seafood, paella and sangria along the coast. El Corte Inglés Shopping Center open till late is 700 metres away. Hostal los Tilos is 15 minutes’ walk from Malaga sandy beach. Famous Alcazaba Moorish Castle is 2 km away and you can walk to the city center ion 20 minutes. Free bike parking is available on site.

name: The Urban Jungle Hostel
address: Calle Niño de Guevara 8, 29008 Málaga, Andalusia
description: The Urban Jungle Hostel is conveniently set in Málaga, and features a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. The property is located 2.7 km from San Andres Beach, 700 metres from Alcazaba and 500 metres from Museum of Glass and Crystal. The accommodation provides karaoke and a shared kitchen. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Italian, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the hostel include La Malagueta Beach, La Caleta Beach and Picasso Museum. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 11 km from The Urban Jungle Hostel.

name: Albergue Inturjoven Malaga
description: The Albergue Inturjoven Málaga is located around 2km from the centre of Málaga and also from the Alcazaba Church. This hostel features rooms with private bathrooms, a garden and terrace. Rooms at the Inturjoven Málaga are bright and simply decorated. Low-cost Wi-Fi access is available in each room. The Albergue’s restaurant offers a range of buffet cuisine, including typical Malagan dishes. There are also vending machines selling drinks and snacks. The hostel offers luggage storage and is ideally located for visiting Málaga’s sights. The Picasso Museum is approximately 2 km from the Inturjoven and Málaga Cathedral is a 25-minute walk away. The nearest beach is around 2.5 km from the hostel.

name: The Lights Hostel
description: Offering a roof terrace and balconies with views of La Alameda Principal y Torregorda Street, a 24-hour reception and free WiFi, Lights Out Hostel is located in Málaga City Centre, 300 metres from famous Calle Larios Street. Each room at Lights Out Hostel is air-conditioned, and include bed linen. Most of them have a balcony with views over the city, from where you can enjoy the different festivals throughout the year. There are single-sex shared shower rooms and toilets on each floor. Guests have access to a shared kitchen and other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and a snack bar. The hostel is 400 metres from both Malaga Cathedral and from Carmen Thyssen Museum. Malaga Airport is 8 km away.

name: Hostal Doña Manuela
description: Situated in the Campanillas district in Málaga, next to Andalusia Technology Park, Hostal Doña Manuela features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Every room is equipped with a flat-screen TV. You will find a coffee machine in the room. There is luggage storage space at the property. Carmen Thyssen Museum is 11 km from Hostal Doña Manuela, while Calle Larios is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Malaga Airport, 8 km from Hostal Doña Manuela.

name: ibis budget Malaga Aeropuerto Avenida Velazquez
description: The ibis budget Malaga Aeropuerto hotel is close to Malaga Airport and is the perfect choice for a layover, located just 5 minutes from Los Álamos and Misericordia beaches. It is also close to the city's historic center if you wish to discover the culture of Malaga. This budget hotel in Malaga has cozy rooms, specially designed to offer optimal comfort at a great price, and featuring TV, WIFI and air conditioning.accorhotels.com

name: Fay Victoria Beach
address: Avenida Del Mediterraneo, 230, 29730 Rincón de la Victoria, Andalusia
description: Situated on the beachfront in Rincón de la Victoria, The Fay Victoria Beach Hotel belongs to Añoreta Golf, a golf course located just 2.5 km from the Hotel where you can enjoy special conditions. Hotel Fay Victoria Beach’s terrace café is set directly on the seafront promenade. Rooms at the Hotel Fay Victoria Beach have wooden floors and bright décor. They include satellite TV, a rental safe and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Information about the region is available from the hotel’s 24-hour reception desk. Hotel Fay Victoria Beach is located on the Costa del Sol, a 5-minute drive from the A7 Motorway. Málaga city centre is 15 km away, while Málaga Airport is within a 30-minute drive.

name: Camping Torremolinos
description: Set a 10-minute walk from the beach, Camping Torremolinos offers air-conditioned bungalows and mobile homes with a private patio and TV. The campsite features a bar and a restaurant. Some bungalows or mobile homes have a bathroom and a kitchen. Camping Torremolinos offers free WiFi throughout its premises. Malaga Airport is 4 km from the campsite and Malaga city centre is a 10-minute drive away. You can reach Aqualand Water Park and Plaza Mayor Shopping Centre in a 5-minute drive. Free parking is available on site.

name: Picnic Dreams Boutique Hostel
address: Calle San Juan de Letrán, 9, 29012 Málaga, Andalusia
description: Located 100 metres from Picasso house in central Málaga, Picnic Dreams Boutique Hostel offers front desk services, free luggage storage and free safe. The hostel boasts a furnished rooftop terrace. Rooms at Picnic Dreams Boutique Hostel all include en-suite bathroom with shower. The all have air conditioning, toiletries and towels included. There is a restaurant and snack bar downstairs where you can have something to eat during the day. There are also free city maps, as well as free WiFi in all areas. A great range of bars can be found nearby, as well as Marques de Larios Street with its several shops. From Picnic Dreams Boutique Hostel you’re within 5 minutes’ walk of the Plaza la Merced, the Alcazaba, and Gibralfaro Castle.

name: Ibis Budget Málaga Centro
description: Looking for a budget hotel that doesn't compromise on quality? ibis budget is the perfect choice. Ideal for a last-minute vacation with friends, family or your partner. You may even be able to bring your dog (check with the hotel). This ibis budget hotel is located in the center of Malaga and offers modern, cozy rooms with air conditioning, the new Sweet Bed by ibis budget, heating, 24-hour reception, WIFI and buffet breakfast at a great price.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Complejo Los Rosales
address: Urbanización El Olivar, Avenida Ricardo Gross, 8, 29620 Torremolinos, Andalusia
description: Hotel Complejo Los Rosales is located in the El Olivar residential estate, just 5 minutes’ drive from Málaga Airport. It has an outdoor pool and a multi-sports court. The air-conditioned rooms at Los Rosales feature a private terrace with views of the sea and the airport. Each one comes with free Wi-Fi, a TV and a private bathroom with a bath. tThe hotel offers traditional Spanish food during July and August.There is also a snack bar open all year and a daily buffet breakfast is available. A shuttle service to Playamar beach is available upon request subject to availability. Hotel Complejo Los Rosales is 300 metres from a bus stop which connects you with central Málaga, which is 12 km away. You can drive to the beach and Torremolinos town centre in 5 minutes. Shopping centers are within 15 minutes walk of the property.

name: Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida De Gran Canaria 24, Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set overlooking the sea, the adults-only Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only is an ideal accommodation for spending a relaxing break in the sun on the island of Gran Canaria. Lie back and soak up the sun on one of the loungers or hammocks surrounding the complex’s year-round heated pool. There is also a free spa centre and fitness suite on site where you can enjoy a range of treatments or a relaxing massage for a surcharge. The on-site restaurant and bar, The Club, offers a buffet breakfast and a more formal sit-down meal in the evening. After dining, you can sit back with a drink in the poolside bar or in the rooftop chill out. The rooms in the Servatur Casablanca Suites & Spa - Adults Only boast balconies or terraces with views of Puerto Rico and the sea. They all have a kitchenette and free WiFi.

name: Servatur Terrazamar Suite & Sun Suite
address: Avda de las Palmeras 5- 8, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: This large and well-equipped apartment complex is situated in the resort of Puerto Rico, in the south of Gran Canaria – ideal for a fun-filled holiday in the sun. Terrazamar Sun Suite is built on a valley side and has terraces on various levels offering great views of the valley and the Atlantic Ocean. You can also choose to relax and sunbathe on the large private terrace of your own apartment. Take a dip in the large on-site swimming pool or lie back in comfort on the sun loungers. You can also get active by playing a game of tennis on the complex’s courts. Use the Terrazamar as a base to visit the famous beaches of Puerto Rico, just over a kilometre from the complex.

name: Gloria Palace Amadores Thalasso & Hotel
address: La Palma, 2, 35139 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Gloria Palace Amadores is set on a cliff top, between Gran Canaria’s Puerto Rico and Amadores Beaches. This luxury spa hotel offers 2 outdoor pools and spectacular Atlantic Ocean views. Gloria Palace, one of the largest thalasotheraphy centres in Europe, offers a seawater pool, massage and various treatments. There is a sauna, Turkish bath and physiotherapy pool. Air-conditioned rooms have a private balcony with sea views. There is satellite TV, and you can hire the safe and minibar. Guests have access to free Wi-Fi in their room and throughout the hotel. Tennis coaching is available on the floodlit tennis court. There is a gym, and you can play table tennis, bowls, archery and darts. Children have their own swimming pool, playground and mini-club. Evening shows are provided for both adults and children. Amadores has a buffet restaurant with show cooking and nightly themed buffets are offered. There are several bars, including a piano bar and pool bar. Gloria Palace has a 24-hour reception and offers car hire. Free parking is offered.

name: Marina Suites
address: Calle Juan Diaz Rodriguez, 10, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Set beside Puerto Rico Marina in Gran Canaria, this modern aparthotel offers views over the Atlantic Ocean from its outdoor infinity swimming pool. Rooms come with satellite TV and a private balcony. All of the Marina Suites offer free Wi-Fi and air conditioning, and are decorated in white. They all come with a kitchen with a hob and microwave, and the private bathrooms contain a hairdryer. Guests can enjoy a variety of international breakfast at the Atlantic Pool Bar with views of the Atlantic Ocean. The Yacht Club Bar offers board games and a big screen. The hotel offers an adutls area with 2 outdoor hot tubs and baliness beds, as well as a fitness center. Reception is open 24 hours a day, allowing you greater flexibility during your stay. Anfi Tauro Golf Course is just 5 minutes’ drive away from Marina Suites. Amadores Beach is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Servatur Puerto Azul
address: Avda. de la Cornisa, 13, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Servatur Puerto Azul in Mogan, you'll be by the ocean, a 3-minute drive from Amadores Beach and 8 minutes from Puerto Rico Marina. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Holiday Club Vista Amadores
address: Calle Montana Clara,12, 35130 Puerto Rico, Gran Canaria
description: Holiday Club Vista Amadores features a sauna and a fitness room, as well as accommodation with free WiFi and a kitchen in Amadores. The aparthotel offers a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a hair dryer and bath or shower. A dishwasher and microwave are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Some units have a balcony. A Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at Holiday Club Vista Amadores. Guests can enjoy a meal at the in-house restaurant, which specialises in local cuisine. The accommodation offers a year-round outdoor pool. A car rental service is available at Holiday Club Vista Amadores. Playa del Ingles is 15 km from the aparthotel. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 36 km from Holiday Club Vista Amadores.

name: La Laguna Gran Hotel
address: C/ Nava y Grimón, 18, 38201 San Cristóbal de La Laguna, Tenerife
description: Located in La Laguna and with the famous Leal Theatre within 600 metre. La Laguna Gran Hotel provides express check-in and check-out, non-smoking rooms, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a garden. We also provide a restaurant, the property, fitness centre and a bar. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, room service including organizing tours for guests. Each room at La Laguna Gran Hotel has a wardrobe, desk, flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. We offer continental and buffet breakfast options are available daily at the accommodation. La Laguna Gran Hotel offers a terrace. We have a section supporting Bike friendly enthusiasts. Catedral San Cristobal de La Laguna is 1.3 km from the hotel. The nearest airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 5 km from La Laguna Gran Hotel.

name: Bull Reina Isabel & Spa
address: Alfredo L. Jones 40, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Located on the beachfront of Las Canteras Beach in Las Palmas, Reina Isabel has a rooftop pool, a free spa and gym, and a sun terrace overlooking the Atlantic. Free parking and Wi-Fi are offered. All air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Reina Isabel feature parquet floors and a balcony. They are equipped with flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast which includes cava, vodka and fresh orange juice. There are also buffet dinners and a an à la carte-restaurant. The hotel has a poolside bar and a beachfront terrace bar. Parasols, towels and loungers can be provided for use at the beach for free. El Muelle Cinema is 5 minutes’ walk from the Reina Isabel, and you can drive to Las Palmeras Golf Course in 8 minutes. Gran Canaria Airport is around 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Gloria Palace San Agustin Thalasso & Hotel
address: Calle Las Margaritas, Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Set 600 metres from Las Burras Beach in Gran Canaria, the luxurious Gloria Palace San Agustin offers a rooftop pool with sea views. It features a spa and rooms with a balcony, the hotel has been completely renovated in 2021. Rooms at the Gloria Palace Hotel San Agustin have a simple design and include air conditioning. Most of them enjoy sea views. Free WiFi is available. Gloria Palace has outdoor pools for children and adults, surrounded by gardens and sun terraces with loungers. You can also play padel and tennis, or use the gym, for an extra cost. The rooftop pool also carries a surcharge. The property also offers an on-site bicycle shop, where you can buy equipment and rent a bicycle. Free shuttle buses run to Playa del Inglés and Maspalomas beaches. The Maspalomas Golf Course is 5 km away and special discounts apply to guests at the Gloria Palace Hotel Gran Canaria.

name: Silken Saaj Las Palmas
address: Calle León y Castillo, 329, 35006 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Providing free WiFi, Silken Saaj Las Palmas offers accommodation in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, 1 km from Parque de Santa Catalina. The property is situated less than 1 km from Parque Romano. Centro Comercial El Muelle is a 20-minute walk from the property. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV. With a private bathroom, some also feature a views of the sea. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at the property. With staff speaking English and Spanish, guidance is available at the reception. Poema Del Mar Aquarium is 2 km from Silken Saaj Las Palmas, while Centro Comercial Las Arenas is 2.1 km away. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Colón Rambla
address: C/ Viera Y Clavijo 49, 38004 Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Tenerife
description: Located in the heart of Tenerife's Santa Cruz, this elegant hotel features free Wi-Fi and has an outdoor pool and charming gardens. The Colon Rambla is fronted by an impressive glass wall which continues around to the garden and outdoor terrace. From the spacious interiors, you can enjoy the pleasant views over the Ramblas, which the hotel faces. Air-conditioned rooms have a plasma satellite TV, a minibar. and a laundry service are available. You can enjoy the hotel's outdoor pool, terrace and pretty gardens, as well as the restaurant and bar with terrace. There are also several function rooms for meetings and celebrations. There is a 24-hour reception. Conveniently located next to the García Sanabria Park and the Patos Square, you can browse the surroundings and enjoy these lovely areas of Santa Cruz. In addition, the Colon Rambla is only 2 minutes from the port and under 10 minutes to the fabulous Teresitas Beach.

name: Occidental Las Palmas
address: León Y Castillo, 244, 35005 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: The Occidental Las Palmas hotel is an urban hotel located in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Thanks to its location close to the beautiful Doramas Park and just a few minutes from leisure port Occidental Las Palmas Hotel is the perfect place to discover all the attractions of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.Barcelo.com

name: Urban Anaga Hotel
address: Calle Imeldo Seris 19, 38003 Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Tenerife
description: Set in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, 550 metres from Tenerife Espacio de las Artes, Hotel Urban Anaga offers accommodation with a restaurant, a fitness centre and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and room service, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel has newspapers and a fax machine and photocopier that guests can use. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel all rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Guests at Hotel Urban Anaga can enjoy a continental or a buffet breakfast. The accommodation offers a terrace. Museo militar regional de Canarias is 2 km from Hotel Urban Anaga, while Museo municipal de Bellas Artes is 1.3 km away. The nearest airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Sercotel Hotel Parque
address: Gran Canaria Calle Muelle Las Palmas, 2, 35003 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Sercotel Hotel Parque has an ideal seafront location in central Las Palmas, near the historic areas of Vegueta and Triana. It offers good-value accommodation and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel is set in the heart of Gran Canaria’s capital city. It is just 100 metres from the main bus station. This gives good access to the airport and other parts of the island. Parking is available upon request. Rooms at Sercotel Hotel Parque are simple and comfortable. They all have air conditioning and a minibar. They have an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel has a restaurant, with views of the sea and San Telmo Park. There is also a café, serving light snacks. A private car park is located 100 metres from the property and is available for a surcharge. Las Canteras Beach is 5km away. The area around the hotel has many historic buildings. There are also many shops, bars and restaurants.

name: Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa
address: Mar Mediterraneo 1, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Set 800 metres from Gran Canaria’s Maspalomas Beach, this luxury complex features a spa, casino and heated lagoon-style swimming pools set in tropical gardens. Each room has a private balcony. Rooms at the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort & Spa are spacious and elegant, with marble floors and air conditioning. They all have satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and bathrobes. The Costa Meloneras Resort’s stylish Ambassador restaurant serves nouvelle cuisine. The complex also offers buffet restaurants, cafés and a cocktail bar. The Lopesan Spa offers a hydrotherapy circuit and salt grotto. A wide range of wellness treatments is available. The complex also features an artificial beach and sun terraces with loungers. Situated next to Maspalomas Lighthouse, the Lopesan Costa Meloneras Resort is a 10-minute walk from Maspalomas Dunes. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Meloneras Golf Course, just 1.5km away.

name: Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels
address: Touroperador Fritidsresor 4, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Featuring a garden, Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels is set in Maspalomas and is 3.6 km from Aqualand. Boasting a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with an outdoor pool. Maspalomas Lighthouse is 2.4 km away. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe, flat-screen TV and a coffee machine. All rooms feature a terrace and views of the garden. Minibar and breakfast in the room services are available for an extra charge. Guests will find a buffet restaurant at the property. Kumara Serenoa By Lopesan Hotels offers a children's playground. Palmitos Park is 10 km from the accommodation. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 28 km from the property.

name: Hotel Aloe Canteras
address: Calle Sagasta, 98, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Hotel Aloe Canteras boasts a sun terrace overlooking Canteras Beach, just 30 metres away, in Gran Canaria’s capital, Las Palmas. Most of the bright, modern rooms offer front or side views of the Atlantic Ocean. Hotel Aloe Canteras rooms come with a TV and work desk. There is a safe and a small fridge, and the private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and amenities. The hotel has a TV lounge and offers an internet corner with free WiFi. There are vending machines for drinks and snacks, and the central location means there are many bars and restaurants nearby. Hotel Aloe Canteras has a 24-hour front desk and you can hire a car. Parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults
address: Av. Sargentos Provisionales, 38, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and bar in Playa del Ingles. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a concierge service and free WiFi. The hotel offers a hot tub and a tour desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults features some units with pool views, and rooms are equipped with a patio. At the accommodation all rooms have bed linen and towels. The area is popular for hiking, and bike hire and car hire are available at Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playa del Ingles Beach, Playa de Veril and Yumbo Centre. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria, 27 km from Sanom Beach Resort Only Adults, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bull Vital Suites & Spa
address: Avenida De Gran Canaria, 80, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: BULL Vital Suites & Spa offers luxury accommodation next to Maspalomas Golf Course, in southern Gran Canaria. The complex has 2 outdoor pools, gardens and 1 free spa entry per person per stay. Each spacious room features a private balcony or terrace with views over the golf course, Maspalomas Dunes or the pool. They come with air conditioning, 2 satellite TVs, free WiFi, safe for hire, and minibar. The spacious junior suites include a separate seating area and kitchenette. The bathroom has a bath or shower, bathrobe, hairdryer, and beach towels. The Vital Suites features a Roman-style spa, with a sauna, thermal pools, and steam bath. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym. The property also offers medical services and rehabilitation treatments, and a personal trainer can be requested. The complex offers a restaurant and a poolside bar.

name: Barceló Margaritas
address: Avenida Gran Canaria, 38, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Barceló Margaritas hotel (formerly Occidental Margaritas) is located in Playa del Inglés, one of the most famous tourist areas in the south of the island of Gran Canaria. A free shuttle bus to Playa del Inglés and the Maspalomas Dunes is offered by the hotel. Renovated in winter 2021, the Barceló Margaritas Hotel is characterized by its wide range of services and numerous facilities: a renovated lobby with reception, two pools, one of which is a completely new family pool with swimming lanes, 2 pool bars, a nudist roof terrace, a completely renovated buffet restaurant with various themed areas, lifts and free WIFI. Its 322 modern and bright rooms are designed to give our guests an unforgettable vacation. They have air conditioning, satellite TV with flat screen, safe and minibar for a fee, balcony, fully equipped bathroom with rain shower. In the hotel you will also enjoy a day and night animation program, as well as a fitness center, and a new and complete open-air Margaritas Crossfit for functional and high-performance training with a personal trainer. We offer a diverse and varied animation program for children from 4 to 12 years in our mini club and playground. With the All-Inclusive and All-Inclusive Plus programs, guests can enjoy exclusive services. Additional services: • WIFI FREE •Currency Exchange • Car rental (for a fee) • Bicycle rental (for a fee) • Doctor (for a fee and on request) • Laundry (for a fee)Official Hotel Information

name: La Aldea Suites
address: c/ Transversal Federico Rodríguez, 35470 La Aldea de San Nicolás, Gran Canaria
description: Offering suites which combine rustic and modern design, Hotel La Aldea Suites is located in San Nicolás, in western Gran Canaria. It features a terrace with pool and hot tub. All rooms are equipped with air conditioning free of charge. The rooms at La Aldea have stone walls, tiled floors, and stylish décor. They each have a private balcony, mini fridge, seating area and bathroom, and they come with satellite TV. The hotel’s bar offers snacks and drinks. Free WiFi is available in all areas. Staff at the Aldea’s reception can provide information about what to see and do in Gran Canaria. Guided hiking excursions can be arranged upon request. Tamadaba Nature Reserve is a 12-minute drive from the hotel. You can drive to the seaside in 10 minutes. Güi Güi Beach is 7 km away.

name: Hotel Faro, a Lopesan Collection Hotel - Adults Only
address: Plaza de Colon, 1, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Situated by the lighthouse that gives it its name, the hotel overlooks the sea and is just a few strides from the southern end of Maspalomas beach. The property has one swimming pool included and there is also a second pool on the rooftop which is subject to additional charges. Thanks to the hotel’s unbeatable location, it offers spectacular views over a 6 km stretch of sand dunes and the ocean that bathes them. This 5-star hotel is flooded by daylight and has a functional and urban interior and décor. Close by there are 3, 18-hole golf courses, where golfers can enjoy their sport 365 days a year and benefit from the special services this establishment makes available. The hotel is well known for its excellent cuisine: in both the buffet restaurant and the à-la-carte restaurant you will find a high level of quality and service.

name: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace
description: H10 Playa Meloneras Palace is next to Meloneras Beach and Golf Course in southern Gran Canaria. It has 3 swimming pools, a sun terrace, spa and striking design inspired by Antoni Gaudí. The rooms at the H10 Meloneras feature tiled floors and typical Mediterranean décor. They all come with a private balcony and satellite TV. The hotel’s Tamadaba buffet restaurant offers show cooking and international food. Gaudí Restaurant serves à la carte meals, and there is also a poolside bar-café and 2 other bars. Leisure facilities at the H10 Gran Canaria include tennis courts and a mini club for children. The lively resort of Playa del Inglés is around 10 minutes’ drive from the Hotel Playa Meloneras. Gran Canaria Airport is just 25 minutes’ drive away.

name: Iberostar Heritage Grand Mencey
address: Calle Doctor Jose Naveiras, 38, 38004 Santa Cruz de Tenerife, Tenerife
description: This stylish, urban hotel with a spa is located in a colonial-style building. Iberostar Heritage Grand Mencey offers spacious rooms equipped with a flat-screen TV. Free high speed WiFi is available throughout. Iberostar’s smart rooms feature hardwood floors and a modern décor. In-room amenities include satellite TV and a mini bar. Some rooms have a balcony with city views and a private bathroom including a bathrobe, slippers and a hairdryer. Los Menceyes restaurant at Iberostar Heritage Grand Mencey serves a variety of local dishes. It is open for breakfast and dinner. Guests can also relax in the hotel’s Bar Casino or in the lobby bar. The hotel is situated in a quiet residential area, just 50 metres from García Sanabria Park. It is just 5 minutes’ drive from the ferry port with regular crossings to the other islands. Tenerife North Airport is 14 km away. There are several bus stops within 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel. Private parking is available at a location nearby for an additional cost.

name: RF San Borondon
address: Agustín Espinosa, 2, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: This small colonial style hotel complex is located in the heart of Puerto de la Cruz, next to Plaza del Charco and a wealth of leisure opportunities. RF San Borondon is composed of 2 buildings surrounded by gardens. You can relax in the large salt water swimming pool and gym. The RF San Borondon's central location means you can easily get to the bus station and sights such as the Lagos de Martianez swimming pools and Loro Park animal park.

name: Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel
address: Carretera De Jandia, Km. 11, 35610 Antigua, Fuerteventura
description: With swimming pools, tennis courts and an elegant restaurant, the Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel - Adults Only is located in Caleta del Fuste and within a golf resort. This hotel features wooden balconies and is located 800 metres from the beach. Each spacious room at Elba Palace Golf & Vital Hotel - Adults Only features free WiFi, air conditioning, and a private balcony. All have satellite TV, minibar, safe, coffee and tea facilities, and pillow menu. The large bathroom comes with a separate bath and shower, hairdryer, and bathrobes. The Elba’s impressive building boasts traditional Canarian architecture. It has tall palm trees, tiled floors and a grand chandelier. Guests can relax on the beautiful central courtyard. You can find a café, an a la carte restaurant, and a bar within the property. Vegetarian and low-calories options are available to guests.

name: Sercotel Puerto de la Luz
address: Calle Juan Rejón, 42, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Set 500 metres from Las Canteras Beach, Sercotel Puerto de la Luz offers 3-star accommodation in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria and has an outdoor swimming pool, a terrace and a bar. Among the facilities at this property are a tour desk and luggage storage space, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.4 km from Playa del Confital. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. All rooms come with a kettle, while certain rooms also offer a balcony and others also feature city views. At Sercotel Puerto de la Luz the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Speaking German, English, Spanish and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area. Las Alcaravaneras is 2.2 km from Sercotel Puerto de la Luz, while Parque de Santa Catalina is 1.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Gran Canaria Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

name: Mogan Princess & Beach Club
address: Albaicín 17, Urb. de Taurito, Mogán, Gran Canaria
description: Set in Taurito and featuring 3 outdoor swimming pools, Hotel Mogan Princess and Beach Club is located 4 km from Puerto de Mogan. This hotel offers a restaurant and 3 bars. The property includes a beach club with a chill-out terrace in Taurito Beach, 800 metres away, and a free shuttle from the hotel to the beach during the day. There is a panoramic pool for adults and a childrenâs pool. All air-conditioned rooms at this hotel feature a terrace or balcony with sea views and satellite TV with international channels. A fridge is available in all rooms. The private bathroom includes a bath, shower, and hairdryer. The hotel has evening entertainment and a nightclub. There is also a 24-hour desk and concierge service. A snack bar and minimarket are available on site. WiFi is available in the lobby and the internet-corner for a surcharge. Gran Canaria Airport is located a 30-minute drive from Mogan Princess and Beach Club.

name: Atlantic Mirage Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Eucaliptus, 4, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located in Puerto de la Cruz, 1.5 KM from Martiánez Beach, Hotel Atlantic Mirage Suites & SPA offers an all year round swimming pool and free WiFi. All air-conditioned (cold/warm air subject to seasonality)rooms feature a balcony with sea view. Guests will find a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer and a flat TV with Satellite Channels. All units include a seating area with a sofa. The buffet restaurant Mirage offers a wide range of international options. Guests can also have a drink at the bar. Jardín Botánico and Puerto de la Cruz city centre are 1 Km from the property. The rearest airport is airport is Tenerife Norte Airport, 26 Km from the property.

name: H10 Atlantic Sunset
address: Avenida Adeje 300 Playa Paraiso, 38678 Callao Salvaje, Tenerife
description: No description found

name: Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotels - Adults Only
description: The Corallium Dunamar by Lopesan Hotel, recently refurbished, is 200 metres from Playa del Inglés Beach, in southern Gran Canaria. Surrounded by tropical gardens, it features an outdoor pool complex. Set in a modern, pyramid-shaped building, the Dunamar Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV. The minibar and safe can be rented, and most rooms have a private balcony. Regional and international cuisine is offered in the hotel restaurant, and there are 2 poolside snack bars. The hotel is a 10-minute walk from the lively Yumbo Centre. Maspalomas Dunes are 20 minutes’ walk from the hotel, and Maspalomas Golf Course is 2 km away.

name: Abora Interclub Atlantic By Lopesan Hotels
address: Calle Los Jazmines, 2, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This all-inclusive club is located in the higher part of San Agustín, nestled in a 10 acre park boasting fantastic panoramic views of the Atlantic and the vast Maspalomas sand dunes. The complex boasts 168 double rooms plus 240 family rooms with capacity for up to 4 people. Many have sea views, though those with views over the spacious gardens are not less privileged. In the gardens themselves it is always possible to find a spot to place a sun lounger and relax under the palm trees. All roms are equipped with direct telephone, Satellite TV, Safe, Sofa, Bathroom with bath and WC and Balcony or terrace. Traditional Sports enthusiasts area catered well at the club with multi-functional sports facilities including 4 tennis courts and sport grounds. You are also sure to be tempted by the nearby San Agustín beach or one of the 2 onsite outdoor pools, to cool off with a refreshing dip. The complex also boasts a first-class entertainment team that makes sure the day is full of games, group sports, music and evening shows. During the summer months, children have their own mini club and there is a special programme of activities for young teenagersWebBeds

name: Abora Buenaventura By Lopesan Hotels
address: C/ Ganigo, 6 Plaza De Ansite, 35100 San Bartolomé de Tirajana, Gran Canaria
description: Abora Buenaventura by Lopesan Hotels is located 500 metres from the beach in Playa del Inglés, on Gran Canaria’s south coast. It has 2 outdoor pool surrounded by palm trees, a children's pool and a hot tub. Free WiFi is provided. A varied entertainment programme for adults and children is offered at the Abora Buenaventura. Guests can enjoy a gym for free. All rooms at the Abora Buenaventura have a private balcony with garden or pool views. There is a TV with free channels, and you can hire a safe. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Abora Buenaventura by Lopesan Hotels has 1 buffet restaurant and a snack & go bar. There are also 2 poolside bars and 2 bars. There is a 24-hour reception offering car hire and currency exchange. The hotel has a beauty salon and various shops on-site.

name: Mur Neptuno Gran Canaria - Adults Only
address: Avenida Alfeceres Provisionales, 29, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: Neptuno is an adults-only hotel, next to the Yumbo Shopping Centre, and 900 metres away from the beach Playa del Inglés. All air-conditioned rooms have free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a furnished balcony. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel spa includes a sauna, Turkish bath and gym. The Neptuno's swimming pool is heated from October until April and live music can be enjoyed in the bar several times a week. There is a 24-hour reception and a tour desk. Maspalomas Golf course is 3 km away. You can hire a car and there is free on-site parking.

name: Bohemia Suites & Spa - Adults Only
address: Avenida Estados Unidos, 28, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: This hotel is located about 150 m from the beach. Guests will also find restaurants, bars and links to the public transport network around 150 m from the hotel. It lies 400 m from Yumbo, with its 2 shopping centres and nightspots and is just 500 m from the centre of Playa del Ingles. The hotel is 18 km from Vecindario. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 95 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Services such as a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant and a bar. Shopping facilities are available. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (for a fee). Additional services include medical assistance, room service and a laundry. A bicycle hire service (for a fee) gives guests the opportunity to explore the surrounding area independently. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning, a living room and a bathroom. Most rooms feature a balcony or terrace. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience.
