We offer a gym, swimming pool, massage rooms and a co-working area with multipurpose rooms. Just 350 metres from the beach, it offers easy access to the resort’s cafés, bars and shops. Offering sea and pool views, the simply decorated rooms at Sholeo Los Gigantes have a private bathroom. Buses stop just 50 metres away and the centre of Puerto de Santiago is just 1 km from the hotel. Tenerife Sur Airport is 45 km away.

name: Elba Lanzarote Royal Village Resort
address: Avenida Faro Pechiguera, 1, 35580 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: Set in Playa Blanca, Lanzarote, and designed as a typical Lanzarote town, Elba Lanzarote Royal Village Resort is located a 15-minute walk from Flamingo Beach. This property offers free WiFi throughout. This complex offers air-conditioned rooms with satellite LED TV, safe, minibar, coffee and tea service, and fan. The private bathroom includes a spacious shower, hairdryer, and magnifying mirror. There are 4 restaurants on site, with options of a la cartè menu and buffet options. A pool bar is also available to all guests. The hotel has several pools, including waterfalls and a children's area, as well as a solarium with sun beds. There are several on-site activities such as football, tennis, and volleyball, including a gym with yoga, Pilates, and Zumba lessons. There is also a spa with different treatment options and services. Playa Blanca is a 5-minute drive from Elba Lanzarote Royal Village Resort. Timanfaya National Park is 10 km away. Lanzarote Airport is 28 km from the property.

name: Catalonia Las Vegas
address: Avenida Colón, 2, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: This lovely hotel is perfectly placed in front of the Martiánez Lakes, boasting stunning views of Teide mountain. It offers free WiFi throughout. Located in the centre of Puerto de la Cruz, there is a taxi rank opposite the hotel. A bus from the nearby stop will take you to any corner of the island. Whatever the purpose of your stay, this hotel has all kinds of modern facilities to cater for your needs.

name: Gran Melia Palacio de Isora
address: Avenida Los Océanos, s/n, Alcalá, 38686 Guía de Isora, Tenerife
description: With its privileged Oceanfront location, this spectacular Design Hotel offers stunning views of the island La Gomera and Mount Teide. It is perfectly integrated in the South west coast of Tenerife, in the fishing village Alcala, Guia de Isora. The resort is at five minutes car distance from the beautiful Los Gigantes cliffs, while offering an inspiring proposal to live magic moments and new sensations. Highlights are the impressive colonial Plaza with fountains and chill-out corners and the huge sea water lagoon infinity pool. In addition various fresh water pools, including a pool only for adults, a family pool and a separate childrens pool, as well as the exclusive RedLevel pool. 6 Restaurants, 6 Bars, Yhi Spa with thermal circuit and Yhi Moves, a 24 hours fitness centre. The resort also offers a programme of life enriching activities, professional animation, tennis and paddle courts, archery, miniclub and subtropical gardens. The glorious room facilities are all very spacious with beautiful garden and ocean views and a minimum of 48sqm with private terrace of balcony. The exclusive RedLevel Demi Suites and Oceanfront Garden Villas offer an even superior level of luxury and personalised service, for adults only.priceline.com

name: H10 Ocean Suites
description: H10 Ocean Suites is located on Fuerteventura and provides 4-star facilities as well as outdoor tennis courts and miniature golf. It is also within walking distance of Corralejo's well-known tourist attractions. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, including a swimming pool, a kids pool and meeting facilities. For those wanting to get outdoors the hotel has a wide variety of activities, such as hiking and scuba diving. The rooms at H10 Ocean Suites are air-conditioned and offer a private bathroom, a mini bar and a private balcony. They feature a seating area, an in-room safe and a flat-screen TV. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient place to have a meal. Each evening, guests can wind down in the comfortable lounge bar. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and cafés in the area. H10 Ocean Suites is an ideal place to discover Lobos Island and Dunas de Corralejo. Those wanting to explore the region are able to visit El Cotillo, located an easy car ride from the property.Revato

name: Hostal Kasa
address: Calle General Vives 75, 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria, Gran Canaria
description: Hostal Kasa is 1-Star-Hotel located in the center of the city and 3 minutes away from Las Canteras beach, you'll enjoy our rooms (exterior/interior), and a terrace to share experiences with other travelers, or to enjoy the maximum comfort of a Hotel. Hostal Kasa is placed in a marvelous place in the city; near the shops, pubs, restaurants, and close to the nightlife. The Bus station of Las Palmas is about 200 meters away. It offers a regular service practically to every place on the island. Hostal Kasa offers free Wi-Fi and rents surfboards.

name: Parque San Antonio
address: Carretera General Puerto De La Cruz Las Arenas 51, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Parque San Antonio is set in attractive, tropical gardens, 1.5 km from the centre of Puerto de la Cruz. This hotel features an outdoor swimming pool and rooms with balconies. The San Antonio’s rooms are spacious and feature bright décor. Each has satellite TV, a desk and centralized air conditioning. The San Antonio offers guests various dining options in the buffet restaurant. There is also a poolside bar, which serves snacks during the day. The hotel has impressive views of Mount Teide and is less than 2 km from Puerto de la Cruz Beach.

name: Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur
description: This colonial-style hotel on the Costa Adeje features a luxurious spa and beautiful views of the Atlantic Ocean. It offers 5 swimming pools, surrounded by sun terraces and gardens. The elegant rooms at the Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur have a balcony and sea views. They include an interactive flat-screen TV, and a separate hydromassage shower and bath. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur includes the Nammu Spa with thermal circuits. Massage and beauty treatments are also available. Duque Beach is just 500 metres from the hotel and there is also a fitness centre on-site. Bicycle and car rental can be organised for guests. There are 2 restaurants at the Vincci La Plantación del Sur, one serves creative Canarian cuisine using local produce; the second one, is specialised in charcoal-grilled meat. The hotel's breakfast includes products for celiacs. There is also a bar. Vincci Selección La Plantación del Sur is 20 minutes’ by car from Reina Sofía Airport.

name: H10 Lanzarote Princess
address: Calle La Maciot, 1, 35570 Playa Blanca, Lanzarote
description: The H10 Lanzarote Princess is located just 200 metres from Playa Blanca Beach, offering views of the Atlantic Ocean. Set in gardens, it features 2 outdoor swimming pools and rooms with balconies. H10 Lanzarote Princess offers bright, stylish décor and its rooms are air conditioned. All rooms come with satellite TV and a desk. Buffet cuisine and show cooking are on offer in the hotel’s main restaurant. La Choza Restaurant is located in the hotel gardens and also has a bar. There are 2 further bars in the resort. Staff at the Princess’ 24-hour reception can provide information on Playa Blanca and the surrounding area. Free WiFi is available in the lobby of the hotel and some rooms. The Lanzarote Princess has tennis and volleyball courts, minigolf and a giant chess board.

name: Tabaiba Princess
address: Avda. Tour Operador Tui, 35100 Maspalomas, Gran Canaria
description: When you stay at Hotel Tabaiba Princess in San Bartolome de Tirajana, you'll be next to a golf course, within a 5-minute drive of Maspalomas Dunes and Yumbo Shopping Center. Featured amenities include express check-in, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Limited parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Royal Sunset Beach Club
description: Royal Sunset Beach Club offers the convenience of at-home living, fantastic on-site amenities and close proximity to the beach. When youre not relaxing in your spacious Apartment, youll have the choice of playing pool, table tennis, squash or other recreational games on-site. Royal Sunset Beach Clubs great location one block from Playa de Fanabe allows you to instantly grab a sunset drink at a beachside bar, swim in the sea or experience the many restaurants and shops along the coast. No matter if youre a sunseeker or a foodie, you and your group will find everything you need in or around Royal Sunset Beach Club.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Floresta
address: Calle Mercurio, 2, 35510 Puerto del Carmen, Lanzarote
description: Hotel Floresta offers spacious apartments located 200 metres from Lanzarote’s Playa de los Pocillos Beach. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool and tennis courts. The apartments are modern and practical with a seating area and air conditioning. They can accommodate up to 2 adults and 2 children. Guests can enjoy a restaurant and bar at Floresta apartments Lanzarote, as well as a terrace to enjoy meals and drinks outside. There are also gardens, play areas for children and an entertainment programme for all ages.

name: Hotel Riu Garoé
address: Doctor Celestino González Padrón, 3, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 190 guestrooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private furnished balconies or patios. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a health club, an outdoor pool, and an outdoor tennis court. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours). Property Location With a stay at Hotel Riu Garoé in Puerto de la Cruz, you'll be connected to a shopping center, just a 1-minute walk from Orotava Valley and 8 minutes by foot from Botanical Gardens. This 4-star hotel is 1.6 mi (2.6 km) from Plaza del Charco and 1.7 mi (2.7 km) from Lago Martianez Swimming Pools. Dining Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Snacks are also available at the 2 coffee shops/cafes. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. Optional Charges Airport shuttle fee: EUR 80.00 per vehicle (one-way, maximum occupancy 7) In-room safe fee: EUR 2 per day Spa fee: EUR 15 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. name: Be Live Experience Lanzarote Beach
address: Plaza Del Janubio, 2, 35508 Costa Teguise, Lanzarote
description: Overlooking Costa Teguise Beach, in Lanzarote, Be Live Experience Lanzarote Beach Hotel offers a gym, and outdoor pool with loungers. Modern, air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, a private balcony or terrace, and seating area. The spacious, bright rooms have a safe and work desk. They are stylishly decorated and feature tiled floors. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer and free toiletries. This hotel has an à la carte restaurant and a poolside snack bar The Half Board service does not include drinks. The Be Live Experience Lanzarote Beach Hotel offers table tennis, air hockey and billiards. You can play also squash and there are archery and aerobics classes. The hotel features a 24-hour reception. Free parking is available nearby and Costa Teguise Golf Course is a 10-minute drive away. Reservations of 9 or more rooms may be subject to supplements and special conditions.

name: Hotel Ilunion San Mamés
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Bilbao, Hotel Ilunion San Mamés provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a terrace. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from San Mamés Metro Station. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. Breakfast is available daily, and includes continental, vegetarian and vegan options. At Hotel Ilunion San Mamés you will find a restaurant serving Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include San Mamés Stadium, Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall and Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 10 km from Hotel Ilunion San Mamés.

name: Hotel Melia Bilbao
description: Next to the Bilbao Estuary and just a few metres from the iconic Guggenheim Museum and the Euskalduna Palace, our 5-star hotel is the ideal place to relax and savour true Basque gastronomy. A modern hotel, designed by the prestigious architect Ricardo Legorreta and paying homage to the work of the Basque sculptor Eduardo Chillida. Travel to Bilbao and live a comprehensive experience. Meliá Bilbao, with its elegant avant-garde architecture, provides comfortable rooms and suites with fantastic views. Enjoy the Aizian Restaurant serving the most delicious classics of Basque cuisine with local and organic produce, and end your day in our Wellness Centre equipped with a gym, sauna and semi-covered swimming pool with heated water and mountain views. And if you are travelling for work, you can hold all kinds of meetings and events in our meeting rooms."

name: Radisson Collection Bilbao
description: Radisson Collection Bilbao has a fitness centre, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Bilbao. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 500 metres from the city centre and 1.1 km from Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Radisson Collection Bilbao offers some units with city views, and all rooms have a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, vegetarian or vegan breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Guests can make sightseeing and ticketing arrangements at the tour desk, or conduct business at the business centre. Popular points of interest near Radisson Collection Bilbao include Arriaga Theatre, San Mamés Metro Station and San Mamés Stadium. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 8 km from the hotel.

name: Hesperia Bilbao
description: Located just across the River Nervión from Bilbao’s Guggenheim Museum, Hesperia Bilbao has an eye-catching coloured glass façade. Bilbao’s old town and city centre are 10 minutes’ walk away. It offers spacious, stylish rooms with free WiFi and 42-inch satellite TV. All of the modern rooms are air-conditioned, soundproofed and feature a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. La Orilla terrace bar offers views of the city centre and the Bilbao estuary. Hesperia Bilbao offers large spaces for meetings, wedding and other events. The hotel is 5 minutes’ walk from Bilbao’s main shopping streets and tapas bars. Concordia Train Station is around a 10-minute walk from the hotel.

name: Nyx Hotel Bilbao By Leonardo Hotels
description: NYX Hotel Bilbao by Leonardo Hotels has a fitness centre, shared lounge, a restaurant and bar in Bilbao. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 200 metres from Arriaga Theatre, and within less than 1 km of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At NYX Hotel Bilbao by Leonardo Hotels the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Full English/Irish and American options. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at the accommodation. A business centre and vending machines with snacks and drinks are available on site at NYX Hotel Bilbao by Leonardo Hotels. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Abando Train Station, Catedral de Santiago and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 9 km from NYX Hotel Bilbao by Leonardo Hotels.

name: Hotel Abando
description: The Abando Hotel is located in central Bilbao, opposite Abando Metro Station and 150 metres from Abando Indalecio Prieto Railway Station. Its air-conditioned rooms all offer free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. Abando is just 200 metres from Bilbao’s main shopping streets, and 500 metres from the Guggenheim Museum of contemporary art. The old town is just 300 metres away. There is a tram stop 150 metres away. The hotel offers a varied breakfast, while the stylish Epaia Restaurant serves typical Basque cuisine. It specializes in fresh fish, and has an extensive wine list. Abando has a free gym with sauna and Turkish bath. There is also a gift shop and internet terminals.

name: Hotel Ilunion Bilbao
description: Located in the commercial heart of Bilbao, Hotel Ilunion Bilbao is 100 metres from San Mamés Bus and Metro Stations. There is a gym, and free WiFi is offered. All modern, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Ilunion Bilbao include a minibar and flat-screen satellite TV. They also come with a private bathroom and a hairdryer. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility, accessible rooms are available on request, also for people with auditory and visual impairment. You can have a varied breakfast at the hotel's restaurant La Kedada Bar & Restaurant where you can also find traditional Basque cuisine. The hotel also has spacious lounge areas and a 24-hour reception with tour desk. Situated next to Iturriza Casilda Park, Hotel Ilunion Bilbao is just 600 metres from Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Euskalduna Conference Centre. The Guggenheim Museum can be reached within a 15-minute walk. Pets allowed, under availability with the hotel. Supplements per night apply. Guests should contact the hotel to check and confirm availability of this room type. Once at the property, guests will receive the rules of access, which must be read and approved.

name: Vincci Consulado de Bilbao
description: Attractively situated in Bilbao, Vincci Consulado de Bilbao features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. This 4-star hotel offers a tour desk and luggage storage space. The hotel has a terrace and city views, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. At the hotel, rooms have a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Each room is fitted with a safety deposit box and certain rooms are fitted with river views. The rooms will provide guests with a minibar. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or vegetarian options. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English and Spanish. Popular points of interest near Vincci Consulado de Bilbao include Bilbao Fine Arts Museum, Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Occidental Bilbao
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Bilbao is an urban hotel designed to provide maximum comfort. The strategic location of the hotel just a few minutes from the historic centre makes it the perfect base for visiting the main tourist attractions. It has good transport links with the airport and train station. Its 200 modern rooms have been designed to ensure that you have the most comfortable stay. For those seeking tranquillity the hotel offers an exclusive Spa area and a heated indoor pool extra charge. Whats more the hotel offers meeting rooms for holding events and conferences. The Occidental Bilbao hotel is the perfect place to discover the impressive modern architecture of Bilbao and of course its delicious local cuisine. This Basque city offers an array of cultural activities streets full of charm and the biggest indoor market in Europe the Mercado de la Ribera.Tourism Registry HBI00337Barcelo.com

name: Hotel Ercilla de Bilbao, Autograph Collection
description: From industrial beginnings comes a city revitalized. An independent region with an independent soul.Infused by British soul. A place full of flavor, full of heart. Passionately revitalized by its people to signal the dawn of a new era.There is a place that stands out. Here you will find glamorous individualist rubbing shoulders with like-minded local;opening each others mind and awakening their senses. Where food and drink spark love, laughter and the fiery passion that´s within us all. It´s the best of Bilbao with all its proud British history. Passion for culture. Desire for flavor. And love for people are all ignited in one majestic destination.A new kind of hotel where you can experience 70´s glamour. Ercilla de Bilbao a hotel exactly like nothing else.Marriott

name: Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao
address: Gran Vía de Don Diego López de Haro, 73, 48009 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Set in Bilbao, 600 metres from San Mamés Metro Station, Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao offers accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is 700 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from San Mamés Stadium. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao provides some units that feature a balcony, and each room comes with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Guests at Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. The hotel offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Catalonia Gran Vía Bilbao include Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall, Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 7 km from the accommodation.

name: Mercure Bilbao Jardines De Albia
description: The Mercure Jardines de Albia Bilbao is next to the city's main points of interest: The Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, Museum of Fine Arts and the Old Town, with easy access to Euskalduna Palace. An ideal spot for enjoying the city, close to restaurants, bars and shops. The hotel has 138 rooms, breakfast, a spa to relax in and 3 meeting rooms, as well as paid parking with direct hotel access. No pets allowedaccorhotels.com

name: NH La Avanzada
description: NH La Avanzada is conveniently located in the Leioa-Getxo district and is a short distance from Gobela metro station. This contemporary hotel, staffed by our warm and friendly guest service members, is an easy walk to local attractions. Only 12 km from the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, and a mere 15-minute walk to Blue Flag Ereaga Beach, NH La Avanzada serves guests with a perfect location for both business and leisure. Each of our 120 bright and comfortable hotel rooms provide flat screen TVs, bathrobes, free Wi-Fi, desks and minibars. For our guests who want, or need, larger rooms, we have suites and apartments with separate living rooms available. Each morning our warm and friendly staff serves a fresh breakfast buffet. Made to order hot dishes and an early bird breakfast are available upon request. Txipiron is our elegant yet welcoming in-hotel restaurant which offers luxurious international and local cuisine. Open for lunch and dinner daily, private dining, vegetarian selections and children’s options are also offered. Additionally, NH La Avanzada hosts a conference center which can hold anywhere between 10 and 300 people. To further optimize the perfect stay, our staff will arrange room service or recommend additional local restaurants.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel Zenit Bilbao
description: Zenit Bilbao is in central Bilbao’s Indautxu district, 10 minutes from Atlétic Bilbao FC’s San Mamés Stadium. It offers stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and satellite TV. The hotel’s Abando Restaurant has a private outdoor terrace, where guests can enjoy traditional Basque cuisine. There is also a lounge bar and terrace. Hotel Zenit Bilbao offers access to a fitness centre located nearby. The Zenit’s 24-hour reception allows guests to come and go at any time. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Bilbao. Bilbao Cathedral and the city centre is a 15-minute walk from Zenit Bilbao, and you can walk to The Guggenheim Museum in 20 minutes. It is also 5 minutes’ walk from Indautxu Metro Station.

name: Hotel Bed4U Bilbao
description: Boasting a shared lounge, bar and views of city, Hotel Bed4U Bilbao is situated in Bilbao, 1.3 km from Catedral de Santiago. Featuring a fitness centre, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.1 km from Abando Train Station. At the hotel, every room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Bed4U Bilbao rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, vegetarian or gluten-free options. Speaking English, Spanish and French, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include San Mamés Metro Station, Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Arriaga Theatre. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 8 km from Hotel Bed4U Bilbao.

name: Petit Palace Arana Bilbao
description: Set in an impressive 19th-century building, this modern hotel is situated 200 metres from the Santiago Cathedral in Bilbao. Featuring a chic design, the rooms at Arana Bilbao come with air conditioning and a minibar. and flat-screen TV. Some rooms also have a balcony.The private bathroom includes a hydromassage shower. Free WiFi is provided. The Arriaga Theatre is opposite the Petit Palace Arana Bilbao, and the Guggenheim Museum is 20 minutes away on foot, with its remarkable architecture and modern art exhibitions. Petit Palace Arana Bilbao provides free bicycles for guests to explore to city. Car hire can be arranged at the tour desk and there is public parking nearby, for an additional cost. A Buffet breakfast is served in the hotel’s dining room and gluten-free food is available on request. Nearest airport is Bilbao Airport only 6.8 km from the property, and Bilbao main train station, Abando, is 450 metres from the Petit Palace Arana Bilbao.

name: Gran Hotel Domine Bilbao
description: Designed by Javier Mariscal, this stylish hotel is located opposite Bilbao's Guggenheim Museum. It features a roof terrace with spectacular views. The air-conditioned rooms at the Gran Hotel Domine Bilbao feature carpeted floors and a private bathroom with bathtubs, bathrobe and slippers. Each room has free WiFi, USB connection and a 40" flat-screen TV with international satellite channels, HDMI. Breakfast is served on the roof terrace with panoramic views of the city. Guests can enjoy different dining options at either the Belz restaurant, Le Café or at the Sixty-One Lobby Bar. The hotel has a wellness centre with fitness area, sauna and Turkish bath. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about what to see and do in Bilbao. The Museum of Fine Arts and the Maritime Museum are both within 500 metres of the hotel. The city’s shopping area, including the Zubiarte Shopping Centre, are 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Pensión Ama Bilbao
description: No description found

name: Hotel Tayko Bilbao
description: Situated in Bilbao, 200 metres from Arriaga Theatre, Hotel Tayko Bilbao was built in 1924. The property is within just 0.2 km of Catedral de Santiago and 15 minutes' walk from Guggenheim Museum. All rooms in the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV, private bathroom with free toiletries. Michelin-star restaurant Ola and La bodega de Ola at Hotel Tayko Bilbao are both managed by the Michelin-starred chef Martin Berasategui. Speaking German, English, Spanish and Basque, staff at the 24-hour front desk can help you plan your stay. Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall is 2.2 km from Hotel Tayko Bilbao, while Bilbao Fine Arts Museum is 2.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Pensión Plaza Nueva
description: No description found

name: Hotel Silken Indautxu
description: A central hotel in Bilbao for sightseeing comfortably, 400 meters from the Indautxu metro station. Urban hotel in Bilbao is located in the epicenter of Bilbao's museum triangle, between the Guggenheim Museum, the Fine Arts Museum and the Azkuna Alhóndiga. Three essential tourist stops that are also located in the heart of the commercial and gastronomic area of the city, with the best shops and pintxo bars. The hotel's Etxaniz restaurant with a careful proposal that bets on the local product with elaboration of reference the traditional one in the Basque gastronomy. Menu of the day and a la carte are offered to adapt to the preferences of all our travellers. The Gastro bar El Muelle, recently renovated, has an outdoor terrace with a green environment. Perfect atmosphere for a more informal stop, dinner and drinks are served in this bright and spacious space. The Meat & Soul cafeteria allows you to taste its pintxos and express breakfasts with sweet and savory dishes from the area.

name: Hotel Carlton
description: Centrally located in Plaza de Federico Moyúa square, this elegant hotel stands as an impressive landmark in Bilbao. It offers free access to its gym and spacious rooms with luxurious décor. The rooms at Hotel Carlton feature a classic or contemporary design and include a private bathroom. They also come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Hotel Carlton offers a business centre with a PC and free internet access. There is also a printer and complimentary minibar. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The grand restaurant serves Basque specialities and international classics. The menu changes daily, from Monday to Friday. Set next to Gran Vía, Carlton Hotel is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the Guggenheim Museum. Moyua Metro Station is next to the hotel, providing easy access to Bilbao and its surroundings. The airport bus stops nearby.

name: Micampus San Mamés Residencia Universitaria Solo Estudiantes
description: Well situated in the centre of Bilbao, Micampus San Mamés Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES offers air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Featuring a bar, the hostel is close to several noted attractions, around 800 metres from San Mamés Metro Station, less than 1 km from San Mamés Stadium and a 13-minute walk from Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.7 km from Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. At the hostel, every room includes a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower, while certain units at Micampus San Mamés Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES also provide guests with a seating area. The units feature bed linen. Guggenheim Museum Bilbao is 2.9 km from the accommodation, while Catedral de Santiago is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 10 km from Micampus San Mamés Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES.

name: Casual Blue
address: Calle Banco de España N3-1, 48005 Bilbao, Biscay
description: No description found

name: Pensión Lo Bilbao
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as an espresso maker and air conditioning. Other amenities include premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, down comforters, and towels.Expedia

name: Holiday Inn Express Bilbao
description: Comfortable hotel close to Bilbao, with breakfast, free Wi-Fi and free airport shuttle. Holiday Inn Express Bilbao is only 2 km from Bilbao Airport and 20 minutes from the city centre by bus. There are plenty of green areas around to go for walks. The sights of Bilbao city centre can be reached by car or by bus that departs from outside the airport. The iconic, Frank Gehry-designed Guggenheim Museum Bilbao houses a world-renowned collection of modern art. There's also a Fine Arts Museum, and in the delightful Old Town, you can eat traditional pintxos and browse independent shops. At this hotel, you can enjoy: - A free shuttle bus to and from the airport - A continental Express Start Breakfast, included in the room rate - Free Wi-Fi - Complimentary on-site parking during your stay - Family rooms that sleep up to 4 guests, max 2 adults/room. In the spacious lobby, you can sit back on one of the comfy sofas and enjoy a drink from the bar. For lunch or dinner you don’t need to head far: next door to the hotel, Urbe Restaurant offers seasonal Spanish dishes, and there are plenty more options within a short drive.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Bilbi
description: This hotel occupies a privileged spot next to Bilbao's old city, close to La Ribera market, the Miribilla Quarter and the Bilbao Arena Sports Centre. It has been lovingly refurbished with modern interiors and free WiFi. Rooms come with Canal + satellite channels and air conditioning. Private bathrooms have a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Enjoy excellent exterior views of the city from your bedroom in the Bilbi. You are footsteps from the Nervión River and can easily access the majority of Bilbao's sights and attractions on foot. There are also many restaurants nearby where you sample typical Pintxos. There is an open-air market on the first weekend of every month and you can enjoy lots of concerts and different theatre plays every week.

name: ibis budget Bilbao City
description: In Bilbao, we introduce the option of staying in the center, at super-competitive prices, in modern, functional rooms with all you need for your leisure or work stay. A young, dynamic and professional team will welcome you in the newly built facilities, where you can also enjoy our fantastic breakfast buffet. We encourage you to get to know us, and be confidence that we will not let you down.accorhotels.com

name: Botxo Gallery - Hostel
address: Avenida De Las Universidades, 5, 48007 Bilbao, Biscay
description: This modern hostel offers a chill-out lounge with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and views over the River Nervión and the Guggenheim Museum. Guggenheim Tram Station is 250 metres away. Botxo Gallery - Youth Hostel Bilbao has bold red, black and white décor with stylish murals. It offers spacious, air-conditioned dormitory rooms. Towels and bed linen can be rented from the reception. The hostel has a communal kitchen with a microwave, dishwasher and fridge. You can also find a wide range of traditional tapas bars within a 10-minute walk. The Botxo Gallery is just 150 metres from Deusto University. The nearby tram station provides easy access to the historic city centre.

name: Quartier Bilbao Hostel
description: Located in the heart of Bilbao Historic Centre, 100 metres from Santiago de Bilbao Cathedral, Quartier Bilbao Hostel offers rooms with free WiFi. Including bunk beds, all rooms have individual reading lights and lockers. Bed linen is provided, and towels can be rented for an additional charge. Other shared facitlies available at Quartier Bilbao Hostel include a rooftop terrace, a TV lounge with vending machines, and a kitchenette where the self-service continental breakfast is available. Set in a pedestrian street, this hostal is just 50 metres from the Ribera Market. Plaza Nueva is 120 metres from Quartier Bilbao Hostel, while El Arenal Park is 500 metres away. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 6 km from Quartier Bilbao Hostel.

name: Sercotel Ayala
description: Conveniently set in the Bilbao City Centre district of Bilbao, Sercotel Ayala is located 270 metres from Campos Eliseos Theatre, 1 km from Arriaga Theatre and 1.4 km from Funicular de Artxanda. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk as well as free WiFi throughout the property. A buffet breakfast is available daily at the hotel. All the rooms in this property are equipped with a desk, Smart TV and minibar. The property is 1 km from Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, 1.6 km from Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall and 1.5 km from Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. The train station is in close proximity of the hotel.The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Bilbao City Rooms
address: Alameda Recalde, N 24 Planta4, 48009 Bilbao, Biscay
description: No description found

name: Casual Bilbao Serantes
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, kitchenware and utensils, and a portable fan.Expedia

name: BYPILLOW Amari
description: Located in the Bilbao City Centre district in Bilbao, 300 metres from Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, BYPILLOW Amari features air-conditioned rooms and private parking. All rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Rooms are equipped with a private bathroom equipped with a shower. Extras include free toiletries and a hairdryer. BYPILLOW Amari features free WiFi throughout the property. There is a 24-hour reception at the property. Etxebarría Park is 1.2 km from BYPILLOW Amari, while Alhondiga Bilbao is 800 metres from the property. Bilbao Airport is 5 km away.

name: Hotel Bilbao Plaza
description: Located in the centre of Bilbao, overlooking the River Nervion, Hotel Bilbao Plaza features free WiFi, private parking and an on-site bar. Guggenheim Museum is 10 minutes' walk away. Every room has a smart TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms look onto the river, some onto a patio, and some come with a terrace. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property, and bike hire is also offered. You will find a café-bar at the Hotel Bilbao Plaza, as well as a dining room where breakfast is served. Hotel Bilbao Plaza is 10 minutes’ walk from Bilbao’s Old Quarter and 5 minutes’ walk from Calatrava Bridge. You will also find Arriaga Theatre 600 metres away.

name: Hotel Miro
description: Situated opposite Bilbao’s Guggenheim Museum, this boutique hotel was created by fashion designer Antonio Miró. It offers free WiFi and a 24-hour honesty bar. The Hotel Miró's rooms are decorated in a minimalist style. All are equipped with a smart TV. The bathrooms have Molton Brown toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, and free mineral water is provided. A buffet breakfast with selected local products is offered. Hotel Miró has a well-equipped gym. Guests benefit from a personalized concierge service. Massage services are available on request for an extra charge. The area surrounding the Miró is rich in traditional Basque restaurants. The historic city centre is 5 minutes’ walk away.

name: Casual Bilbao Gurea
description: No description found

name: NH Collection Villa de Bilbao
description: The stylish and contemporary NH Collection Villa de Bilbao hotel is reputed as one of the best hotels in the city. It’s set in Bilbao’s commercial district, just steps away from the Guggenheim, Bilbao Fine Arts Museum, Palacio de Congresos, and the San Mamés stadium. Restaurants showcasing the city’s exceptional gastronomy, including Michelin-starred restaurants, are within easy walking distance and the nearby metro station provides great links to rest of the city. NH Collection Villa de Bilbao has 142 spacious and elegant rooms. Many of these come with spectacular views of Bilbao and the surrounding mountains, while each one is perfectly designed for your relaxation thanks to pillow menus and luxurious mattresses. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Each morning we serve a lavish breakfast that features hot and cold dishes along with fragrant coffee and fresh fruit juices. Gluten-free options are also available. Our popular Le Bol Blanc restaurant has a creative menu based on traditional Basque cuisine. Unwind with a drink at the Corner bar where we have a hand-picked menu of specialty gins and vodkas. Guests have free access to our rooftop gym. Our courteous staff can organize VIP treatment at the city’s top attractions. We also have 7 function rooms for up to 340 people.NH Hoteles

name: Bilbao Rooms & Kitchen Zorroza
description: Bilbao ROOMS & KITCHEN Zorroza features a shared lounge, terrace, a restaurant and bar in Bilbao. The property is located 3.3 km from Bilbao Exhibition Centre, 4.2 km from San Mamés Metro Station and 4.5 km from San Mamés Stadium. The accommodation provides a shared kitchen and free WiFi throughout the property. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, all units at the guest house have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms include a balcony. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests at Bilbao ROOMS & KITCHEN Zorroza can enjoy a à la carte breakfast. Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall is 5.3 km from the accommodation, while Bilbao Fine Arts Museum is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 8 km from Bilbao ROOMS & KITCHEN Zorroza.

name: Hotel Ria de Bilbao
description: Set in Zorrozaurre island in the Bilbao Ria and overlooking the River Nervión, 2 km from Guggenheim Museum and next to Frank Gehry bridge. All types of rooms overlook either the property's garden or the river estuary of the Nervión. Rooms include free WiFi, TV, air conditioning, heating and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. The property offers free coffee and pastries daily. Along with tourist sights such as the world-famous gallery and the Euskalduna Palace, this property is also located close to the city’s Deusto University. San Mamés Stadium is 900 metres from Hotel Ria de Bilbao, while Doña Casilda Park is 20-minute walk from the property. Bilbao Airport is 6 km from the property.

name: Bilder Boutique Hotel
description: Conveniently set in Bilbao, Bilder Boutique Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a restaurant. This 2-star hotel offers a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 100 metres from Arriaga Theatre. At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room is equipped with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms have a terrace and others also offer city views. All units will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Popular points of interest near Bilder Boutique Hotel include Abando Train Station, Catedral de Santiago and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Lidar
description: Situated within 1 km of Arriaga Theatre and 2 km of San Mamés Stadium, Hotel Lidar provides rooms in Bilbao. Featuring a shared lounge, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.2 km from Catedral de Santiago. At the hotel, the rooms are fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Lidar each room includes bed linen and towels. Staff speak German, English, Spanish and French at the reception. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Abando Train Station, San Mamés Metro Station and Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 8 km from Hotel Lidar.

name: Bilbao Metropolitan Hostel by Bossh Hotels
address: Calle Nicolás Alcorta, 2, Bajo, 48003 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Located in Bilbao and within 1.2 km of Catedral de Santiago, Bilbao Metropolitan Hostel by Bossh Hotels features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.1 km from Arriaga Theatre, 2 km from San Mamés Stadium and 1.7 km from Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall is 2 km from the hostel and Funicular de Artxanda is 2 km away. All units in the hostel are equipped with a coffee machine. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at Bilbao Metropolitan Hostel by Bossh Hotels also provide guests with a city view. At the accommodation every room is equipped with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Bilbao Metropolitan Hostel by Bossh Hotels include Abando Train Station, San Mamés Metro Station and Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 8 km from the hostel.

name: Bilbao Hostel
description: Bilbao Hostel is set next to the A8 Motorway and is 10 minutes’ drive from central Bilbao. Surrounded by gardens and sports grounds, this hostel features a buffet restaurant and a 24-hour reception. Each modern room and dorm at Bilbao Hostel has heating, a desk and a private or shared bathroom. All accommodation offers views of Bilbao. There is a shared lounge area with a TV and a dining area. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. You can make use of sports facilities including football, basketball courts and table tennis. Free parking is available onsite for cars and bikes. Olabeaga and Autonomía train stations are within 15 minutes’ walk of the Bilbao Hostel, and connect you to the city centre in 10 minutes. You can take the bus or tram to the Guggenheim Museum, 3 km away.

name: Latroupe La Granja
description: In a prime location in Bilbao, LATROUPE La Granja provides air-conditioned rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. This property is located a short distance from attractions such as San Mamés Metro Station, Funicular de Artxanda, and Abando Train Station. The accommodation features karaoke and a concierge service. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower, while certain units at the hostel also provide guests with a terrace. A continental breakfast is available daily at LATROUPE La Granja. Staff at the 24-hour front desk speak English, Spanish, Basque and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Arriaga Theatre, Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 8 km from LATROUPE La Granja.

name: Hotel Sirimiri
address: Plaza de la Encarnación, 3, 48006 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Hotel Sirimiri is located in Bilbao's old town, a 5-minute tram journey from the Guggenheim. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. Rooms at the Hotel Sirimiri are exterior and offer lots of natural light. Rooms also have air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, and an en suite bathroom with a hairdryer. The Hotel Sirimiri is set a few metres from Atxuri Tram Station that can take you to the bus terminal. From here there is access to the city centre and to the airport. The Santiago Cathedral, La Ribera market, and the Arriaga Theatre are a short walk away.

name: Residencia Universitaria Blas De Otero
address: C/ de Las Cortes, 38, 48003 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Residencia Blas de Otero offers value accommodation in the historic centre of Bilbao, 400 metres from the Cathedral. Rooms include a private bathroom, small kitchen and free internet access. Residencia Blas de Otero is a short walk from Abando Train Station and Bilbao’s Old Town. The world-famous Guggenheim Museum is around 2 km away. The Residence is home to students of the University of the Basque Country. It includes a TV and DVD lounge, a games room, a gym and a self-service laundry room. Snacks and drinks are available from vending machines. Breakfast is provided at a nearby restaurant. There is free Wi-Fi access in public areas of the Blas de Otero. The Residence also has a 24-hour reception with a tour desk, which can provide information about the city. This residence is open to the university community all year round. If you are not a member of the Educational or University Community, a membership card by any Hostel Association in the IYHF must be presented.

name: Ganbara Hostel
description: Ganbara Hostel - Self Check In is set in the heart of Bilbao’s old town, on one of its famous Siete Calles, or Seven Streets. It offers free Wi-Fi, 2 communal lounges and a shared kitchen. Each of the simply decorated, modern dorms at Ganbara Hostel - Self Check In has heating, air conditioning and access to a shared bathroom with a hairdryer. Bed linen and lockers are included. The hostel is a 5-minute walk from the Basque Museum and nearby Casco Viejo Metro station. Buses to the famous Guggenheim Museum stop 10 minutes’ walk away. Bilbao Railway Station is less than 1 km from the Ganbara.

name: Abba Euskalduna Hotel
address: Camino de la Ventosa 34, 48013 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Boasting a popular location, Abba Euskalduna Hotel commands views of Bilbao, and is conveniently close to a multitude of eateries. It also provides private parking on site and the Guggenheim Museum Bilbao is a brief car trip away. This modern hotel features a range of facilities, including meeting rooms, supervised child care/activities and a 24-hour reception. For families Abba Euskalduna Hotel offers babysitting/child services. The rooms at Abba Euskalduna Hotel have air conditioning and offer a mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a coffee maker. All have an in-room closet, an in-room safe and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests staying at Abba Euskalduna Hotel can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close at mealtime. The hotel is ideally located for exploring the city, with San Mames Stadium a short stroll away. Staff can help with planning tours, and can assist with car hire.Revato

name: NH Bilbao Deusto
description: NH Bilbao Deusto is a comfortable and modern hotel in the heart of Bilbao. Everything is close by, including the famous Guggenheim museum of modern art and the Euskalduna Conference Center and Concert Hall. Nearby, you will also find two universities, Deusto and the University of Basque County, both of which are within a five-minute walk. There are 71 spacious rooms at NH Bilbao Deusto, each decorated with warm colors and featuring hardwood floors. If you are in Bilbao for work, there is a desk in each room and you can stay connected with our free hotel-wide Wi-Fi. Comfort is our number one priority, which is why rooms come with comfy mattresses, extra-large beds, and pillow menus. Connecting rooms are available and some come with terraces or balconies. A huge breakfast is served each morning, featuring fresh pastries, cold cuts and cheeses. There is a restaurant available for private bookings, and you can find many tapas bars and great dining options near the hotel. For a snack, there is a self-service lobby bar. If you are driving, make use of our on-site parking. For functions, there are three meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 60 people.NH Hoteles

name: Micampus Bilbao
description: Situated in Bilbao and with Catedral de Santiago reachable within 2.6 km, Micampus Bilbao Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. Boasting a shared kitchen, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The accommodation offers a tour desk, and luggage storage for guests. At the hostel, all rooms are fitted with a desk. At Micampus Bilbao Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES rooms include air conditioning and a private bathroom. You can play table tennis at the accommodation. Funicular de Artxanda is 3 km from Micampus Bilbao Residencia Universitaria SOLO ESTUDIANTES, while Calatrava Bridge is 3.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 7 km from the hostel.

name: Pension Don Claudio
description: No description found

name: Pensión B4R
address: Cocherito de Bilbao Kalea 2, 48004 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Set in Bilbao, 1.8 km from Catedral de Santiago, Pensión B4R features rooms with city views and free WiFi. The property is situated 2.9 km from Calatrava Bridge, 2.2 km from Arriaga Theatre and 3.1 km from Funicular de Artxanda. The guest house features family rooms. The units come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a microwave, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. At the guest house all rooms come with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao are 3.6 km from Pensión B4R. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 13 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Artetxe
address: Camino de Berriz 112 (Carretera Bi-3741 Enekuri-Artxanda km 7), 48015 Bilbao, Biscay
description: No description found

name: ibis Bilbao Centro
description: Fancy a visit to Bilbao? Stay at our ibis Bilbao Centro hotel. This hotel offers very comfortable rooms, fully equipped with air conditioning, climate control, free WIFI throughout the hotel and the best beds to provide maximum comfort during your stay. The hotel also boasts several meeting rooms and a snack bar where you can enjoy a bite to eat. All this for an affordable price and with the best staff at your disposal. Could you ask for anything more?accorhotels.com

name: Bilbao Place
description: Bilbao Place provides free WiFithroughout the property and rooms with air conditioning in Bilbao. Popular points of interest nearby include Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, Abando Train Station and Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. The guest house features family rooms. At the guest house, each room is equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Bilbao Place features certain rooms with quiet street views, and rooms include a patio. Guest rooms include a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Funicular de Artxanda, Calatrava Bridge and Arriaga Theatre. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 7 km from Bilbao Place.

name: 7 Kale Bed And Breakfast
description: Featuring rooms with French balconies and free WiFi, 7 Kale Bed and Breakfast is set in Bilbao's old town and 200 metres from Arriaga tram stop. Rooms at 7 Kale Bed and Breakfast are simply decorated and equipped with air conditioning, a TV and also each room has a private bathroom. The property is within 10 minutes’ walk of traditional pintxos bars and restaurants. Charming squares with cafés can be found in the streets surrounding Bilbao Cathedral, a 5-minute walk away. The famous Guggenheim Museum is just 3 tram stops from 7 Kale Bed and Breakfast and Arriaga Theater is 250 metres away. The nearest Metro station is 300 metres from the property, while Concordia Railway Station is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Sercotel Arenal Bilbao
description: Conveniently located in the Bilbao City Centre district of Bilbao, Sercotel Arenal Bilbao is set 100 metres from Arriaga Theatre, 300 metres from Catedral de Santiago and 100 metres from Casco Viejo Metro Station. Featuring a shared lounge, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, all the rooms are fitted with a desk and a Smart TV. All guest rooms feature a minibar. A Buffet breakfast is available every morning at Sercotel Arenal Bilbao. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Funicular de Artxanda, Bilbao Fine Arts Museum and Guggenheim Museum Bilbao. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 14 km from Sercotel Arenal Bilbao.

name: Ekoos Hostel, Bilbao Eko Hostel
address: Calle Bruno Mauricio Zabala Kalea 15, 48003 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Set in Bilbao, less than 1 km from Catedral de Santiago, Ekoos Hostel, Bilbao Eko Hostel offers air-conditioned rooms and a shared lounge. This property is situated a short distance from attractions such as Guggenheim Museum Bilbao, Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall, and Funicular de Artxanda. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Abando Train Station. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, rooms at the hostel also have free WiFi. The units feature bed linen. Popular points of interest near Ekoos Hostel, Bilbao Eko Hostel include Arriaga Theatre, San Mamés Metro Station and Bilbao Fine Arts Museum. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 9 km from the accommodation.

name: Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Bilbao, Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. The property is located 1.9 km from Bilbao Fine Arts Museum, 3.2 km from Guggenheim Museum Bilbao and 3.5 km from Catedral de Santiago. The student accommodation offers city views, a terrace and a 24-hour front desk. At the student accommodation, all rooms have a desk. Each room includes a private bathroom with a shower, while selected rooms have a kitchen with a stovetop. At Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés each room is equipped with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. You can play table tennis at Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés. Popular points of interest near the student accommodation include San Mamés Metro Station, San Mamés Stadium and Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall. The nearest airport is Bilbao Airport, 10 km from Residencia Universitaria Resa San Mamés.

name: Hotel Naval Sestao
description: Hotel Naval Sestao is a modern design hotel 4 km from Bilbao Exhibition Centre and 12 km from the famous Guggenheim Museum. There are excellent Metro and bus connections to the city centre. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Naval Sestao are decorated in soft natural tones and have wooden floors. Each room includes free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a stylish bathroom with a hairdryer. Hotel Naval Sestao has a bright, spacious café with a covered terrace. The elegant restaurant, Bolardo, serves traditional Basque food. The hotel has a quiet location, just 12 km from central Bilbao. Urbinaga Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away and is just 2 stops from the famous Portugalete Suspension Bridge.

name: Hospedium Hotel Blue Loiu
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 24 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and blackout drapes/curtains. Amenities Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Loiu? This hotel has 430 square feet (40 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Hospedium Hotel Blue Loiu in Loiu, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Guggenheim Museum Bilbao and Bay of Biscay. This hotel is 4.9 mi (7.8 km) from San Mames Stadium and 11.8 mi (19 km) from Port of Bilbao. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee. name: Guggenheim Riverview 5 Bedrooms
address: Campo de Volantín Pasealekua 33 Bajo, 48007 Bilbao, Biscay
description: Situated in Bilbao, within 400 metres of Funicular de Artxanda and 1.3 km of Arriaga Theatre, Guggenheim Riverview 5 Bedrooms features accommodation with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.5 km from Catedral de Santiago, 1.6 km from Euskalduna Conference Centre and Concert Hall and 2 km from San Mamés Metro Station. The property is 300 metres from Calatrava Bridge, and within 600 metres of the city centre. At the hotel, all rooms have a wardrobe. Every room includes a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a patio and others also feature city views. At Guggenheim Riverview 5 Bedrooms the rooms have bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bilbao Fine Arts Museum, Guggenheim Museum Bilbao and Abando Train Station. The nearest airport is Bilbao, 8 km from Guggenheim Riverview 5 Bedrooms, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Bilbao Art Lodge Staynnapartments
description: No description found

name: Hotel Af Valle Orotava
address: C/ Cupido 12, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Hotel AF Valle Orotava is a 4-star hotel, completely renovated, located in the center of Puerto de la Cruz, 10 minutes walk from Playa Jardín, equipped with modern facilities and rooms with views of the sea and Teide, rooftop with large terrace, heated saltwater pool. Buffet restaurant and à la carte restaurant are present. Bright, cozy, and comfortable rooms to provide the best experience and stays to each of our clients. They are fully equipped, air conditioning, free WIFI, safe included, telephone, TV, heating, electronic security lock and optional minibar. Private bathrooms with hairdryer and shower. They also have a balcony or terrace with artificial grass. Puerto de la Cruz has numerous tourist attractions that you can access walking from the Hotel AF Valle Orotava, such as the Loro Parque 20 minutes away, Playa Jardín 10 minutes away, the Castillo de San Felipe 10 minutes away, the Botanical Garden 30 minutes away or Paseo de San Telmo at 10 minutes, as well as the Lago Martiánez leisure complex at 15 minutes, formed by an artificial lake and seven swimming pools, where everyone can enjoy a pleasant dip. You can access Las Cañadas del Teide within 60 minutes by car or bus. The Hotel AF Valle Orotava is close to the bus station, medical center, post office, shops. It is located 36.50km from Santa Cruz de Tenerife, 26km from the North Airport and 84km from the South Airport. Paseo San Telmo Boulevard is a 10-minute walk from the property. Lago Martiánez is 1.2 km away.

name: Hotel Vallemar
address: Avenida de Colon 4, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Just 300 metres from Puerto de la Cruz’s beaches and the pools at Lago Martiánez, Hotel Vallemar offers stylish rooms with balconies. It features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with fantastic views over the Atlantic Ocean. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at Hotel Vallemar features classic-style décor. All rooms come with a TV, minibar and a private bathroom. Rooms offer garden or ocean views. A buffet breakfast is served in the Vallemar’s restaurant, which also hosts themed dinners with a range of Canarian and international dishes. You can enjoy a drink and snacks on the poolside terrace, and there is also a bar with live entertainment. The hotel is next to Puerto de la Cruz’s oceanfront promenade, and shops, bars and restaurants can be found nearby. Plaza del Charco Square is a 5-minute walk away. Los Rodeos Airport is a 15-minute drive from the hotel.

name: Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa
address: Guerrero, 14, Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Set in tropical gardens, Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa is just over 1 km from the beaches at Puerto de la Cruz. It features a spa, outdoor swimming pool and rooms with balconies. Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa offers bright, air-conditioned accommodation with satellite TV and a minibar. Each of its rooms has a fully equipped bathroom. The hotel’s El Drago buffet restaurant serves a selection of Mediterranean cuisine. There is also a poolside bar overlooking the hotel’s attractive grounds. The spa features a hydromassage tub and sauna, and offers a range of treatments including massage. There is also a gym on site. The centre of Puerto de la Cruz can be reached in around 5 minutes by foot and there is a golf course just 2 km from the hotel. The impressive Mount Teide Park is approximately 15 km from Blue Sea Costa Jardin & Spa.

name: Be Live Adults Only Tenerife
address: Avenida Blas Pérez González 11, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Located 270 metres from Jardin Beach in in Puerto de la Cruz, Be Live Adults Only Tenerife features a shared swimming pool and an on-site restaurant. This hotel has a 24-hour reception. All rooms at Be Live Adults Only Tenerife offer air conditioning, modern décor, and parquet floors. The private bathroom comes with a shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. Some of them feature views of the sea. WiFi is available for free. Loro Parque Zoo is a 5-minute drive from the hotel, and Teide Nature Reserve is 37 km from the property. Tenerife North Airport is 20 minutes’ drive from the hotel.

name: Mynd Adeje
description: Situated in Adeje, 500 metres from Playa de Ajabo, MYND Adeje features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. 1.6 km from Las Galgas Beach and 2.2 km from Playa El Pinque, the property offers a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, rooms are fitted with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, all rooms at MYND Adeje have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms also boast a terrace. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers American, vegetarian or vegan options. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at this 4-star hotel. Playa Las Salinas is 2.6 km from MYND Adeje, while Aqualand is 11 km from the property. The nearest airport is Tenerife South Airport, 29 km from the hotel.

name: Barceló Tenerife Royal Level
address: Avenida Greñamora 1, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Barcelo Tenerife Royal Level has 59 fully equipped and renovated rooms. A range of exclusive gastronomy options and the Magma performance hall. It also includes other original proposals for leisure and rest such as a navigable lake; a climbing wall; a gym; a recreational sports area with a beach volleyball court; basketball; tennis and paddle tennis; eight swimming pools /two of which are heated throughout the year/ and a Wellness area.Barcelo.com

name: Alua Atlantico Golf
address: Avenida Del Atlántico, 3, 38639 San Miguel De Abona, Tenerife
description: Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive has a restaurant, fitness centre, a bar and garden in San Miguel de Abona. Boasting a kids' club, this property also provides guests with a children's playground. The hotel offers an outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, karaoke and a 24-hour front desk. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a bath and a desk. At the hotel the rooms are equipped with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. The establishment also offers My Favourite Club®, with exclusive services and special attributes in room categories. A buffet breakfast is available every morning at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive The accommodation offers a terrace. You can play table tennis, and tennis at Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and car hire is available. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Playa San Miguel de Abona, Playa El Barranco and Playa de San Blas. The nearest airport is Tenerife Sur, 10 km from Alua Atlantico Golf - All Inclusive, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Fergus Puerto De La Cruz
address: Avda. Marques Villanueva Del Prado, 38400 Puerto de la Cruz, Tenerife
description: Featuring 2 outdoor swimming pools surrounded by gardens, Hotel Puerto de la Cruz offers spacious rooms with balconies. It is within 5 minutes’ walk of central Puerto de la Cruz and 1.1 km from the oceanside Lago Martianez salt-water lake. Free WiFi is available. Each bright room at FERGUS Puerto de la Cruz has simple, modern décor and air conditioning. All rooms have satellite TV and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Air conditioning is available only during the summer months, and it is subject to limited operating hours. A safe and minibar are available for an additional cost. The hotel has a buffet restaurant and a bar, where there is live entertainment and music. There is also a poolside bar. One of the swimming pools is heated and there is also a children’s swimming pool. The hotel offers a free shuttle service to Martianez Shopping Centre, available from Monday to Friday, and Saturday morning as well. Mount Teide National Park with its famous volcano can be reached in 1 hour by car. Santa Cruz de Tenerife, its port and the island’s North Airport are within 30 minutes' drive of the hotel. Private parking is subject to availability.

name: Mediterranean Palace
address: Avda De Las Americas 1, 38660 Adeje, Tenerife
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 535 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features at this resort include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting (surcharge), and an arcade/game room. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the area shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this resort consist of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Mediterranean Palace in Arona, you'll be on the beach, within a 10-minute drive of Siam Park and Arona Pyramid. This 5-star resort is 0.6 mi (1 km) from Playa de las Américas and 4.2 mi (6.8 km) from Fañabe Beach. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at Mediterranean Palace, a restaurant which specializes in international cuisine, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Unwind at the end of the day with a drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar.
