The hotel is just 300 metres from Valencia’s main shopping area, and 300 metres from Plaza Espanya Metro Station. Buses from Plaza Espanya also offer easy access to the beach. The Conqueridor Hotel’s restaurant is located on the ground floor and offers a varied breakfast. In the evenings it offers modern versions of classic Spanish dishes. Please note that from March 2022 to March 2024 we are carrying out restoration work at the hotel. During the renovation, some services as Gym and Sauna will remain close. Sorry for the inconvenience.

name: Hotel Medium Valencia
address: Avda. d'Amado Granell Mesado, 48, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: Situated 700 metres from Valencia's impressive City of Arts and Sciences, this design hotel offers a gym and seasonal outdoor pool. The spacious rooms include free Wi-Fi and flat-screen satellite TV. Each air-conditioned room at the Medium Valencia has wooden floors and elegant modern décor. Each one has a private bathroom with toiletries and a hairdryer. Some have views of the spectacular City of Arts and Sciences. Mediterranean cuisine served in Hotel Medium Valencia’s on-site restaurant. The hotel also has a lounge bar in the lobby. The Medium Valencia is around 2.5 km from the historic centre of Valencia, and 4 km from the city’s beaches. The hotel offers private on-site parking, and frequent bus services stop nearby.

name: Zalamera Bnb
description: Featuring free WiFi, a friendly coffee bar and a relaxing sun terrace, Zalamera BnB offers environmentally friendly accommodation, using solar panels and bio fuel. The breakfast is always fresh, with ingredients from local initiatives. Zalamera BnB is situated in the centre of Valencia, very easy to reach with a direct connection from Valencia airport, and a 3-minute walk from train and metro stations. Barrio del Carmen is a 2 km walk. Guests can rent one of the on-site bikes to go to the beach, or explore the city of Valencia. The Bed & Breakfast is housed in a beautiful building with a façade from 1880, and has brand new rooms and facilities. The interior design combines art deco elements, natural materials and plants, creating a classy yet homely atmosphere. A terrace or patio is featured in certain rooms. Every room is fitted with free WiFi, air conditioning, a heating system and a private bathroom. There is luggage storage space at the property. City of Arts & Sciences is 2.4 km from Zalamera BnB. Extramurs is a great choice for travellers interested in the old town, gourmet food and shopping.

name: A Casa Martínez B&B
address: Avinguda Regne de Valencia 57 Puerta 1, 46005 Valencia, Valencia
description: Ideally set in the Eixample district of Valencia, A Casa Martínez B&B is set 1.3 km from Norte Train Station, 1.3 km from Turia Gardens and 1.5 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The property is around 1.9 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, 2.2 km from Jardines de Monforte and 3.1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás. The accommodation offers a lift, full-day security and luggage storage for guests. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a dishwasher, a microwave, a coffee machine, a shower, bathrobes and a desk. Featuring a private bathroom, rooms at the guest house also feature free WiFi. At A Casa Martínez B&B the rooms come with bed linen and towels. Vegetarian and gluten-free breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. A Casa Martínez B&B provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. L'Oceanografic is 3.2 km from the guest house, while Puerto de Valencia is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from A Casa Martínez B&B.

name: Catalonia Excelsior Hotel
address: Carrer de la Barcelonina, 5, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Catalonia Excelsior is located in Valencia’s Old Town, just a few metres from Plaza del ayuntamiento Square. This elegant hotel features a café, free Wi-Fi access, rooms with satellite TVs. The Excelsior’s rooms are bright and air conditioned. Each has air conditioning, a small fridge and a well-equipped bathroom. Guests can enjoy a daily, buffet breakfast in the Catalonia’s café. There is a range of cafés, bars and restaurants within walking distance of the hotel. Valencia Cathedral is a 5-minute walk from the Excelsior whilst the Plaza de Toros Bullring is less than one kilometre away. The nearest Metro Station, Colón can be reached in 10 minutes, by foot.

name: Meliá Plaza
address: Placa De L Ajuntament, 4, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Melia Plaza Valencia is set in a classical building overlooking Valencia’s main square. It offers free Wi-Fi and features a gym, sauna and rooftop sun terrace. Air-conditioned rooms feature wooden floors, a minibar, safe and flat-screen TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. The hotel restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine and specializes in rice dishes. It has a summer terrace and a varied wine list. Room service is available 24 hours a day and gluten-free meals are offered. You can hire a car from the Melia Plaza’s 24-hour reception. Private parking is offered nearby for an extra charge. Valencia Train Station is 5 minutes’ walk away, and the Cathedral is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Silken Puerta Valencia
description: Silken Puerta Valencia is set 5 minutes’ walk from Valencia’s Mestalla Stadium and 15 minutes' walk from the City of Arts and Sciences. It features free Wi-Fi and an à la carte restaurant. The Puerta Valencia offers chic, contemporary décor designed by Javier Mariscal. Its air-conditioned rooms are spacious and have parquet floors, satellite TV and a desk. The Puerta Valencia Restaurant serves a range of Mediterranean cuisine, specialising in rice-based dishes. There is also a café-bar, which serves tapas and cocktails in the evening. The hotel features a large, on-site parking facility, available at an extra cost. The nearest Metro station, Aragón, is around 400 metres away and connects guests to the city’s old town and cathedral in 10 minutes. The beach is just over two km from the Silken.

name: Hotel Dimar
address: Gran Via Marques del Turia, 80, 46005 Valencia, Valencia
description: Situated in Valencia’s Cánovas Square, this modern design hotel offers a gym and free Wi-Fi. Each stylish room at Hotel Dimar has tea and coffee making facilities and flat-screen TV. The Hotel Dimar’s air-conditioned rooms have elegant décor and wooden flooring. They all offer a minibar and a private bathroom with amenities and a hairdryer. A continental buffet breakfast is served in the Hotel Dimar’s restaurant, while sandwiches and pastries are available in the bar. There is also a range of restaurants and bars in the surrounding streets. Set next to the Turia Gardens, Hotel Dimar is within a 15-minute walk of Valencia Cathedral. Colon Metro Station is 600 metres away, while the famous City of Arts and Sciences is just 1.5 km from the hotel.

name: Sh Valencia Palace
address: Avenida Paseo De La Alameda 32, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in front of the Palau de la Música in Valencia, this elegant hotel features a rooftop swimming pool and sun terrace. It offers spacious rooms with a classic design and free Wi-Fi. SH Valencia is 10 minutes’ drive from the impressive City of Arts and Sciences. Malvarrosa Beach is just 3 km away while the airport is 25 km away. There is also a snack bar and a lobby bar. A buffet breakfast is served in the hotel. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.

name: Myr Puerta Serranos
description: Situated conveniently in Valencia, MYR Puerta Serranos offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, private parking and room service. The property is close to several well-known attractions, less than 1 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, a 6-minute walk from Church of Saint Nicolás and 1.6 km from Norte Train Station. The hotel features a terrace and a 24-hour front desk. At the hotel, all rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. The rooms include a safety deposit box and selected rooms here will provide you with city views. The units feature a wardrobe. À la carte and continental breakfast options are available every morning at MYR Puerta Serranos. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Jardines de Monforte and Turia Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from MYR Puerta Serranos.

name: SH Ingles Boutique Hotel
address: C/ Marques De Dos Aguas 6, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: This elegant hotel is housed in an impressive, 18th-century palace in the centre of Valencia, 150 metres from the Cathedral. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. The SH Ingles combines a recognisable and historic façade with a classic continental interior of noble woods and marble. It is surrounded by other prestigious buildings, such as the Palace of the Dukes of Cardona and the premises of many international jewellery and fashion brands. A buffet breakfast is available and you can enjoy a drink on the terrace of the hotel café. There is an à la carte restaurant, which serves regional specialities such as Valencia’s famous paella. Gluten-free meals are available on prior request.

name: Melia Valencia
description: This modern Melia hotel is next to Valencia’s Palacio de Congresos Congress Centre and 5 km from the AVE Train Station. Beniferri Metro Station is just 400 metres away. The spacious rooms feature contemporary design and offer spectacular views and a 49' flat-screen satellite TV. All are air conditioned and have free WiFi and modern bathrooms. The hotel has a play area for children. Meeting rooms are available. Some areas of the hotel are dedicated to The Level rooms and exclusive services, such as a private check-in and check-out area, exclusive buffet breakfast, daily snacks and drinks in a private area, as well as concierge service and organization of activities in the hotel. city. Manises International Airport is just 15 minutes’ drive from the Melia Valencia. The hotel's Socarrat restaurant specializes in Valencian paellas, as well as Mediterranean and international cuisine. The Oval Bar has a small snack and drink menu for every hour of the day.

name: Voghe Premium Flats
address: Carrer de la Mare de Déu de Gràcia 8, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring a terrace and free WiFi, Voghe Premium Flats is located in the centre of Valencia, close to Church of Saint Nicolás, Norte Train Station and Turia Gardens. Some of the units include a satellite flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia, 7 km from Voghe Premium Flats, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mythic Valencia
address: 16 Carrer del Poeta Monmeneu Número 16, bajo, 46009 Valencia, Valencia
description: Conveniently located in the La Saidia district of Valencia, Mythic Valencia is set 1.4 km from Jardines de Monforte, 1.1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás and less than 1 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can have a drink at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Mythic Valencia all rooms include bed linen and towels. Continental and gluten-free breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Mythic Valencia provides an ironing service, as well as business facilities like fax and photocopying. Speaking Arabic, German, English and Spanish, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical information on the area at the 24-hour front desk. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Serranos Towers. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Mythic Valencia.

name: Only You Hotel Valencia
description: Located in Valencia and with Norte Train Station reachable within 700 metres, Only YOU Hotel Valencia provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a tour desk. The property is 200 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, and within 400 metres of the city centre. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Each room is equipped with a kettle, while some rooms are equipped with a kitchen with a fridge, a dishwasher and a microwave. At Only YOU Hotel Valencia each room comes with bed linen and towels. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean, Spanish and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Speaking Arabic, Bulgarian, Catalan and English at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Popular points of interest near Only YOU Hotel Valencia include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Turia Gardens and Jardines de Monforte. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the hotel.

name: Original Domino House
description: Original Domino House features air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV in the Camins al Grau district of Valencia. Boasting a shared lounge, the guest house is close to several noted attractions, around 1.4 km from Turia Gardens, 2 km from Jardines de Monforte and 1.5 km from Mestalla Stadium. The accommodation features a lift, luggage storage space and organising tours for guests. All rooms in the guest house are equipped with a kettle. With a private bathroom fitted with a walk-in shower and a hair dryer, rooms at Original Domino House also feature free WiFi. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. Norte Train Station is 2.4 km from Original Domino House, while Puerto de Valencia is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from the guest house.

name: Petit Palace Plaza de la Reina
address: C/ L Abadia De San Martin, 3, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: This modern hotel is located in Valencia Historic Centre, opposite the National Ceramic Museum and 200 metres from the lively Plaza de la Reina. It offers rooms with free WiFi. The rooms at Petit Palace Plaza de la Reina feature parquet floors and stylish décor. Free iPads are available on request. Staff at the 24-hour reception can help booking tickets for guided tours, live shows and other events. You can also hire bicycles for free. Electric scooter rental is also available subject to availability. The Petit Palace Plaza de la Reina is 300 metres from the Cathedral. The Lonja de la Seda, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is 250 metres away. This property offers buffet breakfast

name: Arena Zone Hotel
description: Arena Zone Hotel is an urban hotel located in Valencia, 1.2 km from the City of Arts and Sciences. It offers accommodation with private parking and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. There is a reception from 10AM to 10PM and concierge and guest service 23Hs/day. All rooms include a desk and flat screen TV, chromecast and 600 megabyte internet. Rooms include wardrobe. The Arena Zone Hotel offers a rich breakfast with a wide variety, provided by the restaurant located at our facilities, with direct access from our reception. Oceanogràfic is 1.4 km from the accommodation, while Turia Gardens is 2.5 km away. We are also a few meters from the L10 and the El Saler shopping center. Our location is unbeatable. And that's not all, just over 10 kilometers away is El Saler and l'Arbre del Gos beaches, and about 14 kilometers away from La Devesa beach. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from Arena Zone Hotel. Airport shuttle service is provided at an additional cost. Couples love the location — Gave it an 8.3 for two-person trips. Nearby beaches: El Saler beach, l'Arbre del Gos beach and La Devesa beach

name: Zenit Valencia
description: Zenit Valencia boasts a fantastic central location opposite Valencia’s Estación del Norte and the city’s bullring. It offers free Wi-Fi and has a fitness centre, sauna and car park. All rooms at the Zenit are stylishly furnished, with a private bathroom complete with hairdryer. Each room also contains a work desk, safety deposit box and plasma TV with satellite channels. The hotel serves a buffet breakfast from Monday to Saturday at the restaurant El Azahar. The Zenit is just 200 metres from Valencia Town Hall, and the Cathedral is a 15-minute walk away. The City of Arts and Sciences is 2.5 km away from the hotel. Xàtiva Metro Station is just outside the Zenit Valencia.

name: Petit Palace Ruzafa
description: Set in the heart of Valencia, this boutique hotel boasts an impressive 19th-century façade, stylish accommodation and a range of modern facilities. Surrounded by the city centre’s shops, bars and restaurants, the Petit Palace Ruzafa is ideal for a stay in this lively Mediterranean city. The historic surroundings contrast with contemporary services such as free WiFi internet access. The hotel is located close to the Train Station and just a short walk from the Turia Park. This green area lies in what was once a river bed and runs right through the middle of the city centre. Many of the historic bridges crossing the river are still in place.

name: Sweet Hotel Renasa
description: Sweet Hotel Renasa, located next to Valencia University, offers large, modern rooms and a restaurant. All rooms have air conditioning, laptop safe and satellite TV, as well as a seating area. Facultats Metro Station is just 600 metres away, and offers a direct link to the centre of Valencia city. A bus stop 50 metres from the hotel offers easy access to different parts of the city. The Sweet Hotel Renasa's restaurant offers a range of Valencian specialities, while the light, modern café offers tapas. The hotel also offers packed lunches.

name: Hotel Olympia Universidades
address: Calle Doctor Vicente Zaragozá 13, 46020 Valencia, Valencia
description: Hotel Olympia Universidades offers modern rooms and free WiFi throughout. The hotel is located 10 metres from Benimaclet Metro Station, connecting with Valencia City Centre, Valencia Airport, and the beach. Each exterior room at Hotel Olympia Universidades is air-conditioned and comes with a 32-inch flat-screen TV and soundproofing. Some offer city views. Private bathrooms feature a shower and free toiletries. You will find a range of bars and restaurants within 5 minutes´ walk. Royal Gardens are also 5 minutes on foot. Bike rental is available at Hotel Universidades. The nearest tram stop is 10 metres away and connects with La Malvarrosa Beach in less than 15 minutes. Valencia North Station is 10 minutes on the tram and the airport is 12 km away.

name: Holiday Inn Express Valencia - Bonaire
address: Parque Comercial Y de Ocio Aldaia, 46960 Valencia, Valencia
description: A welcoming Valencia hotel in the Bonaire Aldaia Shopping Centre, with free Wi-Fi and breakfast included Holiday Inn Express® Valencia – Bonaire hotel sits in the Bonaire Aldaia mall, 10 minutes’ drive from Valencia Airport (VLC). Steps away from the mall's brand name stores and restaurants, the hotel is close to the A7 motorway for easy connections to northern and southern Spain. Buses from the nearby stop take 25 minutes to reach the city centre, or it’s a 20-minute drive. You can host up to 20 people in the hotel’s naturally lit meeting room. Key companies nearby include SP Berner and Bayer Crop sciences, and the Palau de Congressos de València convention centre is a short drive away. The city centre's striking City of Arts and Sciences features a planetarium, an oceanarium and a state-of-the-art museum, and beaches line the nearby coast. At this hotel you can enjoy: - A continental Express Start Breakfast included in the room rate, no scrambled eggs or bacon. - Free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel - Complimentary parking Modern, air-conditioned rooms come with pillow menus to help you enjoy a good night’s rest. The lobby bar is the place to relax over drinks with friends, and if you need a bite to eat there are numerous restaurants nearby, or you can grab a snack from the 24-hour vending machines.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Oliveira Rooms
description: With a stay at Oliveira Rooms, you'll be centrally located in Valencia, within a 5-minute drive of Oceanogràfic Aquarium and City of Arts and Sciences. This hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Bioparc Valencia Zoo and 3.2 mi (5.1 km) from Malvarrosa Beach. Make yourself at home in one of the 21 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Plaza del Ayuntamiento - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi Valencia Town Hall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts "González Martí" - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi University of Valencia - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi Palace of the Marques de Dos Aguas - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi Teatro Olympia - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi Plaza de Toros de Valencia - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi Plaza Redonda - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi Plaza de la Reina - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi Santa Catalina Church and Tower - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi San Juan del Hospital Church - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Colón Market - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi San Agustin Church - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Basilica of San Vicente Ferrer - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi La Lonja de la Seda de Valencia - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi The preferred airport for Oliveira Rooms is Valencia Airport (VLC) - 10.6 km / 6.6 mi Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Cash transactions at this property cannot exceed EUR 1000, due to national regulations. For further details, please contact the property using information in the booking confirmation. This property's policy is to refuse certain bookings for the purpose of group events or parties, including pre-wedding stag/bachelor and hen/bachelorette parties. One child 12 years old or younger stays free when occupying the parent or guardian's room, using existing bedding. A car is not required for transportation to and from this property. This property advises that enhanced cleaning and guest safety measures are currently in place. Disinfectant is used to clean the property; commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant between stays; bed sheets and towels are laundered at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F. Personal protective equipment, including masks and gloves, will be available to guests. Social distancing measures are in place; staff at the property wear personal protective equipment; a shield is in place between staff and guests in main contact areas; periodic temperature checks are conducted on staff; temperature checks are available to guests; guests are provided with hand sanitizer. This property affirms that it follows the cleaning and disinfection practices of Safe Tourism Certified (Spain).Sembo

name: Myr Palacio Vallier
description: Situated in Valencia, 300 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás, MYR Palacio Vallier features accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers a business centre and a concierge service. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, minibar, a coffee machine, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. Rooms have a private bathroom with a hairdryer, while certain rooms come with a balcony and others also boast city views. At the hotel each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at MYR Palacio Vallier can enjoy a continental breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Jardines de Monforte and Turia Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from MYR Palacio Vallier.

name: NH Valencia Las Artes
description: The NH Valencia Las Artes hotel is ideally situated close to the Joaquín Sorolla Station and is a 13km bus or car ride from Valencia Airport. It is conveniently located near several attractions including the City of Arts and Sciences, the aquarium and an IMAX cinema. The Palau de les Arts Reina Sofia, the Valencia Cathedral, and Malvarrosa Beach are also all within a 1km to 7km distance and are easily accessible by foot or bus. Both the Central Market and the El Saler Centro Comercial shopping centers are also close by. Each of our 174 comfortable guest rooms have contemporary amenities including room service, free Wi-Fi, and comfortable mattresses. The junior suite has a coffee and tea maker, a sitting area, and sofa for guests who require additional space, not to mention the fantastic view of the opera house. A breakfast buffet is available daily and made-to-order hot dishes are cooked upon request. The elegant NH Valencia Las Artes Restaurant opens for lunch and dinner with its cuisine focused on local Mediterranean fare. A gym with a sauna, a children’s play area, a year-round heated swimming pool, wake up service, and three terraces are additional features for our guests enjoy.NH Hoteles

name: Hulot B&B Valencia
description: No description found

name: NH Collection Valencia Colón
description: Elegantly decorated and housed in a classic 19th-century building, the NH Collection Valencia Colón opened in 2018. It’s conveniently situated in the commercial area of the city on Carrer Colón, one of Valencia’s main shopping streets. The hotel is within walking distance of the city’s biggest tourist sights, including the Marqués de Dos Aguas Palace, the cathedral and the central market. It’s also close to the metro with links to the airport and harbor, and convenient for the main train station and other public transport or sights such as the Oceanografic or Ciutat de les Arts i les Ciències. The hotel has 47 rooms, all decorated under the watchful eyes of renown designer Lorenzo Castillo in a cozy British style, or with French or Indian touches, all with calming tones making them ideal for unwinding after a day of exploring the city. Each room has a Nespresso machine as well as free Wi-Fi and a 36” LCD/LED TV. Guests can relax in complimentary NH bathrobes and slippers, and enjoy a good night’s sleep with a choice of pillows. A generous breakfast buffet is available every day, featuring pastries, breads, cold cuts and eggs any style, as well as local specialties and gluten-free options. The hotel has its own restaurant, Kamikaze Restaurant, and is close to the bars, coffee shops and restaurants of Gran Via. There’s also a gym and a bar. On-site parking is available.NH Hoteles

name: L&H Gran Via Valencia
address: 63 Gran Via de Ferran el Catòlic, 46008 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring a restaurant, bar and views of city, L&H Gran Vía Valencia is located in Valencia, less than 1 km from Church of Saint Nicolás. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. All units in the hotel are equipped with a coffee machine. Every room includes a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain units at L&H Gran Vía Valencia have a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A continental, American or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish and French, and guests are invited to request guidance on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near L&H Gran Vía Valencia include Norte Train Station, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: NH Valencia Las Ciencias
address: Avenida Instituto Obrero de Valencia 26, 46013 Valencia, Valencia
description: The NH Valencia Las Ciencias hotel, formerly known as NH Las Artes II, is located in the City of Arts and Sciences area of Valencia. A 10-minute bus ride will take guests to Valencia city center. The popular L'Oceanogràfic and the Palau de les Arts Reina Sofia opera house are within walking distance of the hotel. All of our 121 comfortable and modern guest rooms feature wooden flooring and soothing tones, and many offer park views. Additional standard amenities include free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and satellite TV. A delicious breakfast buffet is served every morning in the neighboring NH Valencia Las Artes Restaurant and includes fresh fruit, pastries, and cheeses. An early bird breakfast is available upon request. The restaurant also welcomes guests to enjoy a delectable lunch and dinner of local and Mediterranean cuisine. NH Valencia Las Ciencias’s business guests are welcome to book either of our two meeting rooms which hold up to 20 people and are perfect for any small event. Our special events services team can provide additional amenities such as office supplies and audiovisual equipment. Our 24 hour front desk staff is on hand to accommodate special requests such as babysitting and dry cleaning services.NH Hoteles

name: Ad Hoc Carmen
description: Located in Valencia’s historic centre, just 400 metres from Valencia Cathedral, Ad Hoc Carmen hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout. Rooms at this property feature simple and modern furniture and come with air conditioning, wardrobe, heating, flat-screen TV, telephone and a private bathroom with free toiletries. Ad Hoc Carmen offers tourist information of the area and you can rent bicycles on site. Malvarosa Beach is 6 km away and Parc Natural de la Albufera Nature Reserve is 30 minutes’ drive away.

name: Hotel Benetusser
description: Just to the south of the city of Valencia, the Hotel Benetusser has large, modern and air-conditioned rooms. There is free WiFi and a restaurant. All of the Benetusser Hotel’s rooms have a plasma TV and telephone. The marble bathrooms have a hairdryer and bath or shower. The Benetusser has a lounge with large-screen TV and daily newspapers. The reception is open 24 hours a day. The restaurant offers a range of Valencian dishes. Hotel Benetusser is just 10 minutes’ drive from Valencia Exhibition Centre and the City of Arts and Sciences. Located 5 minutes' walk away, Benetusser Train Station connects you with Valencia City Centre in 5 minutes. The Albufera Natural Park is just 2 km away.

name: Nest Style Valencia
description: Attractively set in the Camins al Grau district of Valencia, Nest Style Valencia is set 2.6 km from Puerto de Valencia, 2.8 km from Jardines de Monforte and 3.3 km from Norte Train Station. With a bar, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.4 km from Turia Gardens. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Nest Style Valencia rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish and Italian, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical advice on the area at the reception. L'Oceanografic is 3.6 km from Nest Style Valencia, while González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: L'esplai Valencia
description: Located 250 metres from Valencia Cathedral, L'Esplai Valencia offers rooms with city views and free WiFi. This bed and breakfast is set in a restored listed building with original features. Offering modern décor, each room comes a seating area and kettle. The private bathroom has a bath or shower and a hairdryer. Air conditioning is available. Bike hire and car rental can be organised for you, and luggage storage is available. You can find a wide range of bars and restaurants within a 5-minute walk of the property. Colon Metro Station is 650 metres from the bed and breakfast, and the Turia Gardens are the same distance away. Valencia Norte Train Station is a 15-minute walk from L'Esplai Valencia. You can find Plaza de la Reina Square and Plaza de la Virgen Square within 200 metres of the property. The City of Arts and Sciences is 2.5 km from the property.

name: Palacio Santa Clara, Autograph Collection
address: Calle Pascual y Genis 22, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Valencia is unique for many reasons, in its streets, history and avant-garde coexist perfectly knowing how to complement the city and so it is our new Autograph Collection, Hotel Palacio Santa Clara. Located close to the famous and commercial street of Valencia, Carrer Colón, it is the perfect example of the modernista spirit. Designed by the renowned architect Francisco Javier Görlich in 1916, this initial essence is preserved in our hotel. The delicious aesthetic design with different textures, curved lines, vegetables motifs. brings you a sense of harmony that perfectly combines with our best services and facilities. Explore our hotel in Valencia, find out our bar, drink a selected cocktail and evoke old times, unwind in one of our guest rooms totally equipped with everything you need plus small design touches that will lift your experience and after taking a dip in our pool, refresh yourself in our Dome Bar in the terrace. Live the real modernista experience. Discover Hotel Palacio Santa Clara.Marriott

name: Vincci Mercat
address: C/ de la Llanterna, 31, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Featuring a restaurant and bar on site, Vincci Mercat is located in Valencia, less than 100 metres from the city’s Central Market. This hotel offers free Wi-Fi throughout and a rooftop terrace with a mini swimming pool and views of the old city. Each air-conditioned room in this hotel has a flat-screen TV, wardrobe, safe, minibar. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower, free toiletries, and a hairdryer. You can find several restaurants and bars within a 5-minute walk of Vincci Mercat. Valencia Cathedral is 600 metres from the property, and the City of Arts and Sciences is 3 km away.

name: Caro Hotel
description: The unique Caro Hotel is housed in a 19th-century palace in central Valencia, just 200 metres from Valencia Cathedral. Combining historical features with modern design, it has an outdoor pool open all year round. Designed by Francesc Rifé, each of the elegant rooms in the Caro is totally individual, with exquisite touches of minimalist design. All have a flat-screen satellite TV, air-conditioning and a free minibar. The bathrooms include Bvlgari toiletries, a bathrobe and slippers. The cuisine of restaurant Alma del Temple offers a relaxed service that based on traditional ingredients and gives a protagonism to the kitchen. Architecturally unique, parts of Caro Hotel date from up to 2000 years ago. Original features include a 2nd-century Roman mosaic, part of the 13th-century Arabic city walls and Gothic arches. The façade dates from the 19th century. Plaza de la Virgen and Valencia's basilica are within 5 minutes’ walk of the hotel. La Lonja de la Seda, the medieval market and a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel San Lorenzo Boutique
description: Located 100 metres from the Turia Gardens, in Valencia’s Old Town, Hotel San Lorenzo Boutique offers stylish rooms with free WiFi. The hotel is 200 metres from Torre de Serranos City Gate. Featuring free WiFi, each spacious air-conditioned room has a minibar, flat-screen TV and views of the city. The private bathroom includes a bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. Hotel San Lorenzo Boutique has a 24-hour reception, as well as a ticket service and tour desk. Bike rental and car can be organised for you, and an airport shuttle service is available. The Lonja de Seda Silk Exchange and Valencia Central Market are less than 10 minutes’ walk away from the hotel. Norte Train Station is a 20-minute walk away.

name: Vincci Lys
description: Vincci Lys offers spacious, elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and minibars. Situated in the centre of Valencia, it is only 300 metres from Valencia Train Station and Valencia Town Hall. Each of the Vincci’s air-conditioned rooms is soundproofed and offers elegant, classical-style décor. Rooms also feature a pillow menu and a safe. The private bathroom offers toiletries and a hairdryer. Vincci Lys offers a varied buffet breakfast daily which includes gluten-free products. The hotel has Room Service for guests. Early check-in and late check-out are available upon request, as well as meeting and conference facilities. The Vincci Lys offers on-site parking with direct access to the hotel. The hotel is set on a quiet pedestrian street a short walk from shops and restaurants. It is a 10-minute walk to Valencia Cathedral. Xàtiva Metro Station, 5 minutes’ walk from the hotel, offers direct services to Valencia Airport.

name: Hotel Neptuno
description: This design beachfront hotel overlooks Valencia harbour and has a small spa and a gym The modern, air-conditioned rooms have flat-screen TV, free WiFi and sea or marina views. Marina Real Juan Carlos I tram stop can be found just outside the hotel, and offers a link with central Valencia. There is also direct access to the beach. Attractively located in the Poblats Maritims district, this hotel provides a popular beachside bar and a restaurant. The restaurant offers a range of traditional rice dishes and fresh seafood for dinner. Oceanografic is 2.4 km from the hotel, while City of Arts & Sciences is 2.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from the property.

name: AZZ Valencia Táctica
description: Located just 10 minutes’ drive from Valencia’s Congress Centre, Hotel Táctica provides air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TVs. The rooms at the Táctica feature parquet floors. Each one has satellite TV and a private bathroom. The hotel’s cafeteria serves drinks and snacks. Free WiFi is available in all areas. The hotel offers a charging station for electric vehicles, available for an extra charge. The Recinto Ferial de Valencia Exhibition Centre and Heron City Shopping Centre are within 2 km of the property. The hotel is 7 minutes’ drive from Valencia Airport and 15 minutes from central Valencia.

name: Ilunion Aqua 3
address: Calle De Luis Garcia Berlanga, 19-21, 46023 Valencia, Valencia
description: The design-driven Ilunion Aqua 3 is located just 300 metres from Valencia’s City of Art and Sciences and the Oceanographic Park. It offers a modern rooms, a 24-hour reception, and free WiFi. The hotel is located above the Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre, which features a multi-screen cinema, a wide range of clothing shops a spa and a fitness centre. The air-conditioned rooms at the Ilunion Aqua 3 feature wooden floors and modern décor in warm colours. They all include a work desk, safe and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The bathroom features marble finishes and comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel has a bright and modern restaurant, where breakfast is served each morning. The restaurant also offers à-la-carte and set menus for lunch and dinner, and it features special menus for guests with allergies. There is a bus stop just 50 metres from the hotel, from which there is a regular service to the city centre and the beach. The Malvarrosa and Las Arenas beaches are just a few minutes drive from the hotel, and Manises Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away. Discounted rates are offered for parking at the Aqua Multiespacio shopping centre. This hotel is officially adapted for guests with reduced mobility. Late check-out until 12:00 is offered to all guests free of charge.

name: One Shot Mercat 09
description: Featuring free WiFi, a seasonal outdoor pool and a sun terrace, One Shot Mercat 09 offers accommodation Ciutat Vella district, located on the historic center of Valencia. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms feature a seating area where you can relax. Rooms come with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Gourmet buffet breakfast is available at Restaurant Karak. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Barrio del Carmen is 600 metres from One Shot Mercat 09, while City of Arts & Sciences is 2.7 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from One Shot Mercat 09.

name: Sh Suite Palace
address: Plaza de Margarita Valldaura 2, 46003 Valencia, Valencia
description: Conveniently located in Valencia, SH Suite Palace offers a gluten-free breakfast and free WiFi. The property is close to Jardines de Monforte, Church of Saint Nicolás and Plaza Ayuntamiento. The property is non-smoking and is set 100 metres from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At SH Suite Palace all rooms have bed linen and towels. Speaking both English and Spanish, staff at the reception can help you plan your stay. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Norte Train Station, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Turia Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from SH Suite Palace.

name: Port Feria Valencia
description: Located next to the Feria de Valencia and very close to the city center, Port Feria Valencia is the best option to discover and get to know Valencia, thanks to its excellent communications to and from any point of the city, its complete facilities and quality of their services. Modern hotel with excellent communications with the historic center, the Plaza del Ayuntamiento, the City of Arts and Sciences and the Airport. The Port Feria Valencia has, among its excellent and complete services, an à la carte restaurant with Mediterranean cuisine and Valencian specialties, an outdoor swimming pool and solarium, a gym, a restaurant and a cafeteria. Our clientele will be able to enjoy free Internet connection throughout the hotel (Wi-Fi) and parking and airport transfer service (both for an additional fee). In addition, Port Feria Valencia has magnificent rooms equipped with all the necessary amenities to have an unbeatable stay and three meeting rooms with a maximum capacity of up to 78 people, among other services and facilities. Benimàmet Metro Station is 400 metres away, and the hotel has good access to main roads. Valencia Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: The Westin Valencia
description: The Westin Valencia is ideally located in the city centre close to the historic center, the commercial area and the City of Arts and Science of Valencia. Our 135 elegant Art Deco style rooms and suites have a warm, relaxing atmosphere with plenty of natural light and some of them even feature private terraces with a Jacuzzi. Come relish in our rooms, relax at our spa, enjoy our exquisite dining and let our lovely staff take care of you on your next vacation.Marriott

name: Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach
description: Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach brings a 360º proposal for your stay with high quality shows with dancers and live music. This stylish, design hotel is located next to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach, and it is just one minute's walk from Valencia Harbour. The themed rooms at Hotel Sabbia by Gabbeach feature unique, contemporary decor. All have a TV and bathroom. Some offer a terrace, sea or garden views and spa bath or shower. All have free fast broadband internet connection via WiFi and cable. Breakfast is served daily and the Sabbia by Gabbeach restaurant offers a fusion of modern international and Spanish cuisine. The hotel also has a pub which closes at 03:00. The property offers banquet facilities and meeting rooms. There are a number of bars, restaurants and shops on the same street as the Sabbia by Gabbeach. At Sabbia by Gabbeach we practice Hatha Yoga under the sun rays and the sea breeze. Buses to the centre pass from a stop opposite the hotel, and the Ciutat de les Arts i les Ciències is 3 km away. Ferries to Mallorca, Menorca and Ibiza all leave from the port. The Sabbia by Gabbeach is 300 metres from the Marina Real Tram Stop and Metro Station.

name: Holiday Inn Express Valencia-Ciudad Las Ciencias
description: Welcoming Valencia hotel near the City of Arts and Sciences, with breakfast included and a bar Holiday Inn Express® Valencia - Ciudad Las Ciencias is the closest hotel to the Oceanogràfic aquarium, a short walk away. It's a five-minute walk to the striking City of Arts and Sciences, while dining and shopping is just next door, at the El Saler mall. There's a bus stop directly in front of the hotel for easy access to Valencia city centre. You can drive to popular Las Arenas beach or the handsome Old Town in 15 minutes. Business guests have access to 4 naturally lit meeting rooms, and the Palacio de Congresos de Valencia conference centre is less than 20 minutes by car. Valencia Airport is 14 km away. At this hotel you can enjoy: - Free Wi-Fi - Parking for a daily fee - A continental Express Start Breakfast buffet included in the room rate The comfortable rooms provide single beds for business guests, or sofa beds and connecting suites for families. Some rooms have views of the City of Arts and Sciences, and kids under 19 stay free with their parents. Breakfast is served in a spacious dining room overlooking seasonal outdoor pool. For dinner, you can sample the many restaurants in the adjacent shopping mall, or head to Alqueria del Pou, a rustic restaurant surrounded by fields, just 1 km away. End the day with a drink in our lobby bar.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: NH Ciudad de Valencia
description: The NH Ciudad de Valencia hotel is in one of the city’s main streets, Avenida del Puerto. Many attractions can be found nearby, including the City of Arts and Sciences Museum, the Palace of Arts, and the Opera House. There is a subway and bus stop by the hotel for connections to the rest of the city and the surrounding areas. After a five minute drive, you will find yourself at the Las Arenas and La Malvarrosa sandy beaches. Each room at NH Ciudad de Valencia is equipped with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV, a mini-bar, and a desk, in case you need to get some work done. There is a total of 149 rooms including triple rooms and two Junior Suites that have a separate living area and an outdoor terrace. All are designed in a contemporary style with red accents and a laid-back color scheme. Breakfast is an exciting affair, with many delicious options to choose from. They include cold cuts, cheeses, yogurt, cereals, and much more besides. From Monday-Thursday dinner is available in the restaurant, and although the hotel does not have an on-site restaurant for lunch and dinner on the weekends, we recommend that you try the world-famous Valencian paella at one of the local restaurants. We also have 2 meeting rooms for up to 70 people and a compact gym.NH Hoteles

name: Las Arenas Balneario Resort
description: This 5-star resort has a superb seafront location with direct access to Valencia's Las Arenas Beach. The Las Arenas Balneario Resort features 2 seasonal outdoor pools surrounded by loungers, and a luxurious spa. All rooms at this design hotel are elegantly decorated with neutral colours. They include free Wi-Fi and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. The Sorolla restaurant serves traditional but creative cuisine. Guests can enjoy a breakfast buffet and light refreshments are available from the pool bar. The spa at Las Arenas Balneario Resort Valencia includes a heated indoor pool with views to the gardens. Massage and beauty treatments are available, and there is a gym. The Palacio de la Música and the America’s Cup Port are a short walk from the hotel. There are 2 metro stations and many bus stops nearby the Hotel Las Arenas Balneario Resort.

name: AZZ Valencia Congress
description: Valencia Congress Hotel&Spa is situated in Parque Empresarial Táctica in Paterna, 7 km from Valencia. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar, the spa as well as the restaurant and the gardens. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Certain rooms include a seating area where you can relax. The rooms have a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests can benefit from massages, health and aesthetics treatments in private cabins in the hotel's spa for a surcharge. Meeting rooms for events and congress that host over 1400 attendees is also available. Metro station is 1.5 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 3 km from the property.

name: B&B Hi Valencia Canovas
description: No description found

name: AC Hotel Valencia by Marriott
description: AC Hotel Valencia is in the northern part of the city near the Oceanografic, the Museum of Arts and Sciences. It is a magnificent location to get to know in Valencia.The hotel rooms are redesigned for you to have an excellent experience with all the offered amenities. They are equipped with high-quality mattresses to provide the best rest, spacious closets, a plasma TV with international channels, a minibar with all kinds of drinks, and a private bathroom. You can choose from 6 types of rooms according to your needs and preferences.This hotel offers the AC Lounge space, a recently renovated place, where it is possible to enjoy private areas to read, work and/or taste all kinds of dishes and drinks typical in Valencia.Our hotel in Valencia offers access to the Fitness Room, available to all guests. It has high-quality equipment for the best training. In addition, the AC Hotel Valencia has several rooms to hold meetings and events of all kinds, where the staff will take care of its organization.Marriott

name: Hospes Palau de La Mar
address: Avenida de Navarro Reverter, 14, 46004 Valencia, Valencia
description: Set in a 19th-century building, Hospes Palau de La Mar features a striking lobby, a spa and restaurant. Located in Valencia's Eixample Noble district, it is a 15-minute walk from the city's AVE Railway Station. The Hospes Palau de la Mar has elegant, modern rooms with queen-size beds and marble bathrooms. Wi-Fi is available in rooms and public areas. These include an interior patio. Traditional recipes using local produce and fresh fish are available at the gourmet restaurant. The Palau de la Mar’s Spa has 3 massage and treatment rooms. A hot tub, a sauna and a Turkish bath are also included. There is also a small gym. Valencia’s cathedral and surrounding old town are within 10 minutes' walk of the Hospes Palau, while the City of Arts and Sciences is 2 km away. There is also easy access to the Lonja, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

name: Hi Valencia Boutique
address: Plaza Alfonso El Magnánimo, 1 Puerta 2, 46003 Manises, Valencia
description: Featuring free WiFi, Hi Valencia Boutique offers rooms in Valencia. Valencia´s Cathedral is 600 metres from the property, while the closest metro station is 4 minutes' walk away. The rooms feature a modern décor and come with a TV and a wardrobe. There is a bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries. Towels and bed linen are included. Breakfast is available for a surcharge at a café located 100 metres from the property. A wide range of restaurants and shops can be found within 5 minutes' walk of the property. A tour desk service is also offered. Barrio del Carmen is 15 minutes' walk from Hi Valencia Boutique, while City of Arts & Sciences is 2.3 km away. Valencia Airport is 9 km from the property.

name: Primus Valencia
description: This ultra-modern hotel is just 600 metres from Valencia’s impressive City of Arts and Sciences. It has a spa, gym, an all-year round outdoor swimming pool and its elegant rooms feature plasma satellite TV and free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms at the Valencia Primus have attractive wooden flooring and bright, modern décor. Each one is soundproofed and has a work desk and laptop safe. For a surcharge, guests have access to the hotel’s extensive spa, which features a dynamic swimming pool, cold pool, hot tub, sauna and hammam. A range of massage and beauty treatments are available for a surcharge. There is also a fitness centre. The hotel’s stylish restaurant serves traditional Mediterranean food with a modern twist. It has an outdoor terrace, and there is also a café-bar overlooking the charming decked garden. Aqua Multiespacio Shopping Centre is just opposite the Primus Valencia. There is a bus stop 75 metres away, connecting you with the city centre and beaches.

name: Barcelo Valencia
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. A hotel that coexists with the City of Arts and Sciences.The Barcelo Valencia hotel oozes urbanism and modernity in the City of Arts and Sciences offering a unique experience in this city by the Turia river. Well-connected with the airport it is ideal for business or leisure visits.This 4-star hotel boasts 187 light spacious rooms 10 of them Junior Suites and 2 Suites giving you easy access to all the leisure and business possibilities in Valencia. In addition to the excellent gastronomy the hotel offers a magnificent terrace with views of the city and bar service and our new swimming pool. The hotel also benefits from a fantastic U-Wellness centre spread over 500 m2 and located on the 10th floor with spectacular views of the City of Arts and Sciences. This health and beauty centre offers 2 treatment rooms a fitness studio and a full water circuit with a Finnish sauna an ice room a footbath hydromassage beds pressure jets an activation shower an aromatic central shower a Turkish bath and a variety of health and beauty treatments. The Barcelo Valencia hotel offers design and comfort with cutting-edge facilities giving guests the chance to combine work with fun.Barcelo.com

name: Port Azafata Valencia
description: Port Azafata Valencia is located just 500 meters from Valencia Airport and offers free transportation to the airport, an outdoor pool, gym, sauna and restaurant services. Rooms at Port Azafata Hotel features wooden floors and modern design. Each air-conditioned room includes an LCD TV, safe and a bathroom with hairdryer. In addition, it has 7 meeting and convention rooms. An extensive buffet breakfast is served each morning at Port Azafata Hotel. The hotel´s restaurant specialises in rice dishes such as typical local paella. The hotel is situated just 15 minutes by car from the centre of Valencia, and a 5-minute drive from Manises Golf Club. Tickets for the City of Arts and Sciences are available at the Port Azafata’s reception.

name: Sea You Hotel Port Valencia
address: 5, Plaça Del Tribunal De Les Aigües, 46011 Valencia, Valencia
description: SEA YOU HOTEL PORT VALENCIA is a four-star boutique hotel located in La Marina de Valencia. It is located just 10 minutes walk from the beach of Las Arenas. This charming city hotel offers its guests an exceptional experience with its elegant rooms overlooking the Tribunal de Les Aigües square and the Royal Shipyards. It has a Sky Bar "El mirador del Grao" a unique space with views of the city and the Mediterranean Sea. This space is ideal to relax with a refreshing drink watching the wonderful sunsets that Valencia offers us. It is one of the best views of Valencia. The rooms at SEA YOU HOTEL PORT VALENCIA are modern and meticulously decorated to provide convenience, comfort and style. Each room features top-notch amenities such as a hot tub, minibar, safe, air conditioning, free Wi-Fi, and flat-screen TV, ensuring guests feel at home during their stay. The hotel also has a buffet breakfast where guests can enjoy a varied selection of hot and cold dishes, allowing them to start their day in the best possible way. The privileged location of SEA YOU HOTEL PORT VALENCIA is another of its attractions. Surrounded by connections with public transport such as the metro, bus, tram, bike path, you will be able to move around the city comfortably. name: Moontels Mercado de Ruzafa
address: Calle del Cura Femenía, 4, 46006 Valencia, Valencia
description: Moontels Mercado de Ruzafa features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Valencia, less than 1 km from Norte Train Station, a 19-minute walk from Turia Gardens and 1.3 km from González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. Complimentary WiFi is availablethroughout the property. All self-catered units feature parquet floors and are fitted with a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box, an equipped kitchen with a microwave, and a private bathroom with shower. A toaster, a fridge and stovetop are also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Church of Saint Nicolás and Joaquin Sorolla Train Station. The nearest airport is Valencia, 8 km from Moontels Mercado de Ruzafa, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Helen Berger
address: Carrer de Les Comèdies 22 - 24, 46003 Valencia, Valencia
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Valencia, Helen Berger Boutique Hotel provides air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi and a bar. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The accommodation offers airport transfers, while a bicycle rental service is also available. At the hotel, each room includes a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All rooms are equipped with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are fitted with a terrace. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Helen Berger Boutique Hotel offers a buffet or à la carte breakfast. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Turia Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Helen Berger Boutique Hotel.

name: NH Valencia Center
description: Situated in the serene city center area of Valencia, the NH Valencia Center hotel is located near a quiet park and is less than a kilometer from Quart Tower. The Joaquin Sorolla and Estacion Norte stations are within two kilometers of the hotel and provide access to local transport. Each of our 192 rooms provides an optimal level of comfort and style. Contemporary amenities include 24-hour room service and free Wi-Fi. Select rooms have Turia park views. Suites offer the added luxury of coffee machines, bathrobe, and slippers. A fresh breakfast buffet is served each day and guests are welcome to request made-to-order hot dishes or an early bird breakfast. For lunch and dinner, the NH Center Restaurant serves delectable international and Mediterranean cuisine in laid back surroundings. Next to the lobby is our bar-café which serves light refreshments including cocktails and a range of snacks. NH Valencia Center has 8 function rooms which can accommodate up to 400 guests. Allow our special events services team to assist in planning an impeccable menu for everything from a straightforward business meeting to a chic gala. Our friendly staff is on hand to ensure guests have the perfect stay.NH Hoteles

name: Micampus Galileo Galilei
address: Avda. De Los Naranjos, 46022 Valencia, Valencia
description: The Galileo Galilei hall of residence, next to the Universidad Politécnica de Valencia and Tarongers Metro Station, offers well-priced, spacious accommodation with a fitness centre. All rooms have free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. The rooms in Colegio Mayor Galileo Galilei are decorated in a unique style. All rooms have a seating area as well as a work area. Children under 12 stay for free when using existing bedding. The Colegio Mayor Galileo Galilei has a games room and 24-hour reception. It also has a shared kitchen for guests where they can cook. The residence is about 1 km from the beach. Its proximity to the Metro means you can quickly reach Valencia city centre.

name: Art Homes Lavadero
description: Art Homes Lavadero is located in the Eixample district of Valencia, 1.7 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and 3 km from Jardines de Monforte. Complimentary WiFi is provided throughout the property. Every unit features a private bathroom and shower, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Popular points of interest near the aparthotel include Norte Train Station, Turia Gardens and González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Art Homes Lavadero.

name: Cosy Rooms Tapinería
description: Cosy Rooms Tapinería is located in a renovated 19th-century building in Valencia’s Barrio del Carmen district, between Plaza de la Reina and the Cathedral. It has 24-hour reception and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. All rooms at Cosy Rooms Tapinería feature smart décor and modern furnishings. Each includes a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a rain shower. Guests will find plenty of bars, restaurants and shops near the hotel. Valencia’s Mercado Central Food Market is just 5 minutes’ walk away. There is a bus stop on Plaza de la Reina Square and the Railway Station is 10 minutes’ walk away. Valencia Ferry Terminal is a 15-minute drive away.

name: The River Hostel
description: Centrally located next to Turia Gardens, The River Hostel is 5 minutes’ walk from Valencia Cathedral and Alameda Metro Station, which has direct airport trains. There is 24-hour reception, free Wi-Fi, free parking nearby and free luggage room. Accommodation is in dormitories or private rooms, all with shared bathroom facilities which are separate for males and females. All have air conditioning and heating, while most of them have balcony. Sheets are provided free of charge. Towels can be provided upon payment of a deposit. There are vending machines for drinks and guests can have breakfast in the onsite café. The hostel also has a games room and lounge and guests can make use of the shared kitchen for free. You can hire a bicycle directly at reception. Transfers to the airport, train or bus stations are available for an extra charge.

name: Senator Parque Central Hotel
description: Senator Parque Central Hotel is situated in central Valencia, 15 minutes’ walk from Xativa Station and the Old Town. This modern hotel offers free Wi-Fi, a fitness centre and sauna. Rooms at the Senator Parque Central are air conditioned and soundproofed, and feature a safe. A hairdryer and amenities are included in the private bathrooms. 2 free bottles of mineral water are provided upon arrival. The Senator has an air-conditioned dining room, where a daily buffet breakfast is served. There is also a bar. The hotel has a 24-hour reception desk. Las Arenas Beach and Valencia Port are 5 km from the hotel, and regular public bus services stop outside the hotel. There are also many shops and bars in the surrounding streets. The nearest airport is Valencia airport, 10.5 km from the property.

name: The Valentia Cabillers
description: Featuring an outdoor pool located on the rooftop terrace (4 x 2.5 mts and 1.2 mts. deep), The Valentia Cabillers is located in Valencia's historic centre, just 50 metres from Valencia Cathedral. Free WiFi is provided. Each air-conditioned room features modern decor. All rooms come with a flat-screen satellite TV and kitchenette. Private bathrooms include free toiletries and towels. Guests can enjoy drinks, snacks and traditional tapas at The Valentia Cabillers' bar. Room service is also available. City of Arts & Sciences is 2.7 km from The Valentia Cabillers, while Bioparc Valencia is 3.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from the property.

name: Ramirez Flats Valencia
description: Offering city views, Ramirez Flats Valencia is set in the El Pla del Real district of Valencia, less than 1 km from Turia Gardens and a 17-minute walk from Jardines de Monforte. Private parking is available on site at this sustainable property. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a lift and free WiFi. The aparthotel will provide guests with air-conditioned units with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a dishwasher, an oven, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also offered in the kitchenette, as well as a kettle. At the aparthotel, units are equipped with bed linen and towels. Sightseeing tours are available within easy reach. A bicycle rental service is available at the aparthotel. Popular points of interest near Ramirez Flats Valencia include Norte Train Station, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Soho Boutique Turia
address: 36 Carrer del Gravador Esteve, 46004 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in Valencia, within 500 metres of Turia Gardens and less than 1 km of González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Soho Boutique Turia provides accommodation with a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.2 km from Jardines de Monforte. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a shower. At Soho Boutique Turia each room has bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers buffet, continental or gluten-free options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados, Norte Train Station and Church of Saint Nicolás. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from Soho Boutique Turia.

name: Plaza Alaquas
description: Plaza Alaquas is ideally located near Valencia Airport and a short drive from Valencia city centre. This modern design hotel offers free Wi-Fi. The hotel is set in a quiet area, with convenient access to public transport. Biopark Valencia is just 4 km away and the City of Arts and Sciences is 8 km away. The Alaquas has a bar-café serving snacks and drinks. The restaurant serves typical Spanish food and a buffet breakfast. The hotel also has a 24-hour reception desk. Rooms at the Plaza Alaquas are bright and spacious. They all have a small seating area. Rooms are comfortable and air-conditioned, with extra-long beds.

name: ibis budget Valencia Aeropuerto
address: Carrer Camp de L'Olivereta, 46940 Valencia, Valencia
description: Discover our Ibis Hotel at Valencia Airport. Carmen Baviera, in charge of the management, welcomes you to our Ibis Hotel located just 10 minutes walk from the Manises-Valencia International Airport and 200 m from the Rosas Metro, which connects to central Valencia. The fully equipped rooms have AC, heating and state-of-the-art WiFi. The hotel has a restaurant, breakfast buffet, bar and parking.accorhotels.com

name: Parador de El Saler
address: Avda. De Los Pinares, 151, 46012 El Saler, Valencia
description: This Parador is located on the famous El Saler golf course, within a coastal nature reserve. Luxurious and contemporary, it has a spa and free Wi-Fi. The rooms of the Parador Campo de Golf El Saler are modern and spacious. All have heating, air conditioning and TV. Many of them have views of the golf course. In the spa you will find a range of exclusive treatments and massages. It also has saunas and a heated swimming pool. During the summer the hotel has an outdoor swimming pool. The Parador has free parking. The restaurant of the El Saler specialises in local rice dishes, above all paella. The El Saler golf course is ranked in the top 10 in Spain. Alternatively, you can explore the Albufera Nature Reserve which is home to a wide range of plant and wildlife. The city of Valencia is just 18 km away.

name: Host & Home
description: Offering air-conditioned rooms in the Ciutat Vella district of Valencia, Host & Home is 600 metres from Church of Saint Nicolás. The property is situated 1.4 km from Jardines de Monforte, 4.7 km from Bioparc Valencia and 5.8 km from L'Oceanografic. The property is less than 1 km from Norte Train Station, and within 200 metres of the city centre. At the guest house, rooms are fitted with a desk. Rooms have a kettle, a flat-screen TV, a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms come with a balcony and some have inner courtyard views. The rooms have a private bathroom, a hair dryer and bed linen. Popular points of interest near Host & Home include Turia Gardens, González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts and Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Quart Youth Hostel
address: Calle Guillem De Castro, 64, 46001 Valencia, Valencia
description: Set 300 metres from the Torres de Quart Medieval Tower, Quart Youth Hostel offers free luggage storage and free Wi-Fi. Rooms have individual lockers and adapters are provided. Featuring a modern décor, each room features a ceiling fan and wardrobe. Rooms come with single or bunk beds and a shared bathroom with bath or shower. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at Quart Youth Hostel. There are vending machines which sell snacks and drinks inside the property and a shared kitchen is also available to prepare your own food. Toaster, kettle and coffee machine are provided. Centrally located, Quart Youth Hostel is 5 minutes’ walk from the old town of Valencia. The property is well communicated by public transport. Buses connected to City of Arts and Science and to the beaches of Valencia leave from a bus stop located 150 metres away.

name: Purple Nest Hostel
description: Located in the centre of Valencia, just 10 minutes’ walk from the cathedral, Purple Nest Hostel offers bright, air-conditioned rooms. It has free WiFi, a roof terrace and a lively bar. Rooms are decorated in cheerful, vibrant colours, with tiled floors and original designs painted on the walls. Guests use shared bathrooms and towels are provided. Purple Nest Hostel has computers with internet that can be used for an extra charge. The hostel features vending machines, and free coffee and tea is offered. The Purple Nest is a great base for exploring the sights of Valencia and enjoying its nightlife. The bus station is around 2 km away, and the bus for the beach stops close to the hostel.

name: Plaza Home
address: 63 Carrer de Sant Vicent Màrtir, 46002 Valencia, Valencia
description: Located in the centre of Valencia, 500 metres from Norte Train Station, PLAZA HOME provides air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi. The property is around 1.8 km from Jardines de Monforte, 4.5 km from L'Oceanografic and 4.7 km from Puerto de Valencia. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.5 km from Turia Gardens. At the guest house, every room is equipped with a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. All units include a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near PLAZA HOME include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Church of Saint Nicolás. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Urban Youth Hostel
description: Urban Youth Hostel in Valencia provides adults-only accommodation with a restaurant, a bar and a shared lounge. Around 1.3 km from Playa de las Arenas, the property is 1.9 km away from Malvarrosa Beach, 500 metres from the nearest Metro Station, Maritim-Serrería, and a 20-minute walk from the City of Arts and Science. All rooms at the Youth Hostel are bright and overlook the street. Some come with a spacious terrace. Each bed has its locker, individual plug and a reading lamp. Extra lockers can be rented from reception. Urban Youth Hostel features a modern bar in the ground floor serving national and international dishes. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared kitchen, a shared lounge and a games room. There is a self-service washing and drying service. You can reach Valencia Airport in 40 minutes by public transport. The hostel is just 600 metres from Valencia Harbour.

name: UP Station Hostel
description: UP Hostel Valencia is located in Valencia, within the North Train Station, and next to Valencia Bullring and city hall. It is located 1.2 km from Barrio del Carmen and a 20-minute walk from Turia Gardens. This property offers beds in dormitories with bunk beds for 16 people, including private lockers and access to shared bathroom facilities. Bed linen are provided. Breakfast includes croissants, toast, butter and jam, cereals as well as coffee, tea and juice. You can find several restaurants, bars, and shops within a 5-minute walk of UP Hostel Valencia. Oceanografic is 30 minutes away by bus, while Bioparc Valencia is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 9 km from UP Hostel Valencia.

name: Bet Apartments - City Suites Abastos
address: 28 Carrer de Martin Humano, 46008 Valencia, Valencia
description: Set in Valencia, within 1.6 km of Church of Saint Nicolás and 3.2 km of Bioparc Valencia, Bet Apartments - City Suites Abastos features free WiFi throughout the property. All rooms boast a kitchen and a private bathroom. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.6 km from Norte Train Station. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a microwave, a kettle, a bath or shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near the hostel include González Martí National Museum of Ceramics and Decorative Arts, Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and Valencia Botanical Gardens. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 6 km from Bet Apartments - City Suites Abastos.

name: Hotel Aviación
address: Calle Juan de la Cierva 17, 46940 Manises, Valencia
description: Boasting a bar, Hotel Aviación is set in Manises in the Valencia Community region, 6.4 km from Bioparc Valencia and 10 km from Church of Saint Nicolás. With a restaurant, the 2-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room has a desk and a flat-screen TV. At Hotel Aviación all rooms include bed linen and towels. Non-stop information is available at the reception, where staff speak English, Spanish, Hindi and Indonesian. Norte Train Station is 11 km from the accommodation, while Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados is 12 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia, 3 km from Hotel Aviación, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Som Hostel
address: Carrer del Mestre Racional 4, 46005 Valencia, Valencia
description: No description found

name: Bizzbeach
description: Situated in Valencia, BIZZBEACH features air-conditioned accommodation and a bar. The property is around less than 1 km from L'Oceanografic, a 13-minute walk from City of Arts & Sciences and 2.5 km from Turia Gardens. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi is available. There are popular points of interest include Venecia, Rafalcaid and Puerto de Valencia. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 12 km from BIZZBEACH.

name: ibis budget Valencia Centro Puerto
description: Setting a new standard in super eco accommodation, the Ibis Budget Valencia Centro Puerto boasts simple facilities so you can enjoy the comforts you really need without having to pay for unnecessary luxuries. Located 20 minutes' walk from Valencia's two main beaches, Malvarrosa and Las Arenas, and 25 minutes' walk from the City of Arts and Sciences, the Ibis Budget Valencia Centro Puerto is the ideal place to stay in Valencia.accorhotels.com

name: Pamphylia Hotel
description: PAMPHYLIA HOTEL is set on the beachfront in Valencia, 1.4 km from Malvarrosa Beach and 2.4 km from Patacona Beach. This 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The property is allergy-free and is situated 100 metres from Playa de las Arenas. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At PAMPHYLIA HOTEL the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast. Puerto de Valencia is 1.1 km from PAMPHYLIA HOTEL, while L'Oceanografic is 4.1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: Suites Puerto Valencia
description: Located in Valencia, 2.5 km from Malvarrosa Beach, Suites Puerto Valencia features views of the city. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is set 1.4 km from Playa de las Arenas. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Suites Puerto Valencia offers certain units that feature a terrace, and every room is fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Puerto de Valencia is 500 metres from Suites Puerto Valencia, while L'Oceanografic is 3.3 km away. The nearest airport is Valencia Airport, 13 km from the hotel.

name: Hostal Orange Vibes
address: Dr Machi 2 Dr Machi 2, 46980 Paterna, Valencia
description: Located in Paterna, 7.4 km from Bioparc Valencia, Hostal Orange Vibes provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. The property is set 7.5 km from Church of Saint Nicolás, 8.8 km from Basilica de la Virgen de los Desamparados and 8.8 km from Jardines de Monforte. Free WiFi and a shared kitchen are provided. At the inn, each room has a patio. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guest rooms at Hostal Orange Vibes include air conditioning and a desk.
