description: Hotel Clement Barajas, just 2 km from Madrid Airport, offers stylish, air-conditioned rooms with satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The rooms in Clement Barajas all have wooden floors, safes and work desks. They also have modern bathrooms. The hotel has an à la carte restaurant that offers traditional dishes made from high quality ingredients. There is also a TV showing live sports events in the evenings. Barajas Metro Station is 400 metres away or a five-minute walk from the hotel, and central Madrid can be reached in 30 minutes by car. Clement Barajas. Wanda Metropolitano Stadium is 10-minutes' drive from the property. Complimentary coffee for early risers from 3:30 a.m. to 7:00 a.m.

name: Hotel Unuk
address: Calle Ortiz de Zúñiga, 8, 41004 Seville, Andalusia
description: Situated in Seville, less than 1 km from La Giralda and Sevilla Cathedral, Hotel Unuk features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a shared lounge and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 300 metres from the city centre and 700 metres from Santa María La Blanca Church. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Every room includes a kettle, while selected rooms also boast a balcony and others also feature city views. At Hotel Unuk the rooms have bed linen and towels. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving Mediterranean and Spanish cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and halal options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Hotel Unuk include Alcazar Palace, Triana Bridge - Isabel II Bridge and Plaza de Armas. The nearest airport is Seville Airport, 10 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel M.A. Sevilla Congresos
description: Located next to Seville’s Fibes Exhibition Centre, M.A. Hotel Sevilla Congresos features a restaurant and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Sevilla Airport is 4 km away. All air-conditioned rooms in this hotel have satellite TV, safe, and minibar, plus a private bathroom with a bath and shower, hairdryer, and free toiletries. The property´s reception is open 24 hours a day, and it offers a concierge service. There is also a business centre and free daily newspapers are available. M.A. Hotel Sevilla Congresos is a 10-minute drive from Santa Justa AVE Railway Station. The historic city centre, where you can find Plaza España Square and Sevilla Cathedral, is 6 km from the property.

name: Hotel Fernando III
description: Hotel Fernando III is in Seville’s historic Santa Cruz district. It offers free WiFi, a roof terrace with city views and a seasonal swimming pool, open from June to September. The spacious, air-conditioned rooms at the Fernando are comfortable and offer attractive, contemporary design. Some rooms have balconies and offer city views. The hotel’s restaurant serves both Andalusian dishes and European cuisine, in additional to traditional tapas and wines. There is also daily breakfast service. The hotel can also provide tourist information and a ticket service. Additional facilities include function rooms suitable for conferences, banquets and weddings. Hotel Fernando III is a short walk from Seville Cathedral and the Giralda Tower. The Alcazar Gardens are just 2 streets away, while Seville Train Station is also nearby.

name: Catalonia Granada
description: Located 5 minutes’ walk from AVE Train Station, Catalonia Granada features a swimming pool and a roof-top sun terrace with city views and bar service. There is free WiFi available throughout. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also has a spa with a swimming pool (paid), a fitness area and massages treatment are available on prior request. Each room at Catalonia Granada has a smart TV, a desk and a private bathroom with a bath or shower. There is a restaurant, where a buffet breakfast is served every morning; a hall bar and meeting amenities and conference rooms available for business events and banquets. Popular points of interest near Catalonia Granada include Alcaiceria, Royal Chapel and Sacromonte. Federico Garcia Lorca Granada-Jaen Airport is 15 km away.

name: Vincci Ciudad de Salamanca
description: Vincci Ciudad de Salamanca is within a 25-minute walk of Salamanca Cathedral and Plaza Mayor. Its spacious rooms include free internet access, a minibar and a 32-inch flat-screen TV. The Vincci’s stylish rooms have functional design and wooden floors. Each has a free safe and a modern bathroom with a hairdryer and amenities. The Ciudad de Salamanca offers a daily buffet breakfast which includes products for celiacs. The hotel also has a snack bar serving a wide range of drinks and light meals. The Vincci is 1 km from Salamanca’s Palacio de Congresos Exhibition Centre. The bus stop next to the hotel offers direct links to the city centre, including Gran Vía and Plaza Mayor. Private parking is available on site at a reasonable daily rate.

name: Catalonia Plaza Mayor Salamanca
address: C/ Espoz y Mina, 23-25, 37002 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Catalonia Plaza Mayor Salamanca is ideally situated next to the Plaza Mayor, and offers free Wi-Fi. The hotel decorations are modern with an Eastern touch and classic features set in stone of Villamayor. The restaurant offers you an exquisite international cuisine and various conference rooms are available for meetings or cocktails. All hotel rooms have smart TVs, which are equipped with Chromecast app

name: AC Hotel Ciudad de Toledo by Marriott
description: AC Hotel Ciudad de Toledo has a privileged location in a stunning area near the Tajo River with an impressive panoramic view over the city of Toledo, a town considered by UNESCO to be a World Heritage site. Our hotel was constructed respecting the architectural style of the area: Los Cigarrales (Valle de Toledo), and consists of the top-quality facilities and a very high service standard, befitting the status of AC Hotels. Everything is there to ensure that guests enjoy a comfortable stay. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Hotel Salamanca Montalvo
address: Calle Hoces Del Duraton, 1, 37008 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Offering free WiFi and free parking, the modern Hotel Salamanca Montalvo is located by Via de la Plata, just 5 minutes' drive from central Salamanca. A bus stop is located 50 metres away. All rooms include a 32" flat-screen TV with satellite channels, individually controlled air conditioning/heating, a minibar, safe and private bathroom. Some rooms enjoy views over the city. The hotel offers a quality breakfast buffet, an on site coffee shop, and its own La Terraza del Montalvo restaurant. There is a garden with a children's play area including a slide and swings. The hotel is located in the Montalvo Business Park.

name: Maisonnave
description: Located in the centre of Pamplona 50 metres from the town hall, Maisonnave offers free Wi-Fi and free access to the gym and sauna. Recently renovated, rooms boast modern decor. The Maisonnave's rooms are light and decorated with warm, relaxing neutral colours. All of the rooms come with flat-screen satellite TV and a private bathroom. The Maisonnave's restaurant is a privileged place where you can enjoy great Navarran food, using quality produce. There is a daily buffet breakfast and a Nespresso coffee machine. The Maisonnave is situated within easy reach of many main attractions such as the cathedral, Plaza del Castillo and the city's main tapas area. La Taconera and La Ciudadela parks are also nearby. The yearly San Fermines bullrunning route passes through the Town Square.

name: Hotel Posada Del Lucero
description: Set in a nationally listed monument, dating from the 16th century, Hotel Posada del Lucero is located in Seville’s Old Town. This elegant hotel offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and many original features. Featuring free WiFi, each air-conditioned room opens onto the traditional Andalusian central courtyard, with columns and arches. There is a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries. A varied breakfast buffet is available, and Hotel Posada del Lucero also has a café-bar, open all day. The 24-hour front desk offers car rental and a hairdressing service. The Dueñas Palace and Encarnación Square, where you can find the impressive Metropol Parasol Building, are both within 300 metres of the hotel. Seville Cathedral and the famous Giralda Tower are 850 metres away.

name: Hotel Finca Los Abetos
address: Avenida de San Josa de Calasanz, Km 2.8, 14012 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Set 10 minutes’ drive from central Córdoba, Hotel Finca Los Abetos offers air-conditioned rooms with balconies. It features 2 seasonal outdoor pools, a restaurant, and views of the surrounding Sierra de Córdoba Mountains. The rooms at this hotel include free WiFi, safe, a flat-screen TV and international channels. The private bathroom comes with a bath or shower and free toiletries. Surrounded by gardens, the Maestre Escuela has a peaceful setting. Outdoors you will also find 2 seven-a-side football pitches. There are 2 seasonal pools. It features a traditional Andalusian interior courtyard and a terrace with mountain views, where you can enjoy a drink or meal. Breakfast is served in the hotel’s café. Reception has tourist information and is open 24 hours. Free parking is available at the property, as well as bike storage and bike repair service.

name: Sant Pere Del Bosc Hotel & Spa
address: Paratge de Sant Pere Del Bosc, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: Set in a restored Modernista building, the luxury Hotel Sant Pere del Bosc Hotel & Spa - Adults Only offers a saltwater outdoor pool. The hotel spa includes a water circuit and massage service. Each air-conditioned suite at the Sant Pere del Bosc Hotel & Spa - Adults Only Hotel features free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. All suites have a small seating area with a sofa and an elegant bathroom with amenities. More than 20 treatments are offered at the hotel spa. These include ayurvedic treatments, yoga and made-to-measure dietary and aesthetic services. Access to the spa carries a surcharge. The Sant Pere’s restaurant serves locally produced organic food. The hotel also has a bar and terrace. Hotel Sant Pere is next to Sant Pere del Bosc Hotel & Spa - Adults Only Shrine, 6 km from Lloret de Mar. Angel de Lloret Golf Club is just 1 km from the hotel. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide information about the area and arrange airport transfers or car hire. Free parking is available on site.

name: Zenit Vigo
description: Boasting a shared lounge, restaurant and views of city, Zenit Vigo is situated in Vigo, 1.3 km from Estación Maritima. Featuring a fitness centre, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a concierge service and organising tours for guests. At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk. The rooms are fitted with a kettle, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms also boast a balcony and some have sea views. At Zenit Vigo each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. A gluten-free breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Zenit Vigo offers a sun terrace. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Portuguese. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Vigo AVE Train Station, Galician Association of Chemists and ONCE. The nearest airport is Vigo Airport, 9 km from Zenit Vigo.

name: Hotel Carlemany Girona
description: Carlemany Girona is ideally situated 600 metres from the historic Barri Vell district and 400 metres from Girona Train and Bus Station. Rooms feature 32-inch flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi. Hotel Carlemany offers spacious modern rooms, with luxury cotton bed linen and Loewe toiletries. Each room is air-conditioned and includes a minibar and safe. The Carlemany’s Indigo Restaurant & Bar serves cocktails on the attractive terrace. The Pati Verd serves a daily buffet breakfast, and offers regional cuisine using seasonal ingredients. There is also a café serving snacks throughout the day. Carlemany Girona welcomes athletes. It offers special menus as well as specific information on routes and activities. There is bicycle storage and a repair shop. The Carlemany Hotel is set in a quiet street near Girona’s main shops. Girona Cathedral and the Jewish Quarter are within a 10-minute walk. Secure parking with direct access to the hotel is available on site.

name: Gran Hotel Nagari Boutique & Spa
description: Gran Hotel Nagari Boutique & Spa is located in Vigo, 200 metres from the Vigo Contemporary Art Museum. The nearest beach is 4 km away. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. The chic rooms feature a PlayStation 4, a flat-screen TV, free bottle of water, heating, and air conditioning. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries, a hydromassage bath, a chromotherapy shower, and hairdryer. The luxurious Nagari Health and Beauty Spa offers a gym, hot tub and Turkish bath. Beauty treatments are also available using advanced technology and top quality products. Gran Hotel Nagari includes the stylish Alameda XXI restaurant, which serves traditional cuisine and has over 200 wines for guests to try. The Manhattan Wine and Lounge offers cocktails and tapas, and features a large terrace.

name: Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa
address: Tornería, 22, 11403 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a garden and shared lounge in Jerez de la Frontera. With a terrace, the property also features a restaurant, as well as a bar. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa the rooms come with bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a continental or gluten-free breakfast. Novo Sancti Petri Golf is 45 km from Hotel Casa Palacio María Luisa, while Montecastillo Golf Resort is 14 km from the property. The nearest airport is Jerez Airport, 14 km from the hotel.

name: San Gil
description: San Gil offers attractive accommodation in a colourful, traditional Andalusian-style mansion with a garden. Set in central Seville, it features a seasonal rooftop swimming pool and an à la carte restaurant. Each of the San Gil’s spacious, air-conditioned rooms has a minibar and satellite TV. All rooms have fully equipped bathrooms. The hotel features ornate, colourful tiles throughout, as well as original windows and balconies. Free WiFi is available. The San Gil’s La Calesera restaurant offers typical Sevillan cuisine and tapas dishes. During the summer months, meals are served on the pretty terrace set within the hotel’s gardens. On some evenings there is live flamenco music. The San Gil is just 5 minutes’ walk from Basilica de la Macarena Church and the city’s Roman walls. Seville Cathedral and the Giralda bell tower are less than 2 km away.

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Girona
address: Carrer Mossen Joan Pons 1, 17001 Girona, Catalonia
description: Enjoy contemporary business and leisure facilities and a warm chocolate chip cookie upon arrival, when you stay at the DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Girona. Boasting a fantastic location in the center of Girona, close to the Auditorium and Congress Center, this attractive Girona hotel offers easy access to many attractions including Girona Cathedral, the River Onyar and the Jewish Quarter. A ten minute stroll through a beautiful park area will take guests to downtown Girona and the award-winning restaurant, El Celler de Can Roca is just five minutes’ walk from our contemporary hotel in Girona. All of our eco-friendly, air-conditioned Guest Rooms and Suites have been beautifully decorated and feature a variety of modern amenities including complimentary WiFi, an LCD TV and a stylish bathroom. With a dedicated staff, high-quality A/V equipment and four flexible meeting spaces, this hotel in Girona is the ideal venue for a successful business event, celebration or wedding. A 24-hour business center is also available, offering a range of helpful services. Work out in the complimentary 24-hour Fitness Center or relax with a cocktail by the sparkling waters of the outdoor swimming pool, located on the top floor terrace of the hotel. Also featuring a Rooftop Bar, this attractive, sun-soaked terrace is the perfect place to enjoy a light snack as you gaze out over the city. Dine in style in the sophisticated Restaurant Sargantana, where you can experience the finest, authentic Catalan cuisine, prepared with the freshest, locally sourced ingredients.Hilton

name: Hipotels Sherry Park
address: Avda. Alvaro Domecq, 11, 11405 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Surrounded by lush gardens, the Sherry Park Hotel offers a large outdoor swimming pool and rooms with free WiFi. It is 15 minutes’ walk from the historical centre of Jerez. All rooms are equipped with satellite TV and a private bathroom. Some rooms include a balcony. On-site facilities include an indoor pool, gym and sauna. The hotel is 25 minutes’ walk from the Cathedral and the Jerez sherry cellars. The Sherry Park is also just a short walk from the city’s renowned Royal Equestrian School and the bullring. Parking is offered by payment, and subject to availability. "La Vermuteria del Sherry", which replaces the restaurant "El Ábaco". This new gastronomic concept leaves aside the idea of "table and tablecloth" and offers a wide selection of wines exclusively from the Jerez area, thus maintaining the commitment to local gastronomy as a hallmark. The diner can also enjoy a wide selection of vermouth made in the region, accompanied by portions and tapas.

name: Exe Isla Cartuja
description: Exe Isla Cartuja is set within Seville’s Isla de la Cartuja site and next to its Olympic Stadium, 15 minutes’ drive from the city centre. It offers free internet and free parking. The Exe offers impressive views of the stadium and some rooms overlook the pitch. All air-conditioned rooms feature simple, attractive décor and have satellite TV. A buffet breakfast is served daily in the hotel restaurant, which offers superb views of Seville's Olympic Stadium. Gluten-free menus can be requested. The hotel has two rooms adapted for people with reduced mobility equipped with a shower, handrail and shower seat. Access to the breakfast area isn't adapted for reduced mobility due to the building's characteristics. Isla Mágica Theme Park is just 10 minutes’ walk from the hotel, while the Alamillo Park is 100 metres away. Sights such as Seville Cathedral and La Giralda are less than 4 km from the Isla Cartuja.

name: Palau de Bellavista Girona by URH
description: The Hotel Palau of Bellavista by URH is 10 minutes’ walk from Girona's historical centre, its Fortress, and Cathedral, and offers rooms with minibar and room service. There are impressive views from its roof terrace bar. Offering free private parking, the stylish, air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Palau of Bellavista by URH have a CD player and satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a dressing room, hairdryer and amenities. The Hotel Palau of Bellavista by URH welcomes athletes. It features an outdoor pool and fitness centre. Sports massages are available upon request. There is a 24-hours front desk, and you can hire a car at the Hotel Palau of Bellavista by URH. Free WiFi is available throughout. The property's Bellavista Restaurant is open daily for dinner with previous reservation.

name: Vincci La Rabida
description: Featuring a beautiful Andalusian courtyard and a roof terrace looking onto La Giralda, Vincci la Rabida is set in a charming mansion dating from the 18th century. It has a great setting in the city’s old town and is just 400 metres from Seville Cathedral. The hotel maintains original features such as stone archways, colourful tiles, French balconies and beamed ceilings. There is free Wi-Fi in public areas and rooms. The attractive rooms have stylish décor with ceramic-tiled floors, satellite TV, heating and air conditioning. The large bathroom has a hairdryer and includes toiletries. Some rooms include a personalized check-in and check-out service, pillow menu, a Nespresso coffee machine and access to the Vincci Essence Lounge with drinks and snacks. Vincci La Rabida has 2 exclusive restaurants which offer a range of Andalusian cuisine, while El Mirador Restaurant offers views of the cathedral. A hot and cold buffet breakfast is available daily, and dishes for celiacs are available upon request. Bicycle rental and a tour desk are available. The hotel is a short walk from the famous tapas bars and restaurants of El Arenal.

name: Petit Palace Marques Santa Ana
description: Situated just 200 metres from Seville Cathedral, this restored 19th-century building offers free WiFi and a roof terrace with city views. Petit Palace Marqués Santa Ana offers air-conditioned rooms. Rooms at this boutique hotel feature wooden floors and stylish modern design. They all have a flat-screen TV, a minibar and a free laptop safe. A buffet breakfast is served daily. There are also numerous restaurants and tapas bars in the surrounding streets. The Marqués Santa Ana offers free bicycles under request, business facilities, and private parking, and its 24-hour reception offers information about the city. The Giralda is just 400 metres from the hotel, while the Alcázar is within 700 metres, while the Golden Tower is just 1 minute away on foot.

name: Becquer Hotel
description: Set in Seville’s old town, 300 metres from Plaza Nueva Square, Hotel Bécquer features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi access. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a kettle with a selection of tea and coffee. The private bathroom is equipped with a hairdryer. Laptops, iPads, and DVD players are available on request and subject to availability. Other facilities include a seasonal roof top terrace with a pool. The impressive Cathedral and Alcázar Fortress are both within 10 minutes' walk of the hotel, and the Guadalquivir River is 400 metres away. The Bellas Artes Art Gallery is just over 400 metres away, and you can walk to the beautiful Santa Cruz district in 7 minutes.

name: Hotel Rey Alfonso X
address: Calle Ximenez De Enciso, 35, 41004 Seville, Andalusia
description: Hotel Rey Alfonso X is located in the historic centre of Seville, a short walk from the Giralda and the Santa Cruz district. An outdoor swimming pool is open from June to September. Some rooms at the Rey Alfonso offer views of the Santa María La Blanca Church, the oldest in Sevilla. Others overlook the street or the hotel gardens. All are fully air conditioned, heated and en suite and offer satellite TV. Facilities at the Rey Alfonso X include free Wi-Fi and a cafeteria and a games room. Guests can enjoy views of the Cathedral and Seville’s old quarter from the terrace.

name: Hotel Doña Maria
description: Hotel Doña Maria is set in a former palace in central Seville, offering views of the famous Cathedral and the Giralda. It features a seasonal, rooftop swimming pool and free Wi-Fi access. All rooms at the hotel have a unique design with classic furniture. Rooms are soundproofed and air conditioned. There is also satellite TV. The hotel has easy access to many of Seville’s sights, including the bull ring and Torre de Oro Tower, which are less than 500 metres away. The old Jewish Quarter, Salvador Church and the María Luisa Park are a short walk away. The Doña María has an attractive terrace overlooking the cathedral. There is also a bar here, open until late. Buffet breakfast is available in the morning. There is a ticket service and a tour desk.

name: Hotel San Antonio El Real
address: C/ San Antonio El Real, 40004 Segovia, Segovia
description: San Antonio el Real is located next to Segovia's Roman Aqueduct. Set in a converted monastery with a beautiful cloister, the stylish rooms offers free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. All air-conditioned rooms at the Hotel San Antonio el Real come with a safe. Modern furniture and tiled floors create a relaxed atmosphere, and there is a work desk and a minibar. The San Antonio Hotel’s restaurant serves a range of local dishes, and there is also a bar-café.

name: Hotel Albret
description: Situated 20 minutes' walk from central Pamplona, next to the city's hospitals, this stylish hotel offers free Wi-Fi and air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen satellite TVs. Featuring wooden floors, rooms come with a minibar and a safe. The private bathroom has a bath tub and shower, as well as a hairdryer and toiletries. The hotel's snack bar and restaurant offers a selection of dishes and drinks. Room service is also available. Guests have free access to a gym situated 200 metres from the hotel. Luggage storage is offered and on-site parking is available for an extra charge. The hotel has easy access to the A15, A21 and A12 Motorways. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do in Navarre.

name: Hotel Marsol
address: Passeig Jacint Verdaguer, 7, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: Marsol is located right on the seafront in Lloret de Mar, on Catalunya’s Costa Brava. It offers a fitness centre, spa and a rooftop pool with a terrace and loungers. All rooms at the Hotel Marsol are air-conditioned. They all come with free WiFi, a satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A safe is available at no extra cost. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves a varied breakfast and a range of international dishes for lunch and dinner. There is also a café-bar with a terrace, set on the seafront promenade. The Marsol is a 5-minute walk from the centre of Lloret de Mar, where there is a wide selection of restaurants, bars and nightclubs. Sant Romà Church is located just 100 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Casa de Indias By Intur
address: Plaza de la Encarnación 5-6, 41003 Seville, Andalusia
description: Hotel Casa de Indias By Intur is located in Seville, 1.5 km from Triana-Isabel II Bridge, and has a concierge service, hypoallergenic rooms, an outdoor pool, a bar and free WiFi in all areas. In addition, it offers family rooms, solarium, 24-hour reception, room service and excursion organization service. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen satellite TV, a desk, a hairdryer, and a bath or shower. Also, the rooms in this hotel have a private bathroom with free toiletries. Casa de Indias de Intur hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. There are several places of interest nearby, including the Giralda, Seville Cathedral, the Real Alcázar de Sevilla and Las Dueñas Palace. The nearest airport is Seville Airport, 11 km from Hotel Casa de Indias By Intur. Our hotel is located in a historic building and the languages spoken at the reception are French, English and Spanish.

name: Hotel Cándido
description: Hotel Cándido is located in a quiet area of Segovia, 7 minutes' drive from the city's famous aqueduct. It features a spa, an outdoor pool during the summer season and classic-style rooms with free WiFi. The rooms at Hotel Cándido are spacious and have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private balcony. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer. The hotel's spa is available for a fee on weekends and features a hot tub, sauna and swimming pool. There is also a fitness center. The Cándido hotel's restaurant serves traditional Castilian cuisine and specializes in roast meats. During the summer months, guests can dine on a charming terrace.

name: Petit Palace Santa Cruz
description: This luxurious boutique hotel offers free WiFi. Set in a 16th-century mansion in Seville's City Centre, Petit Palace Santa Cruz is 10 minutes' walk from Seville Cathedral and its Giralda Tower. All air-conditioned rooms at the Petit Palace have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The modern bathroom comes with a hairdryer. The hotel is set in the old Jewish Quarter of Santa Cruz. Famous for its winding streets, guests can find many typical restaurants and tapas bars here.

name: Hotel Yit Casa Grande
address: Plaza De Las Angustias, 3, 11402 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Located in the historic heart of Jerez de la Frontera, this boutique hotel is built in a typical Andalusian style with a stunning central courtyard and the decor of a fine family mansion. Casa Grande's roof terrace has fantastic views of the surroundings. The air-conditioned rooms feature free Wi-Fi, plasma satellite TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. The hotel has a charming library with music and books. There is also a lounge bar where you can get a drink. Casa Grande serves a healthy breakfast of local products. The hotel is 12 km from the beach, and Jerez Airport is 10 km away. You can reach the cathedral and alcázar in a short walk.

name: NH Collection Granada Victoria
description: The NH Collection Granada Victoria hotel is a magnificent 20th-century classical building in the heart of Granada. The spectacular Alhambra can be reached in 20 minutes on foot, while just steps away is a lively shopping and restaurant area. There are 70 modern rooms at NH Collection Granada Victoria that are designed with your relaxation and sleep in mind. Each one features rain-effect showers and premium mattresses. You can also stay connected to the rest of the world with free Wi-Fi in each room and a flat-screen TV. Some of the rooms come with a private balcony and enjoy spectacular views over Granada and the nearby Sierra Nevada mountains. For a little more luxury, request our romantic Junior Suite. We want breakfast to be the highlight of your morning and offer a lavish spread of options that include Andalusian specialties and gluten-free alternatives. Enjoy a casual lunch with a hand-crafted cocktail in our stylish bar, with its dark wood and pale green decor. Mediterranean dishes get a scrumptious modern make-over at our 1st floor restaurant where you can dine in a lovely sunlit atmosphere under our iconic dome. We also have four meeting rooms for up to 90 people. Registration no; H/GR/01287  Category: 4 STARS  Type: City (Collection)NH Hoteles

name: Only You Hotel Atocha
description: Set in a 19th-century building, Only You Hotel Atocha is located in Madrid, 150 metres from Madrid-Atocha Train Station. This hotel offers views over the Paseo Infanta Isabel and Calle Alfonso XII. All rooms are soundproofed, and they have a large flat-screen TV, safe, and a minibar. The private bathroom includes free toiletries. A bathrobe and slippers are provided. Free WiFi is available. This hotel offers a café, bakery, and various lounge areas. On the last floor you will find the breakfast room, from where you can enjoy stunning views of the city. You will find a wide range of shops, restaurants, and bars within a 10-minute walk of the property. The Prado Museum is 900 metres from Only You Hotel Atocha, and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum is a 10-minute taxi ride away. The famous Puerta del Sol is just 3 stops away by metro. Madrid-Barajas Airport is 15 km from the property.

name: Alhambra Palace Hotel
address: Arquitecto Garcia De Paredes 1, 18009 Granada, Andalusia
description: Discover our prestigious cuisine Andalusian roots, season and proximity. Our products are grown in our own organic urban garden, which we accompany with a surprising wine list. With the elegance of an Arab palace and admiring the incredible sunsets of Granada. We offer excellent gastronomy and relaxation on our terraces and balconies, and we also hold events and incentives in its spectacular panoramic lounges, keeping the original decoration, but offering the latest technological advances of the XXI century Restaurant "Principe" Andalusian cuisine considers food as a source of life, nutrition and healing. It unites flavours and sensations, making eating well a pleasure for life and the senses. At the Alhambra Palace Hotel we recover recipes, which are a gift from the past, updated and renewed for our guests.bestwestern.com

name: Attica21 Coruña
address: C/ Enrique Mariñas, 34, A Coruña, Galicia
description: Attica21 Coruña is located in a strategic location in the city of A Coruña, in front of the ExpoCoruña exhibition and fairgrounds, in an established residential area and just a few minutes from the beach. It offers different types of fully equipped rooms, a cafeteria and restaurant service, gym and parking. The hotel is located a few meters from the bus stop with quick connection to the city center. And in a privileged position with the Alvedro Airport which is 10 minutes away and with the AP-9 that communicates with any point outside the city and province. When travelling with pets, please note that an extra charge of 25 EUR per pet upon request. Please note that the property can only allow pets with a maximum weight of 15 kilos

name: Itaca Jerez by Soho Boutique
address: Diego Fernandez De Herrera, no. 1, 11401 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Itaca Hotel Jerez provides a traditional setting when in Jerez de la Frontera. This modern hotel is an ideal base for discovering local vineyards as it is set in Jerez - Xeres - Sherry. Guests of this 4-star hotel can book sightseeing trips with help from the tour desk. Corporate facilities include meeting rooms. After a day of exploring the local region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They all include heating, an in-room safe and a mini bar. Barcelo Hotel Jerez de la Frontera features a convenient café, perfect for those who want a bite to eat without leaving the property. Each evening, guests are welcome to wind down in the lounge bar. A wide choice of eating options can also be found in the surrounding area. Jerez Airport and Circuito de Jerez are a short car trip from Itaca Hotel Jerez de la Frontera. The hotel's multilingual staff will ensure that every traveller has an enjoyable visit.Revato

name: H10 Palacio Colomera
address: Plaza de Las Tendillas, 3, 14002 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Providing a rooftop terrace and a swimming pool, H10 Palacio Colomera is located in Cordoba and is a brief stroll from Roman Temple of Cordoba. It also offers a coffee bar, a sun deck and free Wi-Fi. This 4-star hotel provides limited hours room service, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. H10 Palacio Colomera has air conditioned rooms with a flat-screen TV, slippers and a mini bar. They feature ironing facilities, a desk and an in-room safe. The hotel features a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of an evening with a meal and a drink. Every morning a buffet breakfast is available in the breakfast room. Cordoba's attractions, including the Cordoba Synagogue and Calleja de las Flores, are within easy walking distance of H10 Palacio Colomera. Medina Azahara is only a short car ride from the hotel.Revato

name: Exe Guadalete
address: Avenida Duque De Abrantes 84, 11407 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Set in gardens, Exe Guadalete is located in Jerez de la Frontera, 15 minutes’ drive from the Costa de la Luz. It features an outdoor swimming pool with chill-out area and free Wi-Fi. The Exe Guadalete offers simple, attractive décor with wooden flooring. Each air-conditioned room has satellite TV and a minibar. The hotel‘s café-bar serves a range of light meals and snacks. Guests can enjoy a drink in the cocktail bar, or on the hotel terrace. Jerez is famous for its sherry and there are several sherry-making tours on offer within walking distance of the hotel. The Andalucian School of Equestrian Art is 500 metres away. Staff at the hotel’s tour desk can arrange car and bicycle rental. The nearest golf course is just 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Grand Hotel Don Gregorio
description: Featuring a spa, this 15th-Century palace has been beautifully restored into a luxury hotel. Grand Hotel Don Gregorio is located opposite Saint Stephen’s Convent and 5 minutes’ walk from Plaza Mayor Square. All of the elegant, air-conditioned rooms include a spa bath and free WiFi. They also have a minibar, flat-screen TV, and soundproofing. In the bathroom you will find slippers, bathrobes, toiletries and a hairdryer. Grand Hotel Don Gregorio has indoor and outdoor lounge areas. It houses a Michelin Star restaurant serving Mexican, Spanish and Asian fusion cuisine. There is room service. The hotel's spa can be enjoyed privately at an additional cost and is equipped with a large hot tub, Turkish bath, heated beds and a relaxing shower. For an additional fee, massages are offered. It is convenient to reserve. Located in the historic centre of Salamanca, the hotel is under 5 minutes’ walk from Salamanca’s cathedral and university buildings.

name: AC Hotel Ciudad de Sevilla by Marriott
description: AC Hotel Ciudad de Sevilla is located in one of the best-known residential areas in Seville, near the Avenida de la Palmera. Many landmarks are close by, including downtown Seville, the María Luisa Park, the Puente de las Delicias bridge, the Real Club Pineda, the Palacio de Congresos, and the city’s business district. This central location allows for quick transportation to the airport and the exhibition center thanks to the Santa Justa train station. The hotel architecture reflects a mixture of the elegance of the early 20th century and modern day styles through to the 86 comfortable and well-designed rooms. In addition, the hotel offers AC Lounge, fitness room, outdoor pool (open from Spring to early autumn), safety-box at the front desk, free newspapers and minibar. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want. Register Number in the R.T.A. H/SE/00854Marriott

name: Hotel Blanca de Navarra
description: IMPORTANT NOTICE: Dear clients, starting October 2 we begin the renovation of our rooms, for several months from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. we will have the inconvenience and noise that this type of work entails. Sorry for the inconvenience. Hotel Blanca de Navarra is located in Pamplona, next to the University of Navarra and Yamaguchi Park. It offers private parking, free WiFi throughout the hotel and rooms with satellite TV. All rooms at the Blanca de Navarra Hotel have a private bathroom equipped with a hairdryer. They are air-conditioned and there is also a work desk in each one. The hotel also features a café-bar which serves drinks and tapas. The hotel is 800 metres from Ciudadela Park and 1.2 km from the old town. There is a bus stop outside the door of the hotel, and it is easily accessible from the A-12 and A-15 Motorways.

name: Hotel Carris Marineda
address: Carretera Banos de Arteixo, 43, 15008 A Coruña, Galicia
description: Carris Marineda is a modern and multifunctional 4-star hotel with an elegant designed located in A Coruna, inside the largest shopping complex in Spain, Marineda City. It has excellent communications with the main ways of access to the city, the airport and the city centre.iHotelier/iStay

name: L'Azure Hotel 4 Sup
address: Calle Esports, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: L'Azure Hotel 4* Sup is conveniently set in the centre of Lloret de Mar, 3 km from Water World. It offers 2 outdoor swimming pools, a fitness centre, and spa. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. At the hotel, you will find a Mediterranean restaurant and a buffet restaurant. Other facilities at L'Azure Hotel 4* Sup include an adult-only rooftop terrace with an infinity pool. A splash park for children is also available at the hotel. Lloret Beach is 800 metres from the accommodation, while Santa Clotilde Gardens is 1.8 km away. Girona-Costa Brava Airport is 23 km from the property.

name: Eurostars Plaza Acueducto
description: This recently built 4-star hotel provides accommodation designed in a contemporary-style. It is located just opposite the magnificent ancient aqueduct. Set at the heart of beautiful Segovia, this hotel overlooks one of the city’s most famous monuments. Enjoy views of the aqueduct from this hotel. From here you can stroll around the historical city streets and admire the stunning architecture. All rooms include a TV, minibar, hairdryer, safe, and telephone, as well as free toiletries. Some rooms are adapted for guests with reduced mobility. The property offers a breakfast service for a surcharge, including special diets. You can also find luggage storage, laundry and dry cleaning services, and room service. Private covered parking is available for an extra charge. Plaza Acueducto boasts free Wi-Fi internet access - allowing you to connect and check your emails at any time.

name: NH Collection Sevilla
address: Avenida de Diego Martinez Barrio, 8, 41013 Seville, Andalusia
description: The NH Collection Sevilla, formerly known as NH Central Convenciones, is a stylish and modern hotel set in the heart of Sevilla’s financial district. The hotel provides excellent public transport links to Seville as the San Bernardo metro station is just two minutes away on foot. For sightseeing, the medieval Santa Cruz district is only a 15-minute walk away. There are 252 comfortable and stylish rooms at NH Collection Sevilla, many of which come with stunning views. Enjoy modern comforts such as free Wi-Fi, a coffee machine, and a large Smart TV in each room. Your comfort is key, which is why rooms feature rain-effect showers, professional hair-dryers, pillow menus, and luxurious mattresses. Breakfast is a lavish affair with a wide spread of delicious fresh options, including an Andalusian corner. For lunch and dinner, enjoy our Mediterranean and Andalusian dishes al fresco. Drinks are served in our comfortable bar furnished with dove-gray sofas. We also have perfect amenities for winding down, including an outdoor pool with bar service and a large terrace with hammocks. NH Collection Sevilla has ideal meeting and conference facilities, including 11 meeting rooms for 1400 people. The highlight is our Gran Salon Andalucia with its 8-meter-high ceilings. Registration no; H/SE/00999 Category: 4 STARS Type: CityNH Hoteles

name: H10 Porto Poniente
description: Located next to the seafront promenade at Poniente Beach in Benidorm, the H10 Porto Poniente offers 2 plunge pools with sea views. The on-site adults-only Despacio Spa Centre includes a heated swimming pool and a gym. Its elegant rooms are bright and air-conditioned. Each one comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. There is free WiFi available throughout. The hotel also features the Tortuga Restaurant and the Marea Alta Rooftop Bar offering sea views. There are 3 meeting rooms, all with natural light. Private parking with an electric vehicle charging point, including Tesla, can be arranged at an extra charge. Register number HA-1539

name: Los Seises Sevilla, a Tribute Portfolio Hotel
description: Located in the very heart of Sevilla. At Los Seises you can enjoy more than 310 days of sunshine a year; enjoy your breakfast on our Patio. Take advantage of aperitive time in our Sherry Bar, indulge in our pool with views to relax while sunset or simply celebrate with your loved ones sharing drinks and tapas from day to night at Pura Vida Terraza. Our F&B offer is designed to be shareable, seasonal, and flavourful. Don't miss the chance of hearing one of our Flamenco performances, we offer more than 30 shows all year round. The hotel's rich heritage rooted in authentic Sevillian traditions connects the visitors to the pulse of the city and Santa Cruz neighborhood. Think big and we will make it happen.Marriott

name: Agua de Mar Hotel Boutique
description: Offering a sun terrace, Agua de Mar Hotel Boutique is situated in Vigo in the Galicia Region. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Rooms have a flat-screen TV. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. A balcony or patio are featured in certain rooms. Rooms come with a private bathroom. Extras include bath robes and slippers. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Estación Maritima is 1 km from Agua de Mar Hotel Boutique. Vigo Airport is 7 km from the property. We are located 100 meters from the Urzaiz train station and the new Vialia shopping center.

name: AQUA Hotel Bertran Park
address: Carrer Sant Josep 49, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: AQUA Hotel Bertran Park lies in a peaceful area of central Lloret de Mar, just a 450-metre stroll from the famous beaches of this fun-filled, Costa Brava resort. Free WiFi access is available in public areas. Enjoy a day on the sandy beach before diving into the AQUA Hotel Bertran Park’s outdoor swimming pool. A sun terrace surrounds the pool, where you can lay back in the sun with a refreshing drink from the hotel’s cafe-bar. The hotel’s buffet restaurant serves meals prepared in the show kitchen, allowing you to enjoy a delicious dinner. Each air-conditioned room has a minibar opens onto a furnished terrace or a Juliet balcony.

name: Ciutat De Girona
description: The Hotel Ciutat de Girona is set in the historic and cultural heart of Girona, a 10-minute walk from Girona Train Station. It offers a professional spinning room. This property is decorated with iconic images from the city’s past, which blend well with the modern style. Rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen satellite TV, a safe and a minibar. Blanc restaurant serves local products, all of which come from within a 100 km radius. It serves a hot and cold buffet breakfast every morning.

name: NH Collection Vigo
address: Rua De Garcia Barbon, 17-19, 36201 Vigo, Galicia
description: The NH Collection Vigo is situated in Vigo’s commercial and financial district, near the Nautical Club and the Do Castro park. It has a fitness centre. All air-conditioned rooms at the NH Collection Vigo have free WiFi, a plasma TV with satellite channels and offer a pillow menu. The hotel’s restaurant, the Irati, specialises in traditional Galician cuisine. There is also a café-bar which serves a selection of tapas dishes. The NH Collection Vigo is in the heart of Vigo and 100' metres from the Modern Art Museum. Vigo Port is 400 metres away. It has easy access to the Atlántico Motorway, which links Vigo to the cities of Santiago de Compostela and La Coruña. The town's railway station is a 15-minute walk away and the airport is approximately 12 km from the hotel.

name: Eurostars Sevilla Boutique
description: Located in the Santa Cruz neighbourhood, Eurostars Sevilla Boutique is set on a XVI century palace and is 150 metres from the Giralda and the Sevilla Cathedral. The hotel has a business centre, restaurant and café-bar. Fresh dishes and drinks can be served on the terrace, with views over the Giralda and the Cathedral. The design of the building includes original paintings by local artists, which can be bought on site. It has an outdoor swimming pool, a Turkish bath and free WiFi. The outdoor pool, set in a plant-filled courtyard, can be used 6 months of the year. Eurostars Sevilla Boutique is a design hotel in the historic centre of Seville, offering spacious, air-conditioned rooms. It is just 150 metres from the Alcázar and the Town Hall.

name: Barceló Carmen Granada
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Privileged location in the heart of the city of GranadaThe hotel is located close to the historic commercial and business centres of the city just a few metres from Recogidas street and 500 metres from the Conference Centre.Perfect 360 degree viewsExclusive private terrace with a pool and solarium as well as a snack bar located on the rooftop. Its location offers 360 degree views of the Sierra Nevada and the Vela tower of the Alhambra.Comfort and style in every roomBright elegant fully-equipped rooms some of which come with a balcony or terrace offering views of the highlights of the Andalusian capital.Visitors to the Barcelo Carmen Granada hotel enjoy a perfect opportunity to discover some of the great architectural wonders of the citys long history first-hand. Excellent service in surroundings that imbue all the charm of southern Spain.Barcelo.com

name: AC Hotel Palacio Universal by Marriott
address: Rua Canovas Del Castillo, 28, 36202 Vigo, Galicia
description: The AC Hotel Palacio Universal, built in the latter part of the nineteenth century and located in the heart of the city, was the meeting point of the bourgeois and intellectual and political elite at the time. It is located in the best area of Vigo, in front of the Marina, near the historical town and not far from the beach and exhibition center. Our Vigo hotel offers minibar, fully equipped bathroom, special amenities in each guest room, AC Lounge, with temporary limited schedule, fitness center, and Turkish Bath. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: AC Hotel A Coruña by Marriott
address: Rua Enrique Marinas Romero, 34, 15009 A Coruña, Galicia
description: Located in what has been known for some time as the new business and residential area of A Coruña, this hotel is near the Expocoruña Exhibition Centre and the Coliseum Leisure Centre. The AC Hotel A Coruña is near the train station, city airport, and A-6 motorway allowing quick entry or exit to or from A Coruña. This urban hotel, perfectly located for enjoying the city or for business in A Coruña, features 116 guest rooms and a fitness center. Our guests can enjoy a delicious meal in the AC Lounge, with a varied menu open for lunch and dinner and a complete and healthy breakfast buffet in a polyvalent room. AC hotel A Coruña also features five exquisitely designed event rooms perfect for holding anything from business meetings to social get together. Free Wi-Fi access throughout the hotel so that guests can connect to the internet whenever they want.Marriott

name: Hotel San Juan de los Reyes
description: Located in the historical centre of Toledo, Hotel San Juan de los Reyes is housed in a charming old flourmill, with a neomudejar façade dating from the 19th century. Set in the old Jewish Quarter of the city, the San Juan is the ideal base for exploring the beautiful architecture and monuments of Toledo – the cathedral, the Greco Museum and synagogues. Enjoy magnificent views of the city from the hotel’s rooms, which are also equipped with hydro-massage bathtubs. Admire the interior decor of the Hotel San Juan, which has been conserved in keeping with the original design and decoration of the property.

name: Silken Coliseum
address: Plaza de Los Remedios, 1, 39001 Santander, Cantabria
description: Set in a former cinema, this hotel features a unique façade and is located 500 metres from the Botin Centre in Santander. It offers free Wi-Fi and a bar-café. The modern rooms at the Silken Coliseum come with air conditioning, satellite TV and a free safe. The private bathrooms feature a hairdryer. The hotel features a fitness centre. You can have drinks and tapas at the Bambalinas Café. A daily menu is also served. Silken Coliseum is situated just 300 metres from Santander Train Station. Santander Cathedral is 200 metres away.

name: Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center
address: Ctra. Arcos, km. 6, 11406 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center is part of the Barceló Montecastillo Hotel & Golf Resort, near the Jerez Formula 1 Track and 5 minutes’ drive from Jerez Airport. It features free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a spa. The large, bright rooms at the Jerez Montecastillo come with their own private balcony, as well as air conditioning. Facilities at the Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center include tennis courts and a fitness centre, available for an extra charge. The modern spa at Barcelo Montecastillo has a hot tub, a sauna, Turkish baths and a hydrotherapy circuit. There is also an 18-hole golf course designed by Jack Nicklaus. Access to both the spa and the golf course also carry an additional cost. Guests can enjoy buffet breakfast at El Lagar restaurant, which also serves lunch and dinner. Swimming pools and catering services are shared with another hotel located in the resort. These facilities are located 200 metres from Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center. Barceló Jerez Montecastillo & Convention Center is well located for the A-4 and the A-382 Motorways. The city of Jerez can be reached in 5 minutes by car.

name: Occidental Pamplona
description: The 4-star Occidental Pamplona hotel gives you the opportunity to visit the main points of interest of the capital of Navarre from a comfortable and relaxing stay that you can not miss. Get to know firsthand such interesting places as the famous Yamaguchi Park, the planetarium of Pamplona and the spectacular garden of the galaxies, as well as being able to easily take different means of transport, whether by bus, train or plane. All thanks to the privileged location of this hotel, from which you can explore the city of Pamplona and discover all its charm. It is worth noting that it is the first city on the Camino de Santiago and is the scene of the annual celebration of the Sanfermines, events that attract hundreds of thousands of tourists from all corners of the world. The hotel has been completely renovated and has fully equipped rooms designed for maximum comfort, without forgetting its exquisite restaurant, lobby bar, gym and parking.

name: Hotel Macia Sevilla Kubb
description: Hotel Macia Sevilla Kubb is set in Seville and features a fitness centre, a terrace with pool and a shared lounge. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 600 metres from Santa María La Blanca Church and around less than 1 km from Barrio Santa Cruz. The property is a 12-minute walk from La Giralda and Sevilla Cathedral and 1 km from Alcazar Palace. All guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Every room has a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries. The rooms include a desk. A buffet breakfast is served every morning at the property. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can provide tips on the area. Luggage storage, laundry and dry cleaning services are offered. Plaza de España is 1.5 km from Hotel Macia Sevilla Kubb. The nearest airport is Seville Airport, 8 km from the accommodation.

name: Allegro Granada
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Allegro Granada- belonging to the Barcelo Hotel Group is a modern hotel with 122 rooms located in the Beiro neighbourhood bordering the city centre less than 15 minutes away on foot.The Bull Ring the University Hospital and the Cartuja University Campus are located nearby as well as several public transport stops leading directly to the city centre. The train station is only 10 minutes walking distance. Its proximity to the old quarters accessibility and location on a quiet square make this hotel a perfect option for visiting Granada. The cheerfully decorated rooms are practical and functional and offer complete comfort. The Allegro Granada stands out for its facilities and services. On the top floor is a beautiful outdoor swimming pool with sun terrace for adults and children with access for people with reduced mobility a hot tub and a drinks and snacks service. The hotel also offers beautiful indoor and outdoor spaces to host all types of celebrations and events making it the best hotel in the city of Granada for the MICE segment. The new Allegro Granada is undoubtedly the ideal place for those who want to enjoy the spectacular sunsets that crown this beautiful city.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel Nord 1901
description: This family-run hotel is a 5-minute walk from Girona Cathedral. It offers a garden terrace with a small swimming pool, and rooms with flat-screen TV and free WiFi. All the elegant rooms include climate control, a safe and kettle. Apartments also have a kitchenette. Bathrobes, slippers and a professional hairdryer are provided in the modern bathrooms. At Nord 1901 Superior's reception staff can arrange room service or massages. They can also provide information about Girona and the nearby Costa Brava. Nord 1901 Superior is just 100 metres from the coloured houses of the River Onyar. Plaza Independencia is a 2-minute walk away and has a range of popular restaurants and cafés. Guests can also enjoy a buffet breakfast with views of the garden and in warm weather breakfast is served in the garden itself.

name: Hotel Plaza
address: Santiago Rey Fernández Latorre 45, 15006 A Coruña, Galicia
description: No description found

name: Hotel Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa
description: Set in large gardens, 5 minutes' drive from central Toledo, Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa offers free Wi-Fi, a paying spa, and a seasonal outdoor swimming pool. Each room has a private balcony. All rooms at the Hotel Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa are air conditioned and spacious. They have wooden floors, a 43-inch flat-screen TV, minibar, safe and a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a hairdryer. The Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa Hotel has a buffet restaurant and an à la carte restaurant, offering seasonal dishes. There is also a poolside bar, a disco and a children’s play area. Available for a supplement, the spa contains a hydrothermal circuit with contrast showers, a sauna and an ice fountain. The Beatriz Toledo Auditorium & Spa is located 5-minute drive from Toledo’s old town, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Buses to the town centre stop 150 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Amadeus
description: Located just 150 metres from Seville Cathedral, in the Santa Cruz District, this hotel’s roof terrace offers views of the Giralda Bell Tower. All air-conditioned rooms have satellite TV and free WiFi. The hotel occupies 2 connected buildings, both based on a classical music theme. Guests receive a free welcome drink on the 18th-century interior patio, where there are musical instruments available to play in the soundproofed rehearsal room. The private bathroom of each room comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Some have a hydro-massage bath or shower. There is a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk.

name: Hotel Museu Llegendes de Girona
address: Portal de La Barca, 4, 17004 Girona, Catalonia
description: Housed in a restored 18th-century building, Hotel Museu Llegendes de Girona is located in Girona's old town, 150 metres from the Cathedral and Arab Baths. Rooms feature flat-screen TV, rain showers and free Wi-Fi. This design hotel offers elegant, individually decorated rooms. They all include air conditioning, a safe and minibar. The stylish modern bathrooms come with toiletries and slippers. Some have bathrobes. Breakfast is served in the Museu Llegendes de Girona’s dining room. The hotel has its own bar, and the popular cafés and restaurants of Plaça Independencia are just 400 metres away. Hotel Museu Llegendes de Girona offers views of Girona Cathedral and is just 200 metres from the famous Jewish Quarter. The hotel’s tour desk can provide more information about the city.

name: Abades Nevada Palace
address: C/ De La Sultana 3, 18008 Granada, Andalusia
description: Hotel Abades Nevada Palace is a modern hotel, located a 10-minute drive from Granada’s historic centre. It offers a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi throughout. All air-conditioned rooms at the Nevada Palace have satellite TV and a minibar. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and amenities. There is a bar and an à la carte restaurant. Room service is also available. The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a tour desk. The Sierra Nevada Ski Resort is a 30-minute drive from away.

name: Maroa Hotel
description: The Maroa Hotel is located between Plaza de Compostela and the ferry that goes to the Cíes Islands. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. Rooms at the Maroa Hotel have modern décor and are air conditioned. All have TV and free internet connection. Maroa Hotel serves a daily buffet breakfast. On the seafront, within walking distance, you will find a large number of bars and cafes. The historic center is 100 meters away. The hotel is 500 meters from Vigo's Museum of Modern Art and 800 meters from Charlie Rivel Park. The accommodation is located a 15-minute drive from Vigo-Peinador Airport and a short drive from the beautiful beaches of the Rías Baixas. Breakfast is served on the seventh floor.

name: NH Sevilla Plaza de Armas
address: Calle Marques de Paradas, 41001 Seville, Andalusia
description: The NH Sevilla Plaza de Armas hotel is centrally located in Seville. It’s just 7 minutes from the Santa Justa station, next to the 1992 World Exposition Center and near Sierpes Street, a prime shopping district. Guests are within walking distance of the nearby attractions. The NH Sevilla Plaza de Armas is only a few minutes’ walk from the Plaza del Museo, a mere 2.5km from the Museum of Fine Arts and 3km from the Olympic Stadium. There are 5 meeting rooms, catering for anywhere between 8 and 190 people. The hotel was renovated in the summer of 2019 and all of the 262 rooms within the NH Sevilla Plaza de Armas offer clean, contemporary design with hardwood floors. Free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, desks, and minibars come as standard in every room. Junior Suites include an additional sitting area and some have views over Isla de la Cartuja. A daily breakfast buffet including fresh breads and pastries is prepared for our guests. Requesting made-to-order hot dishes is an additional option. During lunch and dinner hours, Tablafina opens its doors to serve delightful dishes based on local produce and specialties, and in warmer months (May - October) be sure to visit our roof top pool and terrace skybar. Our 24-hour front desk staff are on hand to ensure guests have a perfect stay.Registration no; H/SE/00860 Category: 4 STARS Type: CityNH Hoteles

name: Patios del Orfebre
address: Calle Tejon Y Marin 1, 14003 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Located within 600 metres of Cordoba Mosque and 300 metres of Cordoba Synagogue, Patios del Orfebre provides rooms in Córdoba. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 800 metres from Roman Temple, 1 km from Calahorra Tower and a 13-minute walk from Merced Palace. The accommodation offers free WiFi. All units in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while certain rooms are fitted with a terrace. The units have a wardrobe. A Continental breakfast is offered in a location nearby. Viana Palace is 1.2 km from Patios del Orfebre.

name: Higueron Hotel Malaga, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Located in one of the most exclusive areas of Málaga, Higuerón Hotel Málaga, CURIO Collection by Hilton is a benchmark in exclusivity, a resort where luxury finds its maximum expression and excellence takes on a new meaning. A journey through the most cultural, culinary and artistic aspects of Málaga. 290 bedrooms and suites carefully designed to cover the most demanding needs of guests. Including the new suites in which exclusivity becomes the norm, opening up a world of disconnection, such as our Picasso Suites, duplex rooms with outdoor jacuzzi, solarium and Balinese beds. An unforgettable experience in our prestigious sport club, 24-hour gymnasium & our renowned NagomiSpa. 6 restaurants, which take diners on a trip around the world. A journey that begins with the local flavours of the area at Chupadeo and continues at MED. A culture based on flavour, starting at exclusive Sollo Restaurant, awarded a Michelin star. A strategic location with direct access to the beach thanks to our curious tram, which will also take you to the train station, from where you can travel to Málaga International Airport and the provincial capital city centre in just a few minutes.Official Hotel Information

name: Hotel Don Jaime 54
address: Calle Don Jaime I, 54-56, 50001 Zaragoza, Zaragoza
description: Fantastically located in the historic centre of Zaragoza by its famous river, Hotel Don Jaime 54 allows you to visit most of Zaragoza on foot. It features an on-site restaurant. The city's famous Pilar Basilica and cathedral are a short walk away. The city's cultural sights are just as near as the local shops, leisure facilities and business venues. Rooms are modern and simple with bright interiors and soothing, minimal colours. They have central heating and central air conditioning. After a busy day exploring the area, relax with a refreshing drink in the cafe-bar and exchange stories with other guests. Hotel Don Jaime 54's restaurant can cater for large groups and functions of up to 150 people.

name: Eurostars Maimonides
description: Facing Cordoba’s famous Grand Mosque, in the heart of the Jewish Quarter, this elegant hotel has a traditional Andalusian patio and free Wi-Fi. The air-conditioned rooms all have satellite TV, and many have views of the Mosque. The Eurostars Maimonides is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Congress Palace and Roman Bridge. The hotel offers on-site secure parking, subject to request. The light, spacious rooms in Maimonides Eurostars all offer marble floors and modern bathrooms. Seasonal air conditioning and heating is available. They also have minibars and safes. The hotel’s Azahara Restaurant offers typical Andalusian and international dishes. Guests can also dine on the patio, with its fountain and flowers. There are plenty of bars and restaurants located within walking distance of the hotel.

name: Eurostars Asta Regia
address: San Agustin 9, 11403 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: This modern hotel is located next to Plaza del Arenal Square in central Jerez, just 100 metres from the Town Hall and Alcázar. Eurostars Asta Regia Jerez offers a swimming pool, gym, steam bath and sauna. The air-conditioned rooms at the Eurostars Asta Regia Jerez feature modern décor with parquet floors. Each one comes with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen cable TV and a minibar. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Jerez Cathedral is 450 metres from the Eurostars Asta Regia Jerez, and there are many shops and restaurants nearby. Jerez Airport is 20 minutes’ drive away, and you can reach the coast in 25 minutes.

name: Silken Rona Dalba
address: Plaza San Juan Bautista 12, 37002 Salamanca, Salamanca
description: Just 2 minutes' walk from Plaza Mayor Square, Silken Rona Dalba offers air-conditioned rooms and free Wi-Fi throughout. It also has a café bar and breakfast buffet available. The rooms at the Hotel Silken Rona Dalba have en suite bathrooms, designer toiletries by Javier Mariscal, pillow menu and massage service at an extra cost. Perfectly situated in a small square ‘San Jaun Bautista de Barbalos’, opposite a small, pretty 12th century roman church.

name: Hesperia A Coruña Centro
address: Calle Juan Florez, 16, 15004 A Coruña, Galicia
description: Set 2 blocks from the seafront, the Hesperia A Coruña Centro is set in a modern, city-centre building. It features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, 100 metres from Plaza de Lugo Market. The comfortable rooms at the A Coruña Centro come with satellite TV, central heating, minibar, safe and private bathroom. Each has a queen-size or two single beds. The tour desk can provide information on other attractions in and around the area. The Picasso Museum and Opera House are within 5 minutes’ walk of Hesperia A Coruña Centro and the Riazor Stadium is 200 metres away. Palexco Convention Centre is a 15-minute walk from the property.

name: URH Sitges Playa
description: All rooms at the URH Sitges Playa have a private balcony and air conditioning. All include a spacious and elegant bathroom, safe, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. The Amanit Restaurant offers a unique fusion, the best of Balinese and Mediterranean food facing the sea. The URH Sitges Playa has a fitness center and a massage area (subject to availability and upon request). It also offers airport shuttle service and private covered parking for a daily fee.

name: Hotel Selu
description: Located a short stroll from Cordoba Train Station, the hotel offers guests an ideal base while in Cordoba. Guests can also enjoy complimentary internet in all areas. Guests of this 3-star hotel can plan sightseeing trips with the assistance of the tour desk. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. After a day of discovering the region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They are all soundproofed and include a radio, a desk and a mini bar. Hotel Selu Cordoba features a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to unwind of an evening. Alternatively, there is a large choice of international restaurants nearby. Cordoba's attractions, such as Calleja de las Flores, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Selu Cordoba. Medina Azahara is only a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Hotel Palacio Garvey
address: Tornería, 24, 11403 Jerez de la Frontera, Andalusia
description: The 19th-century Garvey Palace is located in the historic quarter of Jerez de la Frontera. It offers large, uniquely decorated rooms with hydromassage baths and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. The air-conditioned rooms in the Hotel Palacio Garvey have free internet access, minibars and music systems. The Palacio Garvey Hotel has a library, as well as a business centre with free Wi-Fi. The Garvey’s restaurant, La Condesa, serves modern Mediterranean and Andalusian dishes using local products. The hotel’s Patio Andaluz includes a café and bar, and a continental breakfast is served daily. Palacio Garvey can be found next to Calle Larga, one of Jerez’s main shopping streets. A variety of restaurants can be found in the area immediately around the hotel.

name: Best Western Premier CMC Girona
description: Located in the heart of the city's commercial area, the Ensanche, Best Western Premier CMC Girona is near to the most popular shops such as El Corte Ingles and Espai Girones, boutiques and fashion outlets and is withing walking distance to the historic city center. This four-start hotel is the perfect option for discovering Girona, thanks to its easy access and excellent communication with any point in the city, its complete facilities, and the quality of its services. All 111 rooms have all the necessities to make your stay in Girona an unforgettable experience. Each room equipped with Wi-Fi, TV, centralized air-conditioning and heating, desk with comfortable armchair, safe, minibar and a full bathroom. Best Western Premier CMC Girona offers a complete Wellness Centre with a hydromassage, a sauna, a treatment and massage cabin and a gym for the exclusive use of our guests. Relax and enjoy your stay with all five senses and avail a wonderful breakfast buffet and an outstanding a la carte menu specializing in Mediterranean cuisine with avant-garde touches in the Restaurant or just simply visit the place for leisure and relaxation with a wide range of cocktails in the bar. Furthermore, on-site amenities include free high speed Wi-Fi internet throughout the hotel; Internet Corner (E- Point) with a computer and printer; a fully equipped 7 meeting rooms with natural light and a capacity for up to 200 people and private underground parking for 52 vehicles for the exclusive use of our guests.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Subur Maritim
description: Situated in front of Sitges Beach, the Hotel Subur Maritim offers an outdoor pool and free WiFi. The air-conditioned rooms include a private terrace, most with sea views. Next to the Hotel Subur Maritim, the hotel’s Cau del Vinyet restaurant is set in a restored 1920s villa. It serves fresh Catalan cuisine, including a daily set menu. Each room at the Hotel Subur Maritim offers a minibar and flat-screen satellite TV. Rooms have a simple, functional design, and include a safe and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free coffee and tea are offered at the reception. The Hotel Subur Maritim is a 15-minute walk along the seafront promenade from the charming old town of Sitges. Bicycle rental is offered at the hotel’s 24-hour reception, and free parking is available on site. Terramar Golf Course is just 1.5 km away.

name: Meliá Sitges
description: Melia Sitges is set in a quiet area of Sitges, just 3 minutes’ walk from Balmins and Aiguadolç beaches. The hotel features a stylish garden with an outdoor pool, and a restaurant with a terrace. The Meliá Sitges is 5 minutes’ walk from Aiguadolç Marina and 15 minutes’ walk from the lively town centre. It is a 20-minute walk to the train station, which connects you with central Barcelona in just 40 minutes. The air-conditioned rooms at the Meliá feature modern, minimalist decor. Each one has a pillow menu and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The Bistrot Saffron restaurant serves modern Mediterranean food. There is also a stylish cocktail bar with modern seats in the garden.

name: Crisol Jardines de Córdoba
address: Calle Poeta Alfonso de Bonilla, 3, 14012 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Set in attractive gardens, the Crisol Jardines de Córdoba offers accommodation in Cordoba with a seasonal outdoor pool, a hot tub and a restaurant. There is free WiFi available throughout. The spacious rooms at the Ayre Córdoba feature classic décor and views of the hotel’s extensive gardens. All rooms have a TV, a safe and a minibar. The poolside Azaire Restaurant, a typical gastronomic space with terrace and volcanic stone, serves a range of Spanish cuisine. The hotel also has a viewing area where you can see panoramic views of the city, as well as an outdoor area for exercising. 2 tennis courts are also available for guests to use on request. The historic centre of Córdoba, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, is 4.6 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Sunway Playa Golf & Spa Sitges
address: Paseo Marítimo De Sitges 92-94, 08870 Sitges, Catalonia
description: This hotel is just 20 metres from Sitges Beach and next to Terramar Golf Course. It offers free bicycle rental, 2 pools and accommodation with free Wi-Fi, private balconies and fantastic views. All of the air-conditioned rooms in Playa Golf and SPA have tiled floors and satellite TV. The apartments have modern kitchens with a hob, microwave and washing machine. The Playa Golf has its own supermarket, and there is also a fitness centre and a games room. Reception is open 24 hours a day. The Sunway Playa Golf and Spa has a spa and it offers a hamman, sauna and massages at an extra cost and an indoor pool with a hot tub free of charge. The Sunway Playa Golf and SPA complex has 3 restaurants offering a range of Mediterranean dishes. There is also a bar offering views over the Mediterranean Sea. Guests can use the hotel's free bicycles (subject to availability) to explore Sitges, with the town centre a 10-minute ride away. Barcelona can be reached easily by car, via the C32 motorway, or by train from Sitges station.

name: Barceló Granada Congress
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. Barcelo Granada Congress part of Barcelo Hotel Group is a symbol in the historic city of Granada both for its privileged location and for its original architectural design. The hotel enjoys an unbeatable location located just a few meters from Calle Recogidas that connects the hotel with the city center. The hotel is part of the so called Zone 1 of the city the preferred area for all those who visit Granada for business reasons. It has a total of 249 rooms distributed in Superiors Junior Suites and the spectacular Suites with panoramic views of the city. All of the rooms are fully equipped equipped among other facilities complete bathroom with hydromassage column minibar hair dryer free Wifi safe pillow menu. All rooms include Junior Suites and Suites with whirlpool. The Suites also have a spacious lounge and panoramic bedroom with spectacular views of the entire city.Barcelo Granada Congress offers exceptional facilities and services highlighting its USpa and Fitness Center with panoramic views of the Sierra Nevada where you can enjoy all kinds of hydrotherapy and massage treatments with a specialized staff who will advise you at all times. In addition to the gastronomic restaurant where you can enjoy the unique flavors of the typical Andalusian gastronomy the hotel also has underground parking piano bar Japanese garden.Barcelo.com

name: Hotel Don Felipe
description: Situated in the historic centre of Segovia, Hotel Don Felipe offers beautiful views of the city and modern rooms with air conditioning. It also features gardens and free Wi-Fi throughout. A buffet breakfast is available at Don Felipe and there is also a bar. Due to its central location, many restaurants and cafes can be found nearby the hotel. Guests can relax on the hotel’s furnished sun terrace. The 24-hour reception also offers a tour desk with information on Segovia and its main points of interest. The Alcázar de Segovia is just 200 metres from Don Felipe Hotel. Plaza Mayor and Segovia Cathedral are less than 5 minutes’ walk away, while Madrid is 35 minutes’ away by high speed train.

name: Hotel Zentral Mayoral
description: Hotel Zentral Mayoral, located just in front of the bus terminal, 200 metres from Puerta de Bisagra and a 2-minute walk from the escalators to Zocodover Square, is centrally located in Toledo. The hotel has 110 rooms, many of them with terrace and views of the city. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, desk, and a bathroom with a bath or shower, and hairdryer. The hotel has eight meeting rooms and a restaurant and many companies have used for meetings or training days, because they know that the last detail will be taken into account for a successful day.

name: Hotel MIM Sitges
