description: Just 120 metres from Sitges Beach, Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa features a spa and a rooftop seasonal pool. Its stylish rooms have contemporary décor and some offer sea views. Each spacious room at Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa has air conditioning, a TV and minibar. The hotel provides beach towels for a refundable deposit. The hotel restaurant serves a range of both local and international cuisine. The rooftop sky bar offers sea and mountain views. Hotel MiM Sitges & Spa's Spa features a sauna, steam bath, sensation showers, leisure pool and heated beds where you can access with special discount. There is a 24 hour gym with free access for all guests. Sitges’ seafront promenade is just a few metres from the hotel. The town’s railway station is a 10-minute walk away and here you will find regular trains to Barcelona, 40 km away.

name: Exe Casa De Los Linajes
description: Surrounded by the historic district of San Esteban, this charming hotel is set in a building dating from the 16th century. Enjoy the aristocratic feel throughout your stay. Exe Casa de Los Linajes has been carefully restored to maintain many of its enchanting original features. Each of its rooms is individually styled and contains antique-style furniture. Some rooms are adapted for guests with reduced mobility. A gluten free breakfast is available under request. The historic feel of Exe Casa de Los Linajes will put you in the mood to explore the surrounding UNESCO World Heritage Site of Segovia.

name: Hotel Posada del Toro
description: Centrally located, Hotel Posada del Toro is is 200 metres from Granada Cathedral and Plaza Nueva. It offers rooms with a private bathroom and free Wi-Fi in all areas. The hotel is decorated in traditional Andalusian style and features a courtyard dating from the 19th century. All rooms at the Hotel Posada del Toro have air conditioning and heating. Bathrooms come with hairdryer, and there is also a TV in each room. Granada Town Hall and buses to the Alhambra can be found within 5 minutes' walk. There are several traditional tapas bars in the streets nearby.

name: Hotel Inglaterra
description: Situated in the city centre, Hotel Inglaterra Granada offers easy access to Granada's popular retail and sightseeing areas. It also provides free Wi-Fi, a 24-hour reception and meeting rooms. This elegant hotel offers an airport shuttle, luggage storage and a ticket service. There is public parking nearby for guests with a car. Just moments from nearby bars and clubs, this 3-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the local nightlife. All rooms are air conditioned and equipped with a mini bar, a hair dryer and a flat-screen TV. All provide a desk, a private bathroom and an in-room closet. Guests staying at Hotel Inglaterra Granada can enjoy a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, ideally based for those who want to stay close when looking for a bite to eat. A wide variety of eating options can also be found in close proximity to the property. The hotel is close to Granada Cathedral, Carrera del Darro and Madrasah of Granada. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Granada Train Station, which allows convenient access in and around Granada.Revato

name: Hotel Comfort Dauro 2
description: The Hotel Comfort Dauro 2 is situated in the centre of Granada, 5 minutes’ walk from the cathedral. It offers free WiFi and a tapas bar with a summer terrace. Set in a traditional building, the hotel features elegant rooms with dark wood floors. They are equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom. Hotel Comfort Dauro 2 is located 1 km from the stunning Alhambra Palace. Friendly staff are happy to provide information on the city and make suggestions for nearby restaurants and bars.

name: NH Collection Gran Hotel de Zaragoza
description: The NH Collection Gran Hotel de Zaragoza hotel, formerly known as NH Gran Hotel, is located in the commercial heart of Zaragoza. Stroll through high-end boutiques at the Paseo de la Independencia or wander through old town Zaragoza and explore its charming narrow streets. The train station is also close by and from here you can be in Madrid or Barcelona in under two hours. NH Collection Gran Hotel de Zaragoza is set in a beautiful building with traditional French moldings, high ceilings, and marble finishes. The 133 rooms are sophisticated with calm shades of white and luxurious mattresses and pillow menus for ultimate comfort. Feel at home with a 42-inch flat-screen TV, Nespresso machine, rain-effect showers, professional hair-dryers, and free Wi-Fi. Everyone will find a favorite on our large breakfast buffet. La Ontina Restaurant is the pride of our hotel, run by Michelin-starred chef Enrique Martinez. Here, you can enjoy fine local cuisine as well as have your meal al fresco at one of our terraces, accompanied by a delicious local wine. Have a fragrant coffee at the La Rotonda under its impressive dome roof or unwind with a drink at the La Ontina Gastro Bar. There are also five meeting rooms.NH Hoteles

name: H10 Casa de la Plata
description: Offering a swimming pool and a rooftop terrace, H10 Casa de la Plata is a deluxe place to stay in Seville. It is located a short stroll from Giralda and Seville Cathedral. This traditional hotel offers meeting rooms, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. Rooms are air-conditioned and come with top-of-the-range amenities such as a pillow menu, a mini bar and a rain shower. They all feature a flat-screen TV, bottled water and slippers. H10 Casa de la Plata houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax at the end of the day. The hotel also serves a daily breakfast. Attractions near H10 Casa de la Plata include Archivo General de Indias, the Casa de Murillo and Alcazar of Seville. It is within a 20-minute walk of Plaza de Armas Station, which allows easy access in and around Seville.Revato

name: Hotel Antik
description: Hotel Antik San Sebastian is located in San Sebastián’s Ondarreta district, 4 minutes’ drive from La Concha Bay. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel Antik San Sebastian features plasma satellite TV. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer, and some rooms also have a large balcony. Gipuzkoa University is a 10-minute walk from the hotel, and the city centre is 3.5 km away. City buses leave from nearby, and there is good access to the AP-1 and AP-8 Motorways.

name: Balcón de Córdoba Hotel
description: The hotel has a wonderful location just 70 m from the mosque of Córdoba. The Guadalquivir River is only 300 m from the hotel and the Córdoba airport just 15 minutes by car. The town centre and the bus station can be reached in 20 minutes on foot. Facilities The establishment was built in 2011. The establishment comprises a total of 10 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Services such as a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a breakfast room, a café and a bar. A garden is among the features contributing to a pleasant stay. A TV room is also among the amenities at the establishment. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (for a fee). Additional services include a childcare service, room service and a laundry. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. Most rooms additionally feature a balcony or a terrace. Each accommodation unit features a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A safe and a minibar also feature. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and wireless internet access. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The terrace is the perfect place to while away the time. There is also a poolside snack bar. A wellness area with a solarium is available. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. The establishment additionally offers special deals. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA and MasterCard, are accepted for payment. Please note that the hotel do not have a valet parking service at this moment as a sanitary measure. Therefore, the hotel offer you information about the closest car parks to the hotel. If you have light luggage and want to park your car first, its best to head towards (Parking Mezquita) C/Cairuan 1. and continue on foot to the house. If you need to unload your luggage before parking your car, the hotel must head towards, Calle Amador de los ríos. At this point you will see that it is not possible to access unless you have permission. the hotel have the permission to access, the hotel will only ask for your license plate at the check in. At this point DO NOT ENTER even if the barrier is down. Call the intercom and say you are coming to hotel Balcón de Córdoba, in order for them to open up the barrier or give you access if the barrier is down. Once you have gained access, you should take the first left (Calle Torrijos) and drive around the Mosque until you reach the corner where Casa Pimpo restaurant is located. At this point you can park the vehicle and then with your luggage, head towards Calle Encarnación, about 20 metres away is where the house is located. Once the staff unload the luggage in reception, to park your vehicle at the parking garage, the hotel will head towards Paseo de la Ribera, 1, (Parking la Ribera), about 3-minute drive. If you use a GPS navigator, the hotel recommend that you DO NOT note the street where the hotel is located (Calle Encarnación) and follow the directions, as they may lead you through narrow streets.WebBeds

name: Hotel Córdoba Medina Azahara Affiliated by Meliá
description: Sercotel Córdoba Medina Azahara is situated 10 minutes' walk from the centre of Córdoba and its Jewish Quarter. It features free WiFi throughout, as well as a seasonal outdoor pool on the 7th floor. Each modern room comes with a satellite TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom. Sercotel Córdoba Medina Azahara offers a buffet breakfast service, as well as a snack bar. There is a mini gym and 2 conference rooms. The hotel is approximately 15 minutes’ walk from Córdoba Mosque and 1 km from the Alcázar Castle and Gardens. The AVE High-Speed Train Station and Córdoba's bus station are less than 500 metres away.

name: Guitart Central Park Aqua Resort
address: Constanti Ribalaigua 7, 17310 Lloret de Mar, Catalonia
description: Located in the centre of Lloret, Hotel Guitart Central Park Aqua Resort is less than 10 minutes’ walk from the beach. It features 4 swimming pools and free Wi-Fi in all the complex. The large and colourful rooms at the Hotel Guitart Central Park Aqua Resort have a balcony, air conditioning and satellite TV. There are 2 swimming pools, 1 with waterfalls, located in the hotel gardens and the terraces are perfect for sunbathing. The spa offers a variety of treatments and massages. The new water park offers different facilities such as the Splash Park, a children's area, a swimming pool and a leisure area. The hotel’s seasonal restaurants, Mediterrani, Little Italy, and Lloret De Mar, serve a selection of Spanish and international cuisine. There is also an evening entertainment programme and between June and September there are activities for children. Lloret’s resort centre, where there is a selection of shops, bars and cafés is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Guitart. Barcelona and Girona can be reached in around an hour by car.

name: Hotel Medina de Toledo
description: Hotel Medina de Toledo offers a terrace with stunning views of Toledo and air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. This small hotel offers 18 rooms, and is located just a 1-minute walk from Zocodover Square. All rooms feature bright décor and tiled floors, and include a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. Hotel Medina de Toledo has a 24-hour reception, and offers tourist information about the city, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Toledo Cathedral is a 5-minute walk from the property, while Toledo AVE Train Station is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Córdoba Centro
address: Calle Jesús y María 8, 14003 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Set in the heart of the beautiful, historical city of Cordoba, in Andalusia, this modern hotel provides a tranquil atmosphere from which to explore the city. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. Hotel Cordoba Centro is situated in the old Jewish Quarter of the city, where you can see some of the most attractive monuments in Cordoba. Visit the stunning Mezquita de Cordoba, located just a short walk from the hotel. You can also find Plaza de las Tendillas just outside the hotel. From here, you can also get to the main shopping and entertainment area of the city. Cordoba's train and bus stations are within 15 minutes' walk of the hotel. Public parking is available.

name: Occidental Cádiz
description: In terms of safety against viral diseases including COVID19 we have adapted our prevention and hygiene procedures to ensure the atmost safety and wellbeing of our guests staff and suppliers at all our hotels For your study and development we have constituted a Technical Commission whose aim is for us to enjoy the return to the activity with maximum safety We have created the program for this purpose We care about you which includes a sizing plan to ensure you enjoy your next stay at any of our hotels in complete tranquility. The Occidental Cadiz hotel part of the Barcelo Hotel Group and formerly the Barcelo Cadiz is located on Avenida Andalucia close to the Conference Centre and within easy reach of all the main tourist attractions in the city while being just a few moments away from the main city beach. An urban hotel in the heart of Cadiz.It has 96 bright rooms measuring up to 30 m2 equipped with beds with widths up to 2.10 m Free Wi-Fi fully equipped bathroom with a hair dryer satellite TV 24-hour room service and many more facilities. With nearly 300 m2 of space for meetings distributed over 4 function rooms 2 of which can be joined forming a function room of 80 m2 the hotel is the perfect place to organise events and conferences. It also has another 2 function rooms with natural light all of them with a maximum capacity of up to 120 people. The hotel has a restaurant with buffet service or a la carte menu with a cafe and terrace. If you want to visit the beach on hotter days Victoria Beach is just 100 m away. If you prefer to visit the historic centre the old quarters are just 15 minutes on foot and the football stadium is 800 m from the hotel. Its exceptional location good transport connections to any point in town and the surrounding areas in addition to its facilities and services make the Occidental Cadiz the perfect hotel for a holiday with your partner or family as well as being a comfortable place to stay for business trips.Barcelo.com

name: Melia Lebreros
description: The stylish Meliá Lebreros is located in Seville’s commercial district, 400 metres from Santa Justa AVE Train Station. Renovated in 2016, it has a seasonal outdoor pool, gym and modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. The hotel's smart rooms have air conditioning, a minibar and a private bathroom with free toiletries. All rooms have flat-screen satellite TV and a pillow menu. The hotel also dedicates some of its areas to The Level exclusive rooms and services, where The Level guests have private access to The Level Lounge with a private buffet, daily cocktails, press and concierge services and pre-arrival services. Rooms include pillow menu, superior amenities and toiletries, sound tower, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and turndown service, among other services. Meliá Lebreros provides a variety of culinary options. Mosaico Restaurant offers an all-day dining experience and specialises in local and international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy local dishes in a traditional atmosphere at La Taberna la Dehesa or have a drink at Bribone Bar. The hotel has a business centre and several meeting rooms and there is easy access by road to the Fibes Congress Centre from the hotel. Car hire can be arranged at reception. The Meliá Lebreros is opposite 2 shopping and leisure centres, and Sevilla FC’s Sánchez Pizjuán Stadium is just 300 metres away. The historic city centre is within walking distance. Nervión Metro Station is just 200 metres from the hotel.

name: Exe Las Adelfas
description: Exe Las Adelfas is set in the residential district of Brillante, 5 minutes’ drive from Córdoba city centre. It features attractive gardens, a seasonal outdoor pool and free WiFi. Rooms at Las Adelfas are bright and air conditioned. All accommodation has satellite TV and a minibar. The Exe Las Adelfas restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast as well as dinner service from 8:30 p.m. to 10:30 p.m. The hotel is approximately 3 km from Córdoba’s old town, which has a wide selection of cafés and traditional tapas bars. The city’s famous mosque is around 10 minutes’ drive from Las Adelfas. The number 13 bus stops outside the hotel and connects you to Córdoba Railway and Bus Station, as well as the main shopping district. Free exterior parking is available, as well as secure garage parking for a surcharge.

name: Hotel Palacio de Santa Paula, Autograph Collection
address: Gran Via de Colon 31, 18001 Granada, Andalusia
description: The Palacio de Santa Paula Autograph Collection, one of the best five-star hotels in Granada, is a 73 room restored masterpiece that was also declared an artistic and historic monument. It replaced the Santa Paula Monastery and the Casa Morisca, which existed in the XVI and XII centuries respectively. The beautiful hotel is located in the historic center of Granada near the Albaicín and Sacromonte areas, the Cathedral and of course, the Alhambra. This luxury hotel’s restaurant, “El Claustro”, where the Santa Paula monastery refectory used to be, offers guests haute cuisine that fuses elements of traditional Andalusian gastronomy with modern culinary concepts, a gastronomic trip around Granada province. R.T.A. Registration Number H/GR/01177.Marriott

name: Hacienda Posada De Vallina
address: Corregidor Luis De La Cerda, N 83, 14005 Córdoba, Andalusia
description: Set next to Córdoba’s famous Mezquita Cathedral, the Hotel Posada de Vallina by MiRa offers luxurious accommodation set in a traditional Andalusian house. It features free Wi-Fi and rooms with flat-screen TVs. Set in Córdoba's Jewish Quarter, Posada de Vallina maintains many of the building’s original features including exposed stone walls, beamed ceilings and original archways. The hotel’s bedrooms feature traditional décor, with most overlooking a pretty indoor courtyard. A buffet breakfast is served in the Vallina’s restaurant, while the hotel's bakery sells traditional Cordoban pastries and cakes. Restaurants, cafés and tapas bars can be found nearby. Staff at the hotel’s 24-hour reception can provide information on Córdoba’s tourist attractions, as well as arrange excursions and reservations for city tours, flamenco shows and visits to Arab Baths.

name: AACR Monteolivos
description: AACR Hotel Monteolivos is a 5-minute walk from Seville’s AVE Train Station and 1 km from Sánchez Pizjuan Football Stadium. Set in gardens, the hotel offers a seasonal outdoor pool. The air-conditioned rooms have free Wi-Fi, a TV with internet access, and a safe. There is a work desk, and the private bathroom comes with a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms feature contemporary décor with artwork inspired by the city of Seville. Guests can enjoy a breakfast, which is served in the hotel’s dining room, which offers views of the gardens. There is a 24-hour reception. On-site parking is offered for an extra charge. Six bus routes link the hotel with central Seville.

name: Villa Oniria
description: A 19th-century manor house, situated in the heart of the city centre, Villa Oniria has been carefully restored in a traditional Andalusian style. Offering 31 comfortable and welcoming rooms, the hotel provides somewhere to escape to in every corner. Stroll around the garden, bursting with aromatic plants and featuring 2 fountains, which leads onto a beautiful inner patio - a fantastic place to relax, surrounded by luxury.

name: Catalonia Hispalis
description: Catalonia Hispalis offers good-value accommodation with free Wi-Fi internet access. This modern hotel is near to Seville Airport, and has good access to the historic city centre. The hotel has air-conditioned rooms with exterior views, free Wi-Fi and interactive satellite TV. The en suite bathroom has a hairdryer. The Catalonia Hispalis has a restaurant, serving international cuisine. There is also a café-bar. Room service is available 24 hours a day. Hispalis Hotel is next to the E-5 motorway and there is a bus stop to central Seville directly opposite the hotel. Santa Justa Train Station and the Fibes Convention Centre are just 2 km away.

name: Hotel Macià Granada Five Senses Rooms & Suites
address: Calle Gran Via De Colon, 25, 18001 Granada, Andalusia
description: Located on Granada’s central Gran Via Avenue, Hotel Macià Granada Five Senses Rooms & Suites is just 200 metres from Granada Cathedral. It offers an outdoor pool with views of the historic city centre and the Cathedral. All air-conditioned rooms and suites include free WiFi, a safe, and work area with a desk. Each private bathroom includes free toiletries and a hairdryer. All suites include a free minibar and coffee capsules, and some come with a hot tub. Hotel Macià Granada Five Senses Rooms & Suites is situated 400 metres from the beautiful Albaicin district. The Alhambra Palace is a 25-minute walk or a 10-minute bus ride away. Direct buses to Granada Airport also stop on Gran Via. You can find a wide range of typical tapas bars in the nearby Bib Rambla Square and Elvira Street. There is a free internet corner and TV lounge at Granada Five Senses. Staff at the 24-hour reception can provide visitor information and book tickets for the Alhambra. The property also offers an on-site spa, solarium, beauty treatments, and hairdressers.

name: Hotel Macià Cóndor
description: Located close to the commercial and historical centre of Granada, the elegant Macia Condor offers rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. The hotel operates a 24-hour reception. A buffet breakfast is available and the hotel also offers an à la carte restaurant. Guests can relax in the bar or on the terrace. Granada’s famous UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Albaicin, is less than 10 minutes away by foot. The cathedral is 800 metres away.

name: Hotel Sercotel Doña Carmela
description: Sercotel Dona Carmela Hotel provides modern 3-star accommodation in Seville. It also offers a concierge, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. In addition, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide local information. After a day of exploring the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. All provide their very own bathroom where a hair dryer can be found. Those staying at Sercotel Dona Carmela Hotel can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently located for those who want to stay close by for a meal. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the dining room, or there is a variety of popular eateries in the local area to discover. Sercotel Dona Carmela Hotel has private parking on site and is within easy driving distance of Alcazar of Seville, Seville Cathedral and Plaza de Espana. Magic Island Theme Park, Maria Luisa Park and Island of the Charterhouse are just an easy drive from the hotel.Revato
